ACTIVE_RANKING: Here you can see how your friends are doing in this category!

ALL_REVIVED:
Hello!

While you were away, I have revived all your animals and plants!
ANIMATION_TOOLTIP: Turn off/on animations. Without animations, the game will work faster.
API_INVITE: Hello! Join our adventures in Oceania!
ARROW_TOOLTIP: You can use it to select map elements that do not require special tools

AXE_NOT_FOUND: You need an axe to chop down a tree. You will get it later in the game.
BONUS_ACTIVE: You already have an active bonus
BONUS_TOOLTIP_NOTE: Quickly click on the goods to earn bonus experience!
BRAG_CHAPTER: I've finished the chapter - %quest%. Have you finished it already?
BRAG_COMPETITION: I set my score in the Competition island TOP. Can you beat me?
BRAG_FRIEND: I helped %friend%. Maybe you can help me settle on my island?
BRAG_LEVELUP: I gained %level%. Which level do you have?
BRAG_QUEST: I've completed the quest - %quest%. Have you completed it already?
BUILDING_FINISH: To finish this construction you need these objects.
CANT_USE_HERE: This tool can't be used here
CAVE_KEY_NEED: You need a key to open a treasure chest.
CAVE_LIGHT_NOT: You don't have %name%. You can buy it.
CHARACTER_STUCK:
Oh, no. It seems you're stuck and cannot move anywhere 
Press F5 to reload the game.
COLLECTION_INFO: You can find collectables by performing various actions, such as digging, fishing and harvesting plants.
COMPETITION_CLOSED_INFO: The 1st season of competition island has come to an end. Therefore, it's no longer possible to start a new competition, but there's no need to worry - the 2nd season is approaching and will offer new rewards as well as other improvements!
COMPETITION_END_TEXT: The time for this competition has run out. To retry a competition challenge, get on the mysterious ship!
COMPETITION_QUEST_VALIDATION: Do you really want to start "%name%" competition?
COMPETITION_REWARD_DESCRIPTION: Well done! You've finished the competition and earned valuable rewards. If you want to retry a competition challenge, you can get on the mysterious ship and go on a new adventure!
CRAFTING_NOSLOTS: No more slots to add to crafting queue
CRAFTING_TOOLTIP: Here you can craft food and different resources
CRAFTING_TOO_LOW_LEVEL: This formula will be available, when you upgrade the workshop to higher level.
DIALOG_ADVENT_BUY_CONFIRM: Do you want to make this purchase?
DIALOG_ADVENT_CAPTION: Just one purchase to get access to ALL missed days, bouth backward and forward.
DIALOG_BRIDGE: A broken bridge! There definately will be a way to repair it.
DIALOG_CHECK_REMOVE: Removing this withered plant you will lose it forever and you will not be able to revive it.
DIALOG_CHECK_RENEW: Reviving this withered plant, it will ready for harvest.
DIALOG_FEED_FRIEND: You can feed an animal, if you have enough food.
DIALOG_HEALTH: You can heal an animal with a medipack or a ruby, thus saving it's rank. Or you can sell it for diminished price.
DIALOG_HEALTH_FRIEND: You can heal friend's sick animals, spending a ruby. For your good deed you will gain reputation.
DIALOG_INVENTORY: You can put the bought energy item in your backpack or use it at once.
DIALOG_RAFT: Do you want to leave this small hospitable island?
DIALOG_RENEW: You can revive withered crops, spending a ruby or reviving potion.
DIALOG_RENEW_FRIEND: You can revive friend's withered crops, spending a ruby or reviving potion. For your good deed you will gain reputation.
DIALOG_UPGRADE: You can start upgrading this building if you have these things!
DLG_GOTO_WINTER: Do you want to visit Kiritimati island?
DLG_GOTO_WINTER_HOME: Do you want to go back home?
EXPERIENCE_TOOLTIP: %hp% experience needed to reach the next level
FISHINGROD_NOT_FOUND: In order to get that big catch, you need a fishing rod!
FRIEND_BOX_EMPTY: The chest is empty. Ask your friends to help you, to fill it with various goods!
FRIEND_BOX_FAIL: Friend's help is not available, because you removed the element with which your friend had helped.
FRIEND_BOX_FAIL1: Help is not available for this element.
FRIEND_BOX_HARVEST: A friend gathered your crops for you!
FRIEND_BOX_TOOLTIP: Here you can find goods that your friends have produced for you by visiting your island and performing various activities on it.
FRIEND_EVENTS_LEFT1: You have spent all your lucky events today.
FRIEND_HELP_TIME: You cannot help your friend all the time. Wait until you've recharged to lend a helping hand again!
FRIEND_NO_HELP: You can't interact with this object!
FRIEND_NO_OBJECT: No interactivity available for this object!
FRIEND_NO_WORKS: You don't have any actions left!
F_VISIT_FRIEND_LOW_LEVEL: You cannot visit this friend, because they have not finished the first chapter yet.
F_VISIT_INACTIVE: Your friend hasn't visited the game for too long and has been archived. Let them know and invite them back!
F_VISIT_LOW_LEVEL: To visit friends, you have to play a bit further in the game
GIFT_DAILY_LIMIT: The maximum number of gifts received per Oceania Day is 20 gifts. The total mailbox size is 60 gifts. This does not include ruby ​​gifts, the number of which is unlimited.
GIFT_HINT_FRIENDCOUNT: You have already sent a free gift to a friend
GIFT_HINT_FRIENDFULL: Your friend has a full mailbox. Tell them to empty it!
GIFT_HINT_FRIENDLIMIT: Your friend has reached free gift limit
GIFT_HINT_GIFTCOUNT: You can send %count% free gifts today
GIFT_HINT_GIFTLIMIT: You have reached your free gift limit for today
GIFT_LIMIT_REACH: Your friend has reached free gift limit!
GIFT_TOOLTIP_LEVEL: To give this gift, you must reach %level% level!
GIFT_TOOLTIP_QUEST: To give this gift, you must fulfill a quest!
HELP_TOOLTIP_NOTE: Press me. I will try to help you!

JOURNAL_TOOLTIP: Here you can see what active quests are available to you
LOCK_GIFT: You can send maximum of 20 free gifts one to each friend.

MOVETOOL_TOOLTIP: Move any movable object (e.g. sand paths)
MTS_CONFIRM_CANCEL: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
MTS_SUBSCRIPTION_CANCELED: The service has been cancelled for future subscriptions. It will still be available until the end of the specified period.
MTS_TP_INFO_NOTE: The character will move almost instantly, and there will be greater speed for performing actions.
NEW_DAY_STARTED: A new Oceania Day has begun. You can help your friends again and send free gifts. Reopen the game and you will receive the daily tasks and gift bonus.
NEW_GAME_TEXT:
All your game progress and earned resources (including rubies!) will be deleted and the game will start completely from the beginning.

The process is irreversible.

If you want to continue, input the phrase below:
NOT_ENOUGHT_ITEMS: To do this you need more:
NOT_ENOUGH_RESOURCES: You're missing some of the needed resources.
NOT_PLANT_HERE: You need to dig a field to plant it!
NOT_TRANSFORM: You can't upgrade this building for now!
PATH_NOT_FOUND: The way is blocked! You need clear obstacles
PICKAXE_NOT_FOUND: You need a pick-axe to split a large rock. You will get it later in the game by completing quests.
PICKBIG_NOT_FOUND: Apparently this pile of rocks requires a better pick-axe. You will be able to get it later in the game.
PRINTSCREEN_TOOLTIP: Take a picture of the visible area
PROFILE_ACHIEVEMENTS_NOTE: Check who the most famous Oceania players are
PROFILE_ACHIEVEMENTS_NOTE_INACTIVE: You can view the top when you return to your main island
PROFILE_BEGIN_NOTE: Delete all current progress and start a new game from the very beginning
PROFILE_COLLECTION_NOTE: Check out which collection items you already have!
PROFILE_COLLECTION_NOTE_INACTIVE: Collections can be viewed when you return to your main island
PROFILE_DELETING_PLAYER: Deleting game progress - please, wait the game will refresh
PROFILE_HELP_NOTE: Need help? Visit this section and search for answers!
PROFILE_KAUSS_NOTE: Here you can see all the Oceania Cup winners from the last competition.
PROFILE_MYPLACE_NOTE: You can view your profile here.
PROFILE_NEWS_NOTE: Find out the latest news in the game
PROFILE_PROFILE_NOTE: Customise your avatar and put on newly bought clothes and accessories!
QUEST_CANCEL: You wont be able to restart this quest!
QUEST_CANCEL_RESTART: The quest will be stored in quest archive and you will be able to restart it any time, paying 1 ruby, but you will lose all its task progress.
QUEST_CANCEL_TITLE: Are you sure you want to lay aside this side quest?
QUEST_FRIEND_ISLAND: This task can be fulfilled only on your friends' islands
QUEST_ISLAND: This task can be fulfilled only on an island "%name%"
QUEST_MY_ISLAND: This task can be fulfilled on any of your islands
QUEST_RESTART: Do you want to restart this quest? It will added to your active quest journal and you will be able to complete its tasks.
RESTART_COMPETITION_QUEST: Do you really want to decline the quest "%name%" and begin a new competition?
REVIVE_ALL_RELOAD: To revive all plants and animals, it is necessary to reload the game. Do it now?
ROTATETOOL_TOOLTIP: Rotate any object that can be rotated
RUBIES_TRANSFER_TITLE: Transfer rubies from your main island
RUBIE_TRANSFER_TOOLTIP_TEXT: On the left side, you can see how many rubies you've chosen to transfer. On the right side, the maximum amount that you can still transfer during the competition is shown. Take into account, that you can't send rubies back to your main island.
SCREEN_SIZE: It would seem that your game window is smaller than necessary. Click somewhere outside the game window and press  "ctrl + 0" to make the whole game visible.
SELLTOOL_TOOLTIP: Sell any object that can be sold
SERVER_DESYNC: Sorry, data is out of sync. Please, refresh the game to continue playing.
SERVER_LOADING: At the moment, we're saving data on our servers. When the icon disappears, the new changes will have been successfully saved.
SEVER_NO_RESPONSE: Answer from the server is delayed. Please wait, when this message disappears, you will be able to continue playing.
SHARED_OBJECT_DISABLED: I can't save the changes because Local Shared Objects are currently disabled. If you don't know how to enable them, contact our client support.
SHOP_LEVEL_REQURED: Level %level%. required to buy this item!
SHOP_QUEST_REQUIRED: You need to complete a quest to buy this item:
SHOP_TOOLTIP: Here you can buy plants, animals, building and special items
SHOP_WRONG_MAP: You cant buy this item on this map
SMS_VIP_INFO_NOTE: When making any payments in the Oceania game, you will receive both your paid service and special VIP points. These points are special kind of reward for our most dedicated supporters. By collecting a certain amount of points, you will receive VIP club levels and special game prizes that can only be obtained here.
SOUND_TOOLTIP: Turn on or turn off the sound
SPOT_NOT_AVAILABLE:
Not enough space!
Clear space or try elsewhere.
START_COMPETITION_TEXT: Are you ready to accept one of the 30-day challenges and travel to Competition island?
SUPERSPADE_NOT_FOUND: You need an iron spade to dig here. You will get it later in the game by completing quests.
TEMP_USER_ACTION_UNAVAILABLE: This action is only available to registered users
TEMP_USER_LEVEL_LIMIT: Congratulations on reaching level %level%! Currently your games progress is saved in your browsers cookies, which will not be available on other devices, reinstalled systems, if accidentaly erased etc. Please authorize  to make sure you don't use your games progress.
TEMP_USER_RUBIES_UNAVAILABLE: Buying rubies is only available to registerd players
VIP_0_DESCR: By purchasing any Oceania paid services, you support our game and earn VIP points. When you reach a new level, you will receive bonuses and various benefits that do not exist in the game otherwise.
VIP_1_DESCR: VIP club outfit and two unique level bonuses.
VIP_2_DESCR: Pet gecko x5 and a new start of the day window - Aztec bounty.
VIP_3_DESCR: The Monkey King, who brings additional benefits and enhanced VIP bonuses.
VIP_4_DESCR: A special bundle of forest treats and a daily news window - Pirate Treasures.
VIP_5_DESCR: The second hammerhead ​​fishing spot and the opportunity to duplicate one of the workshop's products.
VIP_PROGRESS_NEXT_LEVEL: Gain another %points% points to reach the next level
VIP_PROGRESS_NEXT_LEVEL_MAX: You have reached max VIP level
VIP_SUBTITLE2: Claim membership ranks of the VIP club to receive exclusive bonuses.
VIP_TOOLTIP_ITEM_1:
The Coconut level reward is a special VIP club outfit.
Rep. bonus - affects the amount of reputation gained by selling the most profitable reputation animals (truffle pigs, llamas).
Elix. bonus - increases the amount of Moonlight Elixir produced.
VIP_TOOLTIP_ITEM_2:
Banana level reward is five activations for the Gecko pet.
Rep. bonus - affects the amount of reputation gained by selling the most profitable reputation animals (truffle pigs, llamas, wallabies).
Potao bonus - increases the number of potatoes harvested.
Elix. bonus - increases the amount of Moonlight Elixir produced.
New start of day window with Aztec theme and better rewards.
VIP_TOOLTIP_ITEM_3:
Strawberry level reward is a map object that can be placed on any buildable base map - Monkey Shaman.
Rep. bonus - affects the amount of reputation gained by selling most reputation animals. (truffle pigs, llamas, wallabies, platypuses).
Potao bonus - increases the number of potatoes harvested.
Elix. bonus - increases the amount of Moonlight Elixir produced.
New start of day window with Aztec theme and better rewards.
VIP_TOOLTIP_ITEM_4:
Reward is the third forest bounty that appears on the island when there are already wild berries and mushrooms.
Rep. Bonus - affects the amount of reputation gained by selling most reputation animals. (Truffle Pigs, Llamas, Wallabies, Platypuses).
Potao bonus - increases the number of potatoes harvested.
Elix. Bonus - increases the amount of Moonlight Elixir produced.
New morning window with a pirate theme and better rewards.
VIP_TOOLTIP_ITEM_5:
Reward is the second Hammerhead fishing spot on Haraiki Island.
Rep. Bonus - affects the amount of reputation gained by selling reputation animals.
Potao bonus - increases the number of potatoes harvested.
Elix. Bonus - increases the amount of Moonlight Elixir produced.
New start of day window with a pirate theme and even better rewards.
DOUBLE one long crafted item in the workshop once per day.
ZOOMIN_TOOLTIP: Zoom-in to see details of the island
ZOOMOUT_TOOLTIP: Zoom-out to see more of the island

COLLECTIONS.INFO_1: You can find butterflies by harvesting corn, melons and pumpkins as well as buying small flowers.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_10: You can find traveller's items by searching camelthorns, aloe, red-flower cactuses, volcanic blocks, pointy-leaf plants, club-moss, curcumas, savannah grass, as well as using carnivorous plants.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_11: You can find masks by doing many different actions in game. Like, visiting Mysterious cave, cultivating plants, diging ponds or even making objects at workshop.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_12: You can get mushrooms by doing various things on friend islands.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_13: Collection items can only be found on the island of long vacation.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_14: You can obtain New year's items by greeting guests on Festival island.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_15: The animal footprints can only be found in their natural enviroment - deep forest.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_2: Shells can be found by emptying the well and fishing.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_3: Rocks can be found by digging, feeding chicken and hens, and emptying the clay pit.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_4: Bird feathers can be found by feeding ducks, roosters, chickens and ostriches.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_5: Everyday objects can be found when building sheds, stools, chairs and tables.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_6: Arthropods can be found when cutting tall, broad or sturdy palms, and harvesting beans or tomatoes.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_7: Flowers can be obtained by buying blue, white or orange flowers, crafting clay pots and using beehives.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_8: You can find gifts of nature on friends' islands by emptying wells, beehives, harvesting onions and wheat, and feeding grown-up birds.
COLLECTIONS.INFO_9: Gifts of the animal world can be found on friends' islands by feeding cats, dogs, sheep, goats, and emptying clay pits as well as fireplaces.

29.DESCRIPTION: To make the island more attractive, you can decorate it with flowers.

3.NAME: Wood-cutting
3.DESCRIPTION: Now that you have created an axe, you can obtain wood!

30.NAME: Florist
30.DESCRIPTION: Start placing flowers to obtain additional reputation.

31.NAME: Fruit trees
31.DESCRIPTION: It's time to grow some fruit!

32.NAME: Fruit harvest
32.DESCRIPTION: If you need additional experience and reputation, prepare some fruit dishes.

33.NAME: Iron axe
33.DESCRIPTION: You can definitely find something useful behind the huge baobab trees, but you won't be able to cut them with your primitive axe!

34.NAME: Ironwood handle
34.DESCRIPTION: A traveling merchant can give you parts of the axe in exchange for various goods.

35.NAME: Iron blade
35.DESCRIPTION: A traveling merchant can give you parts of the axe in exchange for various goods.

36.NAME: Huge baobabs
36.DESCRIPTION: It's time to put your new axe to the test!

37.NAME: More space
37.DESCRIPTION: Remove all baobabs to receive additional reputation!

38.NAME: Fishing spot
38.DESCRIPTION: There seems to be a fishing spot on the newly discovered shore. To use it, you'll need a fishing rod!

39.NAME: Fishing rod
39.DESCRIPTION: You'll need a proper branch to make a fishing rod.

4.NAME: Wood-cutting specialist
4.DESCRIPTION: Prove that you are a diligent wood-cutter to receive additional experience and reputation!

40.NAME: Hook
40.DESCRIPTION: You can make a decent hook out of bone.

41.NAME: Fishing line
41.DESCRIPTION: Now, you must craft a fishing line.

43.NAME: Fisherman - professional
43.DESCRIPTION: Fish at shark bay to obtain additional experience and reputation.

45.NAME: Swamp realm
45.DESCRIPTION: To reach the next part of the island, you need to cross a vast swamp.

46.NAME: New animals
46.DESCRIPTION: Now you can buy 3 new animals. Start growing them!

47.NAME: Shovel shaft
47.DESCRIPTION: You can get parts of the shovel at the local market, in exchange for various goods.

48.NAME: Shovel handle
48.DESCRIPTION: You can get parts of the shovel at the local market, in exchange for various goods.

49.NAME: Shovel blade
49.DESCRIPTION: You can get parts of the shovel at the local market, in exchange for various goods.

5.NAME: First workshop
5.DESCRIPTION: In order to make use of the resources, you will need a workshop.

50.NAME: Secrets of the swamp I
50.DESCRIPTION: Go on an expedition in the swamp!

51.NAME: Secrets of the swamp II
51.DESCRIPTION: Go on an expedition in the swamp!

52.NAME: Workshop II
52.DESCRIPTION: To craft better materials, you'll need a more advanced workshop.

53.NAME: New recipes
53.DESCRIPTION: There are new recipes available in the workshop - try them out!

54.NAME: Plank era buildings
54.DESCRIPTION: Now that you can craft plangs, you can make better buildings and other objects.

56.NAME: Bonfire II
56.DESCRIPTION: The new bonfire will produce coal.

57.NAME: Plank well
57.DESCRIPTION: Now you can turn your simple well into a proper plank well.

58.NAME: Plank house
58.DESCRIPTION: You don't have to live in that stick tent - time to build a proper house!

59.NAME: Instructions in beekeeping I
59.DESCRIPTION: Rico is a true specialist in beekeeping. Fulfill his demands, and he'll teach you everything about bees.

6.NAME: Use workshop
6.DESCRIPTION: The workshop is ready - try crafting something!

60.NAME: Instructions in beekeeping II
60.DESCRIPTION: Rico is a true specialist in beekeeping. Fulfill his demands, and he'll teach you everything about bees.

61.NAME: First beehives
61.DESCRIPTION: You have learnt the basics of beekeeping - time to try it out!

62.NAME: Bee products
62.DESCRIPTION: Beekeeping is the source of various valuable products.

63.NAME: Bear care
63.DESCRIPTION: Now you can buy bears in the shop.

64.NAME: Animal products
64.DESCRIPTION: Animals give profit as well as various resources.

65.NAME: Better environment
65.DESCRIPTION: Shop offers new things that will make your environment more pleasant.

66.NAME: New bush
66.DESCRIPTION: A merchant offers you a new bush. Its berries can be used in food and crafting. Fulfull his demands to buy the bush.

67.NAME: Blueberry bush
67.DESCRIPTION: Now you can buy blueberry bushes in the shop!

68.NAME: Workshop III
68.DESCRIPTION: The clay era workshop will grant many new crafting options!

69.NAME: New materials
69.DESCRIPTION: Explore the new materials in the clay era workshop.

7.NAME: Shovel
7.DESCRIPTION: To cultivate land, you'll need a shovel.

70.NAME: Clay oven
70.DESCRIPTION: Now that you've advanced to the clay era, you can build an oven.

71.NAME: Clay products
71.DESCRIPTION: Many useful things can be crafted out of clay.

72.NAME: Clay well
72.DESCRIPTION: You can get more water from a clay well.

73.NAME: Bonfire III
73.DESCRIPTION: Clay era bonfire is much more pleasant.

74.NAME: Clay house
74.DESCRIPTION: A plank house is not very safe - it's time to build something better.

75.NAME: Clay sheds
75.DESCRIPTION: You can now build clay sheds.

76.NAME: Removing the swamp
76.DESCRIPTION: You can get rid of the entire swamp.

77.NAME: Clay pit
77.DESCRIPTION: To obtain more clay, you'll need a clay pit!

78.NAME: Chisel
78.DESCRIPTION: To access the next part of the island, you'll need to remove huge stones.

79.NAME: Chisel handle I out of III
79.DESCRIPTION: A local carpenter has agreed to make a good handle, if you meet his demands.

8.NAME: Farmer
8.DESCRIPTION: Show that you know how to cultivate land and grow plants!

80.NAME: Chisel handle II of III
80.DESCRIPTION: A local carpenter has agreed to make a good handle, if you meet his demands.

81.NAME: Chisel handle III
81.DESCRIPTION: A local carpenter has agreed to make a good handle, if you meet his demands.

82.NAME: Mould for the blade I of II
82.DESCRIPTION: To craft a blade, you'll need a mould. You can get it from a local builder in exchange for a few things.

83.NAME: Mould for the blade II
83.DESCRIPTION: To craft a blade, you'll need a mould. You can get it from a local builder in exchange for a few things.

84.NAME: Chisel blade
84.DESCRIPTION: You've got the mould - now you must craft the blade.

85.NAME: Chopping rocks
85.DESCRIPTION: Time to try out the chisel!

86.NAME: Workshop IV
86.DESCRIPTION: In order to utilize the stones, you need the stone era workshop.

87.NAME: Stone resources
87.DESCRIPTION: Try out new options in the stone era workshop to receive additional experiences and reputation.

88.NAME: Jungle master
88.DESCRIPTION: You can see thick jungle behind the rocks - what might be hidden there?

89.NAME: Mine
89.DESCRIPTION: Stones can also be obtained from the stone mine.

9.NAME: Chef
9.DESCRIPTION: You can make food out of fruit and vegetables.

90.NAME: Mine in the jungle
90.DESCRIPTION: There is an old mine in the jungle. You can get many valuable resources there.

91.NAME: Workshop V
91.DESCRIPTION: Now that you have access to new resources, you'll need a more advanced workshop.

92.NAME: Modern resources
92.DESCRIPTION: Craft modern resources to obtain additional experience and reputation.

93.NAME: Modern buildings
93.DESCRIPTION: Now you can construct the most advanced buildings.

94.NAME: Stonegardens
94.DESCRIPTION: Decorate your island with stone era flowers to receive additional reputation.

95.NAME: Better oven
95.DESCRIPTION: You can make a better oven out of stone.

96.NAME: Bonfire IV
96.DESCRIPTION: Now you can build a much better bonfire.

97.NAME: Stone well
97.DESCRIPTION: Improve your clay well to the next level.

98.NAME: Stone house
98.DESCRIPTION: A stone house is much safer and warmer.

99.NAME: Last improvements
99.DESCRIPTION: Modernise your environment and receive a generous reward.

1.NAME: Branch
1.DESCRIPTION: Search the bags until you find a branch.

10.NAME: Craft a shovel
10.DESCRIPTION: Obtain the necessary parts and craft a shovel in the workshop section UNIQUE!

100.NAME: Plank furniture
100.DESCRIPTION: Build plank tables, stools or benches.

107.NAME: Tomatoes for ketchup
107.DESCRIPTION: Rico wants to make ketchup. Submit 30 tomatoes.

108.NAME: Beads for girlfriend
108.DESCRIPTION: Rico wants to give his girlfriend something pretty. Craft bone beads.

109.NAME: Lobworms for fishing
109.DESCRIPTION: Rico plans to go fishing. Buy lobworms.

11.NAME: Dig furrows
11.DESCRIPTION: First, you have to dig furrows. 8 will do for now.

110.NAME: Rabbits
110.DESCRIPTION: Rabbits are Rico's favourite animals. Feed small or grown up rabbits 20 times.

111.NAME: Boots
111.DESCRIPTION: Rico has lost his boods. Use 2 boots from your bag.

112.NAME: Flowers for bees
112.DESCRIPTION: Bees are attracted by colourful flowers. Buy star-flowers.

116.NAME: Buy beehives
116.DESCRIPTION: Buy beehives in the shop section BUILDINGS.

12.NAME: First plants
12.DESCRIPTION: Radish are the quickest to grow. Plant 8 radish fields.

122.NAME: Flowers in boxes
122.DESCRIPTION: Buy and finish building flowers in boxes.

128.NAME: First blueberry bush
128.DESCRIPTION: Buy and plant your first blueberry bush.

13.NAME: First harvest
13.DESCRIPTION: When the radish are grown, harvest them!

137.NAME: Flowers in pots
137.DESCRIPTION: Buy and finish any flowers that need a clay pot.

14.NAME: Radish salad
14.DESCRIPTION: Go to the workshop section FOOD and make radish salad.

140.NAME: Upgrade bonfire
140.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the bonfire to its next stage.

143.NAME: Finish clay house
143.DESCRIPTION: Finish building the clay era house.

145.NAME: Hungry crock
145.DESCRIPTION: If you feed him three more times, he will be willing to leave.

146.NAME: Going down
146.DESCRIPTION: You can't just jump straight in. Thing about getting out, make a ladder in workshop.

147.NAME: Craft chisel
147.DESCRIPTION: Go to the workshop section UNIQUE and craft a chisel.

148.NAME: Ducks for the wife
148.DESCRIPTION: The carpenter's wife wants to keep ducks. Sell grown-up ducks.

149.NAME: Carrots for stew
149.DESCRIPTION: The carpenter's favourite food is carrot stew. Submit carrots.

150.NAME: Lobworms for fishing
150.DESCRIPTION: The carpenter is a passionate fisherman. Obtain lobworms (in the shop or by digging furrows).

151.NAME: Pies for party
151.DESCRIPTION: The carpenter will have a birthday soon. Make corn pies for the party.

152.NAME: Wood supplies
152.DESCRIPTION: A carpenter can do with out a proper supply of wood. Submit wood.

153.NAME: New outhouse
153.DESCRIPTION: The neighbour's bull has destroyed the carpenter's toilet. Build a new one (shop section Buildings).

154.NAME: Sugar for the horses
154.DESCRIPTION: The carpenter sometimes treats his horses to a bit of sugar. Buy sugar.

155.NAME: Cat lover
155.DESCRIPTION: The carpenter adores cats. Feed small or grown-up cats.

156.NAME: Symbolic payment
156.DESCRIPTION: Finally, you have to pay the carpenter for his work. Submit shells.

157.NAME: Tomatoes for hothouse
157.DESCRIPTION: The builder plans to plant tomatoes in his hothouse. Harvest tomato fields.

158.NAME: Bricks for paths
158.DESCRIPTION: The builder plans to make a plank path in his backyard. Submit clay bricks.

159.NAME: Barrels for juice
159.DESCRIPTION: The builder's wife makes several litres of berry juice every year. Sell finished barrels (Decorations).

160.NAME: Craft blade
160.DESCRIPTION: Go to the workshop section UNIQUE and craft the chisel blade.

161.NAME: Radish salad
161.DESCRIPTION: The builde thinks that in hot weather there's no better meal than radish salad. Make it several times.

162.NAME: Boots
162.DESCRIPTION: The builder's boots are worn out. Use 2 boots from your bag.

163.NAME: Forestry
163.DESCRIPTION: The builder believes that one has to plant new trees as often as possible. Plant 8 trees.

171.NAME: Build stone mine
171.DESCRIPTION: Buy and finish the stone mine.

183.NAME: Upgrade oven
183.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the clay oven and finish the stone era oven.

184.NAME: Upgrade bonfire
184.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade and finish the stone era bonfire.

187.NAME: Modern bonfire
187.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade and finish the modern bonfire.

188.NAME: Modern house
188.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade and finish the modern house.

194.NAME: Gather reputation
194.DESCRIPTION: Gather as many reputation points as you can in 30 days and beat your friends in the top.

195.NAME: Gather shells
195.DESCRIPTION: Gather as many shells as you can in 30 days and beat your friends in the top.

198.NAME: Gather experience
198.DESCRIPTION: Gather as much experience as you can in 30 days and beat your friends in the top.

2.NAME: Craft an axe
2.DESCRIPTION: Go to the workshop and craft an axe in the section UNIQUE!

201.NAME: Gather reputation
201.DESCRIPTION: Gather as many reputation points as you can in 30 days and beat your friends in the top.

202.NAME: Gather shells
202.DESCRIPTION: Gather as many shells as you can in 30 days and beat your friends in the top.

203.NAME: Gather experience
203.DESCRIPTION: Gather as much experience as you can in 30 days and beat your friends in the top.

204.NAME: Additional income
204.DESCRIPTION: Roberto has made excellent use of the opportunity, in this regard he wants to talk to you. Click on Roberto Junior.

207.NAME: Builds a clay pit
207.DESCRIPTION: A hole in the bog would be suitable for a clay pit. Complete the construction.

208.NAME: Find the streak
208.DESCRIPTION: On some of the walls you can see the beautiful strelicia. Pick one flower.

209.NAME: Find freesia
209.DESCRIPTION: The sweet aroma of freesia allows you to notice it even in the dark of night. Pick one flower.

21.NAME: Find the predator
21.DESCRIPTION: Poke around in the grass, but be careful. Find the lurker.

210.NAME: Find Lily
210.DESCRIPTION: If you carefully examine the walls, you will notice lilies among the creepers. Pick one flower.

211.NAME: Spring water
211.DESCRIPTION: By drinking from the fountain you feel the strength of youth in your veins.

212.NAME: Complete fountain decoration
212.DESCRIPTION: Fully decorated fountain will raise your energy maximum. You can find more flowers beyond the cliffs.

213.NAME: Eliminate cacti
213.DESCRIPTION: In order to beautify the far beach, all cacti must be cut down.

214.NAME: Eliminate corals
214.DESCRIPTION: The waves have washed away a large amount of coral. Improve the island and remove all the corals.

215.NAME: Overcome difficulties
215.DESCRIPTION: Overcome the first difficulty by gaining survival experience.

216.NAME: Analyze the fountain
216.DESCRIPTION: The ancient spring is attributed healing properties. Take courage and taste the mystical water.

217.NAME: Visit Tuinhuiss Island
217.DESCRIPTION: The easiest way to get to Tuinhuiss - the island of rare plants - is by raft. Get going, visit the island.

218.NAME: Visit Arciris Island
218.DESCRIPTION: An artificially raised island named Arciris was seen nearby. Go, visit the island.

219.NAME: Get the bait
219.DESCRIPTION: For better fishing, you will need bait. Get 5 bugs.

22.NAME: Pacify the reptile
22.DESCRIPTION: Try giving your reptile a snack, perhaps he can be domesticated.

220.NAME: Fish out sea cabbage
220.DESCRIPTION: Try the new fishing rod, catch 5 sea cabbages.

221.NAME: Visit Koura Island
221.DESCRIPTION: A fisherman told me that the best place to catch lobsters is the Lobster Gulf off the coast of Kour Island.

222.NAME: Visit Terakai Island
222.DESCRIPTION: The entire island of Terakai is a huge sandy beach. Passers-by say that new buildings have appeared there in recent months.

223.NAME: Finish the bonfire
223.DESCRIPTION: There have definitely been visitors here, but it doesn't look like they've been here for a long time. Restores the fire place.

224.NAME: Buy sugar
224.DESCRIPTION: Get ready to collect honey. Hand in 20 sugar.

257.NAME: Pretty beads
257.DESCRIPTION: They would definitely like jewellery. Submit 3 bone beads.

258.NAME: Second task
258.DESCRIPTION: There can be various pits and hazards in a swamp, but no place to get a drink. Make and sell 2 wood troughs.

26.NAME: Make a bonfire
26.DESCRIPTION: Go to the shop and buy a bonfire.

261.NAME: Swamp birds
261.DESCRIPTION: Swamp birds could use a home as well. Build 3 bird houses.

262.NAME: Restore figures
262.DESCRIPTION: Hmmm.. It shouldn't be hard to finish these figures. The artist has laid a great outline and there are so many materials here.

263.NAME: Hedgehog family
263.DESCRIPTION: A hedgehog family has wandered into the swamp. It's hard for hedgehogs in a swamp. Feed them 15 times.

264.NAME: It will be..
264.DESCRIPTION: But it's so wet, that it's impossible to reach it. Submit 50 wood units for paths.

265.NAME: Vegetables I
265.DESCRIPTION: Little balls, red and bitter. Why would anyone pull them out?

266.NAME: Vegetables II
266.DESCRIPTION: At the end of those meaty stalks a wonderful flower can bloom. But usually it's pulled long before that. It stinks!

267.NAME: Vegetables III
267.DESCRIPTION: Some would say they're the best vegetables, but others laugh and say that they don't have the right balls and isn't vegetable at all.

268.NAME: Resources I
268.DESCRIPTION: Sheep and other animals that aren't as clever as me like to use this for food and bedding.

269.NAME: Resources II
269.DESCRIPTION: I have encountered this black material in different worlds. Who would have thought you can simply dig it up here.

270.NAME: Resources III
270.DESCRIPTION: Brrrr, I hate thinking about it, but this material could have been a sheep.

271.NAME: Animals I
271.DESCRIPTION: I always go where I please, unless I am locked up in a cage on an island, but word is someone else does that, too.

272.NAME: Animals II
272.DESCRIPTION: It's the loudest alarm clock in the barn. There's nothing worse early in the morning.

273.NAME: Animals III
273.DESCRIPTION: The best animal in the world! Undoubtedly!

274.NAME: Decors I
274.DESCRIPTION: Big flowers, small flowers... Yes, small flowers are tasty too. Yum, yum!

275.NAME: Decors II
275.DESCRIPTION: Never again will I let myself be trapped in this, get rid of the pieces of this cage!

276.NAME: Decors III
276.DESCRIPTION: It seems like there isn't enough sand on the beach, surely more should be purchased...

277.NAME: Sand fields
277.DESCRIPTION: From your stories I gathered you lack sand in your jungle. Move 6 sand paths.

278.NAME: Bone beads
278.DESCRIPTION: Sometimes I like to dress up for a special occasion, please get me some new jewellery. Sell 3 bone beads.

279.NAME: Water gathering
279.DESCRIPTION: I am thirsty, did you know you can get water from jellyfish? Gather 3 units of water in Aciris island.

28.NAME: Buy simple well
28.DESCRIPTION: Buy a simple well in the section BUILDINGS.

280.NAME: Society
280.DESCRIPTION: You aren't a sheep so you won't understand, but I need to talk to my own kind. Grow 3 lambs simultaneously.

281.NAME: Sand!
281.DESCRIPTION: Someone has ruined the white sand by digging out furrows! Sell 15 furrows to make the sand look right again.

282.NAME: Hand in sweets
282.DESCRIPTION: I want to treat my friends to some sweets, can you help me? Submit 6 sweets.

283.NAME: Get lianas
283.DESCRIPTION: Lianas are almost like flowers. Get 2 lianas.

284.NAME: Bean stock
284.DESCRIPTION: Small seedlings taste like flowers, too, sometimes. Plant 5 beanstalks.

285.NAME: Sweeter life
285.DESCRIPTION: My food tastes kind of bland. Sell sugar from your bag 6 times.

286.NAME: Get milk
286.DESCRIPTION: Milk is rare in this corner of the world. Get me 2 bottles of this white liquid, please.

287.NAME: Jam
287.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps you have some jars of jam left over? Make jam 3 times.

288.NAME: Some greenery
288.DESCRIPTION: You mustn't forget green forage. Please get me a straw bundle.

289.NAME: Fish me some cabbage
289.DESCRIPTION: When I praised green forage, sea-cabbage wasn't on the menu. Never mind, I'll use it anyway. Get 2 sea-cabbage.

290.NAME: Fresh raddish
290.DESCRIPTION: If you got me into a messy task, you'll have to help me with it. Harvest 12 beds of fresh radish.

291.NAME: Spices
291.DESCRIPTION: To save the day you will need to buy some spices. 3 units of yeast should suffice.

292.NAME: Secret ingredient I
292.DESCRIPTION: I need a bit of this and that, don't ask too many questions. Bring me an obsidian shard.

293.NAME: Secret ingredient II
293.DESCRIPTION: No one must see my secret recipe. Hide me behind the trees, plant 2 broad palms.

294.NAME: Secret ingredient III
294.DESCRIPTION: I still need some time alone, you can have lunch while you wait. Get 100 food.

295.NAME: Build a sand castle
295.DESCRIPTION: To build such a masterpiece, you need special shovels and lots of materials.

296.NAME: Finish the sand castle
296.DESCRIPTION: You can't build a sand castle without water.

298.NAME: Talk to the boy
298.DESCRIPTION: To start a conversation, left-click on the boy.

3.NAME: Use axe
3.DESCRIPTION: Try out the new axe by cutting any 3 trees.

30.NAME: Empty the well
30.DESCRIPTION: Get water from the well 5 times.

301.NAME: Remove twigs
301.DESCRIPTION: Here on the shore, there are branches that stick to my feet, collect and carry all the branches here. Get 7 Thorny Branches.

302.NAME: Remove the bones
302.DESCRIPTION: The bones washed up on the beach scare people. Gather them and bring me the bones. Get 3 bones.

303.NAME: Creepers for traps
303.DESCRIPTION: There is a dangerous creature on the beach. Catch and bring back a good number of creepers for making loops.

304.NAME: Remove the aloe vera
304.DESCRIPTION: The old aloes have long ceased to sustain me, but the place is perfect for placing lounge chairs. Remove the aloe vera.

305.NAME: Remove trees
305.DESCRIPTION: Dead trees spoil the view, please remove them. I will help and clean up the land after you. Remove dead trees.

306.NAME: Young sapplings
306.DESCRIPTION: Three-branched palm trees provide a soft shade that creates a pleasant atmosphere. Plant 3 new trees in the places of the old.

307.NAME: Demolish the vault
307.DESCRIPTION: I have built too much storage, please free up some space and dismantle the started shell storage.

308.NAME: Guest house
308.DESCRIPTION: Instead of a storage room, it would be good to build a nice house. Please help me build a guest house.

309.NAME: Comfortable furniture
309.DESCRIPTION: I almost forgot about the started seats. I don't have time at all, I'm asking for them.

31.NAME: Fortify foundation
31.DESCRIPTION: Hand in some clay so that newly built shelter does not get washed away.

310.NAME: Feed the chickens
310.DESCRIPTION: Bird care is simple, a little feed and you're done. Feed 10 chickens.

311.NAME: Look after the ducks
311.DESCRIPTION: Not a tough job, still, look after and feed the adult ducks.

312.NAME: A herd of pigs
312.DESCRIPTION: I want to see a large herd of hogs. Grow 10 pigs at the same time.

313.NAME: Bean stew
313.DESCRIPTION: I want a double portion of bean stew for the first course.

314.NAME: White bread
314.DESCRIPTION: Bread is an important part of the meal. Please bake one loaf of bread.

315.NAME: Strawberry soup
315.DESCRIPTION: A single serving of strawberry soup would be an appropriate dessert.

316.NAME: Serve the grapes
316.DESCRIPTION: One of my acquaintances is a winemaker. Get the grapes, I'll take care of the delivery. Hand in 30 grapes.

317.NAME: Firm melons
317.DESCRIPTION: Some Bio-Farm wants organic sugar. 30 horned melons should be enough, hand them in.

318.NAME: Pumpkins for the holidays
318.DESCRIPTION: There will be a thematic event soon, and the organizers need pumpkins for brewing drinks, submit them.

319.NAME: Nail business
319.DESCRIPTION:
I negotiated a very good price on the nail deal. For each nail
You will earn 35 shells. I need 20.

320.NAME: Straw business
320.DESCRIPTION: Very urgent need of straw bales, how would you like to earn 20 shells for each? Hand me 25 bundles.

321.NAME: Stone business
321.DESCRIPTION: I bargained for stone blocks for a long time. You'll earn 20 shells for each, but I'll need 35 blocks in total.

322.NAME: Jade
322.DESCRIPTION: I listened for a long time about souvenirs until I found out that they need jade. Please bring me 2 jades.

323.NAME: Jasper
323.DESCRIPTION: The contract mentioned 3 jaspers, but the size of the gem was not specified. Please provide me with jasper of any size.

324.NAME: Citrine
324.DESCRIPTION: I know that citrines are very hard to find, but if you manage to find one, you'll earn decent money for just one stone.

325.NAME: Clear the shrubbery
325.DESCRIPTION: To understand what is happening on the island, you must first clean it. Remove grass and bushes.

326.NAME: Remove pointy-leafs
326.DESCRIPTION: Remove 5 pointy-leafs and continue cleaning up.

327.NAME: Chop wood
327.DESCRIPTION: Well, you can already see through the island. Cut down 4 trees.

328.NAME: Ancient ruins
328.DESCRIPTION: Even in their broken state, they exude greatness. Hand in a bottle of wine.

329.NAME: Unknown builders
329.DESCRIPTION: It looks like they might have been built by some long-forgotten civilization. Build a stone vault.

330.NAME: Material collector
330.DESCRIPTION: It can be seen that the columns have been damaged and not just by passing of time. Collect clay or stone.

331.NAME: Water container creator
331.DESCRIPTION: Someone else has also noticed this and started building a bath nearby. Try something similar - build an aquarium.

332.NAME: Far seer
332.DESCRIPTION: You fail to climb a tree to scout out the whole island. Practice climbing a coconut tree on the main island.

333.NAME: Reacher
333.DESCRIPTION: You can see a pier in the distance. Only a skilled architect could build such a thing. Build 4 stone paths.

334.NAME: The new fishing spot
334.DESCRIPTION: What a great fishing spot! It is strange that the previous pier builder stopped before reaching it.

335.NAME: Grab the boots
335.DESCRIPTION: I wonder where this architect has gone next? Fish out a pair of boots in a lobster bed.

336.NAME: Sell lobster
336.DESCRIPTION: No matter what happens with others, you can catch a valuable role here.

338.NAME: Mystical statues I
338.DESCRIPTION: Restore statues and restore their lost luster. Perhaps some of the past grandeur is still preserved in them.

339.NAME: Mystical statues II
339.DESCRIPTION: Restore statues and restore their lost luster. Perhaps some of the past grandeur is still preserved in them.

34.NAME: Craft hay bundles
34.DESCRIPTION: Go to the workshop section MATERIALS and craft hay bundles.

340.NAME: The big bear
340.DESCRIPTION: Mother bear, noticed bees and followed them. But the hive I found is too pretty to touch with my big paws.

341.NAME: Baby bear I
341.DESCRIPTION: The little cubs have wandered deeper into the island. Track them down!

342.NAME: Baby bear II
342.DESCRIPTION: Once the whole family has gets  honey, they will safely move on.

343.NAME: Get wax
343.DESCRIPTION: The bees living on this island are special wax collectors.

344.NAME: Boil water
344.DESCRIPTION: A water hole has been dug. Someone might have lived here once, but not stayed for long.

345.NAME: Collect the bones
345.DESCRIPTION: Many bones are found on the island. Where did they all come from?

346.NAME: Mystical Statues III
346.DESCRIPTION: Restore statues and restore their lost luster. Perhaps some of the past grandeur is still preserved in them.

349.NAME: Fully restore pier
349.DESCRIPTION: Access to the fishing spot is difficult. Fortunately, someone in the know has already done the hard part.

362.NAME: Creating rose heap
362.DESCRIPTION: Ewe has shared a recipe for heap of roses. Pick the roses surrounding the lamb and make 3 rose heaps.

363.NAME: Special shovels for the castle
363.DESCRIPTION: Get 3 special shovels by using the tropical house, feeding the rainbow sheep, or building the lobster pier.

366.NAME: Visit Koura Island
366.DESCRIPTION: The bees have noticed an abandoned island nearby. Go explore it.

39.NAME: Dog friend
39.DESCRIPTION: Dog is a man's best friend. Sell 20 grown-up dogs.

4.NAME: Shard
4.DESCRIPTION: There is a shard in one of the bags - find it!

40.NAME: Cat friend
40.DESCRIPTION: The purring of a cat makes any house more pleasant. Sell 20 grown-up cats.

47.NAME: Wood shed
47.DESCRIPTION: Build a wood shed out of twigs.

48.NAME: Shell shed
48.DESCRIPTION: Build a shell shed out of twigs.

49.NAME: Decorate your island
49.DESCRIPTION: Buy 4 flowers (blue, white or orange ones).

5.NAME: Rope

ACCOUNT_BANNED.NAME: Access denied
ACCOUNT_BANNED.DESCRIPTION: You have been denied access to the game. If you have any questions, feel free to contact our client support.

ACCOUNT_LOCKED.NAME: Updating profile
ACCOUNT_LOCKED.DESCRIPTION: Your profile currently is locked, because we are making corrections to it. Please, try to login a little later

BROWSER_ERROR.NAME: Failed to create session with the social portal
BROWSER_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Most likely you have an out of date Opera or Safari version. Update them and try again

CLIENT_CRASH.NAME: Unexpected error!
CLIENT_CRASH.DESCRIPTION: Please send us a message what you were doing when you encountered this error

DEFAULT.NAME: Data mismatch error!
DEFAULT.DESCRIPTION: Your last actions have been canceled. You will be transported back in time a little

DESYNC.NAME: Time synchronisation error
DESYNC.DESCRIPTION: Your game had worked too fast. Administration is informed about this case and they will look into it.

GAME_LOCKED.NAME: Game temporarily closed
GAME_LOCKED.DESCRIPTION: Unfortunately, the game is currently unavailable due to technical updates.

JSON_PARSE_ERROR.NAME: Error pirates strike again!
JSON_PARSE_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Data in the wrong data format has been served

LOAD_ERROR.NAME: Failed to contact with server!
LOAD_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Most likely there has been separation of interent connection: LOAD_ERROR

LOAD_IO_ERROR.NAME: Failed to contact with server!
LOAD_IO_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Most likely there has been separation of internet connection: IO_ERROR

MALFORMED_DATA.NAME: Game has received bad data!
MALFORMED_DATA.DESCRIPTION: Try to clear cache memory of the web browser or go in to the game through another web browser

OLD_VERSION.NAME: Old version
OLD_VERSION.DESCRIPTION: Please, obtain the newest version of the game! If you have any questions, feel free to contact our client support.

OLD_VERSION_MOBILE.NAME: New version is aviable
OLD_VERSION_MOBILE.DESCRIPTION: Please download the new version of the game from play store.

SESSION_ERROR.NAME: Login authorisation data mismatch!
SESSION_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Try to login in the game once again.

UNIQUE_CLIENT.NAME: Multiple games open
UNIQUE_CLIENT.DESCRIPTION: To prevent further problems we're closing this game instance

WRONG_ISLAND.NAME: Synchronisation error
WRONG_ISLAND.DESCRIPTION: You tried to do something on multiple islands simultaneously

FRIEND_EVENTS.1: On your way home from your friend nothing interesting occurred so you just had a good walk.
FRIEND_EVENTS.10: You've won a native traditional poetry contest and get the customary minimalistic prizes - thorns, twigs and some shells.
FRIEND_EVENTS.11: You make a bet with your friend that you will jump higher. You win the bet, but it turns out your friend has nothing to give to you. Well, at least the jump was great!
FRIEND_EVENTS.12: You feel sudden urge to climb the highest tree. You do it and the scenery is so great that you feel energized instead of tired.
FRIEND_EVENTS.13: You find a small cave. Inside there are strange carvings. Interesting experience!
FRIEND_EVENTS.14: Tarick asks you to look after his hens for a while. As a reward you get an egg.
FRIEND_EVENTS.15: You are asked to help milk the cows. In return you get a bottle of milk.
FRIEND_EVENTS.16: You find a salt crystal in the beach. You manage to grind some salt for you.
FRIEND_EVENTS.17: You find horned melon lying in a field. You bring it to the local native and get in return some sugar lumps.
FRIEND_EVENTS.18: While making a sand castle, you find a big lump of clay.
FRIEND_EVENTS.19: You happen to have your trusty wood-axe with you. You chop some twigs.
FRIEND_EVENTS.2: Passing a hut of an old native, he asks you to run to the market after some tobacco. Glad for your help, he gives you 2 shells.
FRIEND_EVENTS.20: You find a skeleton in the wood. It has one very good looking bone. You take it.
FRIEND_EVENTS.21: You find a purse of shells in the street. You ask whose it is. A native responds and gladly gives you some shells.
FRIEND_EVENTS.3: You happen to visit your old friend Paprick. He invites you to dinner and you get 2 food.
FRIEND_EVENTS.4: While strolling through a wood, you enounter a broken spear. You pull of it's tip and get a stone shard!
FRIEND_EVENTS.5: There's a lot of people standing in line to get to the old shaman. One native woman asks if you can entertain her. You tell her a story and get a reward.
FRIEND_EVENTS.6: You decide to have some fun and to impersonate Tarzan swinging from lianas. Unfortunately you fall down, but you get a piece of liana string.
FRIEND_EVENTS.7: Two native children are playing with strings by the wood. They run away, as you approach, but leave behind a piece of liana string.
FRIEND_EVENTS.8: You find a hurt animal with a thorn in it's paw. You pull it out and get a thorned twig.
FRIEND_EVENTS.9: You decide to play ball on your friend's island. You clear the area and find a thorned twig.
