LOADING_TIPS.0:
Before purchasing animals, make sure that you have enough food to feed them on time.
It's safer to gather solid food supplies in advance.
LOADING_TIPS.1: Did you know that every time you dig a furrow, you will find a shell? If you're out of money and there are no bushes nearby, just dig!
LOADING_TIPS.10: The aim of the game is to become the governor of the island.
LOADING_TIPS.11: Invite your friends to join the game. It's more fun to play together, and they will be able to help you with your daily chores.
LOADING_TIPS.12:
Don't worry about your chest or crops. Nobody can steal anything in this game. 
We support friendly cooperation among players.
LOADING_TIPS.13: To beat your friends and gain more reputation, you need to buy various buildings and decorations in the shop.
LOADING_TIPS.14:
If you revive your friend's crops or animals, you will be rewarded with reputation.
Help your friends and become popular in Oceania!
LOADING_TIPS.15: Fireplace, well and house will increase your maximum energy amount, and you'll be able to do more work on your island.
LOADING_TIPS.16: Some objects on the map require special tools. Play further and eventually you will obtain them.
LOADING_TIPS.17: Fulfill daily tasks. It is an alternative way of getting resources and experience.
LOADING_TIPS.18:
If you don't know what to do, open your quest journal. 
You will definately find some tasks there with good reward.
LOADING_TIPS.19: To get more territory, you need to complete main quests. If they're not complete, you won't be able to get further.
LOADING_TIPS.2:
Stone shards are more likely to be found in coastal rocks, lianas - in bushes.
Search them according to your needs.
LOADING_TIPS.20: You can create a row of actions by clicking on several objects.
LOADING_TIPS.3:
Plants wither in a two times longer period than they grow. 
To know when you must harvest your crops, just multiply its growth time by 3.
LOADING_TIPS.4:
Banana and coconut palms never wither. If you don't want to risk losing crops, you can grow palms. 
Keep in mind that they are less effective in terms of food provided.
LOADING_TIPS.5: Before creating huge plantations, check if you will have enough energy to harvest them on time.
LOADING_TIPS.6:
To craft food, you will need some seasoning from the shop. 
Save some shells to buy the seasoning, when you plan to craft food.
LOADING_TIPS.7: To get food, check workshop section FOOD to see what ingredients you need for each recipe.
LOADING_TIPS.8: Don't forget to save some harvest, so you can plant more crops out of your bag. Buying seeds in the shop is expensive.
LOADING_TIPS.9: If you don't like the positioning or orientation of your buildings and decorations, you can move and rotate them.

NPC.BAOBAB_CHOPPED: Finally you got down that giant! Now you have access to larger territory to explore and utilize.
NPC.BUY_ANIMAL: Good, now it's time to start some serious farming. To earn money you have to buy animals in the shop, feed them until they grow up and then sell them for profit. Start earning money.
NPC.CHAPTER2_FINISHED: Great! We've earned the friendship of natives, which means now you can build things on the island. Also you have unlocked the further part of the island.
NPC.CHOP_BAOBAB: The axe is ready! Now you can chop down the huge baobabs. Only take in mind that they are very sturdy!
NPC.CHOP_TREES: Great, the axe is ready. Click on the trees to chop them and gather some wood.
NPC.CLEAR_QUEST: Aha, we need to learn to gain food so papuani tribe allows us to settle on this island. You will need to learn to plant crops and for that we need workshop. At first you should free some space on this shore.
NPC.com_1: Hi! You've arrived at the Competition island! This is a very special place - you're a completely different person that is not related to the life on the main island.
NPC.com_2: I see that you've started cultivating this land. Keep at it and you're sure to reach a high competition score! Remember that when the competition ends, this mysterious island will return to its original state.
NPC.com_3: Remember that the Competition island and main island resources are not connected. If you run out of energy here, you can continue on your main island and vice versa.
NPC.com_4: The goal of the Competition island is to find out how well you can play Oceania by reaching as high a result as possible in a limited time span. When the competition is over, you can try again with a new strategy.
NPC.CREATE_FOOD: Congratulations, you are ready to cook food. Go to workshop section FOOD, buy necessary ingredients and cook your first dish.
NPC.CREATE_SHOVEL: Nice, you've built a workshop and you can make new things. Open the workshop section UNIQUE and make a shovel, so that you can dig furrows and plant fields
NPC.DIGG_FIELDS: Good, now you can dig fields where you'll plant crops later. Dig a few (click on the shovel icon in the tool bar and then on a free spot on the island).
NPC.DIGG_SHELLS: Did you notice that by digging fields, you can find shells? If you run out of money, this is a good way to get out of financial dead end.
NPC.FLOWERPOT_FINISHED: Great, you've earned reputation. With it you can compete with your friends to see who is doing better. But remember that selling decorations will result in the loss of reputation.
NPC.FOOD_GATHERED: Thanks for the yummy, yummy food! Me sees that you is a nice survivor, so you can settle on the island and we is friends now!
NPC.GATHER_FOOD: Great! Now you now how to get food from the plants. Now to finish this chapter, you have to gather enough food for the papuani tribe and they will let us stay here.
NPC.GATHER_RADISH: You've planted the radish. Now you have to wait for them to grow up and then gather them before they wither. You can see how much time is left until they are ready.
NPC.GATHER_RADISH_2022: Hey, it takses only 5 minutes for radish to grow. Perhaps you want to try some other errands while you wait? Look at the toolbar on the left side or check quest diary for additional tasks.
NPC.LEAVE_ISLAND: Yay, we're saved! You have repaired the raft and now we can go and try to find a larger island where to settle. When you're ready, simply click on the raft and we'll be on our way.
NPC.NATIVE_FLOWERPOT_FINISHED: Ooh! You make island beautiful? Very good. Me supports it! When you get more reputation, me gives you things for iron axe!
NPC.NATIVE_FRIENDLIST: Oh, you has a nice raft. I likes guests. You is welcome to come and visit me on me island. You can also visit your friends and help them and gain something in return.
NPC.NATIVE_INTRO: Hello, traveler! Me name is Paprick. I is from papuani tribe. You is welcome to use our shop! If you gives use something tasty, say FOOD, you can stay on this island!
NPC.NEW_DAY_STARTED: A new Oceania Day has begun. You can help your friends again and send free gifts. Reopen the game and you will receive the daily tasks and gift bonus.
NPC.PLACE_WORKSHOP: Nice! You have cleared the space. Now you can buy workshop in the shop for shells and place it where you want it. Afterwards gather wood to build it.
NPC.PLANT_FIELDS: Good, you've dug the fields. Now go to the shop and buy some radish in the section PLANTS. If you don't have enough money, gather some more.
NPC.PLANT_INVENTORY: As radish are expensive in the shop, it is wiser to plant the ones you harvested instead of buying new. Open your BAG and plant some radish, pressing PLANT button.
NPC.QUESTsac_152: The majestic design of this sand castle pleases the eye. Although i can not pay you much, i will not remain in your debt for long.
NPC.QUESTsac_154: I feel like our cooperation is stagnating. Perhaps we can become business partners?
NPC.QUESTsac_157: You should have told me in advance that you expect payment in sea-shells. This time i must ask you to accept payment in stone shards.
NPC.QUESTsac_158: I know full well the production cost of things. I have repayed your expenses. So, now that our bellies are full, shall we continue?
NPC.QUESTsac_159: I received a note from father, he is an architect. He has no regrets for dumping me here, but he does have a business proposition.
NPC.QUESTsac_161: Although trading is  interesting, i miss the day i was but a simple master of my own island.
NPC.QUESTsac_298: Aaah,  i see someone finally got my job offer. To be honest this "bottled message" postal system is just awful.
NPC.QUESTsac_T204: I have not forgotten your achievements with restoration of the sand castle. Now that income keeps rolling in on its own, i wish to compensate you properly. Thank you very much!
NPC.quest_1037: I is very thankful for you help! Now I can surprise the ladies on Woman's day! As a thank you, accept this headdress - I make it myself!
NPC.quest_1061: Great! To retrieve the stored items, click on the storehouse and select Use!
NPC.quest_1068: Hello, governor! My name is Curiosity Sparks, and I've been exploring Oceania for many years. Recently, I dug up this old chest, but I can't open it. I think that it might contain something important!
NPC.quest_1069: Don't worry! Such parchments were very popular among the ancient Oceanian cultures. To see what's written on the parchment, you must use lemon juice!
NPC.quest_1088: Wow! This parchment is even more valuable than I had imagined. It's a map to an island that used to be inhabited by an ancient civilisation! We must go there!
NPC.quest_1090: Such vast territory! Such architecture! I wonder why it's abandoned. Maybe we can find more information on the island.
NPC.quest_1095: The manuscripts you found in the chests are intriguing! It's said here that the ancient Okoro dynasty lived here for centuries. One day, an unknown monster came and drove off all inhabitants!
NPC.quest_1102: You're doing great! I think I found information on the monster - I just need to decipher it!
NPC.quest_1103: I found out something really unusual! This monster is not interested in the island - it just wants to feel like a king! The kings of old wore flower crowns - I think we need to get one!
NPC.quest_1107: Look! The monster has become cute as a kitten - I think I even hear purring! I believe that, if we put all things in order, this island could be inhabited by people! Do you agree?
NPC.quest_1108: This pier has been very pretty back in the day! Besides, it seems to lead to a fishing spot. It would be worth renovating!
NPC.quest_1110: What beauty! This has been a great pier, visited by merchants and guests from all over!
NPC.quest_1113: The people who lived here were really exceptional! I've studied the parchments and tracked down the descendants of Okoro dynasty. You must talk them into returning to this island!
NPC.quest_1124: Oh, brilliant! All Okoro descendants have returned to their land and will continue their traditions. And all thanks to you, governor!
NPC.quest_1186: Berko and Ayana are joyful as two doves! It's a miracle - thank you!
NPC.quest_1209: Governor! You've come all this way! Maybe I shouldn't have bothered you - it's not that bad here... only, I don't have a place to live. And the zebra wants to kick me. And the crocodile... but other than that, I'm good!
NPC.quest_1213: Governor, thank you so much for all your help! I'm finally starting to feel at home in this place! After a while I'll be a true savannahian!
NPC.quest_1225: I see that you've collected some samples of savannah plants. I hear that the locals make pretty garlands out of those flowers. You should try it!
NPC.quest_1252: What an explosion! It's time to check out the cave.
NPC.quest_1270: Oh my! This cave is different from other caves I have visited. Ordinary torches don't work here.
NPC.quest_1281: Excellent! Watermill provides enough energy for light in the tunnel. It's time to explore it!
NPC.quest_1332: It's so beautiful here! The wind has really done some damage, though. Let's find out what can be done to fix it!
NPC.quest_1343: Oh, I've heard so much about Nihiru culture! I would be glad to accompany you!
NPC.quest_1344: This lady is a librarian. She says that she can't find any of her important scrolls after the storm! We must find them!
NPC.quest_1346: The healer has been very busy after the storm. Looks like his medicine supply will run out soon. Can you help?
NPC.quest_1348: As you can see, the storm has been quite awful. The steward of the island says that most damage has been done to the old temples.
NPC.quest_1349: Wow! These temples are so exquisite! You've done a great job, governor!
NPC.quest_1364: Nihiru is a harbour of peace and harmony once more! I don't know about you, but I'll definitely return here!
NPC.quest_1413: Wow! You have done some great work - this is the best market Oceania has ever seen! Merry Christmas!
NPC.QUEST_1517: Go ahead and explore this part of the island yourself. But you can always stop by my place, learn something or just for tea.
NPC.QUEST_1518: Going to the right, you will meet the dwarf Flinzy, but she won't talk to you until you have cleared the swamp and given her horseradish.
NPC.quest_1522: Once, the cave in the Noble Cliff was not blocked. My grandfather went there for the delicious oyster mushrooms. Bring me some oyster mushrooms and you will receive a bundle that my grandfather once found underground.
NPC.QUEST_1529: Stranger, give me food and drink - a lot! Please! I am very thirsty and hungry.
NPC.QUEST_1530: Sorry for my gluttony! I hadn't tasted anything for 327 years. My name is Grogo. I am a dwarf blacksmith.
NPC.QUEST_1531I: You are in the Underground Dreamland. We - the dwarves - are the most frequent inhabitants of these lands. However, various miracles can happen here.
NPC.QUEST_1531II: We have a peculiarity - when we fall asleep, we cannot wake up unless someone wakes us, but while sleeping, we do not age.
NPC.QUEST_1531III: You arrived with a substantial bang and woke me up. But we have a problem - all the passages are overgrown with dream stalagmites and all sorts of other things.
NPC.QUEST_1531IV: I can teach you how to clear the path, but you will need various powders I make, which I can sell to you. Just need to figure out what you can give me as payment.
NPC.QUEST_1532I: These are only suitable as toys for dwarf children.
NPC.QUEST_1532II: No, thank you. These are always being pushed on me by those crazy pirates.
NPC.QUEST_1532III: CRAZY! Grapes are poisonous to dwarves!
NPC.QUEST_1533I: We obtain wool from silver yaks, it is of higher quality and doesn't need washing.
NPC.QUEST_1533II: This already looks interesting, but you will need a lot of powder, and I don't need so many pots.
NPC.QUEST_1533III: It seems you are already desperate. No, I don't need insects, there is no shortage of various beetles underground.
NPC.QUEST_1533IV: Listen, what do you have there, that thing, the one you have more than others?
NPC.QUEST_1534: Great, the new recipe has been added to the workshop. Good luck with the underground exploration.
NPC.quest_1544: Hello! I would like to set the island up for summer holidays. My son was doing that, but he has messed everything up. Could you clean the mess and make it usable? I trust you.
NPC.QUEST_1586: AAAAAA! Tfu, who sneaks up from behind like that. Almost gave me a heart attack. Besides, I spilled the dough bowl. What is the password?
NPC.QUEST_1587:
What is this place? My kitchen, of course. Here I prepare food.

___
NPC.QUEST_1588:
At least you know how to make dough. But no need to scare like that, you can knock on the cave wall.

___
NPC.QUEST_1589: (Flinzy sniffs the horseradish) Well, at least you're not one of THEM. But the dough is ruined.
NPC.QUEST_1590:
Grogo? No, I don't know any Grogo. I know food. If you show me a recipe I don't know, I'll introduce you to a new spice.
_____
NPC.QUEST_1591I: A great banana cake, but I know how to make that.
NPC.QUEST_1591II: Did you know it tastes great with raspberry jam?
NPC.QUEST_1591III: You might not know this, but the seaweed is delivered to us by pirates.
NPC.QUEST_1592I: I have a cellar full of jams. You won't surprise me with those.
NPC.QUEST_1592II: I've only eaten radishes in childhood, but that's not really a recipe...
NPC.QUEST_1592III: Why not live? You don't know anything about this world yet. You still have a lot to learn.
NPC.QUEST_1593: Wonderful! I've never tasted a drink like that. For that, you deserve a concentrated horseradish recipe.
NPC.QUEST_1653: You have gained Flinzy's trust, which hasn't happened to anyone in a long time. She believes you could help us. Let's start with the extinguished lanterns, they are very important. Let's solve this problem together.
NPC.QUEST_1654: As a result of my research, I've discovered that jellyfish have settled in the lanterns. I might have found out sooner by examining the lanterns more closely... But that's not important. The solution is simple - use the green souls.
NPC.QUEST_1761: Hey, stranger! You've arrived to Atavalp village and my name is chief Mo.
NPC.QUEST_1762: The main occupations of Atavalp village villagers are associated with reeds and llamas. If you want, I can sell you sickle recipe. But Adonsy can teach you how to care for llamas.
NPC.QUEST_1765: You can only get useful food from ripe reeds. Reeds regrow each day along with the turn of day (06:00). You will be able to purchase llamas after finishing Adonsy's tasks.
NPC.quest_2103a: Halt! Where are my snails? Wait, you're not the rascal who set my babies free.
NPC.quest_2103b: Hello, my name is Galvira, and this is my pet, who bravely guards this passage.
NPC.quest_2104: At the moment there is no way you can help me. I'm busy! I need to take care of a couple of underground tricksters that dare to haunt here.
NPC.quest_2108: Excellent! You've proven your strength, so I'll leave the rest of the passage restoration under your supervision. I think my drills will serve you well.
NPC.quest_2134: Listening to your story, I thought of a very special torch, it's located in the center of Nihiru Island. First, I'd recommend getting to know the islands closer to home, and only then embark on such a long journey.
NPC.quest_2136a: Great, it seems I can teach you a few useful craftsman's tricks.
NPC.quest_2136b: Silence, brother, you're still learning from me! I've accumulated a lot of knowledge about underground stones, from now on I'll be the one to train you!
NPC.quest_2199: Mister camel was only sleeping. Thank you! Neighbors treated me with ice creams, some I saved for you as well!
NPC.QUEST_2215: Look at this bountiful harvest! I would love if you built trio of pyramids that I haven't seen before.
NPC.quest_2223: Look, we find second part! Sad it's rusted and can't be used. I don't know what to do, but grandpa says, if we find second part, we go ask advice to Elders.
NPC.quest_2225: Sadly no one knows where to find the generous stranger. Elders suggest making a workshop by ourselves on one of the local islands. These tools could certainly be useful for everyone around.
NPC.quest_2228: Nice walls, we will put on roof now, ok? My craftsman friend say he has apprentice that would like to work here.
NPC.quest_2235: Look, the first tool is done! You will need all the rest of materials when you'll want to use this tool. Stone eater will make the process faster, but you will still need energy for 10 actions and enough other special materials for tougher rocks.
NPC.quest_2236: Thank for your help. First tools we gift to you. Remember, if you need more tool, you can trade it for things. Merchants stingy, tool expensive, but we will figure something.
NPC.quest_2237: If you need more stone eaters, you can find a pack of them in the shop. Maybe you'll get some more good deals in the future.
NPC.QUEST_3050: Recently, a man in a brown coat visited the village, he said he planned to go to the local mountains. The stranger left his belongings and first went to explore the surrounding area, but he never returned. I have heard of your courage, but give up your recklessness. Landslides often happen in the mountains.
NPC.QUEST_3054: It was so noisy! Fortunately, nothing fell until the village. In the future, some of the cleared landslides will be restored. When planning a hike, always carry spare bags!
NPC.Quest_4063: Hei, select USE on the green bugs to tell the green bugs to start fanning.
NPC.quest_689: Hey, good job! The island is so green! You know what? We can teach you an awesome recipe for lemonade. Me and Mr Camel make it by squeezing cactus blossoms into water and shaking it well. A jolly good drink it is! Try it!
NPC.quest_690: Nice, man! Mr Camel has eaten now. You just need to handle the pretty costume part and he will share water with you. You'll sort this out, won't you?
NPC.quest_691: Great! Now Mr Camel looks totally chic. If you feed him, he will share water with you.
NPC.quest_698: Look! I has found a map with an undiscovered island. You can visit it by clicking on the raft and finding Ahe island on the map.
NPC.quest_719: The volcano on Amanu island is silent. When it was working, it was warm on all surrounding islands. Now it's getting chilly. The elders have decided to send you to volcano island to find out what has happened.
NPC.quest_720: Cut through the jungle plants to get to the volcano god. Be humble and kind in his presence - he seems rather angry.
NPC.quest_733: Mmmm! Thank you for the offerings! I will tell you how to activate the volcano, if you get me some things.
NPC.quest_736: Mmm! There are ancient treasures hidden on this island - flame elixir, explosive powder and volcano heart. Get all three and donate them to the volcano!
NPC.quest_736_2: Mmmm! I see that your chisel is too fragile for chopping lava stones. I'll give you a better tool in exchange for a small offering!
NPC.quest_751: Thanks! Now I can have great fun in Halloween!
NPC.quest_775: I has heard that by fixing the ship, one can go to wondrous place. But only its captain can repair it...
NPC.quest_779: Good news! I remember the captain's name - McDonald! Oh, no... that's where I ate salad 5 years ago. MacManus! Yes, that's it!
NPC.quest_780: Mmmmm! Of course I've heard about the legendary mysterious ship. But.. why should I spend my time on you?
NPC.quest_783: Mmmm! You've done well. Alright, I'll tell you a secret - if you fix the ship, you'll be able to go to a wondrous place where time works differently than on other islands in Oceania!
NPC.quest_784: Good news - your effort has paid off! Captain MacManus has been found!
NPC.quest_809: You can't get to Kiritimati island by water! You dig a tunnel and go to island underground!
NPC.quest_836: Wonderful! The mysterious ship is finished! Click on it to travel to a new, wonderful island!
NPC.quest_851: Great! Princess Tara adores your gift and will definitely talk fondly of Oceania in her further journeys.
NPC.quest_966: Hi! Me knows why you are here. The crazy noise come from other side of earth. You must dig through the whole globe to get there!
NPC.Q_1785: Hey, you are a good friend. Next quest will be hidden until you finish Savanna main quest. The tasks in part II will have creatures tied to that story line.
NPC.Q_1786: Hey, you are a good friend. Next quest will be hidden until you finish Adonsy's chores main quest. The tasks in part III will have creatures tied to that storyline.
NPC.Q_2810: Great! Wind have blown a lot of these balloons to Festival island. It won't be easy but if you manage to cache it, you can take it home.
NPC.Q_2949a: Think before you act! Some areas are accessible 2 out of 4 days, and some just 1 out of 4. There are numbers above geysers, III indicates that path will open in 3 days. The geysers open in strict sequence skipping a day in game will not skip geyser sequence.
NPC.Q_2949b: You have only these 4 quests, therefor you know all the tasks already. Plan according to this.
NPC.Q_2949c: You can spend rubies to open colored geyser path for JUST ONE DAY, afterwards, it becomes a regular geyser and joins the same 4 day cycle.
NPC.Q_2949d: Read carefully and think! If confused, perhaps your neighbors can give an advice, you don't have to solve this by yourself.
NPC.Q_3035: Don't rush! Most trees here need only one hit, but they will re-grow in 12 minutes. Before taking action check all quests given.
NPC.Q_3160: There are 8 treasure chests on the island. Try to find them in this tropical color chaos.
NPC.Q_3161: Hey, check workshop section UNIQUE! Remember, crafting tea without being tired will have zero effect.
NPC.Q_3162: Hey, this time the only main quest is feeding the crabs, everything else is secondary! Visit Atafu island and buy your new pets.
NPC.Q_3209: Open shop at Atafu island and put a garden pixie in your back yard as well.
NPC.Q_3218: Hei, You will need shovel to dig here, visit my island or your friend island get the shovel and come back.
NPC.Q_3220: Hei, You listen! Clear the path below clouds, and you will be able to walk trough even when  path is obscured by clouds. If you can not move, light a candle and disperse the cloud. Quests will reward you extra candle, so you don't have to wait.
NPC.Q_3225: I will tell you a secret, i have buried a treasure chest under one of the trees. Use MOVE action and place tree in a tile next to it then follow instructions given. And by the way, you can check crafting section UNIQUE to see what secret did the protected temple hold.
NPC.Q_3226: Hey, i see that you found the second box as well. Do like you did before, go home, take the shovel, and come back to dig out this box.
NPC.Q_3289:
Me explain once more:
You have six quests each with three tasks and somewhere in the cave there are hidden six trees. After finishing all three tasks of the same color you can upgrade the corresponding color tree.
NPC.Q_3289a: Quest text is engraved in trees with dark lanterns. Hovering pointer on to the discovered tree will reveal the corresponding color quest's text. Olaf wishes to upgrade all six trees.
NPC.Q_3291: Quest finished, now flute player can move upwards. In the underground find the flute player with this color tag and tell him to rest in peace. Press [UPGRADE] on tree with this color name.
NPC.Q_3300: Warning this island (Olaf's 1st adventure) will dissapear on june the 1st, everything on this island will be lost without traces!
NPC.Q_3303: Hey, the idea is like this: You split the big treasures in to transportable chunks and then move them to Festival island.
NPC.Q_3333: Island has three parts, it will be more efficient if you do them one by one and not all at once.
NPC.Q_3334: Chopping the stone gave you an idea for better saws. The workshop now has the improved saw option.
NPC.Q_3335: Sawing the trees gave you an idea for better wooden nets. The workshop now has the improved wooden net option.
NPC.Q_3336: Poking the flowers gave you an idea for better hammers. The workshop now has the improved hammer option.
NPC.Q_3338: Visit Atafu island, and chose one of the two prizes from SALE section in the shop.
NPC.Q_3371: Hey, you look for green land. Only green place is buildable. This place at bus has not enough space.
NPC.Q_3413: You remember. Dream sheep be used to purchase other dreams.
NPC.Q_3473: Red mushroom is bad for people, but dream spirits consider it a delicacy. Press USE on the imp stool, to attract more friendly spirits.
NPC.Q_3551: Hei PoKo will tell you a secret. To reach some areas you will need to put a field on top of water. Only few spots allow this, search for valid tiles.
NPC.Q_3577: Great! That totals of 7 eggs. You be remember, you needs 25 eggs. Not need all quests to finish.
NPC.Q_3624: Great! Now you can fix ice sculpture. Find broken ice and press UPGRADE.
NPC.Q_3625: Great! Now you can upgrade ice teahouse. Find the ice square and press UPGRADE.
NPC.Q_3626: Great! Now you can upgrade team house. Press UPGRADE.
NPC.Q_3640: Craters are sizzling due to falling rocks. Once every four days some of the craters will chill and be walk-able, days left until they cool are indicated with III , II and I.
NPC.Q_3671: Hey, me remember this hammer, open map and me show where to use it, travel to Garlic island.
NPC.Q_3696: Each task must be done twice, if you open ??OO and OO?? at the same time, you can do both in one go. Check the rocks to see which riddles they open.
NPC.Q_3705: Hey, the Obelisk just got a new icon, try using this new icon.
NPC.Q_3713: Do not forget to use acquired ciphers in underground. Keep in mind that the most practical thing is opening those underground quests all at same time, so you would not have to do them twice.
NPC.Q_3728: Listen to advice! Five instructors are hidden somewhere in the bushes, you can use the experiments i gave you to hire more in the shop. Trust me it is worth it.
NPC.Q_3732: This is not the last side quest, a bit latter the fun will continue.
NPC.Q_3735: Listen to my advice, you really need extra turtles. Check the shop, perhaps it is worth spending the experiments i gifted on turtles.
NPC.Q_3740: You will definitely need extra collection items after you do all quests. Find extras to help the palm tree in its studies.
NPC.Q_3741: Congratulations! Palm tree has finished primary school. You can keep collecting and keep educating palm trees if you wish. Do not forget to click the finished tree to cash in the rewards.
NPC.Q_3741B: Next week palm tree is going for the 10th - 12th grade. This path will be optional and voluntary.
NPC.Q_3756: Hey, now visit the Sea wave island, check your map.
NPC.Q_3759: Excelent! Sheep have three quests: A, B and C. One is on main island the second is on Fest island and the third is on Wave island.
NPC.Q_3825: Hey, snorkel-mask can be earned trough animals, but me recommend keeping pace. Dive, work on shore, dive again, then work on surface some more.
NPC.Q_3837: Hei, some bubbles have lobsters or turtles inside them, if you lack these creatures, try bursting bubbles.
NPC.Q_3866: Hei, did you notice the hidden quest?
NPC.Q_3881: While looking down where to put your feet, you notice abundance of mushrooms, harvest the, all.
NPC.Q_3891: Hei, there is second marten available, you can buy it from the shop. Don't dally, it will not remain in the shop forever.
NPC.Q_3892: Recommend doing big energy task soon, do other things late.
NPC.Q_3910: If you finished all the quests and still lack Forest research, open shop and build more fences. This only happens if you sold some forest research by mistake.
NPC.Q_3976: After painting the flowers, poke the pussy willow or revisit the island. The rabbit will start pulling out the decorations he stored away.
NPC.Q_3977: After coloring the ants, poke the pussy willow or revisit the island. The rabbit will start pulling out the decorations he stored away.
NPC.Q_3978: After refreshing the mushrooms, poke the pussy willow or revisit the island. The rabbit will start pulling out the decorations he stored away.
NPC.Q_3979: After warming the ladybugs, poke the pussy willow or revisit the island. The rabbit will start pulling out the decorations he stored away.
NPC.Q_3985: There may or may not be usage for extra golden hens, for now rabbit will think about it.
NPC.Q_4020: Your nose has exceeded its limits, cure it with help of scented candles, select USE on them.
NPC.Q_4121: Hey, did you notice? Small spruces are walkable.
NPC.Q_4121a: Do not forget, there are six owls on the map, and eventually you will need to find them all.
NPC.Q_4125:
Listen to homework:
1. Running - Sell 28 rabbits on main isle.
2. Lifting - Chop 32 times rubber trees or sturdy palmtrees on any isle.
3. Crawl - build clay or stone paths on School isle.
NPC.Q_4126:
Listen to homework:
1. Rebound - Feed friendly puppy 16 times on School isle.
2. PH level - Harvest 12 radish fields on main isle.
3.  Hexagons - Empty beehives 32 times on main isle.
NPC.Q_4127:
Listen to homework:
1. Bird migration - feed Toucan friends on School isle 24 times.
2. Seedlings - Harvest 12 wheat fields on main isle.
3. Fish migration - Fish shark coast for gudgeons 32 times.
NPC.Q_4128:
Listen to homework:
1. Declension - feed 24 ducklings on Atafu isle.
2. Prefixes - Harvest Common language 12 times on School isle.
3. Essay - Build one gazebo on main isle.
NPC.Q_4129:
Listen to homework:
1. Adding fractions -  Feed 24 koalas on main isle.
2. Data clusters - harvest runes 12 times on school isle.
3. Sinusoids - Build 3 hammocks on main isle.
NPC.Q_4130:
Listen to homework:
1. Exercise voice - feed 28 roosters on main isle.
2. Rhymes - Cultivate strange language on School isle 12 times.
3. Visiting museum - Build 3 toilets on main isle.
NPC.Q_4131:
Reminder:

NPC.Q_4132:
Reminder:
Nature B1 - Feed 24 toucan friends on School isle.
Language B2 - Harvest common language on School isle.
Mathematics B3 - Build 4 hammocks on main isle.
NPC.Q_4133:
Reminder:
Language B1 - Feed 24 ducks on main isle.
Mathematics B2 - Harvest rune fields 12 times.
Art B3 - Build 3 toilets on main isle.
NPC.Q_4134:
Reminder:
Mathematics B1 - Feed 24 koalas on main isle.
Art B2 - Cultivate strange language 12 times.
Sports B3 - Build clay or stone paths on main isle.
NPC.Q_4135:
Reminder:
Art B1 - Feed 28 roosters on main isle.
Sports B2 - Chop 32 times rubber trees or sturdy palmtrees anywhere.
Science B3 - Empty beehives 32 times on main isle.
NPC.Q_4136:
Reminder:
Sports B2 - Sell  28 rabbits on main isle.
Science B2 - Harvest 12 radish fields on main isle.
Nature B3 - Fish in shark coast 32 times.
NPC.Q_4176: Hey, warm colors can only be made in workshop, but worry not, the amount you need can be made in 24-30 hours.
NPC.Q_4284: Sharpen your mind with Winter riddles, the prize is a Tree of unknown origins. Answers to riddles will be displayed in follow up quest description.
NPC.Q_4284b: ATTENTION AT THE END OF JANUARY FESTIVAL ISLAND WILL BE REBOOTED, THUS EVERYTHING ON IT WILL BE LOST.
NPC.Q_4285:
There is a secret in the store, find where to spend the chocolate beetles, because they can and must be spent in the store.
The Winter Cup is approaching, some of the tasks in the cup will be in the form of puzzles, so you can consider this as a kind of warm-up.
NPC.Q_4295: To solve the tasks it was necessary to sell SMALL rabbits, sell pigs and sell yeast, spices or cumin seeds from the bag.
NPC.Q_4296: To solve the tasks, it was necessary to build totem masks or mahogany thrones, sow 30 grapes and feed meerkats.
NPC.Q_4297: To solve the tasks, it was necessary to obtain 120 units of chili, feed ostriches and build pearl chests.
NPC.Q_4298: To solve the tasks, it was necessary to build large aquariums, feed foxes and cut thorn bushes.
NPC.Q_4299: Don't forget to spend the chocolate beetles in the EXCLUSIVE section of the shop.
NPC.Q_4302: Hey, click on Evie and choose USE to ask about what curse just hit this island.
NPC.Q_4329: Whoa, was that a bat that just whistled? Finding the pod echoed with a slight shaking of the ground. Better hide at Paprick (visits) then come back, or better yet, reload the page. Things will look completely different when you come back.
NPC.Q_4333a: If you build enough stools, it is possible that some unusual cloud will be blown into the island.
NPC.Q_4333b: Should I look for an umbrella or a bucket now? It is possible that you will be able to repeat this phenomenon if you build more.
NPC.Q_4333c: You can sell stools if you wish to, just keep making them as well. There will not be any further messages.
NPC.Q_4333d: Did the title Last rain mean nothing to you? Alright, have these trinkets and be off with you, there will not be any more secret quests.
NPC.Q_4343: Wow! An opportunity to observe the restoration of an ancient temple. I definitely need to see it and document it.
NPC.Q_4344: Hey! This is simply incredible! I think we have discovered a way to a completely different world. But it feels so REAL! Governor, we need to look into it. This will be my life's work.
NPC.Q_4345: That duck pond doesn't quite fit in here. I've researched it thoroughly and I think it could be magical. So disturbing!
NPC.Q_4345a: You've already searched this island very thoroughly and found 23 gems that we could try placing around the pond? Go, what are you waiting for!
NPC.Q_4350: This is so beautiful! Couldn't have chosen anything better for research. Governor, this would not be possible without your help. THANK YOU!
NPC.Q_4350a: It appears that the Golden Panda also has a direct practical application. With its help, in different seasons, it is possible to obtain different workshop resources, the production of which usually takes time.
NPC.Q_4350b: Once every 22 hours, it is possible to give the necessary resources to the panda and immediately receive ready-made material in return. The range of materials will change with the seasons.
NPC.Q_4351: Hmm. These rooms and the ones you set aside in your Governor's residence should be enough for us…
NPC.Q_4352: After a hard day's work, it's great to relax under the fan and chat with the local spirits. It's a pity that they speak a foreign language. But I will decode it!
NPC.Q_4353: A healthy diet is important for every researcher. You could also stop by for lunch more often. Washing the dishes would also help!
NPC.Q_4354: With such a team and funding, you might even be able to not work... But what am I talking about here - the discovery is the most important thing. And we do them here on every corner.
NPC.Q_4452:
It was getting dark, but the cockatoo hasn't returned yet. The miracle bird regrets his insistence, now the main thing is to find a relative.
Cockatoo seen on thicket island, please look there.
NPC.Q_4453: Don't forget to use binoculars to observe the colorful trees, nature watching and looking for cockatoos restores energy.
NPC.Q_4532: Hey, see if you can upgrade any of the thundering firs on the island, now you should have access to a wider area of the island.
NPC.Q_4553:
Taste dishes from all festive tables.
If you feast like this 40 times, you will discover a hidden area of the island.
NPC.Q_4982: In order not to get confused, it is recommended to gather as many fish as possible first. Fish gathering on this island does not consume energy.
NPC.Q_4983: Your activity on this island will be limited by the use of the cauldron. Make sure that the pot never stands still.
NPC.Q_4983b: Your goal is to create a path of roses to the pyramid cellar, wine fountain, gramophone and rubber tree stumps. You will need access to the icicles and the table a little later.
NPC.Q_4984b: Hey, there is definitely a way forward, you just have to look for it. Sometimes you get the illusion that the field in front of you is another plant, if you don't manage to treat the plant in front of you, try the neighbor of this plant. This tip will really come in handy.
NPC.Q_4986a: Don't forget to use the sawmill. But also take a look at the pyramid to see how many repair fragments you will really need.
NPC.Q_4986b: You are doing great, but even this amount is barely half of what is needed to repair the pyramid. Continue to weave patches with the help of the sawmill.
NPC.Q_4986c: The basement is fixed, but where does this strange hole lead? Try USING the basement pyramid (or visit Paprick).
NPC.Q_4987c: Visit Paprick or use the pyramid cellar. If you walk quietly, you will discover who is feasting at the laid table.
NPC.Q_4988b: Hey, don't forget that you need vitalizing water to upgrade the tables.
NPC.Q_4989: Almost the whole island is already blooming. If the whole island is not blooming yet, you still have a place to express yourself.
NPC.Q_4989b: After the icicles melt, only puddles remain. This means that the icicle fence can also be turned into a walkable corridor.
NPC.Q_5027a:
With a loud bang the local volcanos have fizzled out. You can feel the winter's chill already.
The only option to ignite these mountains is by finishing either bronze, silver or gold quest lines.
NPC.Q_5027b:
If you do this quickly enough, you will receive a special snow globe, the quicker you work, the better the globe.
While these quest do indeed require significant effort, they also give back part of the energy spent.
NPC.Q_5027c:
The Winter cup island is divided into three tiers. Any player can do the Bronze tier and earn hefty amount of reputation. Finishing all tiers will award you three times as much reputation.
Go on, purchase the traveling module.
NPC.Q_5027d:
If you do not qualify for higher tier quests, you will not see them on the Winter cup stadium island.
You need at least level III Workshop to access the Silver tier quest list. Only players who have fixed the bridge on main island will see the Gold tier. And can earn Winter cup.
Go on, use the traveling pod.
NPC.Q_5158: Migrate with the beasts, find the Beast Tunnel isle and set off.
NPC.Q_5167: Hey, did you know? Improving the pond restores its activities. If you don't want to wait for ink, you can upgrade the pond over and over to empty it. If you use the right mouse button, you can upgrade the pond regardless of the number of actions left in it.
NPC.Q_5300: Hey, if you let all 55 parrots surf in the first seven days, you'll get extra prizes.
NPC.Q_5300b: If you finish even faster, namely in the first seven, five or three days, the prizes will be better. Especially crazy Oceanians who complete the entire cycle of tasks will receive a parrot on the first day.
NPC.Q_5491: Add the names of the new guests to the book! Click UPGRADE on the book.
NPC.Q_5648: You can relax and enjoy this festive island. Paprick baked you cakes, and Kadsija gathered flower baskets, and thanks to Turik for the colorful banana palms.
NPC.Q_5651a: I've never seen such a large baobab in my life. An eagle the size of a bison could be housed in such a tree hollow.
NPC.Q_5651b: I don't know, I don't know. A settlement crafted by a master's hand seems like a better solution to me. You can live civilized and comfortably.
NPC.Q_5652:
Write it down! I'm not joking, write it down, otherwise you'll forget. This cycle is endless:
Insect stones - marigolds - mines - plants from the furrows.
Wait, we haven't reached the furrows yet.
NPC.Q_5653: Exchange and exchange, and exchange until all supplies are gone. You'll have to walk many times from berries to totems and back. Soon we'll also start the second cycle of Tropical palms - domestic animals.
NPC.Q_5656a: I think I'm better at catching insects. Later we'll do it this way, you'll help me with farming tasks, and I'll catch insects for you and make lanterns.
NPC.Q_5656b: You've chosen to build the Baobab, so forget about the Mansion. The Baobab task line will now be twice as advantageous as the other task line. However, I can't forbid you from helping the Volcano God, after all, it's hard to refuse friends.
NPC.Q_5657a:
So listen carefully:
These tasks are not endless, but the cycles can be quite long. Harvest as many bananas as you can, then use the bananas to feed the animals, and return to the palms. Do the same with berries and totems.
NPC.Q_5657b: You've chosen to build the Mansion, so forget about the Baobab. The Mansion task line will be twice as advantageous as the other task line. However, I can't forbid you from helping Gonzo, after all, it's hard to refuse friends.
NPC.Q_5661: The Baobab material line has been successfully completed. Don't forget to process the materials so you can build the monument you desire.
NPC.Q_5665: The Mansion material line has been successfully completed. Don't forget to process the materials so you can build the monument you desire.
NPC.Q_5750: Bane baked cupcakes to celebrate. These cupcakes can be placed both on the main island and here, with the pirates. By drowning the cupcakes in the ocean you will save space, but maybe some are worth taking home.
NPC.Q_5773: Each of the three totems will take you to a different region with quests of the appropriate difficulty. These totems cannot be used remotely, you will have to approach the totem to travel. We recommend visiting all three disciplines at once.
NPC.Q_5785:
Feed 96 chicks.
For this trick, I need you to close your eyes, then open them (travel to Paprick Island and back).
Did you notice any changes?
NPC.Q_5787:
Do you know what would look great on this island? A large bunch of star flowers.
P.S. don't touch the caraway bushes, otherwise you'll have to spend a lot of energy.
NPC.Q_5788: Cut 35 caraway bushes. If you happen to cut the bushes, you'll have to chop medium or larger rubber trees.
NPC.Q_5789: Use the caraway seeds, you'll find additional seeds in midsummer flower bushes. Remember, this task only works at the Competition Crossroads.
NPC.Q_5796:
Uncle has drawn three numbers in the sand here, namely:
40, 3, 80
NPC.Q_5797:
Uncle has drawn three numbers in the sand here, namely:
120, 30, 16
NPC.Q_5798:
Uncle has drawn three numbers in the sand here, namely:
40, 90, 40
NPC.Q_5799:
Uncle has drawn three numbers in the sand here, namely:
36, 60, 20
NPC.Q_5800:
Uncle has drawn three numbers in the sand here, namely:
50, 12, 210
NPC.Q_5801:
Uncle has drawn three numbers in the sand here, namely:
60, 5, 55
NPC.Q_5802:
Uncle has drawn three numbers in the sand here, namely:
60, 40, 45
NPC.Q_5809: Ouch! The clawed one pinched me! These materials should be enough, poke the clawed one (if there are any left) and ask if it needs anything else.
NPC.Q_5810: Uncle needed some flowers for experiments, and uncle's new assistant took care of it. Sorry, uncle didn't mean to ruin your garden.
NPC.Q_5812: Keep using the hedge shears, you will need a large number of free plots on this island.
NPC.Q_5813: That was interesting! I couldn't manage to train this creature, and it prefers to trim your bushes. I'll entrust my assistant to you!
NPC.Q_5833: There has been a landslide in the mountains recently, but it's not too bad, as only Teacher Isabella's summer house is located there. You could visit and make sure she hasn't been harmed.
NPC.Q_5848: Vulpijs suggests having a picnic sitting in the Yellow Flowers. With the help of a picnic pack, you can remove these flowers.
NPC.Q_5855: Vulpija's three favorite places to spend picnic packs are: in the Yellow Flowers, among the Tropical Palms, and next to the Rosebuds.
NPC.Q_5857: You will find Rosebuds next to the cat decors. Vulpijs plans a picnic in this place, but feel free to spend picnic packs on tropical palms or yellow flowers as well.
NPC.Q_5864a: All three monuments have a preparation stage before real construction begins. Identifying the monuments does not require special materials. Make sure the mansion and baobab tower are at least in the Improvement stage.
NPC.Q_5864b: In the Improvement phase, each monument has more than 30 actions. Materials will be enough to complete only one monument. Make your choice now.
NPC.Q_5864c: The main prize is awarded for completing a monument. You can also build a little of each monument, but then you won't be able to complete any of the monuments during this event.
NPC.Q_5904: Hey, the Shaman Disco Ball and the Underground Disco Ball can only be obtained after you have completed the corresponding ADDITIONAL quest, as well as ALL the DISCO SPECIAL QUEST lines.
NPC.Q_5904b: This condition can also be seen in the shop when you are in the Underworld or Shaman Island. Please note that you can only place ONE disco ball on each island. You can get three in total, one on each island.
NPC.Q_5914a: Riddle tasks are available immediately. If you can guess the tasks, you don’t have to wait for the answers and can start completing them. There will be 12 riddles in total.
NPC.Q_5914b: In each goal, the first task is related to animals, the second focuses on plants, and the third involves other things.
NPC.Q_5914c: It’s impossible to miss the correct answers; the baskets with hints appear even if you started later or skipped a day.
NPC.Q_Olafs_1: You help Olaf collect the treasures and Olaf will help you! Open shop section SALE and place the booster Olaf has provided.
NPC.Q_Pretty_Bastard_1: Great, but remember, you need to finish with 250 reputation to get the prize.
NPC.Q_Pretty_Bastard_2: Excellent, remember, if you have less than 250 reputation in your bag at the time of the finish, you will not receive the prize.
NPC.Q_Rich_Bastard_1: Great, but remember, you need to finish with 2000 shells to get the prize.
NPC.Q_Rich_Bastard_2: Excellent, remember, if you have less than 2000 shells in your bag at the time of the finish, you will not receive the prize.
NPC.Q_Smart_Bastard_1: Great, but remember, you need to finish with 34300 experience points to get the prize.
NPC.Q_Smart_Bastard_2: Excellent, remember, if you have less than 34300 experience points in your bag at the time of the finish, you will not receive the prize.
NPC.RADISH_advice: Hey, while you wait on radishes, perhaps try opening diary and do other pending tasks?
NPC.REPAIR_RAFT: Great, wood is gathered, so now we can start repairing the raft. You can do it, by simply clicking on it and then complete it by adding rope.
NPC.REP_GATHERED1: Good you get more reputation. Here has iron axe shaft! You needs it to make iron axe.
NPC.REP_GATHERED2: Ooh! You has even more reputation! Here has this iron axe blade. You make iron axe now, and chop down baobab trees!
NPC.SELL_ANIMAL: Nice, the hen is healthy and you can sell it for full price.\nIt was ill, because none had fed it in time, therefore it is very important to feed animals in time.
NPC.task_1323: Hey there! Help! You know what? We've been here for a long time. Me and Mr Camel survived the crash. Come here! I've got a big favour to ask!
NPC.task_1324_1: You know what? We have a few bushes on the island. We got some wonderful juice out of them, but then they dried out. Maybe you have a bucket of water? You know what? You could water them.
NPC.task_1324_2: I see that you'll need tons of water. Mr Camel here has a great supply of water, but this one will only share if you feed him and get him something fancy to wear. Can you arrange this, huh?
NPC.task_1362: Hey! Yes, I has heard about volcano island and knows the way. But there is no use going there unless you collect many things to bring along!
NPC.task_1363: Mmmm! Why are you here? Leave and do not look back!
NPC.task_1434: Your comes to me? Volcano god send? I make donation for volcano god and volcano, so it works and gives warmth. Please, you go and deliver!
NPC.task_1449: Mmmm! You're still here? Go away and leave me be!
NPC.task_1450: Why do you disturb me? Can't you see that I'm resting? Mmmm! You're still here? Ah! You want it to be warm on your island? Then try passing my tests!
NPC.task_1504: Hello! Me wants to treat all my guests, but I'm out of candy. You help?
NPC.task_1528: Your has found a ship? I can tell you something if you help me a bit!
NPC.task_1538: Oh, it's you! No, wait... I don't remember you. Nice to meet you! Ship, captain... you know what? Get me some stuff and return - maybe I'll remember something while you're gone.
NPC.task_1750: Hello! Welcome to my big celebration! Have some cake!
NPC.task_1919: Hello! How great that you have arrived! I recently found a bottle in the sand. It contained a sketch of an especially spacious storeroom. I thought that you might be interested!
NPC.task_2323: Oh my! That must be the monster who has taken over the island! Try to calm it down, so that it doesn't attack. I'll find out how to deal with it!
NPC.task_2504: Oh, it is you! My neighbours Berko and Ayana are fighting so loudly that my family can't stand it anymore!
NPC.task_2581: Dried savannah grass! How simple, and yet ingenious! I believe that this stripy creature and I will be great friends!
NPC.task_2582: That reptile food is worth more than gold! The crocodile is sweet as a kitten now!
NPC.task_2583: What a house! And it's so cosy inside! I can't wait to organise a house-warming party!
NPC.task_2672: Oh, it's you! Me just wanted to remind you that there is a huge cave in the cliff on your island. Are you not interested to explore it?
NPC.task_2893: The librarian is very grateful! Now she can continue her important work.
NPC.task_2895: The healer is in awe - this new medicine is truly wonderful!
NPC.task_2899: The Great Torch of Peace is lit - now everyone will know that there's no need to worry!
NPC.task_2939: Oh no! A hurricane has crossed Nihiru island! Hurry - there's no time to waste!
NPC.task_2940: Hello, my friend! How is you doing? I'm good, but my friend Amara in big trouble. She has bought a ghost and monster infested house! Could you go to her?
NPC.task_2947: Brrr! The house really seems haunted! You'd better go and see if you can get rid of all that horror!
NPC.task_2956: Haru's old friend Cho is a chef and wants to open a restaurant in Oceania. Haru was hoping that you might help his friend out.
NPC.task_4370: How did you get here? We tried so hard to block the passages so THEY wouldn't get into our underground.
NPC.task_4371: Horseradish, so what? I still won't believe that you can be trusted, anyone can harvest horseradish underground.
NPC.task_4372: Where did you get THIS? You've gained Flinzy's trust, and that's enough for me. My name is Frārs and this is my older brother Ulfars, this is our underground workshop.
NPC.task_4373a: Repair the passages? It seems you'll need my help, you won't get far with those flimsy drills, I've made a more durable set of drills, while you repair the passages, I'll be preparing the drills.
NPC.task_4373b: Ulfars is old and conservative, he doesn't like strangers, so he doesn't talk to them at all. Maybe later he'll share the strongest drills.
NPC.task_4377: I talked to my brother, he's almost convinced that you're really not one of THEM. Ulfars has decided to test you.
NPC.task_4401a: I think by making you stay longer, I've given you a chance to appreciate our lovely underground. I know, I know, you need especially durable drills.
NPC.task_4401b: Don't think I'll stop watching you! If deserved, I'll help, but if you annoy me.....
NPC.task_4410: Under my fist, any metal bends, prove you can keep up and you'll receive a gift.
NPC.task_4573: School bus hasn't arrived yet. Don't let these 24 rascals
NPC.task_4619: Great, there is enough room here to hold harvest stock. I've decided to pile all of the harvest in pyramids. If you gather enough for one of them, you can try your hand out in building one.
NPC.task_4663: In old days we needed many stone. A nice stranger made stone eaters. I not seen that person in long time.
NPC.task_5707: Hi! Looks like these trees will crumble away without your help. Just visit this island each day to keep the decay going.
NPC.task_5723: Oh, no! Priest Calmar wanted to improve spooky atmosphere with some incantations. Hurry back before disaster has happened.
NPC.task_5723a: We were too late! Calmar has disturbed the spirits and in their anger they have conjured unpassable darkness.
NPC.Task_6980: Check the shop! The skeletons were actually smooth merchants. Chose a prize most fitting for you.
NPC.Task_7091: Does not matter which of the two fragments you found, you can use them. Poke the hidden pieces and find the one that can be collected.
NPC.Task_7092: If you managed to find a fragment then do not forget to pick it up. Do not leave it laying in the sand.
NPC.Task_7139: Me was curious about this cave, but i not brave enough. Come to my island and tell i how it looks, i will give snacks if you visit me island.
NPC.Task_7363:
Hey, geyser thingy need cold. Look if bus conditioner is usable.
Look for trees to dig shards out of earth.
NPC.Task_7985: Black pucks can be used to activate bonuses. Spend them carefully, they go a lot more easy then they come.
NPC.Task_8030: Hey, getting collection without bonuses active is a waste of energy. Each bonus increases drop chance, with all three running at the same time your chances will increse 7 times.
NPC.Task_8034: Hey, You should check Hockey island store. You can spend golden pucks to buy clothing, and it will not affect the quest in any way.
NPC.Task_9199: Be careful. You can not claim the end prize if you are shocked, so, at the very end, if you want to collect the final reward you will need to heal yourself first, and healing is not that cheap.
NPC.Task_9947:
Some Crazy bushes can be cut, others are decorations for blocking the road, you will understand which bush is which only by trying.
Adjusts all the nasty bushes to be walkable, so you don't have to cut them at all. Try to go for a saw without cutting the road, you see, these are the bushes to walk on.
NPC.Task_9951: Each pod will have a different effect when the furrow is dug, throw any of the pods into the ground.
NPC.Task_9954:
Hey, travel with bats if you haven't already. When you return to the island you can continue planting.
If you can't hit the bats with the cursor, then traveling by raft will also work.
NPC.tobby_r1: ... I thought I had a sunstroke... But then I learned to enjoy it!
NPC.tobby_r2: ... Did you know that sand tastes like white bread crumbs? ... All you need is persistence!
NPC.tobby_r3: ... Oh, hello, Michael! Oh no, my mistake, I took you for Michael... You have a similar voice.
NPC.tobby_r4: ... I've been on this island for... Oh dear! Is that a talking camel?!
NPC.tobby_r5: ... I've been here for so long. If I weren't crazy, I'd probably go insane.
NPC.tobby_r6: ... I've been practising origami here on the beach. Until I realised that I had no paper...
NPC.tobby_r7: ... A friend of his niece's daughter used to enjoy motorcycling... Wait, why am I telling you this?
NPC.TOTEM_PLACED: Now you need to build the totem. But you have to take in mind that you will need two emeralds to finish it. Look for these emeralds in the nearby bushes.
NPC.TOTEM_PLACED1: You builds EAGLE TOTEM? Great! But look for our holy emeralds in the bushes. You needs them to finish EAGLE TOTEM!
NPC.TOTEM_REP_GATHERED: Ooh! You has earned big big reputation! You can buy now EAGLE TOTEM in our shop BUILDING section and start building it.
NPC.TUTORIAL_BUILD_FIREPLACE: Now that you have learned to grow animals, it is time to build things to truly feel at home. Let's start with a fireplace.
NPC.TUTORIAL_BUILD_HOUSE: Finally you can build your first place where to live. Earn enough shells and buy it in the shop.
NPC.TUTORIAL_BUILD_WATERSOURCE: Nice, the ropes are ready! Now go to the shop and buy a simple well and build it.
NPC.TUTORIAL_CHANGE_APPEARANCE: We have added new animations and looks for avatars! All clothes you bought have been deleted and rubies have been refunded. Now, create a new look for yourself!
NPC.TUTORIAL_CHAPTER3_FINISHED: Congratulations! Now you are officially an inhabitant of the island. But what should you do to become a governor? Let us ask Paprick!
NPC.TUTORIAL_CHAPTER3_GOAL: Oh no, it turns out EAGLE TOTEM can be built only on prestigious islands. We will have to learn to earn reputation. Let's start with sand paths. Go to shop and buy one.
NPC.TUTORIAL_CRAFTING: Aha, you've found a rope, a stick and a stone shard. Hey, you can craft a stone axe from these things. Visit WORKSHOP window at the bottom of the screen and press CRAFT.
NPC.TUTORIAL_CRAFT_REED: Great! Now we have warmth and water, it is time to build place where to sleep. First of all grow some corn for straw bundles.
NPC.TUTORIAL_CREATE_ROPE2: Great! The fireplace is ready. Now let us continue with a well for water. At the start lets make some more rope.
NPC.TUTORIAL_ENERGY: Many actions in the game need energy. When your energy runs out, you will have to wait, till it recharges or you can recharge it yourself using special items.
NPC.TUTORIAL_EXPERIENCE: You just gained experience! It is very important, because when you gather enough experience, you will get a levelup and gain access to new things.
NPC.TUTORIAL_FIRST_ACTION: Aha! You have found something and gained experience. Your stuff is stored in your BAG. If you get enough experience, your level will increase and you will get some extra goodies.
NPC.TUTORIAL_HEAL_ANIMAL: Ah, to buy unfinished buildings you will need a lot of shells. We will need to learn to grow animals. Let's start with a hen. There's one in the further corner of the island. Heal it with the medipack.
NPC.TUTORIAL_INTRO: Hey! It seems you've landed on a stranded island. My name is Billy the Ball and I will help you. Check your QUEST journal to see what to do next.
NPC.TUTORIAL_INTRO2: Good idea! Let's check the bushes and rocks. Click on them to try to find something useful!
NPC.TUTORIAL_INVENTORY: Nice, you've found a useful item. It will be placed in your backpack for now. Maybe later you can create something from it.
NPC.TUTORIAL_IRON_AXE1: Great! Now we have things to make an iron axe in the workshop section UNIQUE
NPC.TUTORIAL_NATIVE_CHAPTER3_GOAL: Me sees that you built a nice house. But to earn reputation you must build EAGLE TOTEM.
NPC.TUTORIAL_NATIVE_TOTEM_FINISHED: You built EAGLE TOTEM? You is great!
NPC.TUTORIAL_NEW_PLAYER: Hello! Welcom to game Oceania! You've been washed out on this small deserted island and it is time to think what to do next. But first of all tell me how you look like.
NPC.TUTORIAL_PRE_CRAFTING: Let's take a look at what you've found. A rope, a stick and a stone shard. Hey, you can craft a stone axe from these things. It's time to learn how to craft items using workshop window.
NPC.TUTORIAL_RESOURCE_0:
Congratulations! You gained enough experience to get to the 2nd level. Your energy is recharged and you've been awarded 1 ruby. 
You can use rubies to buy excklusive special items in the game.
NPC.TUTORIAL_RESOURCE_1: You've gathered your first wood. They will be needed for building and crafting various things.
NPC.TUTORIAL_RESOURCE_2: Great! You've cooked your first portion of food from salt and radish.Food is very important because you will need it to feed animals.
NPC.TUTORIAL_RESOURCE_3: Oh, shells! You should definately keep them. They might be useful, if we meet some natives, they might be interested to trade them in for some other things.
NPC.TUTORIAL_TOTEM_FINISHED: Nicely done! You have finished this hard task and you are no more a mere castaway. But you will need to do more great things to become a governor
NPC.TUTORIAL_WOODCHOPPING: Congratulations, you've created a wonderful axe. You can see it now in your tool bar and now you are able to chop trees and gather wood, which you will need to repair the broken raft.
NPC.T_7462: You patience! Wait a minute and look what be happening.
NPC.T_8061: Hey, got lost? Island is terrifying, right? If you wish you can leave by using the rocket. Press USE on the rocket.
NPC.T_8523: Select UPGRADE on the crab to unblock your path.
NPC.T_8591: Hei, listen this is good advice. Firecracker is easy to make, keep the bonus active throughout the quest, it is more usefull than you think.
NPC.T_8591a: The bonus let's you save more than 450 energies while doing the winter questline, also it gives many other boosts, like 5% to bronze doubloon drop chance, double savanna grass drop, and many many other things.
NPC.T_9026: Hei, if you clean up all the garbage and chop down the withered trees, then perhaps floating jellyfishes will visit this island.
NPC.T_9031: Don't forget to unpack the gilded garlic heads in your workshop.
NPC.UPGRADE_WORKSHOP: Hey! Remember that you can always access your workshop by clicking on workshop icon  in the lower right corner of the screen.

1.NAME: Get to the big island
1.DESCRIPTION: Get away to some bigger island which will be more suitable for survival.

10.NAME: Plant first field
10.DESCRIPTION: Grow some radishes so you can cook them.

100.NAME: First painted fence
100.DESCRIPTION: Buy and construct your first painted fence

1000.NAME: Specialist's help II out of III
1000.DESCRIPTION: Akan is known as the best plane specialist in Oceania. Talk him into renovating the broken parts!

1001.NAME: Specialist's help III
1001.DESCRIPTION: Akan is known as the best plane specialist in Oceania. Talk him into renovating the broken parts!

1002.NAME: Renovating parts
1002.DESCRIPTION: Akan is ready to fix the broken parts. Submit them for fixing!

1003.NAME: 1st Advent
1003.DESCRIPTION: Do something good and receive an Advent candle!

1004.NAME: 2nd Advent
1004.DESCRIPTION: Do something good and receive an Advent candle!

1005.NAME: 3rd Advent
1005.DESCRIPTION: Do something good and receive an Advent candle!

1006.NAME: 4th Advent
1006.DESCRIPTION: Do something good and receive the final Advent candle!

1008.NAME: Ayo's letter
1008.DESCRIPTION: You've received a message from Ayo - he writes that something unusual has happened on his island!

1009.NAME: Ayo's troubles I out of II
1009.DESCRIPTION: Turns out that Ayo's island is covered in snow! You explain that snow is a sign that Christmas is approaching. Ayo exclaims: "Christmas?! What's that?"

101.NAME: Cleaning time
101.DESCRIPTION: Get rid of the old buildings. Sell 3 twig sheds, to free space for new architecture

1010.NAME: Mission Christmas I out of III
1010.DESCRIPTION: If there's snow on Christmas day, one must build a snowman! Show Ayo how it's done!

1011.NAME: Mission Christmas II out of III
1011.DESCRIPTION: To create Christmas atmosphere, you have to decorate your surroundings!

1012.NAME: Mission Christmas III
1012.DESCRIPTION: Ayo looks around and becomes increasingly excited! Keep bringing the Christmas mood to his island!

1013.NAME: Ayo's troubles II
1013.DESCRIPTION: Due to the unexpected weather conditions, some things have gone wrong on Ayo's island. Help him!

1016.NAME: Christmas decorations I out of II
1016.DESCRIPTION: You need pretty decorations for Ayo's island. Paprick has some spare Christmas lights. Fulfill his demands to obtain them!

1017.NAME: Christmas decorations II
1017.DESCRIPTION: You need pretty decorations for Ayo's island. Paprick has some spare Christmas lights. Fulfill his demands to obtain them!

1018.NAME: Christmas tree
1018.DESCRIPTION: If you need a Christmas tree, you must visit forester Hugo. Help him out, and he'll find you the most beautiful Christmas tree!

1019.NAME: Festive clothes
1019.DESCRIPTION: It would be nice to give Ayo a nice Christmas outfit. Time to write to Santa Claus! If you've behaved well this year, he'll send a gift for Ayo!

102.NAME: Clay shed
102.DESCRIPTION: Build your first clay era building

1021.NAME: The Great Challenge V
1021.DESCRIPTION: The local council invites all governors to take part in the Great Challenge! Participate and receive valuable rewards!

1022.NAME: Modern farm I out of IV
1022.DESCRIPTION: Prove to the local council that you own a truly modern farm, and they'll give you a tractor.

1023.NAME: Modern farm II out of IV
1023.DESCRIPTION: Prove to the local council that you own a truly modern farm, and they'll give you a tractor.

1024.NAME: Modern farm III out of IV
1024.DESCRIPTION: Prove to the local council that you own a truly modern farm, and they'll give you a tractor.

1025.NAME: Modern farm IV
1025.DESCRIPTION: Completing this quest will give you the opportunity to craft a Peacock Statue. This is a great way to get shells.

1026.NAME: Tractor driver
1026.DESCRIPTION: You can harvest your crops faster by using the tractor. Become a tractor driver!

1027.NAME: Message from Cupid
1027.DESCRIPTION: Cupid has sent you a message: "Help me! Please, hurry, or Valentine's day will be ruined!"

1028.NAME: Help Cupid
1028.DESCRIPTION: Looks like Cupid has overslept and isn't ready for Valentine's day! You have to fix this (reward - unique decoration)!

1029.NAME: Finding arrows I out of III
1029.DESCRIPTION: Cupid needs special arrows. Some say that priest Screamy Squid can get you all sorts of magical objects. Help him to get the arrows!

1030.NAME: Finding arrows II out of III
1030.DESCRIPTION: Cupid needs special arrows. Some say that priest Screamy Squid can get you all sorts of magical objects. Help him to get the arrows!

1031.NAME: Finding arrows III
1031.DESCRIPTION: Cupid needs special arrows. Some say that priest Screamy Squid can get you all sorts of magical objects. Help him to get the arrows!

1032.NAME: Perfect chocolate I out of II

1033.DESCRIPTION: The local pastry-cook Akma makes the the best chocolates in Oceania. Help Akma, and she'll give you high quality sweets!

1036.DESCRIPTION: Women's day is approaching - help Paprick prepare a surprise for the ladies in his family!

1037.DESCRIPTION: Women's day is approaching - help Paprick prepare a surprise for the ladies in his family!

1038.DESCRIPTION: You are visited by a merchant who needs a few things. Help him, and he'll give you valuable fishing nets!

1040.DESCRIPTION: "I hear that you can even chop down a baobab! But have you tried to use a saw?" Help out Mycott, and you'll get to try out a saw!

1062.DESCRIPTION: You are visited by a strange-looking man: "Hey, you local! Have you eaten an eggplant? It's so delicious that I even named it after myself! I won't give it away for free, though."

1063.NAME: Eddy Eggplant II out of V
1063.DESCRIPTION: You are visited by a strange-looking man: "Hey, you local! Have you eaten an eggplant? It's so delicious that I even named it after myself! I won't give it away for free, though."

1064.DESCRIPTION: You are visited by a strange-looking man: "Hey, you local! Have you eaten an eggplant? It's so delicious that I even named it after myself! I won't give it away for free, though."

1071.DESCRIPTION: Maybe your acquaintances can advise you. However, if you write to them, you'll have to attach some gifts.

1072.DESCRIPTION: Maybe your acquaintances can advise you. However, if you write to them, you'll have to attach some gifts.

1073.DESCRIPTION: You are contacted by Sango: "Yes, I know a great locksmith! I can introduce you... But maybe you can help me out first?"

1074.NAME: Sango knows II out of IV
1074.DESCRIPTION: You are contacted by Sango: "Yes, I know a great locksmith! I can introduce you... But maybe you can help me out first?"

1075.NAME: Sango knows III out of IV
1075.DESCRIPTION: You are contacted by Sango: "Yes, I know a great locksmith! I can introduce you... But maybe you can help me out first?"

1081.NAME: Ancient key II
1081.DESCRIPTION: Ludo has made the mould - you only have to make the key!

1082.NAME: Gypsum powder I out of II
1082.DESCRIPTION: To make a mould for the key, Ludo needs some gypsum powder. You meet a familiar man who will give you the powder if you guess his riddles.

1083.NAME: Gypsum powder II
1083.DESCRIPTION: To make a mould for the key, Ludo needs some gypsum powder. You meet a familiar man who will give you the powder if you guess his riddles.

1085.NAME: Lemon merchants II out of III
1085.DESCRIPTION: Turns out that the parchment has to be processed with lemon juice. Talk the merchants into selling lemons in Oceania!

1091.DESCRIPTION: As the road will be long and you cannot know what to expect, you have to prepare properly.

1096.DESCRIPTION: These plants can't be removed with primitive machetes. Engineer Jarno will tell you how to make better machetes, if you help him out!

1097.NAME: Better machetes II out of IV
1097.DESCRIPTION: These plants can't be removed with primitive machetes. Engineer Jarno will tell you how to make better machetes, if you help him out!

1098.NAME: Better machetes III out of IV

1099.DESCRIPTION: These plants can't be removed with primitive machetes. Engineer Jarno will tell you how to make better machetes, if you help him out!

1105.DESCRIPTION: If you need a crown that's worthy of a king, you must ask princess Tara! She won't give it for free, though.

1109.DESCRIPTION: Renovate the pier to reach a new fishing spot!

111.NAME: Body of colossus

1110.NAME: The great pier II
1110.DESCRIPTION: Renovate the pier to reach a new fishing spot!

1122.DESCRIPTION: The second descendant is scientist Balun - you have to convince him to continue his research on Haraiki island!

1141.DESCRIPTION: Tycott knows another way of earning reputation - growing truffle pigs! Fulfill Tycott's demands to access truffle pigs.

1142.DESCRIPTION: Tycott knows another way of earning reputation - growing truffle pigs! Fulfill Tycott's demands to access truffle pigs.

1162.DESCRIPTION: Everyone knows that autumn is the time of harvest. Take part in local harvest rituals and receive a unique reward!

1164.DESCRIPTION: The locals had decorated a special island for the Halloween party, but a lot of it was destroyed by a storm. Fix everything so that the party can take place!

1165.DESCRIPTION: The locals had decorated a special island for the Halloween party, but a lot of it was destroyed by a storm. Fix everything so that the party can take place!

1166.DESCRIPTION: You need new candles for the pumpkin lamps. Talk the local handiwork specialist Luna into helping you out!

1167.NAME: Candles for pumpkins II out of III

1170.DESCRIPTION: To fix the big Halloween decoration, you'll need the right pumpkins!

1176.NAME: An important quest
1176.DESCRIPTION: Santa is very busy this year, so he's asking you to see if his little helpers are managing all Christmas preparations!

1177.NAME: Gnome troubles
1177.DESCRIPTION: Looks like the gnomes are not doing so well due to various troubles! Help them!

1178.DESCRIPTION: To wake dwarf Dragonwing, you'll need really strong coffee. Paprick has promised to find some, if you help him out.

1179.NAME: Finding coffee II out of III
1179.DESCRIPTION: To wake dwarf Dragonwing, you'll need really strong coffee. Paprick has promised to find some, if you help him out.

1180.DESCRIPTION: To wake dwarf Dragonwing, you'll need really strong coffee. Paprick has promised to find some, if you help him out.

1181.DESCRIPTION: Nosy's train is missing one rail fragment. Turrick could make something appropriate in exchange for a few things.

1186.DESCRIPTION: Berko and Ayana are having a fight, but it can definitely be fixed. Help them and receive a unique decoration!

1187.NAME: Romance
1187.DESCRIPTION: A pleasant environment can encourage love and harmony. Improve Lovebirds island!

1188.NAME: A nice photograph I out of II

1189.NAME: A nice photograph II
1189.DESCRIPTION: Local photographer Fox will definitely have a nice photo of the couple, but he will not give it for free!

119.NAME: Clay pit
119.DESCRIPTION: To ensure clay supplies, buy and construct a clay pit

1190.DESCRIPTION: Local fashion diva Sissy will surely know what would be the perfect Valentine's gift!

1192.DESCRIPTION: Sissy has made delicious cookies - now you only need some wrapping!

1195.DESCRIPTION: In the first part of the games, you must prove that you are the strongest governor!

1197.DESCRIPTION: The last part of the games will test your knowledge and wit!

1199.NAME: Receiving the letter
1199.DESCRIPTION: The gift is prepared - now you can go to Toby and retrieve your letter.

12.NAME: Getting serious
12.DESCRIPTION: It's time to get serious. Plant gathered radish from your backpack for greater yield.

1201.DESCRIPTION: You are contacted by shepherd Gonzo. He has bought a new island and is now dealing with various issues. Prepare to leave!

1233.DESCRIPTION: Paprick wants to start a new tradition - the Great Easter Marathon. Help him to prepare for this event (reward - unique decoration)!

1265.NAME: Casing
1265.DESCRIPTION: The explosive material must be put in a strong casing. Find parts for crafting the casing.

1266.NAME: Timer I out of III

1267.NAME: Timer II out of III
1267.DESCRIPTION: Finally, the explosive needs a timer. Maybe you can arrange something with the clock-maker Minna?

1270.DESCRIPTION: Finally, you can explore what's hidden under the Proud Cliff!

1271.NAME: Wise man's advice I out of III

1283.NAME: Light in the cave
1283.DESCRIPTION: The road is bright - time to go!

1285.NAME: New territory
1285.DESCRIPTION: You are underground! Free some space!

1287.NAME: Tasty mushrooms
1287.DESCRIPTION: Turns out that you can pick oyster mushrooms underground! Try to use them for food!

1288.DESCRIPTION: Now you can buy bats in the shop! Don't forget that they like darkness, so they can only be kept underground!

1300.DESCRIPTION: There will be a grand Summer solstice banquet for all inhabitants of Oceania! Start preparing (unique reward)!

1306.DESCRIPTION: Pip Poisontooth has found out that you are trying to grow reptiles. He could share his knowledge on snakes. Are you ready?

1313.DESCRIPTION: You have learned to brew a very useful medicine. Send it to all local pharmacists!

132.DESCRIPTION: The rituals of the native shaman continue

1339.DESCRIPTION: It's possible that Nihiru inhabitants don't speak your language. Archeologist Curiosity Sparks is a great linguist - invite her to join you!

134.DESCRIPTION: The natives have opened a peculiar school on one island. Help them with resources for the school

1340.NAME: Translator's services II out of V
1340.DESCRIPTION: It's possible that Nihiru inhabitants don't speak your language. Archeologist Curiosity Sparks is a great linguist - invite her to join you!

1343.DESCRIPTION: It's possible that Nihiru inhabitants don't speak your language. Archeologist Curiosity Sparks is a great linguist - invite her to join you!

1344.NAME: Talk to the librarian
1344.DESCRIPTION: The local librarian looks concerned - ask her what happened!

1345.NAME: Important literature
1345.DESCRIPTION: The librarion told you that the wind has stolen several important scrolls. Find them!

1346.NAME: Talk to the healer
1346.DESCRIPTION: The healer has no time to rest after the storm - ask him if you can help!

1347.NAME: More medicine
1347.DESCRIPTION: The healer's medpack is almost empty. Help him!

1348.NAME: Talk to the steward
1348.DESCRIPTION: The steward will definitely know what are the most important tasks that need to be done!

1349.NAME: Great restoration I
1349.DESCRIPTION: The storm has done a lot of damage. You have some repairing to do!

1350.NAME: Great restoration II
1350.DESCRIPTION: The storm has done a lot of damage. You have some repairing to do!

1351.NAME: A fresh start
1351.DESCRIPTION: If you fix all paths on Nihiru island, you'll be able to buy them in the shop!

1352.NAME: Carpenter's assistance
1352.DESCRIPTION: You'll need some special materials to renovate the temples. Help the local carpenter Akio, and he's sure to help you!

1353.NAME: New materials
1353.DESCRIPTION: Thanks to Akio, you can now craft materials for temple renovation (You'll need Workshop VI!).

1354.NAME: Decor for Dragon temple I out of III
1354.DESCRIPTION: Akio's wife Anka can make very fine decorations. Talk her into making a decor for Dragon temple.

1355.NAME: Decor for Dragon temple II out of III
1355.DESCRIPTION: Akio's wife Anka can make very fine decorations. Talk her into making a decor for Dragon temple.

1356.NAME: Decor for Dragon temple III
1356.DESCRIPTION: Akio's wife Anka can make very fine decorations. Talk her into making a decor for Dragon temple.

1357.NAME: Decor for Flower temple I out of III
1357.DESCRIPTION: Akio's wife Anka can make very fine decorations. Talk her into making a decor for Flower temple.
