1358.DESCRIPTION: Akio's wife Anka can make very fine decorations. Talk her into making a decor for Flower temple.

1359.NAME: Decor for Flower temple III
1359.DESCRIPTION: Akio's wife Anka can make very fine decorations. Talk her into making a decor for Flower temple.

136.NAME: Strange trader
136.DESCRIPTION: After selling banana palm, a stranger sees you and says: aha, you don't like bananas? I like only salty food, too. Maybe we can become partners? Fulfill these tasks and we can make business

1360.NAME: Meteorologist's information I out of IV
1360.DESCRIPTION: Before lighting the Torch of Peace, you should make sure if the danger is truly gone. Contact meteorologist Marco.

1361.NAME: Meteorologist's information II out of IV
1361.DESCRIPTION: Before lighting the Torch of Peace, you should make sure if the danger is truly gone. Contact meteorologist Marco.

1362.NAME: Meteorologist's information III out of IV
1362.DESCRIPTION: Before lighting the Torch of Peace, you should make sure if the danger is truly gone. Contact meteorologist Marco.

1363.NAME: Meteorologist's information IV
1363.DESCRIPTION: Before lighting the Torch of Peace, you should make sure if the danger is truly gone. Contact meteorologist Marco.

1364.NAME: Establish order
1364.DESCRIPTION: You have arrived at Nihiru. Do everything you can to bring order (you'll unlock new clothes and decoration)!

1366.NAME: Important letter
1366.DESCRIPTION: You've received a letter - it's marked as 'Urgent'!

1367.NAME: Paprick's task
1367.DESCRIPTION: Paprick has invited you for a visit - he has a favour to ask.

1368.NAME: Ready for the worst I out of II
1368.DESCRIPTION: Before going to help Amara, you should try and protect yourself against various dangers that you might face.

1369.NAME: Ready for the worst II
1369.DESCRIPTION: Before going to help Amara, you should try and protect yourself against various dangers that you might face.

137.NAME: Strange trader II
137.DESCRIPTION: The strange trader is glad for your help and ready to offer two tasks for which he will pay handsomely

1370.NAME: Possessed island
1370.DESCRIPTION: Time to visit Amara's home island and check out the haunted house.

1371.NAME: Banishing ghosts
1371.DESCRIPTION: It seems that Amara's house is possessed by ghosts. Do what you can to get rid of them!

1372.DESCRIPTION: The ghosts seem to be gone, but various monsters are still making a racket at the house. Try to talk them into leaving.

1373.NAME: Major cleaning
1373.DESCRIPTION: Now that the house is no longer haunted, some cleaning is in order.

1374.NAME: Small repairs
1374.DESCRIPTION: The nasty monsters have broken and ruined some things. Repair the house!

1375.NAME: Everything's ok!
1375.DESCRIPTION: The big house is now tidy and safe! Let Amara know the good news!

1377.NAME: Candles
1377.DESCRIPTION: To bring light into the house, you'll need candles! Maybe you can collect some by reaching out to your friends?

1378.NAME: Note from the healer
1378.DESCRIPTION: Healer Haru wants to talk to you. Find out what he's up to!

1379.NAME: New restaurant I out of X
1379.DESCRIPTION: Chef Cho wants to open a restaurant in Oceania. Help him to learn new recipes!

138.NAME: Another survivor I of II
138.DESCRIPTION: One morning you meet another survivor in rags by your house. He admires it and says he's ready to give you coconuts if you help him get away from here.

1380.NAME: New restaurant II out of X
1380.DESCRIPTION: Chef Cho wants to open a restaurant in Oceania. Help him to learn new recipes!

1381.NAME: New restaurant III out of X
1381.DESCRIPTION: Chef Cho wants to open a restaurant in Oceania. Help him to learn new recipes!

1382.NAME: New restaurant IV out of X
1382.DESCRIPTION: Chef Cho wants to open a restaurant in Oceania. Help him to learn new recipes!

1383.NAME: New restaurant V out of X
1383.DESCRIPTION: Chef Cho wants to open a restaurant in Oceania. Help him to learn new recipes!

1384.NAME: New restaurant VI out of X
1384.DESCRIPTION: The restaurant will need curtains, towels and other textiles. Hire dressmaker Nadine!

1385.NAME: New restaurant VII out of X
1385.DESCRIPTION: From time to time, the restaurant may need some repairs. Hire carpenter Turrick!

1386.NAME: New restaurant VIII out of X
1386.DESCRIPTION: Although Cho is an excellent cook, he will definitely need an assistant. Hire Mycott!

1387.NAME: New restaurant IX out of X
1387.DESCRIPTION: If the menu is rich, the restaurant will surely be successful. Share some local recipes!

1388.NAME: New restaurant X
1388.DESCRIPTION: Last preparations and Cho's restaurant will be ready for opening!

1389.NAME: Useful rice
1389.DESCRIPTION: Cho often uses rice in his recipes. See if you can grow rice!

139.NAME: Another survivor II
139.DESCRIPTION: The ragged survivor is thankful for your deeds. If you help him a bit more, he'll reveal how to craft products from coconuts

1390.NAME: Rice food
1390.DESCRIPTION: Chef Cho has shared his favourite recipes with you. Try them out!

1398.NAME: Modern life III out of III
1398.DESCRIPTION: Completing this quest will give you the opportunity to craft a Peacock Statue. This is a great way to get shells.

1399.NAME: Modern life II out of III
1399.DESCRIPTION: After a good meal, you need to work hard! Check the possibilities of the new workshop.

14.NAME: Repair the raft
14.DESCRIPTION: Repair the broken raft, using gathered wood.

140.NAME: Player with meerkats I of II
140.DESCRIPTION: A dice player is visiting the natives. He has small, active animals - meerkats with him. He's ready to trade them in for some favours

1400.NAME: Modern life I
1400.DESCRIPTION: Time to introduce the residents of Oceania to some truly exquisite dishes.

1401.NAME: Ayo's idea
1401.DESCRIPTION: Ayo wants to organise a Christmas market in Oceania this year. Help him with preparations!

1402.NAME: Market square
1402.DESCRIPTION: The market square is covered in snow. Clear all paths, so that the  visitors have no trouble walking around.

1403.NAME: Market stalls
1403.DESCRIPTION: Of course, various goods must be sold at the market! Help Ayo build market stalls.

1404.NAME: Entertainment
1404.DESCRIPTION: Apart from shoppoing, Christmas market visitors will also want to enjoy some music and beauty!

1405.NAME: Handiwork for the market I out of III
1405.DESCRIPTION: Dressmaker Nadine can definitely produce some goods for the crafts stall!

1406.NAME: Handiwork for the market II out of III
1406.DESCRIPTION: Dressmaker Nadine can definitely produce some goods for the crafts stall!

1407.NAME: Handiwork for the market III
1407.DESCRIPTION: Dressmaker Nadine can definitely produce some goods for the crafts stall!

1408.NAME: Sweets for the market I out of II
1408.DESCRIPTION: You must prepare various treats to be sold at the sweets stall!

1409.NAME: Sweets for the market II
1409.DESCRIPTION: Paprick's family is ready to prepare something for the market if you help them out a bit!

141.NAME: Player with meerkats II
141.DESCRIPTION: The dice player is almost ready to trade away the meerkats. Just a few more favours

1410.NAME: Animals for the carousel I out of III
1410.DESCRIPTION: Turrick can make pretty woodcarvings. Maybe he can craft animals for the carousel?

1411.NAME: Animals for the carousel II out of III
1411.DESCRIPTION: Turrick can make pretty woodcarvings. Maybe he can craft animals for the carousel?

1412.NAME: Animals for the carousel III
1412.DESCRIPTION: Turrick can make pretty woodcarvings. Maybe he can craft animals for the carousel?

1413.NAME: Christmas tree decorations
1413.DESCRIPTION: To create a festive atmosphere in the market, you should decorate the Christmas tree!

1414.NAME: A Mysterious Series of Misfortunes
1414.DESCRIPTION: The inhabitants of the island archipelago have started to be plagued by strange misfortunes.

1415.NAME: Cause of Misfortunes
1415.DESCRIPTION: It can't be a coincidence that bad things are suddenly happening everywhere. Try to find out the cause of it all.

1416.NAME: Search for Ahunui Island
1416.DESCRIPTION: Only the captain learned something new. When he sailed past an unexplored sector, all the food on the ship spoiled. There might be something there!

1417.NAME: Head to Ahunui Island
1417.DESCRIPTION: It's time to search for Ahunui Island and find out what terrible thing has happened there.

1418.NAME: Examine the Tied-Up native
1418.DESCRIPTION: This place looks quite eerie. A native is tied to a tree! Maybe you can help him.

1419.NAME: Find Out How to Help the Captive
1419.DESCRIPTION: You need to figure out how to bring the poor captive back to consciousness. He doesn't just look sick, but rather enchanted!

142.NAME: Meerkat growing newby
142.DESCRIPTION: Now that you can grow meerkats, it's time to earn some cash from them

1420.NAME: Obtain Components for the Amulet II
1420.DESCRIPTION: The amulet that will make you invisible to the sorcerer Ahao is difficult to make. Start gathering the necessary components.

1421.NAME: Give Medicine to the Captive
1421.DESCRIPTION: The healer has prepared medicine. Try to use it to bring the poor captive back to consciousness.

1422.NAME: Craft the Moonlight Elixir
1422.DESCRIPTION: You learned from the shaman Teki that they have been captured and enchanted by the evil voodoo sorcerer Ahao.

1423.NAME: Free Teki from the Curse
1423.DESCRIPTION: Now that you've gathered enough moonlight elixir, you can break the curse on Teki.

1424.NAME: Disenchant a Cursed Jungle Section
1424.DESCRIPTION: Using moonlight elixirs, you can restore the cursed jungle to its previous state.

1425.NAME: Find the Other Cursed Shaman
1425.DESCRIPTION: To deal with the evil sorcerer, you also need to free Teki's sister Vipiti. Find her.

1426.NAME: Find Out How to Heal Vipiti
1426.DESCRIPTION: Poor Vipiti is very weak. You need to ask the healer for help again.

1427.NAME: Heal Vipiti
1427.DESCRIPTION: Great, the strengthening medicine is ready. You can try to heal Vipiti.

1428.NAME: Find the Invisibility Flower
1428.DESCRIPTION: Vipiti mentioned that only the eldest brother Manu can help deal with the evil sorcerer. But unfortunately, he is under the sorcerer's watch.

1429.NAME: Obtain Components for the Amulet I of II
1429.DESCRIPTION: The amulet that will make you invisible to the sorcerer Ahao is difficult to make. Start gathering the necessary components.

143.NAME: Meerkat growing adept
143.DESCRIPTION: Now that you know how to grow meerkats, you can bring it to the next level

1913.DESCRIPTION: You need to make sure there will be a wide variety of drinks available.

1915.DESCRIPTION: It's time to prepare the meal and it will be bountiful.

1916.DESCRIPTION: Only the dessert has left and the feast will be over. But it also needs to be superior.

192.NAME: Grow 6 tomato fields

1923.NAME: Souvenir merchant I
1923.DESCRIPTION: Your guests during their visit introduced you to a souvenir merchant.

1924.DESCRIPTION: A massive shadow glides over the island. Pirate Bain wants to know what kind of a bird was that. Show him some examples.

1925.NAME: Check other islands
1925.DESCRIPTION: The shadow glided in southwest direction. It might have been noticed on other islands as well.

1926.DESCRIPTION: So far the search has been fruitless. Maybe Aldo will know what happens Oceania's vast airspace.

1927.NAME: Admiral Edmund Oneeye
1927.DESCRIPTION: Aldo reveals, that the events have something to do with admiral Oneeye. Oneeye is ashamed of his error. Share stories about other oceanians.

1929.DESCRIPTION: Admiral's single bout was blown by such force, that it got thrown far into dry land.

193.NAME: Grow 6 onion fields
193.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

1930.DESCRIPTION: Admiral had to make repairs with the materials he could find nearby.

1931.NAME: Admiral's journey IV
1931.DESCRIPTION: Work wasn't the least bit easy so Admiral mixed working with relaxing.

1932.NAME: Admiral's journey V
1932.DESCRIPTION: Boat was finally fixed, but it still needed to be brought to the water.

1933.NAME: Admiral's journey VI
1933.DESCRIPTION: The honey glue melted after a few hours.

1934.NAME: Admira's journey VII
1934.DESCRIPTION: Admiral had once more been washed out upon a strange shore.

1935.NAME: Admira's journey VIII
1935.DESCRIPTION: To get away faster, a message needed to be passed to others.

1936.NAME: Rescue work
1936.DESCRIPTION: Aldo noticed the smoke signals and went to rescue. The weird bird was in his plane.

1937.NAME: Late evening
1937.DESCRIPTION: Sun didn't listen to the stories and had almost sunk behind horizon. Admiral had told his story for half a day.

1938.NAME: Peculiar find
1938.DESCRIPTION: Admiral had some honey stuck to his coat and it had some weird bees in it. One of them were especially big.

1939.NAME: Persuade Airfoil family
1939.DESCRIPTION: Someone needs to bring Admiral Edmund Oneeye back to his boat.

194.NAME: Grow 6 carrot fields
194.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

1940.DESCRIPTION: Admiral's boat could use some additional equipment. After all it has suffered a lot.

1941.NAME: Boat's equipment II
1941.DESCRIPTION: Admiral offers to use his boats cargo area to you as well. To invest in shipping could be profitable.

1942.NAME: Testing the honey
1942.DESCRIPTION: Honey is a special treat for oceanians. Test if the new honey is any good.

1943.NAME: Too much sweets!
1943.DESCRIPTION: After all the testing your tongue has gone all numb.

1944.NAME: New bee species
1944.DESCRIPTION: You can't miss this chance! Make sure the bee queen get's settled.

195.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

1983.DESCRIPTION: You'll get a chance to buy koalas by finishing all quests.

1984.NAME: Attract platypuses
1984.DESCRIPTION: You'll get a chance to buy platypuses once you finish all quests.

1985.NAME: Attract wallabies
1985.DESCRIPTION: Finish all quests and you'll get a chance to buy wallabies.

1987.NAME: Fedd holiday turtle
1987.DESCRIPTION: This island is favored by special holiday turtles. Each turtle will eat only one type of food, but by doing so, it will give a bit of food designated for other types of turtles.

1988.NAME: Holiday keys
1988.DESCRIPTION: You will need keys for opening thease chests, that contain presents.

1989.NAME: Food hunters
1989.DESCRIPTION: Local birds gladly trade their cache for other delicacies.

199.NAME: Grow 5 pigs

1990.DESCRIPTION: Attention! The turtles love to lie in the sun, in the middle of the island. After a meal the turtles will leave only for a few seconds. Don`t hesitate, feed them and move forward. If you get stuck, reload the page.

1991.NAME: Gift boxes
1991.DESCRIPTION: These ancient chests contain different treasures.

1992.NAME: Cleansing of Ahao's Statue
1992.DESCRIPTION: The statue of the evil sorcerer still harbors magical power. I know a ritual that would allow you to use it to your advantage.

1993.NAME: Earth Element for the Ritual
1993.DESCRIPTION: The ritual must draw strength from various natural elements. Earth will provide stability and foundation.

1994.NAME: Air Element for the Ritual
1994.DESCRIPTION: The gentle flow of air helps to organize thoughts and lends its power to the spell.

1995.NAME: Water Element for the Ritual
1995.DESCRIPTION: Water will help the spell to seep into and penetrate all the cracks and crevices of the statue.

1996.NAME: Fire Element for the Ritual
1996.DESCRIPTION: Fire will give the ritual strength and help to completely cleanse the evil Ahao's statue of malevolence, enhancing it.

2.NAME: Search the island
2.DESCRIPTION: Search all bushes. Maybe you will find something useful that will help you to get away from the island.

200.NAME: Grow 5 meerkats
200.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

2005.NAME: Mystery fancier
2005.DESCRIPTION: Your persistence is commendable, for this you are awarded with a cake!

201.NAME: Buy 5 flowers
201.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

202.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

2022.NAME: Legend about wonderegg
2022.DESCRIPTION: Captain MacManus once showed to The natives egg decorated with gems. He did say that wonderchicken lay eggs like that.

2023.NAME: Turrick's idea
2023.DESCRIPTION: Turrick also wants to have wonderegg. He is goint to announce crafting competition.

2024.NAME: First qualifying round
2024.DESCRIPTION: In the first round wonderegs will be made of simple materials.

2025.NAME: Create more wondereggs
2025.DESCRIPTION: Turrick is really satisfied with Your creation, he presents you with few more Golden chicken.

2026.NAME: Second qualifying round
2026.DESCRIPTION: Turrick is happy with results, lets try something harder to make.

2027.NAME: Third qualifying round
2027.DESCRIPTION: Turrick thinks that You can do even better, so lets try even harder task.

2028.NAME: Master level of competition
2028.DESCRIPTION: You do surprise Turrick with your skills. Your hands are ready for somehing outstanding.

203.NAME: Build any 5 paths
203.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

2030.NAME: Wonderegg competition for jewelers
2030.DESCRIPTION: Turrick thinks that the next step is to use expensive materials.

2031.NAME: Wonderegg master
2031.DESCRIPTION: While listening how satisfied is Turrick idea comes in your mind how to create even better wonderegg.

2032.NAME: Awarding ceremony
2032.DESCRIPTION: Huge number of people have come to Festival island to see Your work.

2033.NAME: Preparations for Wood wonderegg
2033.DESCRIPTION: To create good crafts You need to be prepared.

2034.NAME: Preparations for Glass wonderegg
2034.DESCRIPTION: To create good crafts You need to be prepared.

2035.NAME: Preparations for Iron wonderegg
2035.DESCRIPTION: To create good crafts You need to be prepared.

2036.NAME: Preparations for Gold wonderegg
2036.DESCRIPTION: To create good crafts You need to be prepared.

2037.NAME: Preparations for Royal wonderegg
2037.DESCRIPTION: To create good crafts You need to be prepared.

2039.DESCRIPTION: Easter-bunny is real egg expert. Ask him how to become one.

204.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

2041.NAME: Easter-bunny advice II of VII
2041.DESCRIPTION: Bunny tells You that egg's can be made even from earth and is ready to create Earth egg.

2043.NAME: Easter-bunny advice III of VII
2043.DESCRIPTION: Bunny reminds that You should always react conscientiously.

2045.NAME: Easter-bunny advice IV of VII
2045.DESCRIPTION: Bunny wants to inspre You by creating Ice egg.

2047.NAME: Easter-bunny advice V of VII
2047.DESCRIPTION: Bunny offers you to watch nature for inspiration. Its the way how to find new ideas.

2049.NAME: Easter-bunny advice VI of VII
2049.DESCRIPTION: One more good advice - create composition.

205.NAME: Trade in 50 food
205.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

2051.NAME: Easter-bunny advice VII of VII
2051.DESCRIPTION: Last advice. Godo ideas comes to Your mind when you do things You don't usually do.

207.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

2076.NAME: Nature's child
2076.DESCRIPTION: Papuan shamans advise you not to forget about harmony with nature. Complete the ritual and get a sculpture of nature's friend.

2077.NAME: Greening of stones
2077.DESCRIPTION: To make the monument more attractive to nature, you will have to learn new gardening skills.

2078.NAME: Monument to nature
2078.DESCRIPTION: The favor of Mother Nature is clearly visible in all your garden works.

2079.NAME: It is time to purify Ahao's statue
2079.DESCRIPTION: Everything is ready for the ritual. All that's left is to perform it.

208.NAME: Chop 5 trees
208.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

2080.NAME: Reach the Deep Underground
2080.DESCRIPTION: You are great at overcoming underground obstacles! If the opportunity arises, be sure to explore the further underground passages.

2081.NAME: In Search of Information
2081.DESCRIPTION: The deep underground surely holds many secrets, proceed cautiously and conduct a little exploration.

2082.NAME: Collapsed Passages
2082.DESCRIPTION: While exploring the signpost, you notice someone has scratched a message on the side: "NO FURTHER PATH, WE COLLAPSED THE PASSAGES!"

2083.NAME: Continue the Journey
2083.DESCRIPTION: After repairing the passage, several possible routes open up for you.

2084.NAME: Meet the Dwellers
2084.DESCRIPTION: You have finally encountered the deep underground inhabitants. You might learn something useful.

2085.NAME: Dwarf Diplomacy I
2085.DESCRIPTION: This dwarf seems full of suspicion.

2086.NAME: Dwarf Diplomacy II
2086.DESCRIPTION: It seems no gifts will convince the dwarf.

2087.NAME: Frārs' Assistance
2087.DESCRIPTION: Since the brothers dismantled the passages, maybe they can help repair them.

2088.NAME: Clear the Passages I
2088.DESCRIPTION: There are still many unexplored corners underground, and to see them, the passages must be restored.

2089.NAME: Visit Frārs
2089.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps Frārs has finished preparing the rabbits, it's time to visit him.

209.NAME: Feed 10 animals
209.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

2090.NAME: Clear the Passages II
2090.DESCRIPTION: It has become easier to move underground, but not all secrets have been uncovered yet.

2093.NAME: Underground Fire
2093.DESCRIPTION: Some snails have eaten something bad and started spitting fire.

2094.NAME: Underground Snails
2094.DESCRIPTION: You scared off the old snails, but the little snails show interest in you.

2095.NAME: Snail Merchant
2095.DESCRIPTION: No one trades snails in Oceania, you'll have to learn the skills yourself.

2096.NAME: Gaining Trust
2096.DESCRIPTION: Since your arrival, Ulfars has remembered all your good deeds.

210.NAME: Feed 5 animals of friends
210.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

2100.NAME: Ulfars' Favor
2100.DESCRIPTION: Ulfars wants to test you, you need to acquire rocks, but he doesn't say which ones are needed.

2101.NAME: Ulfars' Assistance
2101.DESCRIPTION: Ulfars is finally willing to talk to you.

2102.NAME: Unexplored Region
2102.DESCRIPTION: That was a very strange conversation. It's time to see what exactly is in the area Ulfars has been so diligently trying to isolate.

2103.NAME: Underground Inhabitant
2103.DESCRIPTION: It seems there is another unknown underground inhabitant in the far corner of the underground.

2104.NAME: Galvira's Snails
2104.DESCRIPTION: Once having experienced misfortune, Galvira has not recovered her snails.

2107.NAME: Talk to Ulfars
2107.DESCRIPTION: Repairing the passages requires a good deal of strength, you've managed to impress Ulfars.

2108.NAME: Underground Strongman
2108.DESCRIPTION: Ulfars respects your strength, but a gift will still need to be earned.

211.NAME: Gather 5 crops of friends
211.DESCRIPTION: Daily task. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive different daily tasks

2111.NAME: Deep Underground Secret
2111.DESCRIPTION: Looks like a dwarf, but isn't a dwarf... Strange...

212.NAME: Construct stonegarden
212.DESCRIPTION: Construct a beautiful stonegarden from the elements available in the shop

213.NAME: Stone bridge
213.DESCRIPTION: Repair the ancient bridge to cross the river

2133.NAME: Terrifying Darkness
2133.DESCRIPTION: This underground is too dark, there are no gemstone lanterns. Ordinary torches won't illuminate it.

2134.NAME: Fire Expert
2134.DESCRIPTION: Advice is not far to seek, if anyone knows fire, it's the Volcano god.

2135.NAME: Special Fire
2135.DESCRIPTION: If you want to take a flame from our noble torch, first help the island's inhabitants.

2136.NAME: Underground Craftsman Training
2136.DESCRIPTION: You've probably already guessed, all of Flinzy's furniture is handmade by us.

2137.NAME: Limestone Supplies
2137.DESCRIPTION: It's not worth arguing with Ulfars. He will train you, but I can help with limestone.

2138.NAME: Training
2138.DESCRIPTION: There's nothing special to explain here. Watch, memorize, try to repeat.

2139.NAME: Large Limestone Supplies
2139.DESCRIPTION: To acquire large limestone supplies, you'll have to go into the mine. It won't be that easy!

214.NAME: Reed trader
214.DESCRIPTION: A difficult daily task, which will give you some reputation. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive other daily tasks

2140.NAME: Underground Spirits
2140.DESCRIPTION: It's time to catch the mischievous spirits, help and I'll tell you how to catch the rascals with rock juices.

2141.NAME: Blue Rock Juice
2141.DESCRIPTION: Now listen carefully, I have special methods for such cases.

2142.NAME: Elegant Improvements
2142.DESCRIPTION: Ulfars has allowed you to express yourself on the condition that you first present the necessary materials.

2143.NAME: Elegant Furniture
2143.DESCRIPTION: Once the materials are gathered, you may realize your idea.

2144.NAME: Snail Taming
2144.DESCRIPTION: Now that I have so many snails in my care, keeping a fire spitter is not safe. Please prepare calming medicine.

2145.NAME: Try the Fire
2145.DESCRIPTION: Now that the fire of hope burns in your lantern, it's very likely the darkness will retreat.

2146.NAME: Knowledge Reserves
2146.DESCRIPTION: It's very likely that among the books you can also find something useful about the deep underground.

2147.NAME: Directions
2147.DESCRIPTION: In several books, the underground is compared to a special cave.

2148.NAME: Trust the Notes
2148.DESCRIPTION: You've managed to find notes on how to create another passage to the underground.

2149.NAME: Powerful Words
2149.DESCRIPTION: For everything to succeed, it's highly desirable to use powerful words, you can draw ideas from other sources.

215.NAME: Cloth trader
215.DESCRIPTION: A difficult daily task, which will give you some reputation. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive other daily tasks

2150.NAME: Mirror Portal
2150.DESCRIPTION: Creating a new portal is almost impossible, but creating a mirror portal is a piece of cake.

2151.NAME: Archaeologist's Visit
2151.DESCRIPTION: During her visit, archaeologist Curiosity  Sparks accidentally discovered a dinosaur bone.

2152.NAME: Dinosaur Bones
2152.DESCRIPTION: Some of the bones resemble dinosaur vertebrae. Ms. Curiosity urges you to conduct a broader investigation.

2153.NAME: The Right Direction
2153.DESCRIPTION: All indications suggest that the bones are buried beneath your welfare fields.

2154.NAME: Careful Investigations
2154.DESCRIPTION: Archaeological findings are delicate, so special care must be taken.

2155.NAME: Archaeological Research
2155.DESCRIPTION: Curiosity Sparks has seriously expanded her research and asks for your help with materials.

2156.NAME: Disappointment
2156.DESCRIPTION: Only a few bones were found, the excavations turned out to be empty. This news has greatly disappointed the archaeologist.

2157.NAME: Hope
2157.DESCRIPTION: Continuing the research, animal bones were found. It is now clear how the dinosaur bones ended up here.

2158.NAME: Island Search
2158.DESCRIPTION: One bone is not a skeleton; the other parts must be somewhere on this island.

2159.NAME: New Excavations
2159.DESCRIPTION: After a long search, a dinosaur graveyard was found in the jungle.

216.NAME: Bonebead trader
216.DESCRIPTION: A difficult daily task, which will give you some reputation. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive other daily tasks

2160.NAME: Cartographer
2160.DESCRIPTION: This part of the island is poorly visible. This time a professional mapmaker will be needed.

2161.NAME: Map Making
2161.DESCRIPTION: The terrain is complex, but the work is doable. Of course, the cartographer wouldn't refuse your help.

2162.NAME: Major Excavations
2162.DESCRIPTION: The map is drawn, time to start digging up the bones.

2163.NAME: Major Discoveries
2163.DESCRIPTION: The archaeologist is working with full force. Curiosity points out the noteworthy items...

2164.NAME: Theories
2164.DESCRIPTION: The found bones are a real puzzle; living creatures tend to be constructed differently.

2165.NAME: Sorting
2165.DESCRIPTION: The first skeleton was successfully extracted without difficulty, but another skeleton or skeletons were found...

2166.NAME: Endurance
2166.DESCRIPTION: The grouping of bones continues, endurance will be needed to get answers.

2167.NAME: Longevity
2167.DESCRIPTION: Sorting is done carefully, but the bones still need care.

2168.NAME: Foundation
2168.DESCRIPTION: Once the bones are sorted, a foundation must be prepared on which to build the skeletons.

2169.NAME: Exhibition
2169.DESCRIPTION: When all the work is done, it's time to showcase your and Curiosity's achievements.

217.NAME: Plank trader
217.DESCRIPTION: A difficult daily task, which will give you some reputation. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive other daily tasks

2170.NAME: Museum
2170.DESCRIPTION: A very prestigious museum has shown interest in your findings.

2171.NAME: Feast
2171.DESCRIPTION: Ms. Curiosity wants to express gratitude to all the excavation participants.

2172.NAME: Rest
2172.DESCRIPTION: Now that the first dinosaur craze is over, it's time for a well-deserved rest!

218.NAME: Bonebead trader
218.DESCRIPTION: A difficult daily task, which will give you some reputation. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive other daily tasks

219.NAME: Clay pot trader
219.DESCRIPTION: A difficult daily task, which will give you some reputation. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive other daily tasks

22.NAME: Earn reputation
22.DESCRIPTION: Learn to construct buildings and decorations to earn reputation

220.NAME: Bonebead trader
220.DESCRIPTION: A difficult daily task, which will give you some reputation. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive other daily tasks

221.NAME: Carrot trader
221.DESCRIPTION: A difficult daily task, which will give you some reputation. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive other daily tasks

222.NAME: Obsidian trader
222.DESCRIPTION: A difficult daily task, which will give you some reputation. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive other daily tasks

2221.NAME: Weird fragment
2221.DESCRIPTION: Moving and picking the islands stones you noticed that an odd object has stuck between them.

2222.NAME: Neighbours advice
2222.DESCRIPTION: You promised to deliver some products for trade to Papric. Along with that you could ask about the part.

2223.NAME: Second part
2223.DESCRIPTION: Paprick advices to examine to stone pile more closely. Maybe you'll find the second part there.

2224.NAME: Seeking advice
2224.DESCRIPTION: According to rumors, this tool was gifted to natives back in the day when Paprick's grandpa was a young boy.

2225.NAME: Native elders
2225.DESCRIPTION: Paprick reminds that proper respects needs to be given to the elders. You won't get to know everything at once.

2228.NAME: Building a forge
2228.DESCRIPTION: For the matters of safety it's best to build the new workshop form stone.

2229.NAME: Waiting for the craftsman
2229.DESCRIPTION: The new craftsman will soon arrive. It would be good to create a friendly and nice atmosphere.

223.NAME: Blueberry trader
223.DESCRIPTION: A difficult daily task, which will give you some reputation. You have to complete it until the end of the day, because tomorrow you will receive other daily tasks

2230.NAME: Special material
2230.DESCRIPTION: While examining the sample craftsman concludes that no stone or bone or iron will do. Maybe merchants will have something.

2231.NAME: Information for inspiration
2231.DESCRIPTION: Craftsmen says that the samples has no soul and asks to get news about the stranger from faraway lands.

2232.NAME: Marsupials
2232.DESCRIPTION: Visitor from the far lands often boasted about his marsupials. They would be a good inspiration.

2233.NAME: Complicated processes
2233.DESCRIPTION: Sadly the first try to make this tool failed. Produced tool is too brittle. Seems like an important ingredient is missing.

2234.NAME: Additional ingredients
2234.DESCRIPTION: All special ingredients have been used during the first tries. You'll have to deal with merchants again to get more.

2235.NAME: Diligent craftsmen
2235.DESCRIPTION: Seems like the craftsmen has found the right approach and now will work form dusk till dawn.

2236.NAME: First stone eater
2236.DESCRIPTION: With no lack of inspiration, craftsmen has finally made a stone eater.

2237.NAME: Popular tool
2237.DESCRIPTION: Stone eaters have become so popular, that it's almost impossible to buy any.

2238.NAME: Want a stone eater?
2238.DESCRIPTION: Paprick knows a lot of people. Some have shown interest to exchange them for help.

2239.NAME: Useful stone eaters
2239.DESCRIPTION: Merchants are passing the island again. After short negotiations you strike a deal that they will bring some stone eaters.

224.NAME: Fame hunter I
224.DESCRIPTION: You are challenged to fulfill especially difficult tasks. If you complete them, you will get reputation as a reward

2240.NAME: Stone Eater Craftsman
2240.DESCRIPTION: A message has arrived from the Stone Eater manufacturer, who offers to trade some tools.

2241.NAME: Odd noise I
2241.DESCRIPTION: One day, when peacefully working in your farm, you hear some weird noises. Try to find where they're coming from!

2242.NAME: Odd noise II
2242.DESCRIPTION: You couldn't locate the source of the noise just yet. Keep searching!

2243.NAME: Odd noise III
2243.DESCRIPTION: While working around the wells and pits the noise grew louder. Could it come from the ground?

2244.NAME: Hole underground
2244.DESCRIPTION: After carefully searching the ground, you found a hole that goes underground and definitely is the source of noise.

2245.NAME: Sad skeletons
2245.DESCRIPTION: You've arrived at raveyard and it turns out, that the noise was in fact party music.

2246.NAME: Getting glow sticks
2246.DESCRIPTION: Raveyard is full of terrifying bushes. To get through them, you will need glow sticks.

2247.NAME: Rock
2247.DESCRIPTION: It turns out, that skeletons were ready for a party, but during pre-party nap their friend - hellpuppy Booddy, hid some of their bones.

2248.NAME: Skeletal advice
2248.DESCRIPTION: Sadly it looks like Booddy hasn't been here recently.

2249.NAME: Tar pit
2249.DESCRIPTION: Booddy also likes to wallow in a tar pit. Sadly it's behind the especially dark bushes.

225.NAME: Fame hunter II
225.DESCRIPTION: You are challenged to fulfill especially difficult tasks. If you complete them, you will get reputation as a reward

2250.NAME: Bone I
2250.DESCRIPTION: Looks like Booddy has recently been here.

2251.NAME: Torch I
2251.DESCRIPTION: You've found one bone, two more to find. They will probably be near other places Booddy likes.

2253.NAME: Torch II
2253.DESCRIPTION: Bats are sleeping peacefully in the tree. Booddy hasn't been here. You will have to look somewhere else.

2254.NAME: Lava stones
2254.DESCRIPTION: Booddy's teeth are growing and itching, so you can often find him nibbling on lava stones.

2255.NAME: Bone II
2255.DESCRIPTION: There are fresh bite marks on the stones. Booddy has definitely recently been here!

2256.NAME: Torch III
2256.DESCRIPTION: You already have 2 out of 3 bones. Only one more left!

2257.NAME: Glowing mushroom
2257.DESCRIPTION: Booddy sometimes howls at the glowing mushroom. Maybe he thinks it's the moon.

2259.NAME: Lava puddle
2259.DESCRIPTION: Hopefully Booddy has been here. Otherway's there won't be any place left where the bone could be.

226.DESCRIPTION: You are challenged to fulfill especially difficult tasks. If you complete them, you will get reputation as a reward

2260.NAME: Bone III
2260.DESCRIPTION: Nearby bushes have marks of burning. Someone has recently splashed in the puddle. It must have been Booddy!

2261.NAME: Party can start!
2261.DESCRIPTION: You've finally collected all bones and the party can begin.

2263.NAME: New friend
2263.DESCRIPTION: Thanks to You, the party can go on! After the party one of the skeletons and Booddy would like to come home with You.

2319.DESCRIPTION: After finishing both quests you'll be able to pick between Rowan tree, Flower totem, Love swans or Ghostly ghost.

232.DESCRIPTION: One day you are visited by Paprick. He says: me knows you want to find out what's on the other side of the river. Help me, and me tells you more.

236.DESCRIPTION: You are invited to a house in which sits a fellow in sunglasses and hat. He says: if you want to join us, you have to pass these 2 tests

2360.NAME: Getting presents
2360.DESCRIPTION: Now that you've finished the quests it is time to pick a present!

2361.NAME: Reminder
2361.DESCRIPTION: To receive special quests during this event, don't forget to visit Ice isle after 15:00 on these dates: 18.12., 21.12., 24.12., 27.12., 30.12. 02.01., 05.01.

2362.NAME: Ice Isle
2362.DESCRIPTION: A mysterious island has appeared on the map.

2370.NAME: The cold lake
2370.DESCRIPTION: It is hard to guess the reason but the lake is still not frozen.

2372.NAME: Winter miracle
2372.DESCRIPTION: Beneath the snow lies the true miracle of the Ice isle.

2373.NAME: Ice castle restoration
2373.DESCRIPTION: Now that you accumulated enough knowledge about the winter grace, it is time to use that wisdom to restore the castle.

2382.DESCRIPTION: Soon the Festival island will be tidied up, and it will return to it's original state.

24.NAME: Versatile farmer
24.DESCRIPTION: Prove that you are a versatile farmer by growing various crops

240.NAME: Forest goodies
240.DESCRIPTION: Sometimes mushrooms or wild berries will appear on the map, if you play long enough. Hurry up and gather them.

2409.NAME: Masquerade
2409.DESCRIPTION: While checking your mail, you find an invitation to a masquerade ball, that will take place on Festival island.

241.NAME: Eager berry picker
241.DESCRIPTION: Prove that you are a good berry picker and gather enough wild berries

2410.NAME: Hello Paprick!
2410.DESCRIPTION: Paprick and his wife had arrived before you, unfortunately he lost her in the croud and the Ladies won't unmask just because you wish so.

2411.NAME: Dilemma
2411.DESCRIPTION: Paprick went to look for his wife and was lost in the crowd as well. To unmask cavaliers, you 'll need the help of ladies.

2412.NAME: New friends
2412.DESCRIPTION: You will probably talk and dance with a lot of strangers before finding Mrs. Paprick. Perhaps you should get acquainted?

2413.NAME: Find Mr, and Mrs. Paprick
2413.DESCRIPTION: Both natives have lost each other in the crowd and have gotten lost themselves.

2414.NAME: Good intentions
2414.DESCRIPTION: Ladies will gladly help you unmask gents, but nothing comes for free.

2415.NAME: Cavalier activety
2415.DESCRIPTION: Some ladies are SO unreachable, fortunately some cavaliers are rather talanted.

2416.NAME: Cavalier activety
2416.DESCRIPTION: Looks like cavaliers would gladly socialize with ladies, with the excuse of helping you. Keep exchanging favours.

2417.NAME: Cunning ladies
2417.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps ladies have caught-on to what is happening, but they are not showing it in any way.

2418.NAME: Winter Challange
2418.DESCRIPTION:
The winter challange has begun!
Finish all CUP quests in 8 days to recieve gold trophie, or 11 days to earn silver, or within 14 days to earn a bronze cup.

2419.NAME: Bronze Qualification
2419.DESCRIPTION: Solve riddles before you act! Your progress will count only after solving thease riddles.

242.NAME: Eager mushroom gatherer
242.DESCRIPTION: Prove that you are a good mushroom gatherer and gather enough mushrooms

2420.NAME: Silver Qualification
2420.DESCRIPTION: Solve riddles before you act! Your progress will count only after solving thease riddles. This riddle can be solved only by those who have built the stone bridge.

2421.NAME: Gold Qualification
2421.DESCRIPTION: Solve riddles before you act! Your progress will count only after solving thease riddles. This riddle can be solved only by those who have visited Volcano isle.

243.NAME: Activate sawmill
243.DESCRIPTION: Learn to use sawmill. Gather resources and activate it's global bonus

2433.NAME: The march mood on Festival Isle
2433.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps cold winds are to blame, but this year flowers bloom only on Festival island, and not a single blossom on any other island.

2434.NAME: Guests
2434.DESCRIPTION: On the festival sandy beach are sitting three mermaids who are admiring spring tulips.

2435.NAME: New guests
2435.DESCRIPTION: Mermaids wish to stay a while on this island and admire flowers. They do not mind your visits, but they refuse to visit your home.

2436.NAME: Oh, dear....
2436.DESCRIPTION: The mermaids have heard, that tulips are meant to venerate women, and they are women as well....

2437.NAME: Shrewd mermaids
2437.DESCRIPTION: What did the mermaids mean, when they mentioned, that they are ladies as well? Compliment and seek help from the natives.

2438.NAME: Simple truth
2438.DESCRIPTION: All women in tulip holidays wish for simple recognition, but if you try real hard, you can provide greater recognition.

2439.NAME: Sweet Delfina
2439.DESCRIPTION: Delfina is gratefull for your compliment, but she has lost her favorite comb.

244.NAME: Cog for the windmill
244.DESCRIPTION: To finish the windmill you will need a cog. Fulfill this task to get it

2440.NAME: Dreamy Adella
2440.DESCRIPTION: After holding a conversation, you conclude that this mermaid has only flowers on her mind. True, they do smell pretty.

2441.NAME: Sophisticated Charlotte
2441.DESCRIPTION: Upon noticing butterflies, the conversation diverts to fashion and clothes only.

2442.NAME: Mermaid wishes
2442.DESCRIPTION: Since you agreed to please them, than please gather those things that mermaids desire.

2443.NAME: Pleasant company
2443.DESCRIPTION: This is a bonus task and is not essential. When you received this task, tulips started to grow on Festival island.

245.NAME: Pestle
245.DESCRIPTION: You will need a pestle to finish laboratory. Fulfill these tasks to get it

2457.NAME: Looking for eggs
2457.DESCRIPTION: Easter bunny has visited every nook and cranny. Check your island to determine what happened to the easter eggs.

2458.NAME: Golden hen
2458.DESCRIPTION: Hey, festival isle is equipped in easter mood as well.

2459.NAME: Chocolate goodies
2459.DESCRIPTION: Easter eggs are on high demand in Oceania. Try to exchange them wisely.

246.NAME: Sun parchment I of III
246.DESCRIPTION: Scroll master Ronald Grunstein will give you a part of the parchment, if you solve his riddles

2460.NAME: Spanking
2460.DESCRIPTION: Run bunny, run, you earned yourself a pussywillow bundle. Your fault for sticking your long ears in jam storage shed?

2461.NAME: Colour of the fur
2461.DESCRIPTION: Is the bunny doing this on purpouse? The more gray hairs you have, the darkerer his brown, fluffy coat gets.

2462.NAME: Chore list I
2462.DESCRIPTION: The fluffy tail got so carried away, that it forgot his egg basket and list of things he planed to do on your isle.

2463.NAME: Chore list II
2463.DESCRIPTION: How about you finish rest of the chores. Looks like bunny does not know where he misplaced this list.

2464.NAME: Chore list IV
2464.DESCRIPTION: Third part of the list contained pranks, so that one was crossed out. Moving on to forth parth.

2465.NAME: Chore list VI
2465.DESCRIPTION: Easy to guess what kind of mischief was in the list again. Carrying on other tasks.

2466.NAME: Chore list VII
2466.DESCRIPTION: As if that was not enough, under the basket there is another note.

2467.NAME: Chore list VIII
2467.DESCRIPTION: Crossed-out, another crossed-out, already done, another crossed-out. Only few tasks left.

2468.NAME: Trap for a joker
2468.DESCRIPTION: Eventually bunny will figure out, where he left the basket. Prepare a proper welcome.

2469.NAME: Enjoy the easter
2469.DESCRIPTION: Work is done, one secret remains!

247.NAME: Sun parchment II of III
247.DESCRIPTION: Scroll master Ronald Grunstein will give you a part of the parchment, if you solve his riddles

2470.NAME: Spring planting
2470.DESCRIPTION: Everyone knows that you excel in farming, for this reason You are entrusted to provide seedlings for others.

2471.NAME: Seedling delivery
2471.DESCRIPTION: Atafu isle holds enough space for your own needs, but to provide promised amounts, you'll need to work in Festival isle.

2472.NAME: Planting tasks
2472.DESCRIPTION: After devising a proper plan, you can start the vast  sowing tasks.

2473.NAME: Pea planting challenge
2473.DESCRIPTION: For each of the three tasks you will receive one garlic, that you can take home.

2474.NAME: Chicory planting challenge
2474.DESCRIPTION: For each of the three tasks you will receive one garlic, that you can take home.

2475.NAME: Garlic planting challenge
2475.DESCRIPTION: For each of the three tasks you will receive one garlic, that you can take home.

2476.NAME: Batata planting challenge
2476.DESCRIPTION: For each of the three tasks you will receive one garlic, that you can take home.

2477.NAME: Cucumber planting challenge
2477.DESCRIPTION: For each of the three tasks you will receive one garlic, that you can take home.

2478.NAME: Wasabi planting challenge
2478.DESCRIPTION: For each of the three tasks you will receive one garlic, that you can take home.

2479.NAME: Watermelon planting challenge
2479.DESCRIPTION: For each of the three tasks you will receive one garlic, that you can take home.

248.NAME: Sun parchment III
248.DESCRIPTION: Scroll master Ronald Grunstein will give you a part of the parchment, if you solve his riddles

2480.NAME: Peach planting challenge
2480.DESCRIPTION: For each of the three tasks you will receive one garlic, that you can take home.

2481.NAME: Garlic in Atafu isle
2481.DESCRIPTION: How nice of you, that you helped everybody. Now you can help yourself.

2483.NAME: Obtain a Moon Apple
2483.DESCRIPTION: For each task, you will receive 1 moon apple. If you complete all, you'll earn another one.

2484.NAME: Obtain a Moon Apple
2484.DESCRIPTION: For each task, you will receive 1 moon apple. If you complete all, you'll earn another one.

2485.NAME: Obtain a Moon Apple
2485.DESCRIPTION: For each task, you will receive 1 moon apple. If you complete all, you'll earn another one.

249.NAME: Moon parchment I of III
249.DESCRIPTION: Extreme archaeologist Sarah Friday will give you a part of the parchment if you solve her riddles

25.NAME: Create iron axe
25.DESCRIPTION: Craft iron axe from the parts

250.NAME: Moon parchment II of III
250.DESCRIPTION: Extreme archaeologist Sarah Friday will give you a part of the parchment if you solve her riddles

251.NAME: Moon parchment III
251.DESCRIPTION: Extreme archaeologist Sarah Friday will give you a part of the parchment if you solve her riddles

252.NAME: Star parchment I of III
252.DESCRIPTION: Leader of the mysterious organization Castin Shadow will give you a part of the star parchment if you solve his riddles

253.NAME: Star parchment II of III
253.DESCRIPTION: Leader of the mysterious organization Castin Shadow will give you a part of the star parchment if you solve his riddles

254.NAME: Star parchment III
254.DESCRIPTION: Leader of the mysterious organization Castin Shadow will give you a part of the star parchment if you solve his riddles

255.NAME: Start repairing the bridge
255.DESCRIPTION: Start repairing the bridge according to the instructions

256.NAME: Continue repairing the bridge
256.DESCRIPTION: Continue repairing the ancient bridge according to the instructions in the Moon parchment

257.NAME: Finish repairing the bridge
257.DESCRIPTION: Finish repairing the ancient bridge according to the instructions in the Star parchment

2600.NAME: School days in Oceania
2600.DESCRIPTION: No matter how much little native like playing on the beach, it is time to start preparing for school.

2602.NAME: Good weather
2602.DESCRIPTION: Shrobbery on Festival  island after such a long summer has grown wild and will need trimming.

2603.NAME: School bell
2603.DESCRIPTION: After the bell it is time to sit down and listen to new tidings.

2604.NAME: School day I
2604.DESCRIPTION: First you will study basics, then we will move on to more difficult matters.

2605.NAME: Home work I
2605.DESCRIPTION: Thease tasks are ment for main isle, go home and remembet to return to school tomorow.

2607.NAME: Home work II
2607.DESCRIPTION: At home you should practice things that you learned.

2609.NAME: School day IV
2609.DESCRIPTION: After tests there are is no homework.

2610.NAME: Useful errands
2610.DESCRIPTION: Pupils are the ones that create school environment. Run some errands and make this environment better

2611.NAME: Useful errands II
2611.DESCRIPTION: A new school year, but some supplies are still not re-stocked. Fortunately these things are trivial.

2612.NAME: Independent
2612.DESCRIPTION: Thanks, but i no longer need to be looked after, now shcool bell is my routine.

2669.NAME: Dark cloud
2669.DESCRIPTION: Less than a month until the spooky festivities. Fortunately you already found a suitable location.

267.NAME: Old parchment hunt
267.DESCRIPTION: Congratulations you are accepted in the secret society! To repair the bridge, you will need ancient parchments

2670.NAME: Darkened isle
2670.DESCRIPTION: Let's take a look on site and determine amount of work needed for preparations.

2671.NAME: Decorating the isle
2671.DESCRIPTION: Since you managed to get trough the forest, it is time to decorate rest of the island.

2672.NAME: Luring the imps
2672.DESCRIPTION: At the end of October horrible imps are most active, but you can manage to capture some even at this date.

2673.NAME: Continue decorating
2673.DESCRIPTION: Few more tasks and you can invite some friends.

2678.NAME: Personal invitation
2678.DESCRIPTION: Your friend Paprick deserves an invitation without midleman. It has to be from your hands.

2679.NAME: Casting away the darkness
2679.DESCRIPTION: To get rid of darkness, first you must get rid of the ghosts.

268.NAME: Moon parchment
268.DESCRIPTION: Combine the Moon parchment from its parts

2680.NAME: Shaman's help
2680.DESCRIPTION: Without ghosts these clouds will fade in time, unfortunately you can not wait.

2681.NAME: Decoration tycoon
2681.DESCRIPTION: These tasks are not obligatory. Each one of these tasks will reward you with coffee and 75 reputation.

2682.NAME: Sticky candy
2682.DESCRIPTION: The clouds have dispersed and it looks like the ghosts left some candy as an apology.

2683.NAME: Not scared of the dark
2683.DESCRIPTION: Despite the dark clouds celebration will be held. For each of these quests you will earn 22 spooky drinks.

269.NAME: Star parchment
269.DESCRIPTION: Combine the Star parchment from its parts

270.NAME: Best friend I
270.DESCRIPTION: Very difficult ironman tasks that have to be fulfilled on your friend's islands

2701.NAME: The End of the Feast
2701.DESCRIPTION: The latest event organized by the governor (You) has ended. All the inhabitants of the surrounding islands have visited.

2702.NAME: Toy Search
2702.DESCRIPTION: Toys are scattered all over Oceania, but when you search, none are found. You need to ask friends for advice.

2703.NAME: Little Parrot's Advice
2703.DESCRIPTION: All the little parrots admire Aldo's great airplane. Small model planes in Oceania are no longer a novelty.

2704.NAME: Gonzo's Idea
2704.DESCRIPTION: The shepherd Gonzo can tell you where to look for horse-like giraffe toys.

2705.NAME: Bruno the Blaster and the Bats
2705.DESCRIPTION: For a job well done, Bruno recently received a bat puppet. Treat Mr. Blaster to tea and gather information.

2706.NAME: The Howling Snakes
2706.DESCRIPTION: In his youth, the Howling Squid wanted to call himself a snake, but all he got was a snake toy.

2707.NAME: Aldo's Piglets
2707.DESCRIPTION: Aldo's plane carries passengers who cannot fly. When there are no passengers, this role is filled by a soft piglet.

2708.NAME: Ivo and the Chameleons
2708.DESCRIPTION: Reptile expert Ivo will tell you how to find chameleons, these lizards usually hide excellently.

2709.NAME: Sango's Singing Toucans
2709.DESCRIPTION: If anyone can tell you where to find toucan toys, it will definitely be the musician Sango.

271.NAME: Best friend II
271.DESCRIPTION: Very difficult ironman tasks that have to be fulfilled on your friend's islands

2710.NAME: Valda's Koalas
2710.DESCRIPTION: Archaeologist Valda Curiosity is known for a safe and soft plush koala bear.

2711.NAME: Toy Supplies
2711.DESCRIPTION: It seems that at least some of the toys are Nadine's work. Persuade the seamstress Nadine to make something soft for you too.

2712.NAME: Toy Sewing
2712.DESCRIPTION: Seamstress Nadine has finally agreed to make some toys.

2713.NAME: The Remainder
2713.DESCRIPTION: Not all toys were made of threads and rags, help Nadine and you will receive unused doubloons.

2714.NAME: The Joy of Collecting
2714.DESCRIPTION: Put aside the tools and it's time to play with the acquired toys.

2716.NAME: Floating Object
2716.DESCRIPTION: After yesterday's strong winds, a barrel has appeared in your waters.

2717.NAME: Sturdy Barrel I
2717.DESCRIPTION: The barrel has turned out to be unusually light and sturdy. It seems like something is rattling inside, but the barrel won't open.

2718.NAME: Sturdy Barrel II
2718.DESCRIPTION: The barrel stubbornly resists. Gentle methods are ineffective, it's time to try a more aggressive approach.

2719.NAME: Sturdy Barrel III
2719.DESCRIPTION: The lid is tightly sealed and even blows have no effect, you need to try to open the barrel differently.

272.NAME: Cook
272.DESCRIPTION: Make food according to these recipes to practice cooking

2720.NAME: Sturdy Barrel IV
2720.DESCRIPTION: Not all possibilities have been exhausted yet, it's time to use ingenuity.

2721.NAME: What's Inside the Barrel?
2721.DESCRIPTION: The lid has opened, it's time to find out what wonders are hidden in such a sturdy barrel.

2722.NAME: The Survivor
2722.DESCRIPTION: At the bottom of the barrel was a flytrap. One plant has successfully recovered. Unfortunately, the rest will have to be thrown out.

2723.NAME: Flytrap Cultivation
2723.DESCRIPTION: Your flytrap has regained strength and is finally ready for propagation. PLANT THE FLYTRAP

2725.NAME: Selection
2725.DESCRIPTION: What's this, a red flytrap? Such a plant will certainly be worth more than ordinary flytraps.

2727.NAME: Special Selection
2727.DESCRIPTION: The red flytrap has produced an even more unusual yield. The parrots will spare no shells and other materials to obtain this rarity.

2728.NAME: Iron Flytrap
2728.DESCRIPTION: If you complete these difficult tasks, you will receive an additional opportunity to get rid of excess flytraps

2729.NAME: Flytrap Processing
2729.DESCRIPTION: Congratulations, your efforts were not in vain, you now possess an advanced understanding of this plant.

273.NAME: Heating the economy
273.DESCRIPTION: The natives have heard about the world-wide economic crisis and want you to participate in economy heating

274.NAME: First machetes
274.DESCRIPTION: You can see vast jungle across the bridge. You will need machetes to cut through this jungle

275.NAME: Test machetes
275.DESCRIPTION: Test your new machetes by cutting the jungle

276.NAME: Cut jungle
276.DESCRIPTION: Craft or buy more machetes and remove one tile of jungle bushes

277.NAME: Ancient pavement
277.DESCRIPTION: There is an ancient pavement below the jungle. Find a tile and renew it

278.NAME: Jungle explorer
278.DESCRIPTION: Visit the other bank of the river and explore what the jungle hides

2797.NAME: Warm balloon
2797.DESCRIPTION: Natives have found an empty, heart shaped balloon. Washed out junk is nothing unusual, but this balloon is still warm.

2798.NAME: Obsorvations
2798.DESCRIPTION: Ever since the balloon was found, you have this strange feeling of uneasiness, look around for clues.

2799.NAME: Other observations
2799.DESCRIPTION: The more you wander around the stronger this uneasy feeling gets.

28.NAME: Earn territory
28.DESCRIPTION: Now that you have the iron axe, you can chop through baobab grove

2800.NAME: Another observation
2800.DESCRIPTION: Sometimes it sounds as if someone smashed pottery, but there are no shards in sight. Still, the sound continues.

2801.NAME: Totaly other observations
2801.DESCRIPTION: The nature has gotten agitated, what could possibly trigger this commotion. Usually the local enviroment is so welcoming.

2802.NAME: Salt traces
2802.DESCRIPTION: Undoubtedly the cause can be found [here], oops, you just poked a hole in the map.

2803.NAME: Great sorrow
2803.DESCRIPTION: Salty weather has caused a sorrowful atmosphere, perhaps you can scatter the dark clounds?

2804.NAME: Warming the ducky
2804.DESCRIPTION: At this point the ducky resembles a rubber burned out light bulb without a spark. Long sighs makes it even sadder.

2805.NAME: Redirect thoughts
2805.DESCRIPTION: Sometimes you get in a loop, to break free, you need to start doing completely different nice things.

2806.NAME: Pulling the rubber
2806.DESCRIPTION: Strange there are no rubber fig trees or their sap, where do all of these rubber things come from?

2807.NAME: Coastal guard
2807.DESCRIPTION: Look at the reeds near the shore, there is another rubber ducky. No matter how you try, the ducky is unmovable.

2808.NAME: Heart balloons
2808.DESCRIPTION: Ducky ignores the pink baloon, and the baloon itself shows no reaction ether.

2809.NAME: Happy ducky
2809.DESCRIPTION: Although ducky is made of rubber, its face still expresses joy. The balloon has started inflating as well.

2810.NAME: Heartfull duckies
2810.DESCRIPTION: With your help both hearts are now beating as one.

2811.NAME: Cach more balloons
2811.DESCRIPTION: As you can see winds blow these balloons here from time to time, if no balloon is present, wait for them.

282.NAME: Top-hat for Gorilla I of II
282.DESCRIPTION: Gorilla wants to join the gentlemen club and a top-hat is needed for it. Help it.

283.NAME: Bow-tie for Cheetah I of II
283.DESCRIPTION: Cheetah wants to join the gentlemen club and needs a bow-tie for it. Help it.

284.NAME: Monocle for Spider I of II
284.DESCRIPTION: Spider wants to join the gentlemen club and needs a monocle for it. Help it.

285.NAME: Machetes
285.DESCRIPTION: Fulfilling this task will earn you some machetes. As an alternative, you can also buy them in the shop

286.NAME: Machetes
286.DESCRIPTION: Fulfilling this task will earn you some machetes. As an alternative, you can also buy them in the shop

287.NAME: Machetes
287.DESCRIPTION: Fulfilling this task will earn you some machetes. As an alternative, you can also buy them in the shop

2876.NAME: Home team
2876.DESCRIPTION: Each task will reward you with a puck, finishing them all will give you an extra puck.

2877.NAME: Team “Bears”
2877.DESCRIPTION: Each task will reward you with a puck, finishing them all will give you an extra puck.

2878.NAME: Team “Roosters”
2878.DESCRIPTION: Each task will reward you with a puck, finishing them all will give you an extra puck.

2879.NAME: Team “Meerkats”
2879.DESCRIPTION: Each task will reward you with a puck, finishing them all will give you an extra puck.

288.NAME: Machetes
288.DESCRIPTION: Fulfilling this task will earn you some machetes. As an alternative, you can also buy them in the shop

2880.NAME: Team “Goats”
2880.DESCRIPTION: Each task will reward you with a puck, finishing them all will give you an extra puck.

2881.NAME: Team “Foxes”
2881.DESCRIPTION: Each task will reward you with a puck, finishing them all will give you an extra puck.

2882.NAME: Team “Tucans”
2882.DESCRIPTION: Each task will reward you with a puck, finishing them all will give you an extra puck.

2883.NAME: Team “Peacocks”
2883.DESCRIPTION: Each task will reward you with a puck, finishing them all will give you an extra puck.

2885.NAME: Labyrinth island
2885.DESCRIPTION: Hey, a mysterious island has appeared near by. Native scouts report of an island completely overgrown with bushes.

2886.NAME: Overgrown labyrinth
2886.DESCRIPTION: Doubts creep in. According to scouts, the expedition will take a lot of time.

2887.NAME: Further studies
2887.DESCRIPTION: Natives are still looking over their ancient scriptures, meanwhile you can go and start clearing the island.

2888.NAME: Hidden treasures
2888.DESCRIPTION: This island has a unique treasure. Without natives you have no chance of finding it.

2889.NAME: Solution
2889.DESCRIPTION: All of the preparations are complete, there is just one more step to take.

29.NAME: Well-known island
29.DESCRIPTION: Start earning more reputation to earn the rights to build the EAGLE totem

290.NAME: Ancient pump
290.DESCRIPTION: You've found an ancient oil pump. You will need it to power the ancient city buildings.

291.NAME: Top-hat for Gorilla II
291.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a top-hat for the gorilla, and it will let you pass. You will also be able to buy it in the section EXCLUSIVE

293.NAME: Ancient sawmill
293.DESCRIPTION: You've found the ancient sawmill. Renew it and you will be able to use its special global bonuses

294.NAME: Bow-tie for Cheetah II
294.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a bow-tie for the cheetah, and it will let you pass. You will also be able to buy it in the section EXCLUSIVE

2949.NAME: Sharpen your mind
2949.DESCRIPTION: Hey, this time we will test Your wits. Geyser island is divided in areas, the access changes each morning at 6:00. Plan accordingly.

295.NAME: Monocle for Spider II
295.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a monocle for the spider, and it will let you pass. You will also be able to buy it in the section EXCLUSIVE

2950.NAME: Geyser riddle I
2950.DESCRIPTION: Finishing each task will give you a delicious cake.

2951.NAME: Geyser riddle II
2951.DESCRIPTION: Finishing each task will give you a delicious cake.

2952.NAME: Geyser riddle III
2952.DESCRIPTION: Finishing each task will give you a delicious cake.

2953.NAME: Geyser riddle IV
2953.DESCRIPTION: Finishing each task will give you a delicious cake.

2954.NAME: Owl's wisdom
2954.DESCRIPTION: Wise owl will keep an eye on you, while you solve this puzzle. Having this owl as an advisor on the main island will grant you extra energy capacity.

2955.NAME: Diligent worker
2955.DESCRIPTION: Unbelievable, but these quests can be finished in just half of the time given.

297.NAME: Ancient metal mine
297.DESCRIPTION: You've found an ancient metal mine. Renew it and you will be able to gain its valuables

299.NAME: Ancient windmill
299.DESCRIPTION: You've found an ancient windmill. Renew it and you will be able to use it to gain flour

3.NAME: Create an axe
3.DESCRIPTION: Create an axe, so you can chop trees and get wood to repair your broken raft.

30.NAME: Animal specialist
30.DESCRIPTION: Additional task: learn to grow various animals

301.NAME: Ancient laboratory
301.DESCRIPTION: You've found an ancient laboratory. Renew it and you will be able to activate its global bonuses

302.NAME: Village saviour
302.DESCRIPTION: A volcano has erupted and burned down 3 native villages. Help them, using sawmill

303.NAME: Explore metal mine
303.DESCRIPTION: Now that you can use metal mine, explore it and see how to gain ore

304.NAME: Learn to use windmill
304.DESCRIPTION: It's time to learn to use the renewed windmill

305.NAME: How to become a governor
305.DESCRIPTION: The bridge is finished. Explore the jungle and also try to find more information on how to become the governor

3050.NAME: Lost Wanderer
3050.DESCRIPTION: Chief Mo requests your help, travel to the Mysterious Continent and learn more about the misfortune.

3051.NAME: Mountain Climbing
3051.DESCRIPTION: Sorry for once denying you the ascent, but I truly cared about your safety.

3052.NAME: Stray Stranger
3052.DESCRIPTION: Hello, thank you for finding me. These giant birds think I'm one of the chicks and regularly bring me food.

3053.NAME: Sali Beaks
3053.DESCRIPTION: “Apologies for my manners, my name is Salī Knābītis, a bird watcher.”

3054.NAME: Overcoming the Landslide
3054.DESCRIPTION: While I was sitting in the nest, I saw many landslides. You'll need extra porters for the return journey.

3055.NAME: Travel Instructions
3055.DESCRIPTION: I won't climb down, and I'll warm myself by the campfire. Traveling upwards, you'll always arrive at a lit campfire.

3056.NAME: Visiting Aldo
3056.DESCRIPTION: Aldo suggested you always take a parachute with you, so you can descend from the cliff at any time.

3057.NAME: Seamstress's Help
3057.DESCRIPTION: Seamstress Nadine can certainly sew you a great parachute, but such quality work won't be cheap.

3059.NAME: Test the Parachute
3059.DESCRIPTION: The aviator has life experience in parachute falls (and getting caught in trees). Learn from the expert.

306.NAME: Preparing feast I of III
306.DESCRIPTION: At first you should prepare chairs, tables and dishes for the feast.

3060.NAME: Mythical Birds
3060.DESCRIPTION: The goal of my journey was a particularly rare bird species, about which I had heard legends.

3062.NAME: Radiant Heart
3062.DESCRIPTION: Look! After one swing of the pickaxe, the stone revealed a crystalline core. Interesting!

3063.NAME: Bird Keeper
3063.DESCRIPTION: The suggestion to take a condor egg home greatly angered Sali Beaks. Prove that you know how to care for birds.

3064.NAME: Bird Keeper II
3064.DESCRIPTION: Continuing to please Salī, you can afford to show something more exotic.

3066.NAME: Crystal Deposits
3066.DESCRIPTION: Wait, wait, wait, is this normal? Usually, crystals don't fall out of rocks like candies.

3067.NAME: Jeweler's Appraisal
3067.DESCRIPTION: These crystals aren't gemstones, unprocessed they aren't worth much, but if you decided to make something nice, I could help sell it.

3068.NAME: Jeweler's Suggestion
3068.DESCRIPTION: The best way to attract buyers for these artworks is by organizing an exhibition, but you'll also need other exhibits.

3069.NAME: Jeweler's Suggestion II
3069.DESCRIPTION: Yes, this one is pretty, but that one in the corner could use some improvement. A few more exhibits, and the exhibition will look really nice.

307.NAME: Preparing feast II of III
307.DESCRIPTION: The feast will need lots of tasty things

3070.NAME: Beak's Lessons
3070.DESCRIPTION: Finally, Sali Beaks has agreed to let you raise condors, but only under his supervision.

3079.NAME: Visiting Gonzo I
3079.DESCRIPTION: Gonzo shows genuine joy. Putting aside unfinished work, Gonzo invites you for a walk around the savannah farm.

308.NAME: Preparing feast III
308.DESCRIPTION: Organize the invitations for the feast

3080.NAME: Visiting Gonzo II
3080.DESCRIPTION: Gonzo's story is heartfelt, and you completely forget about the passage of time. Stay a little longer.

3081.NAME: Abandoned Friend
3081.DESCRIPTION: Time flies! Better head back to the Misty Mountains and see how well the ornithologist has recovered.

3082.NAME: Rare Item Trader
3082.DESCRIPTION: I heard you're interested in peacock feathers? I have a few feathers, but what can you offer in return?

3083.NAME: Rare Item Trader II
3083.DESCRIPTION: I'm not trying to cheat here, the market price is what it is. Don't cry, I'll gift you a peacock... of course, only after the next deal.

3084.NAME: Exhibition I
3084.DESCRIPTION: Too many visitors! Help! Do people really like exhibitions? Alright, let's organize something grand.

3085.NAME: Exhibition II
3085.DESCRIPTION: Sali Beaks introduces you to his old friends - peacock experts at the exhibition. Completing the task will earn you a peacock hat.

309.NAME: Roast for the feast I of III
309.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks to get one roast

31.NAME: Gather bananas
31.DESCRIPTION: There is a banana palm hidden among trees and bushes - it could become a useful food source!

310.NAME: Roast for the feast II of III
310.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks to get one roast

311.NAME: Roast for the feast III
311.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks to get one roast

312.NAME: Inquiries I of III
312.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and the native priest Screaming Squid will reveal how to become a governor

313.NAME: Inquiries II of III
313.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and the fleet admiral Edmund One-eye will reveal how to become a governor

3139.NAME: X-mas isle
3139.DESCRIPTION: Bah, the snow hits your face, but that is ok, in Oceania snow melts quickly.

314.NAME: Inquiries III
314.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and Malabu island governor Helen Lanchester will reveal how to become a governor

3140.NAME: Blizzard island
3140.DESCRIPTION: Looks more like an avalanche hit than a blizzard. Before doing anything you will need to dig.

3141.NAME: Cleaning the snow
3141.DESCRIPTION: Go ahead, clean the island in any tempo you set. These quests will not affect animal feeding quests.

3142.NAME: Winter household
3142.DESCRIPTION: These are animal feeding and household upkeep quests. You will get a new quest once every few days.

3143.NAME: Snow routine
3143.DESCRIPTION: A hot tea, than pick up your snow plow and continue digging! Slowly you reclaim the island.

3144.NAME: Nice and quiet
3144.DESCRIPTION: Once you finish cleaning up the island, go and invite Paprick for a visit.

3145.NAME: Gift hunt
3145.DESCRIPTION: Where are all the gifts? In the forest of course. Decorate the island and MAYBE you will get a chance.

3146.NAME: Winter household II
3146.DESCRIPTION: Not all tasks will be so monotonus, i promise next time we will build a snowman.

3148.NAME: How did you get here? (bonus tasks)
3148.DESCRIPTION: Listen, you should not be here, but since you arrived anyway i will find you some work to do.

3149.NAME: Festival household
3149.DESCRIPTION: This time Festival island will have slightly different tasks. Make some winter mood in festival island.

315.NAME: Governor's title
315.DESCRIPTION: To earn the governor's title you need to fulfill each of these legendary deeds

3150.NAME: Winter houshold III
3150.DESCRIPTION: You were gone too long, look, the feeders are almost empty. This time work at home, next time you will party again.

3151.NAME: New Year!
3151.DESCRIPTION: Happy new year! By finishing this quest you will receive some special prizes.

3152.NAME: Conclusion of hollidays
3152.DESCRIPTION: Those were some merry hollidays! By finishing this task you will recieve brown cow and a house with a spruce.

3153.NAME: Bushes and snowpiles
3153.DESCRIPTION: Check the snow piles and search the bushes. A surprise awaits you in 30 of 145 scrubs.

316.NAME: The ancient temple
316.DESCRIPTION: You notice an ancient temple in the distance

3160.NAME: Crab island
3160.DESCRIPTION: Click - click, click - clack! Loud pincer snapping noises indicate very hungry crabs.

3162.NAME: Hungry crabs
3162.DESCRIPTION: Oh, look at the pale pincer owners! Is it due to lack of vitamins or is it a special breed? Go and find out.

3163.NAME: Rare flowers
3163.DESCRIPTION: If natives find out, that you have harmed this jungle there will be trouble. Most of the flowers are included in protected species list.

3164.NAME: Exotic species
3164.DESCRIPTION: White crabs are rarely seen, if you breed them, high praises and reputation is guaranteeded.

3165.NAME: Mermaid's pets
3165.DESCRIPTION: Hey, thanks for taking care of my pale underwater friends. Nice island by the way, don't you agree?

3166.NAME: Last crab
3166.DESCRIPTION: This is the last task, do it properly and you will earn 50 extra tropical mood for crab purchase.

317.NAME: Temple emerald
317.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

318.NAME: Temple emerald
318.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

319.NAME: Temple emerald
319.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3196.NAME: Heart-full days
3196.DESCRIPTION: Cupid has awoken! Looks like heart-full days are here! Hey where did the cupid go?

3197.NAME: Wholehearted help I
3197.DESCRIPTION: Thank you for responding so fast, i have a little problem.

3198.NAME: Wholehearted help II
3198.DESCRIPTION: So much warmth generated i am starting to run low on arrows.

3199.NAME: Wholehearted help III
3199.DESCRIPTION: Do you remember? Long time ago you helped me brew a love potion, help would be nice, but i won't give you the formula.

32.NAME: Actions with sandpaths
32.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to move and sell sandpaths

320.NAME: Temple emerald
320.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3200.NAME: Wholehearted help IV
3200.DESCRIPTION: You have lots of acquaintances, yes? Can you hint, which of them need my help?

3201.NAME: Wholehearted help V
3201.DESCRIPTION: To fulfill my task i have to go unnoticed. Help me make romantic cover to hide.

3202.NAME: Wholehearted bonus quest
3202.DESCRIPTION: If you are still in romantic mood, perhaps you can help with these tasks. I will give you some warm balloons as a reward.

3203.NAME: Romantic quest
3203.DESCRIPTION: Cupid still has plenty to do, but you can rest at the island and enjoy the warmth of islands red haze.

3204.NAME: Cold spring
3204.DESCRIPTION: Brr, what's with this cold? I hope spring will come soon, and anyway, where does this frost come from?

3205.NAME: Look, winter!
3205.DESCRIPTION: As hard as it is to believe, you managed to find last year's missing winter. Spring will not come until winter is banished.

3206.NAME: Paprics tulips I
3206.DESCRIPTION: Paprick says: "Hey, if you don't want to wait, i can get you some tulip buds, but you got to help me first."

3207.NAME: Paprics tulips II
3207.DESCRIPTION: With the recovered strength, Paprick rushes to find more tulip buds, after all Paprick has no neighbor as good as you.

3208.NAME: Prepare for spring
3208.DESCRIPTION: Slowly cold tunnel starts to change it's breath to mild spring breeze.

3209.NAME: Grow the spring
3209.DESCRIPTION: Pixies are sleeping somewhere on this island and pixies love spring.

321.NAME: Temple emerald
321.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3211.NAME: Runaway crabs
3211.DESCRIPTION: Oh my! Crabs are hungry again and they have found you in no time at all. I will reward you with a cake and other goodies, if you chose to help me.

3213.NAME: Tulip greetings
3213.DESCRIPTION: Hi, it is time to spoil Oceania's women. This time it the sleeping pixies that seek warmth of Oceanias sun.

3214.NAME: Waking up the pixies.
3214.DESCRIPTION: Wake up the pixies and gift them tulips in this clear spring day.

3216.NAME: Spring ladies
3216.DESCRIPTION: Each of these female praising quests will gift you with 80 pixie dust.

3219.NAME: Oceania`s celebration
3219.DESCRIPTION: Hey, do you smell the aroma of cake? That's right the Oceania is celebrating its birthday!

322.NAME: Temple emerald
322.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3220.NAME: Clear the clouds
3220.DESCRIPTION: Look around you, do you see the coffee table? From this table you can collect candles that will be very very important latter.

3221.NAME: Anniversary tasks A
3221.DESCRIPTION: On this island are many small tasks, without doing them reaching special prize will be quite hard.

3222.NAME: Anniversary tasks B
3222.DESCRIPTION: On this island are many small tasks, without doing them reaching special prize will be quite hard.

3223.NAME: Anniversary tasks C
3223.DESCRIPTION: On this island are many small tasks, without doing them reaching special prize will be quite hard.

3224.NAME: Anniversary tasks D
3224.DESCRIPTION: On this island are many small tasks, without doing them reaching special prize will be quite hard.

3225.NAME: Anniversary cake
3225.DESCRIPTION: Exactly! There is a cake on this island and it needs to be eaten!

3227.NAME: Anniversary castle
3227.DESCRIPTION: I hope you like the cake! Time to reminiscence about Oceania's governor castle.

3228.NAME: Building instructions
3228.DESCRIPTION: Governor players will build this castle out of memories, while beginners will use their vision of the future as materials.

3229.NAME: Anniversary stones
3229.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the quests that will reward you with memory stones for building the castle.

323.NAME: Temple emerald
323.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3230.NAME: Anniversary stones
3230.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the quests that will reward you with memory stones for building the castle.

3231.NAME: Anniversary stones
3231.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the quests that will reward you with memory stones for building the castle.

3232.NAME: Anniversary stones
3232.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the quests that will reward you with memory stones for building the castle.

3233.NAME: Anniversary stones
3233.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the quests that will reward you with memory stones for building the castle.

3234.NAME: Anniversary stones
3234.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the quests that will reward you with memory stones for building the castle.

3235.NAME: Anniversary stones
3235.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the quests that will reward you with memory stones for building the castle.

3236.NAME: Anniversary stones
3236.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the quests that will reward you with memory stones for building the castle.

324.NAME: Temple emerald
324.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

325.NAME: Temple emerald
325.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

326.NAME: Temple emerald
326.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3268.NAME: Olafs visit
3268.DESCRIPTION: While you were relaxing and drinking tea, a viking named Olaf arrived on your island. It looks like adventure time!

3269.NAME: Olaf's explenation
3269.DESCRIPTION: An Oceanian local should know all the surrounding flora and fauna. Let us talk while we walk, i will explain everything.

327.NAME: Temple emerald
327.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3270.NAME: Olaf's plan
3270.DESCRIPTION: I have directions on how to find a shield. The island has five hidden fragments, if we find those, we find the shield.

3271.NAME: Camp site I
3271.DESCRIPTION: There is too much to do for a single day, we need a camp. Let us settle on the island first.

3272.NAME: Camp site II
3272.DESCRIPTION: Preperations are complete, let us build the campsite!

3273.NAME: Direction →↓←
3273.DESCRIPTION: Judging from hints, to find a fragment we need to do the following:

3274.NAME: Direction  ↑↑→
3274.DESCRIPTION: "Living comfort" This part of cryptic text must mean the house, but nothing happened, why?
