3275.NAME: Direction  ↓←↓
3275.DESCRIPTION: Some hints look more like pictures then a cryptic text. To find a piece you would need to.........

3276.NAME: Direction  →→→
3276.DESCRIPTION: Across the river after pasing the jagged rock, look, here! This tree has instructions carved in to it.

3277.NAME: Direction  ←↑→
3277.DESCRIPTION: Looks like you are drowsy. After this task let us drink coffee and eat cake.

3278.NAME: Direction ↑↑↑
3278.DESCRIPTION: Olaf is watching the sky, and thinking if clouds could be the next hint.... . Back to work!

3279.NAME: Direction →↓↓
3279.DESCRIPTION: I'm overvorked, let's have lunch. A fresh head will have better ideas.

328.NAME: Temple emerald
328.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3281.NAME: Olafs promise
3281.DESCRIPTION: Remember this is only the first adventure. Olaf will examine records and eventually will return with new adventures.

3288.NAME: Olaf's flutes
3288.DESCRIPTION: While reading ancestral runes i discovered that long ago lived seven flute players. Our work just increased seven times.

3289.NAME: Cave entrance
3289.DESCRIPTION: You already helped me a lot, this time i will help. I will secure some light, i just happen to have these nice looking lanterns.

329.NAME: Temple emerald
329.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3290.NAME: Seven flute players
3290.DESCRIPTION: The awakened spirit will ask you some riddles. Solve the quests and you will get a flute.

3291.NAME: Red flute
3291.DESCRIPTION: The flute player has some unfinished business, find him and you will find out what exactly does he want.

3292.NAME: Yellow flute
3292.DESCRIPTION: The flute player has some unfinished business, find him and you will find out what exactly does he want.

3293.NAME: Orange flute
3293.DESCRIPTION: The flute player has some unfinished business, find him and you will find out what exactly does he want.

3294.NAME: Green flute
3294.DESCRIPTION: The flute player has some unfinished business, find him and you will find out what exactly does he want.

3295.NAME: Sky blue flute
3295.DESCRIPTION: The flute player has some unfinished business, find him and you will find out what exactly does he want.

3296.NAME: Purple flute
3296.DESCRIPTION: The flute player has some unfinished business, find him and you will find out what exactly does he want.

3297.NAME: Tea with Olaf
3297.DESCRIPTION: While drinking tea, Olaf makes a suggestion to combine your shield with newly acquired flutes. Double decoration can be found in the shop. If you do not posses the shield, than all you can do is place the flutes on the map.

33.NAME: Flower lover
33.DESCRIPTION: Make the island pretty with many flowers

330.NAME: Temple emerald
330.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3304.NAME: Lanterns I
3304.DESCRIPTION: Olaf has ran out of lanterns. Finish some native quests to collect some more lanterns.

3305.NAME: Lanterns II
3305.DESCRIPTION: Olaf has ran out of lanterns. Finish some native quests to collect some more lanterns.

3306.NAME: Lanterns III
3306.DESCRIPTION: Olaf has ran out of lanterns. Finish some native quests to collect some more lanterns.

3307.NAME: Lanterns IV
3307.DESCRIPTION: (LT does not meet the minimum requirements, translation not needed)

331.NAME: Temple emerald
331.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

332.NAME: Temple emerald
332.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3326.NAME: Sunflower beginning
3326.DESCRIPTION: How large can the flower grow? If you nurture it properly it should grow quite big. Shall we experiment?

3327.NAME: Cultivating a sunflower
3327.DESCRIPTION: Patience, patience and more patience. This time you can not get a result just by rushing forwards.

3328.NAME: Giant sunflower
3328.DESCRIPTION: It is too early to hope for any kind of benefit from this flower. Wait until it grows up.

3329.NAME: Still sunflower.
3329.DESCRIPTION: You are doing great, i think it is starting to pay off.

333.NAME: Temple emerald
333.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3330.NAME: Gardners pride
3330.DESCRIPTION: Fully grown sunflower is a good source for envy. Every action on the flower will net you 1 reputation.

3331.NAME: Second run
3331.DESCRIPTION: Do you wish to accept the challenge of growing the flower once more? The flower is in the shop.

3332.NAME: Double flower
3332.DESCRIPTION: You will not have enough time for a third flower, still, a second flower is a good reason to brag to everybody.

3333.NAME: Wild Savanna
3333.DESCRIPTION: While testing Olafs boat, the stream has brought you to unknown savanna.

3334.NAME: Savanna Rocksplitter
3334.DESCRIPTION: These savanna rocks look unnatural, let's take a proper look.

3335.NAME: Savanna woocutter
3335.DESCRIPTION: Not a very plesant feeling, when you constantly need to look above you. These trees house reptilians.

3336.NAME: Flying surprise
3336.DESCRIPTION: Eeem...  what is this? Impossible, these are SEA creatures, what are they doing hiding inside the flowers?

3337.NAME: Savanna starfish
3337.DESCRIPTION: Everything here is bizarre, these weird starfishes have to planted like plants.

3338.NAME: Still wild
3338.DESCRIPTION: Starfish gardening was more interesting then you thought, let's get back to exploration.

334.NAME: Temple emerald
334.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3340.NAME: Relocating Savanna A
3340.DESCRIPTION: Paprick has not seen this weird treasure ether. Let's move it to safer place and keep analyzing.

3341.NAME: Relocating Savanna B
3341.DESCRIPTION: If you keep specializing on one type of reward, than the cumulative prize will evade you.

335.NAME: Temple emerald
335.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

336.NAME: Temple emerald
336.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will earn 1 emerald

3370.NAME: Accident in space
3370.DESCRIPTION: Oh, no! School bus crashed on another planet. You will have to study hard to get back home

3371.NAME: No way out situation
3371.DESCRIPTION: At the last moment an escape capsule was deployed, and you managed to survive, but how are you going to get home?

3373.NAME: Rocket
3373.DESCRIPTION: Wish to travel fast? Dig up the small rockets.

3374.NAME: Investigating UFO
3374.DESCRIPTION: Bus driver tried to crash near signs of civilization on purpose. Unfortunately UFO is unusable.

3375.NAME: Investigating UFO II-A
3375.DESCRIPTION: You extracted shards of UFO from earth, pieces have strange written marks. You also uncovered some alien notes.

3376.NAME: Investigating UFO II-B
3376.DESCRIPTION: Crashed outlanders had planed to leave by building a new transport.

3377.NAME: Dangerous outland
3377.DESCRIPTION: Outlanders were not found, this means danger, ether predators or starvation.

3378.NAME: Collecting food
3378.DESCRIPTION: Time for the next Sport-Biology lesson. Let us keep hunting!

3379.NAME: Coplex tasks
3379.DESCRIPTION: At times like these previous education is worth the trouble.

338.NAME: Paper for lighthouse project I of III
338.DESCRIPTION: Invite parchment merchants and convince them to sell it in this region

3380.NAME: Gaze in home direction
3380.DESCRIPTION: Frame is almost finished, time to start planing for departure.

3381.NAME: Missed homework
3381.DESCRIPTION: Oh, it is good to be home. This trip still does not cancel your homework.

3382.NAME: Future plans
3382.DESCRIPTION: No outlander was ever found. Learn a profession to join the exploration group.

3383.NAME: Flag on outland
3383.DESCRIPTION: It is unlikely that you will return. Leave a mark, that proves you were once here.

339.NAME: Paper for lighthouse project I Iof III
339.DESCRIPTION: Continue convincing parchment merchants to sell their wares here

34.NAME: Important island
34.DESCRIPTION: Continue earning more reputation to earn the rights to build the EAGLE totem

340.NAME: Paper for lighthouse project III
340.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these final tasks and you will be able to buy parchment in the shop

341.NAME: Invite architect I of III
341.DESCRIPTION: Send envoys to find the best architect

3411.NAME: Ctritter dream
3411.DESCRIPTION: Cold season is coming and little critters are getting drowsy. Trough out the winter little critters will sleep and dream.

3412.NAME: Four dreamers
3412.DESCRIPTION: Even while dreaming critters get no rest. Nightmares trough out the winter would be a painful experience.

3413.NAME: Lost in woods
3413.DESCRIPTION: The dream is overshadowed by long shadows from the trees. Once he got lost, from then he is scared of the forest.

3414.NAME: Swamp harvest
3414.DESCRIPTION: Dream about yummy harvest has sunk inside the swamp.

3415.NAME: Heavy dream
3415.DESCRIPTION: Little critter is energetic, and still, he has unyielding obstacles inside his dream.

3416.NAME: Colorfull dream
3416.DESCRIPTION: Little critter always dreamed about adventure with friends. Join the dream of treasure hunt.

3418.NAME: Big dreamers
3418.DESCRIPTION: All critters sleep soundly and project the big dream.

3419.NAME: Collective dream
3419.DESCRIPTION: Critters help one another, since collective dream is more peaceful and less dangerous.

342.NAME: Invite architect II of III
342.DESCRIPTION: Invite best architects from all around

3420.NAME: Critter alliance
3420.DESCRIPTION: One critter likes gardening, other one likes heavy-lifting, let them cooperate.

3422.NAME: Good night critters!
3422.DESCRIPTION: (Yawns!) Slumber fairy has come at last, bringing the sweetest of dreams.

343.NAME: Invite architect III
343.DESCRIPTION: Convince the best architect Gustaff Paolo to create a project for your lighthouse

344.NAME: Drafting blueprint I of III
344.DESCRIPTION: Architect Gustaff Paolo is ready to start creating project blueprint. Give him what he needs

345.NAME: Drafting blueprint II of III
345.DESCRIPTION: Architect Gustaff Paolo continues creating blueprint. Give him what he needs

346.NAME: Drafting blueprint III
346.DESCRIPTION: Architect Gustaff Paolo continues creating blueprint. Give him what he needs

347.NAME: Glass merchants I of III
347.DESCRIPTION: The lighthouse will need glass. Convince glass merchant guild to sell their wares in your region

3472.NAME: Sea shell archipelago
3472.DESCRIPTION: Little critters are convinced that there is a beast inside you, and now this beast has escaped the dream world.

3473.NAME: Green wolf
3473.DESCRIPTION: Do not be confused, it is not your soul, but a mere projection of it, just like a shadow is a projection of your body.

3474.NAME: Green stag
3474.DESCRIPTION: The green wolf may or may not  be your spirit animal. Green deer pushes his candidacy.

3475.NAME: Two shadows
3475.DESCRIPTION: You can follow ether wolf or stag, but don't be alarmed and hug both of them.

3476.NAME: Sharp spirit I
3476.DESCRIPTION: Far isles can be accessed from two sides, chose the more convenient direction.

3477.NAME: Stag spirit I
3477.DESCRIPTION: Deer spirit has prepared some challenges to test you. To access lizards you will need to overcome wave at the shores of central island.

3478.NAME: Sharp spirit I
3478.DESCRIPTION: Sharp spirit has found another island. Explore.

3479.NAME: Stag spirit II
3479.DESCRIPTION: Stag tries to convince you in a creative way.

348.NAME: Glass merchants II of III
348.DESCRIPTION: Continue convincing glass merchant guild to sell their wares in your region

3480.NAME: All roses
3480.DESCRIPTION: This is EXTRA quest, finishing this quest is not compulsory. Remember you will need to progress to plant some of the roses.

3483.NAME: Dream friends
3483.DESCRIPTION: Critters are happy that you remembered them. Festival island will hold dream briefing,

349.NAME: Glass merchants III
349.DESCRIPTION: Finish convincing glass merchant guild to sell their wares in your region

35.NAME: Spend energy for sapphires
35.DESCRIPTION: This is a special task for Fix players for which you can receive a free sapphire in Fix

350.NAME: Build Easter swing II
350.DESCRIPTION: According to the local tradition, you need to swing so that mosquitoes don't bite you for the rest of the year.

352.NAME: Reputation for the guests
352.DESCRIPTION: Earn enough reputation to invite three very important guests to the feast

353.NAME: Renew the ancient temple
353.DESCRIPTION: The ancient temple lies in ruins and is cursed. But it can be renewed with some emeralds. Then you will be able to move or sell all the renewed tiles in the ancient city!

354.NAME: Earn glass for the temple I of III
354.DESCRIPTION: Finishing the ancient temple will require glass. It's time to try and find it.

3540.NAME: Cup 2021. qualification
3540.DESCRIPTION: Before you leave you need to finish a small task. Once finished find the stadion island and do your best.

3541.NAME: Winter cup 2021. I
3541.DESCRIPTION: All tasks in this winter cup will be given as riddles. Small advice: Bronze discipline is aimed at lower levels.

3542.NAME: Winter cup 2021. II
3542.DESCRIPTION: Sloppiness is a trap, do not fall in. Read the task texts carefully.

3543.NAME: Winter cup 2021. III
3543.DESCRIPTION: Last three tasks and the Bronze section will be completed.

3544.NAME: Winter cup 2021. IV
3544.DESCRIPTION: Silver stage is not recommended for players below clay era (those who can not produce clay items).

3545.NAME: Winter cup 2021. V
3545.DESCRIPTION: Winter cup has a few knack, all quests are doable, but some need extra cunning to finish.

3546.NAME: Winter cup 2021. VI
3546.DESCRIPTION: Management of free space is one of the most difficult things.

3547.NAME: Winter cup 2021. VII
3547.DESCRIPTION: To challenge Gold tasks you should have at least started volcano island.

3548.NAME: Winter cup 2021. VIII
3548.DESCRIPTION: Not all cup competitions are in riddle format, perhaps next time it will be different.

3549.NAME: Winter cup 2021. XI
3549.DESCRIPTION: Winter cup always has only one right choice. Choosing the task order is also a challenge.

355.NAME: Earn glass for the temple II of III
355.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks to continue getting glass.

3550.NAME: Cup 2021. reminder.
3550.DESCRIPTION: This is a reminder! Cups will be distributed according to time in which this particular quest is done. If this quest is not done - you do not qualify to receive a trophy. Cups are distributed only AFTER the challenge end date arrives (so we can gather the data). Once finished wait for 03.17.2021. and check Paprick island for results.

3552.NAME: Pink challange I of IV
3552.DESCRIPTION: A small quest line to honor the international woman's day

3553.NAME: Pink challange II of IV
3553.DESCRIPTION: An honorable purpose, so give it your best!

3554.NAME: Pink challange III of IV
3554.DESCRIPTION: Before the happy ending and easy tasks (quest IV) finish these difficult tasks.

3555.NAME: Pink challange IV of IV
3555.DESCRIPTION: Take care of your ladies, they deserve the very best.

3558.NAME: Keeper of secrets
3558.DESCRIPTION: Hey, you found all the hidden treasure! Do this quest and you will receive temple flower.

356.NAME: Earn glass for the temple III
356.DESCRIPTION: These are the last tasks. After these, the glass is yours.

3561.NAME: Velykų šventė II
3561.DESCRIPTION: Festivalių saloje prasidėjo šurmulys. Pradėk atidarymo užduotis.

3562.NAME: Velykų šventė III
3562.DESCRIPTION: Velykų šurmulys įtrauks viską ir dirbtuves ir parduotuvę, būtinai patikrink visus kampelius ir užkampius.

3563.NAME: Velykų šventė IV
3563.DESCRIPTION: Kas gi paslėpta kiaušinyje? Rask kiaušinį ir išperink jį, višta ir triušis tavimi didžiuosis.

3564.NAME: Velykų šventė V
3564.DESCRIPTION: Paverks šias Velykas dar gražesnėmis, pastatyk kiaušinių dekoracijas.

3565.NAME: Velykų šventė VI
3565.DESCRIPTION: Kiaušinių dažymas yra privalu šiomis dienomis, todėl Festivalių saloje viščiukai ves mokymus apie tai.

3566.NAME: Velykų šventė VII
3566.DESCRIPTION: Šiai dekoracijai sukurti bus iššūkių. Net surinkus visas reikalingas medžiagas lengva užbaigti nebus.

3567.NAME: Ruošiamės Šv. Velykom
3567.DESCRIPTION: Tai tik apšilimas. Kai šios užduotėlės bus baigtos prasidės tikri Velykų iššūkiai.

3568.NAME: Egg bush quest
3568.DESCRIPTION: Good eye-sight is an excelent feature. Now earn the rabbits respect.

357.NAME: Conquering the ancient city
357.DESCRIPTION: Great! Now you can do whatever you want with this territory. At first, try moving some of the buildings.

3570.NAME: Bushes II of II
3570.DESCRIPTION: Surprise! Rabbit had extra quest in mind.

3571.NAME: Forest challenge
3571.DESCRIPTION: Remember each task gives two eggs, finishing the whole quest will net you additional one egg.

3572.NAME: Bronze challenge
3572.DESCRIPTION: Remember each task gives two eggs, finishing the whole quest will net you additional one egg.

3573.NAME: Glass challenge
3573.DESCRIPTION: Remember each task gives two eggs, finishing the whole quest will net you additional one egg.

3574.NAME: Cloth challenge
3574.DESCRIPTION: Remember each task gives two eggs, finishing the whole quest will net you additional one egg.

3575.NAME: Native challenge
3575.DESCRIPTION: Remember each task gives two eggs, finishing the whole quest will net you additional one egg.

3576.NAME: Pearl challenge
3576.DESCRIPTION: Remember each task gives two eggs, finishing the whole quest will net you additional one egg.

3577.NAME: Color the eggs
3577.DESCRIPTION: To earn the special Easter reward you must collect 25 of the 42 special Easter eggs.

3579.NAME: Easter champion 42
3579.DESCRIPTION: By continuing to collect the special Easter eggs you have unlocked this bonus quest. Finishing everything is very difficult, so consider your choices carefully.

358.NAME: Changing the ancient city
358.DESCRIPTION: Even better news! Now, after renewing ancient pavement and walls you can sell them to obtain more free space!

3580.NAME: Bush extra task
3580.DESCRIPTION: The bush tasks were falsely given before collecting 15 egg bushes, thus we made this extra-extra quest specially for you!

359.NAME: For true ironmen I
359.DESCRIPTION: Special challenges for the best. Beware - they are very tough, but you will receive a baby peacock as a reward!

3595.NAME: Grill party
3595.DESCRIPTION: Paprick and friends plan to make a grilling event. Lemonade and fried sausage, that sort of thing.

3596.NAME: Fire for grilling
3596.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps some people will prefer to sit at campfire.

3597.NAME: Water faucet
3597.DESCRIPTION: Small stream will not work on large amount of gueasts.

3598.NAME: Grilling stuff
3598.DESCRIPTION: This event is not for making a soup.

3599.NAME: First guests
3599.DESCRIPTION: Scent of grilled meat can lures even the most shyest of neighbours.

36.NAME: Down with baobabs!
36.DESCRIPTION: I hate those blasted baobabs, let's chop them down!

360.NAME: For true ironmen II
360.DESCRIPTION: Special challenges for the best. Beware - they are very tough, but you will receive a baby peacock as a reward!

3600.NAME: Flood of guests
3600.DESCRIPTION: Did you really have so many neighbours? You sure are popular.

3601.NAME: Backyard  celebration
3601.DESCRIPTION: Is everyone comfortable? Is anything missing?

3602.NAME: Grand ball
3602.DESCRIPTION: The joyous event has even delicacies, so much for a small celebration... .

3603.NAME: Warm ball
3603.DESCRIPTION: Rain has stopped, vapor rises from the earth, a romantic fog.

3604.NAME: Crazy party
3604.DESCRIPTION: Party is going everywhere at once. Try holding out until sunrise.

3605.NAME: Activities I
3605.DESCRIPTION: A hot event! Too much chili? Boasting soon turns in to competition.

3606.NAME: Activities II
3606.DESCRIPTION: A hot event! Too much chili? Boasting soon turns in to competition.

3607.NAME: Friendly attitude
3607.DESCRIPTION: LT don't qualify,  no translation needed. (split difficulty ends here for LT)

3608.NAME: Organize festiveties
3608.DESCRIPTION: This is the main organizing quest, to finish this event, you need to finish all available grilling quests.

3609.NAME: Fool fix
3609.DESCRIPTION: Invisible for players. Pre-prepared in case of foolishness.

361.NAME: For true ironmen III
361.DESCRIPTION: Special challenges for the best. Beware - they are very tough, but you will receive a baby peacock as a reward!

3611.NAME: Mother's day 2021
3611.DESCRIPTION: Warm light shines trough the window, open your eyes, go find your mother, breakfast table is already set.

3612.NAME: Walk in a park
3612.DESCRIPTION: The air is so fragrant, hold on to your mothers hand and take a stroll outside.

3613.NAME: Afternoon nap
3613.DESCRIPTION: "Wake up little one, you fell asleep in your mothers arms."

3614.NAME: Self-entertainment
3614.DESCRIPTION: After a nap the landscape has changed, this is Festival island. (If you can not travel there buy a ship steering-wheel and press USE)

3615.NAME: Cleaning up
3615.DESCRIPTION: "Mom what to do with this thing? Where to put that thin? What about this one?"

3616.NAME: Games
3616.DESCRIPTION: Mother wipes her hands and is now ready to play with you. Spend this mother's day in warm radiance of your mother.

362.NAME: Improved clay pit
362.DESCRIPTION: The island is visited by engineers. Fulfill this task and you will be able to upgrade you clay pit (press Upgrade after finishing the tasks)

3620.NAME: Hockey camp
3620.DESCRIPTION: The Hockey'ania event is coming, local teams are heading to Hockey camp for training.

3621.NAME: Fan arrival
3621.DESCRIPTION: Oceania houses eight teams, you will have to put in an effort to gain supporters.

3622.NAME: Strategic decisions
3622.DESCRIPTION: You need a plan, this is hockey, not figure skating. Develop tactics.

3623.NAME: Preparing the team
3623.DESCRIPTION: Eight teams share this island curve favor towards you, make this island your home turf.

3624.NAME: Hockey pucks
3624.DESCRIPTION: The more fans, the more sponsors, and more pucks.

3625.NAME: Training regiment
3625.DESCRIPTION: Each of the team has his own training program, wining requires hard work.

3626.NAME: Team spirit
3626.DESCRIPTION: Island needs few improvements, your team puts effort to for this cause.

3627.NAME: 1st friendly match
3627.DESCRIPTION: The camp is meant to train together with other teams, first friendly match is versus “Roosters”.

3628.NAME: 2nd friendly match
3628.DESCRIPTION: Opponents “Peacocks” are not buff, but their fans are louder than an air horn.

3629.NAME: 3rd friendly match
3629.DESCRIPTION: Friendly match is meant for learning purposes. Team “Fox” has a playful mood.

3630.NAME: 4th friendly match
3630.DESCRIPTION: Ho, ho, ho, “Bears” ! This match is going to be good.

3631.NAME: 5th friendly match
3631.DESCRIPTION: Fans frequently visit matches with your team. Today you play “Meerkats”.

3632.NAME: 6th friendly match
3632.DESCRIPTION: Horrid team walks on ice, rugged, scarred and STRONG. What the hell has happened to team “Goat” ?

3633.NAME: 7th friendly match
3633.DESCRIPTION: “Toucans” clack their hockey sticks, so far in all games they have had an exceptionally good luck.

3634.NAME: Home game
3634.DESCRIPTION: Last training session before the big games, today we shall select the team members.

3635.NAME: Training camp
3635.DESCRIPTION: To gather collection with least effort you will need all three of these buildings.

3636.NAME: Hockey'ania
3636.DESCRIPTION: This is a bonus quest that will get done by itself if you do main Hockey quests.

3637.NAME: Hockey'ania II
3637.DESCRIPTION: Without bonuses the Hockey badges will accumulate slowly, chose your strategy.

3638.NAME: Hockey championship
3638.DESCRIPTION: Screw all other quests, this is the main quest. All other quests are simply extra tools.

3639.NAME: Hockey nut
3639.DESCRIPTION: You are crazy! Crazy about hockey, that's for sure.

3640.NAME: Falling meteorites
3640.DESCRIPTION: Bam, bam, bam. Sky is falling over Oceania, and one of the islands got damaged quite severly.

3641.NAME: Dispersing the heat
3641.DESCRIPTION: The entire island is sizzling, you will need quite a lot of water.

3642.NAME: Experimenting
3642.DESCRIPTION: The local household is rather strange, but people tend to be different.

3643.NAME: Thickets
3643.DESCRIPTION: After such clamor it is hard to tell if the island is lost or abandoned.

3644.NAME: Special value
3644.DESCRIPTION: Some things on this island need special care.

3645.NAME: Geyser plants
3645.DESCRIPTION: Farming is possible only in the four corners of this island. By chopping the trees you will gain extra working space

3646.NAME: Palmtree
3646.DESCRIPTION: Each corner has 12 workable tiles, 6 are empty and the other 6 have tropical palms on them.

3647.NAME: Finding path
3647.DESCRIPTION: The entire island is reduced to rubble, try to find a passage trough this mess.

3648.NAME: Salt crystals
3648.DESCRIPTION: This is extra task, after completing this task you will gain 50 gasoline.

3649.NAME: Future hope
3649.DESCRIPTION: It will be moths before geysers become still, and island becomes usable. At the moment leaving the island is for the best.

3650.NAME: Cup Qualification
3650.DESCRIPTION: The competition will start in the midst of summer heat, a bit unfortunate, but the trip to the island is not for free... .

3651.NAME: Summer cup 2021. I
3651.DESCRIPTION: Bronze disciplin is the easiest of the three. Finishing all Bronze tasks will give you the special snow globe. (Žaidynės)

3652.NAME: Summer cup 2021. II
3652.DESCRIPTION: Oceania cup is not just about doing stuff, it has also tasks that plunder your supplies.

3653.NAME: Summer cup 2021. III
3653.DESCRIPTION: Last three tasks, and the snow globe (Žaidynės) is yours.

3654.NAME: Summer cup 2021. IV
3654.DESCRIPTION: Silver disciplin has tasks that require clay and stone bricks, it is not suited for beginners.

3655.NAME: Summer cup 2021. V
3655.DESCRIPTION: This time walking around was made more challenging, since shore lines are not walkable.

3656.NAME: Summer cup 2021. VI
3656.DESCRIPTION: Early progress objects are long forgotten by veterans, cups provide interesting variety.

3657.NAME: Summer cup 2021. VII
3657.DESCRIPTION: To finish gold you need to have progress that has unlocked pickaxes for volcanic rocks.

3658.NAME: Summer cup 2021. VIII
3658.DESCRIPTION: Cup has lots of small knacks to keep in mind. Sometimes the production from workshop needs to be collected on cup island.

3659.NAME: Summer cup 2021. IX
3659.DESCRIPTION: Feedback is crutial, most folks liked winter cup. What is your input on mystery tasks?

3665.NAME: Adellas tasks
3665.DESCRIPTION: Adella is a bit bored, ask her to join the company of your friends.

3666.NAME: Charlottes tasks
3666.DESCRIPTION: Very social Charlotte wishes to know everything about everyone, she does not get to chatter with drylanders often.

3667.NAME: Delfinas tasks
3667.DESCRIPTION: Delfina is quite and shy, she is comfortable as it is. Watching the Ligo sunset is lovely.

3668.NAME: Kirk the Orca
3668.DESCRIPTION: Do not be misled, Orcas are ruthless killers, that is why this judge has three lovely assistants.

3671.NAME: Garlic hour
3671.DESCRIPTION: Paprick came to help fixing fence in your far away field, this will take some time.

3672.NAME: Garlic story A
3672.DESCRIPTION: While working with Papric, he tells where did this hammer come from.

3673.NAME: Garlic story B
3673.DESCRIPTION: Let us go to Garlic island, there i shall continue the story of garlic cliff.

3675.NAME: Garlic secret
3675.DESCRIPTION: By thwacking the garlic cliff with this hammer you can try to earn garlic heads. Try doing so, then cook them.

3676.NAME: Spliting the galic
3676.DESCRIPTION: You and Paprick have different ideas on how to use garlic. Fortunately there is plenty for both of you.

3677.NAME: Spice torture
3677.DESCRIPTION: Oh, no! This is just like tear gas, garlic seems to be extra spicy.

3678.NAME: Hammer ritual
3678.DESCRIPTION: Where did these hammers come from? Can you make more? Paprick explains that it is not possible.

3679.NAME: Ritual hammer
3679.DESCRIPTION: Four doubting you get thwacked with the hammer, at least you did not turn in to garlic.

3680.NAME: Cliff ritual
3680.DESCRIPTION: Not any old rock will do, the garlic cliff was blessed in a special manner.

3681.NAME: Haraiki opinion
3681.DESCRIPTION: Garlic snacks have attracted atention of Haraiki island rulers.

3682.NAME: Winged garlic
3682.DESCRIPTION: Flying orientating by garlic smell, pilot Aldo has shown interest about this spicy plant.

3684.NAME: Garlic-quacke
3684.DESCRIPTION: Garlic tasks, be it big or small are all around you, both on and off of Garlic island.

3685.NAME: Firewood chopping
3685.DESCRIPTION: Paprick helped you fix the fence, so how about you help Paprick with firewood?

3696.NAME: Origin of the riddle
3696.DESCRIPTION: The storm has washed ashore some stone plate with pointers, most text has faded, but you manage to read a portion of it.

37.NAME: Dig shells
37.DESCRIPTION: You can dig shells out of the ground. If you're out of money, just dig and you'll get some! Let's try!

3705.NAME: L cipher
3705.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the eight quests, half of the tasks text you will find here, the other half is written in 3 other [? cipher] quests.

3706.NAME: B cipher
3706.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the eight quests, half of the tasks text you will find here, the other half is written in 3 other [? cipher] quests.

3707.NAME: E cipher
3707.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the eight quests, half of the tasks text you will find here, the other half is written in 3 other [? cipher] quests.

3708.NAME: K cipher
3708.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the eight quests, half of the tasks text you will find here, the other half is written in 3 other [? cipher] quests.

3709.NAME: G cipher
3709.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the eight quests, half of the tasks text you will find here, the other half is written in 3 other [? cipher] quests.

3710.NAME: D cipher
3710.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the eight quests, half of the tasks text you will find here, the other half is written in 3 other [? cipher] quests.

3711.NAME: A cipher
3711.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the eight quests, half of the tasks text you will find here, the other half is written in 3 other [? cipher] quests.

3712.NAME: H cipher
3712.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the eight quests, half of the tasks text you will find here, the other half is written in 3 other [? cipher] quests.

3713.NAME: Decoding cipher I
3713.DESCRIPTION: Cipher consists of pictures and some symbols, some parts are more easy to understand.

3714.NAME: Decoding cipher II
3714.DESCRIPTION: According to cipher those players that have built stone bridge will need tall palms and wine latter on.

3715.NAME: Decoding cipher III
3715.DESCRIPTION: Next ciphers were more complicated, so further ciphers were broken in pieces to decode.

3716.NAME: Decoding cipher IV
3716.DESCRIPTION: This is a reference to that, and this text goes here... . Hmm, this is challenging.

3717.NAME: Decoding cipher V
3717.DESCRIPTION: The last bit cipher, you almost unlocked the code, this is the last decoding quest.

3718.NAME: Cryptic texts
3718.DESCRIPTION: To decode the caves mystery you need to find a way to open the obelisks three hidden compartments.

3720.NAME: Small addition
3720.DESCRIPTION: Sorry, this time quests went rather rough, but you still managed!

3721.NAME: Follow up
3721.DESCRIPTION: Some may have already filled the underground to the brim. That's alright, there is not need for much space.

3722.NAME: Riddles never end
3722.DESCRIPTION: Sorry, you need MORE free space.

3723.NAME: Take a guess
3723.DESCRIPTION: This format is nothing new, you know, quantities shown, but texts unknown.

3724.NAME: Last riddle
3724.DESCRIPTION: This will be the final trial.

3727.NAME: Introduction to learning
3727.DESCRIPTION: Trees grow rings, those usually show the tree trunk age and experience, this time the rings will form outside the tree trunk.

3728.NAME: Hobbies
3728.DESCRIPTION: In the free time you can check out other stuff on this island.

3729.NAME: Sitting at home
3729.DESCRIPTION: Starting with this quest, you will start earning School collection items while doing stuff on the island.

3730.NAME: Club activities
3730.DESCRIPTION: These quests give autumn bouquets. This is not the main quest line.

3731.NAME: More handraft
3731.DESCRIPTION: Sitting at home you learned all the theory, this year we emphasize on practical tasks.

3732.NAME: Stuff happens
3732.DESCRIPTION: Too enthusiastic smelting smelted your classroom. Remember, your safety is in your own hands.

3733.NAME: School routine
3733.DESCRIPTION: If you don't know where to spend your energy, try fishing in the Pit of ignorance. [note for translation, it really is fishing action] All the acquired questions you can solve latter.

3734.NAME: Serious attitude
3734.DESCRIPTION: To speed things up, each of these tasks will net you a chocolate.

3735.NAME: Science
3735.DESCRIPTION: You can learn thing both from books, and from practical attempts. Research materials can be found in the Pit of ignorance.

3736.NAME: Tutors
3736.DESCRIPTION: Owls know literature well, the Traveler has seen exotic animals and knows geography.

3737.NAME: Experts I
3737.DESCRIPTION: Help experts and you will receive few collection items. Remember school collection items are not found in the following actions themselves.

3738.NAME: Experts II
3738.DESCRIPTION: Help experts and you will receive few collection items. Remember school collection items are not found in the following actions themselves.

3739.NAME: Tests
3739.DESCRIPTION: Hopefully science experiments and collaboration with experts helped you prepare for this.

3740.NAME: Re-reading
3740.DESCRIPTION: I think i missed something, but what? Let's check the notes.

3741.NAME: Educating the palmtree
3741.DESCRIPTION: This is the main quest, your goal is to get nine sets of School collection

3742.NAME: Middle grade palmtree
3742.DESCRIPTION: Hei, it is time to continue Palmtree's story, first it must graduate middleschool.

3743.NAME: Youth power
3743.DESCRIPTION: Life abroad will help Palmtree to gather its thoughts.

3744.NAME: Invention time
3744.DESCRIPTION: These tasks are difficult and not obligatory. At the end there will be small nick-knacks.

3745.NAME: Palmtree friends
3745.DESCRIPTION: Company is more fun! Palmtree has brought friends of different education levels.

3746.NAME: Simpletons
3746.DESCRIPTION: Some of the friends are less educated. They will have simple jobs.

3747.NAME: Witted
3747.DESCRIPTION: Some friends were not so good at school, but still read books and are quite witted.

3748.NAME: Excellent palmtrees
3748.DESCRIPTION: Palmtree has returned in company of another quite excelent palmtree.

3749.NAME: Next generation
3749.DESCRIPTION: Generation change is a hope of a change for a better future.

3750.NAME: Steel Ironman I
3750.DESCRIPTION: True ironman has muscles of steel, eats nails and uses tin foil for a blanket.

3751.NAME: Steel Ironman II
3751.DESCRIPTION: You can not carry what you can not lift, and failure means you are not worthy of an iron armor.

3752.NAME: Steel Ironman III
3752.DESCRIPTION: Knight suit needs to be worn with straight spine, not crawling on the ground in shell like weak snail.

3756.NAME: Sea waves
3756.DESCRIPTION: The sea fluctuates and hisses, natives inform you that strange starfish have been seen.

3757.NAME: Wave island
3757.DESCRIPTION: Sea fluctuates but no starfish in sight, not even the ordinary ones.

3758.NAME: Conclusive data
3758.DESCRIPTION: According to data heavy waves will soon hit the Wave island, Fest island and Atafu island.

3759.NAME: Sheep observation A
3759.DESCRIPTION: Sheep have analysed the events, and discovered that special actions are needed to get starfishes.

3760.NAME: Sheep observation B
3760.DESCRIPTION: Sheep have analysed the events, and discovered that special actions are needed to get starfishes.

3761.NAME: Sheep observation C
3761.DESCRIPTION: Sheep have analysed the events, and discovered that special actions are needed to get starfishes.

3762.NAME: Foam pearls
3762.DESCRIPTION: Sheep have located a lead to solve this mistery.

3763.NAME: Other events
3763.DESCRIPTION: Starfishes can wait, you have other pending problems at the moment.

3764.NAME: Under water explorer
3764.DESCRIPTION: Sheep inform you that twist of fate was withing predictions.

3765.NAME: Sardine on island
3765.DESCRIPTION: Surfer Sardine Kain surfaces on the island.

3766.NAME: Nutty volcano visitor
3766.DESCRIPTION: Guess who dived under the volcano. This time surfer Jaw Mick looks more cooked than boiled.

3767.NAME: Practical Kelly
3767.DESCRIPTION: Medusa Kelly surfaced on Fest isle and instantly started cleaning up.

3768.NAME: Buck favours
3768.DESCRIPTION: North wind Buck still likes all living creatures, big and small.

3770.NAME: Delta's visit
3770.DESCRIPTION: While other surfers have just started surfacing, Rainbow Delta has already packed to visit your island.

3771.NAME: Sea hive
3771.DESCRIPTION: At last you realize that starfishes were collected prior by the diving surfers.

3772.NAME: Paprics curiousity
3772.DESCRIPTION: Some natives already have a special starfish, Paprick still has none.

3773.NAME: Colorful crown
3773.DESCRIPTION: Autumn leaf fall has decorated the earth in all sorts of red and gold colors. Work diligently and earn yourself a colorful crown.

3774.NAME: Cake for leafs
3774.DESCRIPTION: Remember, each of the autumn leaf sources has only 4 out of 6 leafs.

3775.NAME: Right leafs
3775.DESCRIPTION: There has been a crown long long ago, this time we switch from red to full colors.

3776.NAME: Making the crown
3776.DESCRIPTION: Last step of making the crown, you are almost there.

3779.NAME: Adventures of Seal
3779.DESCRIPTION: Twilight hour is coming, from the wall emerges a seal shaped ghost named Nemo.

3780.NAME: Scary cage
3780.DESCRIPTION: As usual, the monster day is a party, to which Nemo had baked ornaments for the past year.

3781.NAME: Hope in Hoplesness
3781.DESCRIPTION: To fix things you'll need a lot of effort. Nemo will support you mentally.

3782.NAME: First design
3782.DESCRIPTION: Melting the wax has become a routine. Time to build less-boring things.

3783.NAME: Ghost build
3783.DESCRIPTION: Can't be helped, if you wish to decorate, you need to do it with your own effort.

3784.NAME: Gardening magic
3784.DESCRIPTION: If you plant a chocolate you don't get a chocolate tree, but the seal insists you work in this direction.

3785.NAME: Animal enchanting
3785.DESCRIPTION: It would be so nice if decorations would eat wax and build themselves, just like animals. Try it.

3786.NAME: Horrifying work
3786.DESCRIPTION: Keep working, soon this place will have an excellent party look.

3787.NAME: Building wax
3787.DESCRIPTION: While you worked Nemo was reading some horror stories, and now the seal has some ideas.

3788.NAME: Farming wax
3788.DESCRIPTION: With a bit of effort the seal can raise the dead from the earth. Of course seal meant dead plants.

3789.NAME: Animal wax
3789.DESCRIPTION: Use wax and feed it to local animals. Seal already fed ducks, you feed other ghost animals.

3790.NAME: Wax decorations
3790.DESCRIPTION: There is still a large pile of unused wax in the corner. Nemo says, let's build even more!

3791.NAME: Spooky event
3791.DESCRIPTION: Nemo prases your work, indeed, not every decoration should be made of wax.

3792.NAME: Epilougue
3792.DESCRIPTION: Nemo is over joyed with the design. Underground looks spooky and comfortable.

3793.NAME: Disco underground
3793.DESCRIPTION: How did you get here? And i thought this would be an ideal spot for ghostly date.

3797.NAME: Spooky days!!!
3797.DESCRIPTION: Ghosts, hooray! Unbelievable, but Oceania players are rather happy, than scared of seeing ghosts.

3798.NAME: Spooky guests
3798.DESCRIPTION: Only few have noticed that underground has a secret bonus quest hidden somewhere.

3799.NAME: Spooky house
3799.DESCRIPTION: Turn on animation to see how the house becomes more and more spooky with each upgrade.

3800.NAME: I have a suspicion
3800.DESCRIPTION: Not a single ghost in sight, this is getting very, very, very suspicious, something big is comming.

3801.NAME: Rampaging plants
3801.DESCRIPTION: I did tell you that Nemo can raise plats from the dead. I was not kidding.

3824.NAME: Underwater world
3824.DESCRIPTION: Hey, Natives have decided to go snorkeling, do you wish to come as well?

3825.NAME: First snorkeling
3825.DESCRIPTION: Don't dive too deep on the first attempt. Let's stay in shallow waters.

3826.NAME: Oxygen shortage
3826.DESCRIPTION: Your enthusiasm burned your oxygen reserves quickly. Return to surface and collect more masks.

3827.NAME: Keep exploring
3827.DESCRIPTION: Let's dive in! Check out the underwater mysteries.

3828.NAME: Oxygen supplies
3828.DESCRIPTION: Turns out native named Turik broke his leg, you'll get his oxygen reserves.

3829.NAME: Deeper dive
3829.DESCRIPTION: What lies deeper, what will you discover next? Go deeper!

3830.NAME: Surfacing
3830.DESCRIPTION: Native Kadsija decided to bring her fish to sushi shop, do you wish to tag along?

3831.NAME: Twilight region
3831.DESCRIPTION: Hey, there are some fishes that were not seen in lesser depth, the deeper you go, the more you discover.

3832.NAME: Visit Turik
3832.DESCRIPTION: You can deliver the flowers you plucked to native Turik, high time you visited him. (Translation note - there was a task where avatar picked flowers)

3833.NAME: Fifth dive
3833.DESCRIPTION: Next time you will need to bring some light, at this depth it gets eerie. This time we will manage without.

3834.NAME: Darkness underwater
3834.DESCRIPTION: Figures, you have masks, but now there is the light issue. Let's figure out the darkness problem.

3835.NAME: Pressing in to darkness
3835.DESCRIPTION: Light helps a lot, you see a lot of new paths and other new inhabitants of the deeps.

3836.NAME: Turik's recovery
3836.DESCRIPTION: You can deliver the flowers you plucked to native Turik, high time you visited him. (Translation note - there was a task where avatar picked flowers)

3837.NAME: Underwater dance
3837.DESCRIPTION: What else can you do under water? How about mess around? Like walking upside down.

3838.NAME: Recognition
3838.DESCRIPTION: Sea dwellers liked your dance and as a gratitude they moved some rocks and weeds for your convenience.

3839.NAME: Water bubbles
3839.DESCRIPTION: Don't worry about masks, fishes cleared aeration holes, now you have air under water.

3840.NAME: Last dive
3840.DESCRIPTION: One more time, and then back to farming.

3841.NAME: Special flowers
3841.DESCRIPTION: This is a bonus quest that gives special fishing clothes.

3842.NAME: Lobster mission
3842.DESCRIPTION: This quest on its own is not worth much, the purpouse of this quest is to advance Bordom quest.

3843.NAME: Lobster mission
3843.DESCRIPTION: This quest on its own is not worth much, the purpouse of this quest is to advance Bordom quest.

3844.NAME: Lobster mission
3844.DESCRIPTION: This quest on its own is not worth much, the purpouse of this quest is to advance Bordom quest.

3845.NAME: Lobster mission
3845.DESCRIPTION: This quest on its own is not worth much, the purpouse of this quest is to advance Bordom quest.

3846.NAME: Lobster mission
3846.DESCRIPTION: This quest on its own is not worth much, the purpouse of this quest is to advance Bordom quest.

3847.NAME: Lobster mission
3847.DESCRIPTION: This quest on its own is not worth much, the purpouse of this quest is to advance Bordom quest.

3848.NAME: Lobster mission
3848.DESCRIPTION: This quest on its own is not worth much, the purpouse of this quest is to advance Bordom quest.

3849.NAME: Lobster mission
3849.DESCRIPTION: This quest on its own is not worth much, the purpouse of this quest is to advance Bordom quest.

3850.NAME: Bordom quest
3850.DESCRIPTION: Warning! This quest is ment only for those who usually do quests too quickly. The prize is another Reef decoration, identical to the Diving questline's main prize. This means you can have two of those.

3857.NAME: Winter wonders
3857.DESCRIPTION: In the chilly winter night a winter star shines, and in the distance a crystal bell chimes.

3858.NAME: Warm and echoing
3858.DESCRIPTION: Gaze upon this winter sky, does it not compel you to spend an entire night laying under this magnificent dome?

3859.NAME: Digging the snow
3859.DESCRIPTION: Keep on working and do not forget to ring the miracle bell once in a while.

3860.NAME: Aurora borealis
3860.DESCRIPTION: To keep a straight line the best way would be to dig along the coast. Reload the page for additional benefit.

3861.NAME: Finding hats
3861.DESCRIPTION: Somewhere under the snow there are hats in three different colors, five hats for each color.

3862.NAME: Eating the snow
3862.DESCRIPTION: Each of the grass bushes hides a horned animal, since all of them like to feast on it.

3863.NAME: Snowy pear
3863.DESCRIPTION: It is a special kind of bush that transforms the growing icicles in to edible pear fruits. Cold and delicious.

3864.NAME: Ice sculpture
3864.DESCRIPTION: Such decorations were seen a looong time ago, can't even remember where.

3865.NAME: Sky decorations
3865.DESCRIPTION: This is the main quest of the winter island. Light up the sky and you will receive the special winter pear tree.

3866.NAME: Party hats
3866.DESCRIPTION: Strange isn't it? the cubs are cute no matter if they are kittens, chicks or small trees.

3867.NAME: Icy palmtrees
3867.DESCRIPTION: Without this quest you will not be able to fully illuminate the winter sky, there is no way around it.

3868.NAME: Sky sleigh
3868.DESCRIPTION: Reindeers circle the world, picking up Christmas cards along the way.

3870.NAME: Hazelnut storm
3870.DESCRIPTION: Hey, the cloud is pouring down something completely different from snow.

3872.NAME: Surprise!
3872.DESCRIPTION: Let us make the transition in to a new year in to a party!

3873.NAME: New Year's bout
3873.DESCRIPTION: New Year is a half tiger, half party event, let us entertain both options.

3874.NAME: Tiger tribe I of II
3874.DESCRIPTION: According to oriental calendar  year 2022 is Tiger of the water sign.

3875.NAME: Celebrations I of II
3875.DESCRIPTION: While you still can, let's get loud. You can sit and chat latter when the commotion has died down.

3876.NAME: Tiger tribe II of II
3876.DESCRIPTION: Proper tiger year starts in february, when the oriental calendar changes, but cat's can't be forced to follow the rules.

3877.NAME: Celebrations II of II
3877.DESCRIPTION: Now for the chatting part, make some topic to gossip about.

3878.NAME: Choose a prize
3878.DESCRIPTION: This is what you strived for! New years prize is not something random, you can choose what compels you the most.

3879.NAME: Nutty follow up
3879.DESCRIPTION: Another bonus quest, unrelated to other quests, yes, there will be prizes.

3880.NAME: Birch island
3880.DESCRIPTION: Not far from Atafu island there is an island with winter-looking trees.

3881.NAME: Check birch forest
3881.DESCRIPTION: Look where you are going the island is not explored, you don't know if the island has snakes or scorpions, or not.

3882.NAME: Forest animals
3882.DESCRIPTION: Animal paths reveille that island is inhabited by birds and mammals, interesting!

3883.NAME: Living inside forest
3883.DESCRIPTION: Bears can live in lairs, owls in hollowed trees, but where will you rest?

3884.NAME: Boletus and others
3884.DESCRIPTION: See a mushroom? Pick it up!

3885.NAME: Forest inhabitants
3885.DESCRIPTION: You found the pawprint owners, after chopping trees, they hid in the bushes nearby.

3886.NAME: Fishing
3886.DESCRIPTION: Throw a hook in local waters, check what you can catch.

3887.NAME: Forest household
3887.DESCRIPTION: Design the island according to your tastes. Plan your household on this island.

3888.NAME: Forest's ruler
3888.DESCRIPTION: You are the owner of this forest, but will other animals agree to your statement.

3889.NAME: Other animals
3889.DESCRIPTION: To make plantations you would have to clear the tree stumps, so, let's stick to just animal growth.

3890.NAME: Conquering  forest
3890.DESCRIPTION: You forgot to collect data on what goes on inside the forest during the night.

3891.NAME: Basket of sweets
3891.DESCRIPTION: An idea popped up, publish your findings in the local newspaper.

3892.NAME: Cup Qualification
3892.DESCRIPTION: The biggest winter competition 2022 has almost started. Alas, you need to qualify first, so get right on it!

3893.NAME: 2022 Winter Cup I
3893.DESCRIPTION: Bronze level quests are aimed at plank era, the challenges will involve simplest of materials.

3894.NAME: 2022 Winter Cup II
3894.DESCRIPTION: Oceania cup is a challenge of both wits and stamina, not all quests can be done by force.

3895.NAME: 2022 Winter Cup III
3895.DESCRIPTION: Look at it how you like, facts do not change. All snowballs give more reputation per energy spent, than any other short termed quest.

3896.NAME: 2022 Winter Cup IV
3896.DESCRIPTION: Silver level quests will require usage of clay era or higher workshop, without it, it will be impossible to finish.

3897.NAME: 2022 Winter Cup V
3897.DESCRIPTION: Cup challenge changes each year, unlucky for you, this time there are no riddles, in cases of riddles the requirements are lowered.

3902.NAME: 2022 Winter Cup VI
3902.DESCRIPTION: Some things never change, like the fact, that only those trees planted by you will grow bigger.

3903.NAME: 2022 Winter Cup VII
3903.DESCRIPTION: You will need bigger resource reserves for gold level quests. This is the most difficult questline.

3904.NAME: 2022 Winter Cup VIII
3904.DESCRIPTION: The development of Cup quests is always based on experience of previous Cup challenges. The quests adapt to player capabilities.

3905.NAME: 2022 Winter Cup IX
3905.DESCRIPTION: In competition for the Cup free space is always an issue. Try sowing fields on paths, they are walkable after all.

3906.NAME: Cup 2022 reminder
3906.DESCRIPTION: Bronze, silver, gold, the disciplines only reward a snowball for each category. To fight for the cup you need to do THIS particular quest.

3907.NAME: Shoebill challenge
3907.DESCRIPTION: Don't doubt it, shoebill is a real bird. Finish his challenge an the bird will travel with you to your home island.

3935.NAME: Female days
3935.DESCRIPTION: March is just outside the window, time to show some care for all the world ladies.

3936.NAME: Vibrant tulips
3936.DESCRIPTION: Festival island has spring in the air, you will find about it soon enough.

3937.NAME: Eskimo ladie
3937.DESCRIPTION: From snowy fields a lady has come to visit you.

3938.NAME: Arabian ladie
3938.DESCRIPTION: A lady from the desert lands has arrived.

3939.NAME: Full bloom tulips
3939.DESCRIPTION: Such a warm wind, even the heavy sleepers of the tulips will wake up now.

3940.NAME: Strange shop
3940.DESCRIPTION: You have found a foreign lady in the shop twice already. Look closely, there are three more foreigners there.

3941.NAME: Worlds ladies
3941.DESCRIPTION: Under these blue skies are so many ladies, and today we will honor them all.

3942.NAME: Small surprise
3942.DESCRIPTION: While you were at Paprick's place gifting tulips to his family, the island sprouted a surprise.

3943.NAME: Last surprise
3943.DESCRIPTION: Visit Paprick again, than re-visit Festival island.

3944.NAME: Oceania - 11
3944.DESCRIPTION: It's been 11 years since Oceania game was first launched, let's celebrate!

3945.NAME: Anniversary farmer
3945.DESCRIPTION: Before you get to the cake, you need to do the most basic things in Oceania. Farming is essential.

3946.NAME: Anniversary tamer
3946.DESCRIPTION: Before you get to the cake, you need to do the most basic things in Oceania. Animal care is essential.

3947.NAME: Anniversary builder
3947.DESCRIPTION: Before you get to the cake, you need to do the most basic things in Oceania. Building is essential.

3948.NAME: Tobie's turtles
3948.DESCRIPTION: Oh, no! Who unlocked this wacky isle? Toby has found a way to the Puzzle isle.

3950.NAME: Overgrown walls
3950.DESCRIPTION: If you finish this quest you will earn four corner stones to put as decoration to compliment the 11th celebration decoration.

3951.NAME: Working on isle
3951.DESCRIPTION: More work, no prize? You are absolutely correct! :)

3952.NAME: Anniversary 11
3952.DESCRIPTION: Do this one quest and the 11th anniversary decoration will be yours.

3953.NAME: Fiering the fireworks
3953.DESCRIPTION: A bit late, but still relevant, are you ready to shoot some fireworks? The island even has a cannon for this.

3954.NAME: Carousel
3954.DESCRIPTION: Anniversary is the time some old artwork gets recovered, it turns out Carousel had a bit bigger idea going.

3955.NAME: Carousel II
3955.DESCRIPTION: Slowly the baobab is turning into a carousel.

3956.NAME: Carousel III
3956.DESCRIPTION: You keep hearing about carousel, but thus far it's all about baobabs, strange.

3957.NAME: Carousel IV of III
3957.DESCRIPTION: This is an extra-extra quest, do it and 15 saws and 15 fishing nets will be yours.

3958.NAME: Extension
3958.DESCRIPTION: Do not worry, once the timer runs out, everyone that had done at least the first birthday quest will be given extra time. All quests (except the 1st one) will end on April 6th.

3971.NAME: Grim Easter
3971.DESCRIPTION: Dark clouds cover the easter bunny isle, perhaps there will be no easter, since bunny can't think of colorful ideas.

3972.NAME: Black and white film
3972.DESCRIPTION: The winter snow has washed away all of the colors leaving only gray emptiness behind.

3973.NAME: Aaaapchiiii (sneezing) !!!!!
3973.DESCRIPTION: Easter bunny is allergic to white color, white snow and white narcissus flowers.

3974.NAME: Sunny days
3974.DESCRIPTION: After a bit of sunshine narcissus flowers grow like crazy. Do this quest and additional 15 helpful bunnies will appear.

3975.NAME: Painting the isle
3975.DESCRIPTION: Everything used to have color, what happened after this winter?

3976.NAME: Color selection A
3976.DESCRIPTION: Emptiness all around, because bunny stored away all the dreadful and colorless things. Choose three of the coloring quests.

3977.NAME: Color selection B
3977.DESCRIPTION: Emptiness all around, because bunny stored away all the dreadful and colorless things. Choose three of the coloring quests.

3978.NAME: Color selection C
3978.DESCRIPTION: Emptiness all around, because bunny stored away all the dreadful and colorless things. Choose three of the coloring quests.

3979.NAME: Color selection D
3979.DESCRIPTION: Emptiness all around, because bunny stored away all the dreadful and colorless things. Choose three of the coloring quests.

3980.NAME: Color the paths
3980.DESCRIPTION: This is one of the five coloring choices, unlike decorations, path tiles were not removed.

3981.NAME: Colorful flowers
3981.DESCRIPTION: The locked away flowers used to be red, if you do this quest you will receive one golden hen for the main task.

3982.NAME: Blue ant
3982.DESCRIPTION: Arguably this is the best decoration, the ant strains its ears to hear of your opinion.

3983.NAME: Rainbow mushroom
3983.DESCRIPTION: Main prize for the golden hen quest is a rainbow mushrooms and one giant rainbow mushroom.

3984.NAME: Painting ladybugs
3984.DESCRIPTION: By doing any one of the four selection quests (except paths) the rabbit will put some decorations on the isle.

3985.NAME: Golden hens
3985.DESCRIPTION: The main and the most important quest. Once you get your golden hens, please b

3991.NAME: Flower pea
3991.DESCRIPTION: Flower pea used to bloom pretty, now the plant has taken roots in the Oceania sands.

3992.NAME: Anton the pea
3992.DESCRIPTION: The Flower pea has three kids in the pod, Anton, Lucy and Bebe. This is Anton's tale.

3993.NAME: Craftsman Anton
3993.DESCRIPTION: No place is free or secure from Anton's imagination and handy work.

3994.NAME: Anton rolled
3994.DESCRIPTION: Anton will remain himself no matter what, that's just being Anton.

3995.NAME: Anton's crafts
3995.DESCRIPTION: Bricks hidden under the table were discovered and confiscated. Sorry Anton.

3996.NAME: Anton the Artist
3996.DESCRIPTION: Please please, please! I need to borrow hammer and nails. What is Anton up to?

3997.NAME: Food for miner
3997.DESCRIPTION: Please go to the freshly digged hole in the shed and tell Anton it is dinner time.

3998.NAME: Anton's greetings
3998.DESCRIPTION: Anton is a good pea, sometimes naughty, but that's because he is still young.

3999.NAME: Lucy the pea
3999.DESCRIPTION: The Flower pea has three kids in the pod, Anton, Lucy and Bebe. This is Lucy's tale.

4.NAME: Gather wood
4.DESCRIPTION: Gather wood, using the newly created axe, so you can repair your broken raft.

4000.NAME: Lucy the gardner
4000.DESCRIPTION: Pea rolls around the Narcissus and enjoys the smell. Lucy wishes to grow flowers.

4001.NAME: The WHY Lucy
4001.DESCRIPTION: Lucy has lots of questions, for example, if moon and sun are both up, is the sky brighter or dimmer?

4002.NAME: Perceptive Lucy
4002.DESCRIPTION: Lucy asks whenever she spots something new, but she has good memory and never asks twice.

4003.NAME: Talanted Lucy
4003.DESCRIPTION: A cute dress would suit Lucy, lately she spins on her heel making the skirt dance around.

4004.NAME: Lucy the traveler
4004.DESCRIPTION: Lucy was making preparations for diving and traveling, hence the weird questions.

4005.NAME: Lucy in terrarium
4005.DESCRIPTION: The peas are visiting savanna, Lucy squeals in joy.

4006.NAME: Bebe the pea
4006.DESCRIPTION: The Flower pea has three kids in the pod, Anton, Lucy and Bebe. This is Bebe's tale.

4007.NAME: Bebe and birds
4007.DESCRIPTION: Bebe fell asleep while feeding hedgehogs, but they rolled the pea home, so all is well.

4008.NAME: Bebe rafts
4008.DESCRIPTION: Toby is informed that Bebe is trying to sneak away to visit him. Soon the raft stealthily enters the waters.

4009.NAME: Educate Bebe
4009.DESCRIPTION: Bebe, Bebe, did you ask for permission to visit Toby? Your mother was worried, when you left without a word.

4010.NAME: Bebe in rain
4010.DESCRIPTION: Dark clouds cover Bebe's heart, the peas could not agree on something.

4011.NAME: Bebe learns
4011.DESCRIPTION: Anton, Anton, Bebe is still a small pea, and you should of tough him instead of criticizing him.

4012.NAME: Pea friendship
4012.DESCRIPTION: Small and big peas, they are all still kids, after the rain comes sun, even if it is the middle of the night.

4013.NAME: Pea mother
4013.DESCRIPTION: Pea flower will always love her little peas from all of her heart.

4014.NAME: Listen to the joy
4014.DESCRIPTION: Let the mother tell her stories, it is her day of the year, she likes to share her pea tales a lot.

4015.NAME: Pea island
4015.DESCRIPTION: The pea flower isle has plenty of space for the little ones to roll around.

4017.NAME: Salty the Rat
4017.DESCRIPTION: A leaf boat has washed on your shore, it was driven by Salty the Rat.

4018.NAME: Sweet diet
4018.DESCRIPTION: Mr. Rat is upset, he has suffered enough by eating fruits only on other islands.

4019.NAME: Sweets hater
4019.DESCRIPTION: No fishing rod, no choice in food, he had to eat only sweet things, oh, the horror!

4020.NAME: Savory island
4020.DESCRIPTION: Salty's mouth starts to water, the spicy island is not far.

4021.NAME: Burned island
4021.DESCRIPTION: Nose of Salty did not lie, there is indeed burned aroma.

4022.NAME: Rising tide
4022.DESCRIPTION: Fishes were not washed out without reason, this island has heavy tides.

4023.NAME: Rad on lookout
4023.DESCRIPTION: Clouds had not yet dispersed, but Salty the Rat launched himself forward.

4024.NAME: Burried treasure
4024.DESCRIPTION: Nose hints that under the fertile brown dirt there is savory treasure.

4025.NAME: Digging in
4025.DESCRIPTION: While you were splitting rocks, Salty was digging in the dirt. Oh, look, a tractor.

4026.NAME: Savory treasure
4026.DESCRIPTION: The rat has digged up something, no time to go home, we have to plant these garlic heads NOW!

4027.NAME: Salty guest
4027.DESCRIPTION: Mr. Salty the Rat has helped a lot, but you have done excelent work as well.

4028.NAME: Peel the garlic
4028.DESCRIPTION: Salty was forced to eat sweets on the Fruit island. Even garlics there were chocolates in gold wrapping.

4034.NAME: Bird gear
4034.DESCRIPTION: At first glance it does not look like the island has any gears washed ashore.

4035.NAME: Sticky bolts
4035.DESCRIPTION: Some recovered parts were sticky, this hints on the next place to check.

4036.NAME: Gears
4036.DESCRIPTION: Paprick tells you where he found the gears he gave you.

4037.NAME: Shortage
4037.DESCRIPTION: Missing pieces are more than recovered gears. Let us check othter islands.

4038.NAME: Crazy heat
4038.DESCRIPTION: Did someone leave the oven on? Heat washes over your island and does not subside even at night.

4039.NAME: Prolonged heat
4039.DESCRIPTION: Paprick came to see you, because he also is worried about this heat.

4040.NAME: Gear isle
4040.DESCRIPTION: After collecting data, you manage to find the gear island.

4041.NAME: Sun heat
4041.DESCRIPTION: To turn off the heat you will need to force sun gears to start working, to finaly achieve sunset.

4042.NAME: Wind-up keys
4042.DESCRIPTION: Gears are in place, but nothing happens, the mechanism lacks power to move.

4043.NAME: Island mechanics I
4043.DESCRIPTION: No matter how many times you start it, the mechanism runs to a halt.

4044.NAME: Island mechanics II
4044.DESCRIPTION: After checking everything, you need to wind up the springs to fully restore the islands ticking.

4045.NAME: Counter weights
4045.DESCRIPTION: You recovered some pendlums from the clocks you winded up. I think these chameleon are intended for th trees.

4046.NAME: Last fixe
4046.DESCRIPTION: Pull back the springs a bit more and the island will start running like a clock.

4047.NAME: Summer Qualification
4047.DESCRIPTION: To deter pirates, before going to stadium island, prove you are not one.

4048.NAME: Summer cup 2022 I
4048.DESCRIPTION: Bronze is a good preview for little players what the cup is all about.

4049.NAME: Summer cup 2022 II
4049.DESCRIPTION: All roads on the island are small player friendly, advanced axe is not necessary.

4050.NAME: Summer cup 2022 III
4050.DESCRIPTION: By doing this quest you will get Bronze snow globe, and that's 200 reputations easy.

4051.NAME: Summer cup 2022 IV
4051.DESCRIPTION: Silver discipline is for all players who have seen the large ship on Atafu island.

4052.NAME: Summer cup 2022 V
4052.DESCRIPTION: Some quests require time, other need bulk of pre-prepared resources or energy.

4053.NAME: Summer cup 2022 VI
4053.DESCRIPTION: If you find quests difficult, you can always try doing other cup quests first.

4054.NAME: Summer cup 2022 VII
4054.DESCRIPTION: No riddle quests this time, but still you might read the tasks wrongly.

4055.NAME: Summer cup 2022 VIII
4055.DESCRIPTION: You can meet a total of 7 shy strangers on the cup island, but only one per day.

4056.NAME: Summer cup 2022 IX
4056.DESCRIPTION: Don't forget to put decorations once done. Since island will sink you can earn extra reputation.

4057.NAME: Mark the Markhor 1 of 2
4057.DESCRIPTION: Hey dude, i will chill on this island, i got tired setting up all of the competition.

4058.NAME: Mark the Markhor 2 of 2
4058.DESCRIPTION: Bike will let you move faster by 33%, thus you can try to outrun mosquitoes you ticked off.

4059.NAME: Reminder
4059.DESCRIPTION: Only those who earn all three snow globes can compete for the trophy, and the trophy count is not infinite.

4060.NAME: Mosquitos, man
4060.DESCRIPTION: Help your friend in any of these tasks and i'll swat 135 mosquitos, so you could buy horns.

4061.NAME: Towards the unknown
4061.DESCRIPTION: Paprick won the lottery and got a cruise, but oh, no, his wife got sick. You shall attend the trip in his stead.

4062.NAME: Traveling with submarine
4062.DESCRIPTION: A submarine enters the pier, the place we are going does not have conventional water routes.

4063.NAME: Green field
4063.DESCRIPTION: Hurricane dropped you off in another location of the sand fields. Poke the small twister if you wish to go home.

4064.NAME: Temple clearing
4064.DESCRIPTION: I think i have seen something like this before. Everything is possible, it's just hidden.

4065.NAME: Mowing time
4065.DESCRIPTION: Reeds have been unearthed from the sand, bugs have started mowing the fields, like they had planned.

4066.NAME: Workaround
4066.DESCRIPTION: Wait, did you empty the temple? One of the things there will sure come in handy.

4067.NAME: Green sun
4067.DESCRIPTION: If you think about it, what did your friend look for in this forgotten place?

4068.NAME: Half-island
4068.DESCRIPTION: This area is a lot smaller than the previous ones, and there are no bugs to help move forward, now what?

4069.NAME: Under the submarine
4069.DESCRIPTION: Moving trough the tunnel you find traveling submarine that was trying to locate you. I guess the party is over?

4070.NAME: Squid's dragonflies 1
4070.DESCRIPTION: Priest Screamy Squid will need some thing to make a powerful twister that can blow away the sand.

4071.NAME: Squid's dragonflies 2
4071.DESCRIPTION: Priest sat down in the shade and used mortar and pestle to grind some green powder.

4072.NAME: Squid's dragonflies 3
4072.DESCRIPTION: Sitting down with a fishing rod in his hand Squid starts to mumble something.

4073.NAME: Squid's dragonflies 2 1/2
4073.DESCRIPTION: Although Squid is the natures friend, but even friends bicker sometimes.

4074.NAME: Squid's dragonflies 3 1/2
4074.DESCRIPTION: Squid holds up both dragonfly and damselfly, hmm, which one works better?

4075.NAME: Dragonfly hurricane
4075.DESCRIPTION: Your native friend has found the solution for blowing away the sand, let us test it.

4076.NAME: Lizards
4076.DESCRIPTION: No way forward or backward? Perhaps this will change as things progress.

4077.NAME: Twisting the hurricane
4077.DESCRIPTION: When you spin the hurricane it no longer disappears.

4078.NAME: Red lair
4078.DESCRIPTION: Red bugs were hidden right around the corner, but hey are afraid of bats.

4079.NAME: Continue, continue
4079.DESCRIPTION: We have almost reached the end of the green bug story, there is only a little part that remains to be recovered.

4080.NAME: Friendly twister
4080.DESCRIPTION: The wind created by the bugs is slowly starting to cool off the island.

4081.NAME: Calm the hurricane
4081.DESCRIPTION: The wind howls in full force, i think we have caused a different kind of a problem.

4083.NAME: Feeding colibris
4083.DESCRIPTION: Another vacation, who will watch the pets at home ? Good thing that colibri birds are fun.

4084.NAME: Strange bird
4084.DESCRIPTION: Feathers and prints on the ground, I think Oceania has not seen such bird yet.

4085.NAME: Bird trouble
4085.DESCRIPTION: Can't stop dreaming of flight, but, oh, no wind snatched the kite away.

4086.NAME: Storm brewing
4086.DESCRIPTION: Dark clouds coming, dark clouds provide kites more often, but poking them is real risky buisnes.

4087.NAME: Kiwi friends 1 of 2
4087.DESCRIPTION: How about i call my friends over? The more the merrier.

4088.NAME: Kiwi friends 2 of 2
4088.DESCRIPTION: Other Kiwis are hear, and the kites looks awesome. No surprise, soon the sky is full of runaway kites.

4089.NAME: Small walkers
4089.DESCRIPTION: Kiwi does not let you pet him, your hands are full of static shock. After this quest you can also buy a Kiwi in the shop.

409.NAME: Consulting with an engineer
409.DESCRIPTION: It seems that the lighthouse will need various parts. You will need to upgrade your workshop. For that you will need an engineer

4091.NAME: Cube's friendship
4091.DESCRIPTION: Discover what does the little cube like and perhaps you can persuade him to come out.

4092.NAME: Foamy  friendship
4092.DESCRIPTION: Foamy is found more often near the well, but sometimes it wanders off quite a bit from the water.

4093.NAME: Grass muncher  friendship
4093.DESCRIPTION: Predators can be tricked with meat, but what can you use to lure critter that only eats leaves?

4094.NAME: Snail friendship
4094.DESCRIPTION: Snail has the look of a critter from another planet, the trait is similar to other bugs.

4095.NAME: Cyclop's  friendship
4095.DESCRIPTION: Sand cyclopes live only in these parts, no wonder green bugs came here.

4096.NAME: Kittens friendship
4096.DESCRIPTION: Sand kitten is one of the most friendly creatures in this area.

4097.NAME: Cruncher's friendship
4097.DESCRIPTION: Cruncher is too busy munching down anything and everything, so it does not wander around much.

4098.NAME: Axolotl friendship
4098.DESCRIPTION: After some thought, you definitely saw axolotls trough submarines illuminators.

4099.NAME: Friend of friends
4099.DESCRIPTION: While you were busy, other critter besides green bugs popped up. Green bugs are just visitors.

41.NAME: Moving buildings
41.DESCRIPTION: Learn to move buildings by setting them in a different position

410.NAME: Engineer's help I of III
410.DESCRIPTION: You've found engineer Jarno Metal from Antarctica. Offer him some help and he might help you!

4100.NAME: Nobody is here
4100.DESCRIPTION: You think almost everything is done, but wind still howls, perhaps the green bugs know more.

4101.NAME: Daily friend
4101.DESCRIPTION: Every day you will receive two quests, each of these will encourage some critters to emerge from the sand.

4102.NAME: Catch friend
4102.DESCRIPTION: This time you can get the collection only by doing daily quests and catching critter on field.

4103.NAME: Continue trough sand
4103.DESCRIPTION: If you work smart, you can end up with plenty of reputation for relatively small effort.

411.NAME: Ghostly visitors
411.DESCRIPTION: Oceania is haunted! Luckily, the ghosts don't come often and only want some candy.

412.NAME: Engineer's help III
412.DESCRIPTION: You've found engineer Jarno Metal from Antarctica. Offer him some help and he might help you!

4120.NAME: Study time
4120.DESCRIPTION: Education time is upon us, still, some would wish they could dodge this horror, is there no way?

4121.NAME: Secret school
4121.DESCRIPTION: No matter how you turn, you sill ended up in a school, but this one is a bit different.

4122.NAME: Whole subject
4122.DESCRIPTION: There are six wise owls and there are six main subjects here.

4123.NAME: Collection of knowledge
4123.DESCRIPTION: Owls can teach you as much, as you can comprehend. Return to owls once you do everything.

4124.NAME: Difficult task
4124.DESCRIPTION: I hope you did write all of that down? If not, you will have to poke in the dark.

413.NAME: Engineer's help II of III
413.DESCRIPTION: You've found engineer Jarno Metal from Antarctica. Offer him some help and he might help you!

4137.NAME: Sport C
4137.DESCRIPTION: Testing time, let us see, what have you learned.

4138.NAME: Science C
4138.DESCRIPTION: Todays topic is counterweights and adhesion.

4139.NAME: Nature C
4139.DESCRIPTION: Nature explorers used to draw stuff, now they use photo cameras.

414.NAME: Hunt for pliers I of III
414.DESCRIPTION: The new workshop will need parts. Let's begin with pliers for the tool-box

4140.NAME: Languafe C
4140.DESCRIPTION: Synonyms, antonyms, homonyms a simple subject, or is it?

4141.NAME: Mathematics C
4141.DESCRIPTION: You will need a drawing compass, ruler and notebook.

4142.NAME: Art C
4142.DESCRIPTION: Music and art go hand in hand, but you only need one to express your soul.

4143.NAME: Sport D
4143.DESCRIPTION: Animal school has poor selection of athletes to send to regional competition.

4144.NAME: Science D
4144.DESCRIPTION: This time science instructor has so much to say, that he hands half of it to math teacher.

4145.NAME: Nature D
4145.DESCRIPTION: You can measure individual parts of nature, but you must keep the whole picture.

4146.NAME: Lannguage D
4146.DESCRIPTION: The summer book list had wide variety, so it could suit most tastes.

4147.NAME: Mathematics D
4147.DESCRIPTION: All calculations in science are done with math. Thus, let us do science today.

4148.NAME: Arts D
4148.DESCRIPTION: Even arts have science, painter knows what liquids to add into his paint.

4149.NAME: Pay slim
4149.DESCRIPTION: Forgot to write? Sly fox can sell  you the questions but not the answers. This quest has help purpose only!

415.NAME: Hunt for pliers II of III
415.DESCRIPTION: There are rumors that pliers have fallen out of a plane on the largest island in Oceania

4151.NAME: School continues
4151.DESCRIPTION: After learning the basics, school no longer seems a dark place. Let us continue in Day school.

4152.NAME: Monday morning
4152.DESCRIPTION: Week has started slowly. Fortunately first class is sports, so you can arrive in your sports suit.

4153.NAME: Tuesday morning
4153.DESCRIPTION: A bit overslept, but not a big deal, if you use bike, you can still make it.

4154.NAME: Wednesday morning
4154.DESCRIPTION: Cloudy, possible rain, better take an umbrella for this 15 minute walk.

4155.NAME: Thursday morning
4155.DESCRIPTION: The umbrella still hangs in dressing room, the morning is a bit cold.

4156.NAME: Friday morning
4156.DESCRIPTION: Everyone is happy, weekend means relaxation for both kids and school staff.

4157.NAME: Next day morning
4157.DESCRIPTION: The week has so many days, that you have no idea why are you in school today.

4158.NAME: Monday evening
4158.DESCRIPTION: Second half of the day ends quietly, nobody calls you to blackboard.

4159.NAME: Tuesday evening
4159.DESCRIPTION: After school some classmates wish to ride your bicycle.

416.NAME: Hunt for pliers III
416.DESCRIPTION: The pliers have been found by a hermit. But he will only exchange them for a reward

4160.NAME: Wednesday evening
4160.DESCRIPTION: The clouds have dispersed, let's try not to forget the umbrella at school.

4161.NAME: Thursday evening
4161.DESCRIPTION: Morning chill got canceled by too hot of an afternoon. Why did i bring my coat?

4162.NAME: Friday evening
4162.DESCRIPTION: The current topic is boring, in order to not fall asleep, you flip the pages to a more entertaining part of the book.

4163.NAME: Next day evening
4163.DESCRIPTION: This has got to be a nightmare, it makes no sense that after a school day you get another school day! Madness!

4164.NAME: Biology day
4164.DESCRIPTION: The entirety of the day is dedicated to a single subject. Each lecture will be two classes long.

4165.NAME: Arts day
4165.DESCRIPTION: The entirety of the day is dedicated to a single subject. Each lecture will be two classes long.

4166.NAME: Mathematics day
4166.DESCRIPTION: The entirety of the day is dedicated to a single subject. Each lecture will be two classes long.

4167.NAME: Sports day
4167.DESCRIPTION: The entirety of the day is dedicated to a single subject. Each lecture will be two classes long.

4168.NAME: Language day
4168.DESCRIPTION: The entirety of the day is dedicated to a single subject. Each lecture will be two classes long.

4169.NAME: Science day
4169.DESCRIPTION: The entirety of the day is dedicated to a single subject. Each lecture will be two classes long.

417.NAME: Hunt for screwdriver I
417.DESCRIPTION: Now try to find screwdriver for the toolbox

4170.NAME: Journal fix
4170.DESCRIPTION: The INBOX server had an error, with this quest the problem will be resolved. To compensate sorrow, this quest gives cake.

4171.NAME: Final exam
4171.DESCRIPTION: Each task will give you two foam pearls, in addition it will throw in headache for you to enjoy.

4172.NAME: Mundane school
4172.DESCRIPTION: The wave washed over and diary is now unusable. The principle Wise the Owl has a solution.

4173.NAME: Autumn time
4173.DESCRIPTION: All around, the leaves are falling in bright golden tones, autumn is here with all its riches.

4174.NAME: Autumn mood
4174.DESCRIPTION: Here you will have three autumn jobs, with a decoration as a reward for each of them. If you do everything, you will also get a shirt.

4175.NAME: Treefall
4175.DESCRIPTION: The autumn season in Oceania has started with a bang, judging by the sound of the leaves falling down, dragging the tree trunks with them.

4176.NAME: Booming island
4176.DESCRIPTION: Now that the thinking is oriented in the direction of falling trees, you vigilant of falling giants.

4177.NAME: Labyrinth
4177.DESCRIPTION: Some autumn leaves are so beautiful that it is a shame to spoil them. Remove the autumn beauties and make a way forward, on the island.

4178.NAME: Booming trees
4178.DESCRIPTION: The noise comes from the big fir trees, only when you get closer you will see what is making this ruckus.

4179.NAME: Harvest trees
4179.DESCRIPTION: It turns out that the tree hollows held riches, the crazy squirrel fells the trees to get the autumn goodies.

4180.NAME: Thundering autumn
4180.DESCRIPTION: Let's be honest, looking for noise is just an excuse for a walk in the picturesque autumn.

4181.NAME: Autumn visitors
4181.DESCRIPTION: Everyone likes the autumn boons, but not everyone has the courage to walk in the sunlight. These guests are shy.

4182.NAME: Braiding of bouquets
4182.DESCRIPTION: While the red tones are being created in the workshop, entertain yourself and your guests by arranging autumn bouquets.

4183.NAME: Autumn friends
4183.DESCRIPTION: Regardless of the outside temperature, the autumn leaves exude an unusual warmth, and your sincerity is partly the cause.

4184.NAME: Noise reduction
4184.DESCRIPTION: The conversation with Dulolulu went smoothly, the guests promised to make less noise, but there are still quite a few strangers on the island.

4185.NAME: Sunny autumn
4185.DESCRIPTION: The weather is so warm and sunny that the frightened beasts are starting to return to the island, wait a minute and you will see.

4186.NAME: An accidental find
4186.DESCRIPTION: The walking goal was to warm the heart and soul with autumnal tones, but by chance you managed to find something really beautiful.

4187.NAME: Autumn run
4187.DESCRIPTION: When your feet get tired, it's time to get on the bike. After this quest, you a buried bicycle will wash on the shore.

4188.NAME: Booo beginign
4188.DESCRIPTION: Full moon is long gone, now it is pitch black after sunset, oh, no, i am scared.

4189.NAME: Kingdom of darkness
4189.DESCRIPTION: Bats liked to hang around your palmtrees, so you are invited to visit them.

419.NAME: Hunt for screwdriver III
419.DESCRIPTION: In the heart of the volcano live priests who pray to volcano god

4190.NAME: Let's run away
4190.DESCRIPTION: No no no no no! Island is too scary to remain there.

4191.NAME: Bloated furrows
4191.DESCRIPTION: Why the hell did you dig earth on darkened isle? Do you realize what have you done? Go and see for yourself.

4192.NAME: Calming your nerves
4192.DESCRIPTION: No matter what, i am still scared. Rest in sunlight before returning to darkness.

4193.NAME: Returning to darkness
4193.DESCRIPTION: Rumble continues, this time it sounds like someone dragging the table around.

4194.NAME: Deeper into darkness
4194.DESCRIPTION: Entrance is full of webs, hopefully, when you go deeper, it will get better.

4195.NAME: Clouds of bats
4195.DESCRIPTION: Ghastly horses will not be needed, so keeping them is at your own discretion.

4196.NAME: Spooky wood
4196.DESCRIPTION: Rotten and wormy trees look horrid, but you do not want to know what lies under their roots.

4197.NAME: Hidden freaks
4197.DESCRIPTION: One candy was enough, now you can't get rid of freaks. Oh, no, bats do not scare them.

4198.NAME: Analyzing darkness
4198.DESCRIPTION: The darkness up ahead is so thick, it could be sliced in chunks.

4199.NAME: Last area
