4199.DESCRIPTION: After successful air raid, the clouds of darkness barely hold themselves togeather.

42.NAME: Craft rope
42.DESCRIPTION: Learn to craft rope from lianas in your new workshop

420.NAME: Hunt for saw I
420.DESCRIPTION: The last tool for the tool-box is the saw. Find it, and your tool-box will be complete

4200.NAME: Let's party
4200.DESCRIPTION: Bats have reclaimed the entire island, now they joyfully hover over the soft clouds.

421.NAME: Hunt for saw II
421.DESCRIPTION: It turns out the saw has been swallowed by a hippo. Feed it, so it throws it up.

4219.NAME: Miniature animals
4219.DESCRIPTION: Some explorer came to document the local tiny creatures, do you even have any?

422.NAME: Hunt for ruler I
422.DESCRIPTION: Tourist Michael from USA has a very good ruler. Try to convince him give it to you

4220.NAME: Sand industrialist
4220.DESCRIPTION: The explorer ran into a tree and is blind as a bat. Tools will be needed to find critters.

4221.NAME: Island of lilliputs
4221.DESCRIPTION: The researcher is interested in rare animals that are smaller than other species.

4222.NAME: Sand industrialist II
4222.DESCRIPTION: Trying to see the little beasts is starting to hurt your eyes, to get busy in the Island of lilliputs, you'll need to do this task first.

4223.NAME: Sand industrialist III
4223.DESCRIPTION: The more one studies, the more one has to study. Provide more glass for research purposes.

4224.NAME: Sand industrialist IV
4224.DESCRIPTION: Firewood is starting to run out, plant more sturdy palms, while the palms are growing,  keep melting.

4225.NAME: Sand industrialist V
4225.DESCRIPTION: Toby is used to the heat, however, he won't come because the camel wants sandwiches.

4226.NAME: In search of a bat
4226.DESCRIPTION: The small mammals were found, now the research and recording begins.

4227.NAME: In search of a toad
4227.DESCRIPTION: As the little rascal almost jumps in the face, the researcher searches for the mask.

4228.NAME: The tiny insect
4228.DESCRIPTION: The peacock spider is found in the tropics, its cousin the zebra spider lives in the Baltic countries.

4229.NAME: Under the lens
4229.DESCRIPTION: In general, the research draft is ready, let's go catch the beasts.

423.NAME: Hunt for ruler II
423.DESCRIPTION: Michael is almost ready to give you the ruler and to tell you where to find a divider for some more favors

4230.NAME: Everything explored
4230.DESCRIPTION: The researcher has collected a sufficient amount of data for research.

4231.NAME: Advent candles
4231.DESCRIPTION: On the corresponding Sunday of Advent, the quest will complete itself, if you sleep on Sunday, it will cost 10 rubies to complete.

424.NAME: Hunt for ruler III
424.DESCRIPTION: Michael is very glad for your hospitality. He says that his friend Thomas has a good divider

4240.NAME: Preparing for winter
4240.DESCRIPTION: Cold breeze blows trough your beach, and an urge to get a sweater becomes overwhelming.

4241.NAME: Spiting blizzard
4241.DESCRIPTION: While you put on a sweater, a blizzard hit Oceania. Strange, since usual temperature is always  25.

4242.NAME: Snow fairies
4242.DESCRIPTION: Kentosaur is hibernating on the island, since it looks like a dragon, other fantasy beings came to play.

4243.NAME: Winter fantasy
4243.DESCRIPTION: Fantastic being were not prepared for harsh cold, and they froze over while decorating the island.

4244.NAME: Cleaning paths
4244.DESCRIPTION: If you add things up, the rewards for this quest almost entirely counters the quest costs.

4245.NAME: Snow tasks
4245.DESCRIPTION: Fairy reminds you, all decorated trees can be moved to shoreline, thus uncovering hidden spots.

4246.NAME: Ice tasks
4246.DESCRIPTION: The small ice winged fey do not agree with other fairies. They all look the same, but their wishes differ.

4247.NAME: Snow and ice I
4247.DESCRIPTION: Try as they might, fairies can not wake the Kentosaur, the giant will not contribute to decorating the island.

4248.NAME: Snow and ice II
4248.DESCRIPTION: Don't worry about building thigs early, the quests will count even finished objects.

4249.NAME: Decorating for hollidays
4249.DESCRIPTION: Now the giant is driven to a point, where he can't refuse to receive guests.

425.NAME: Hunt for divider I
425.DESCRIPTION: Tourist and mathematician Leo has a good divider. If you will look after his lazy children, he will give you the divider

426.NAME: Hunt for divider II
426.DESCRIPTION: Continue looking after Leo's lazy children and teach them.

427.NAME: Hunt for rapitograph I
427.DESCRIPTION: The rapitograph belongs to an old native calligraphy guru. Earn rights to speak with him

428.NAME: Make the tool-box
428.DESCRIPTION: You will need a tool-box for the workshop. Start gathering all the instruments for it

4284.NAME: Winter riddles
4284.DESCRIPTION: If you can solve all the riddles, you will earn the Riddle Tree as well as reputations.

4285.NAME: Winter riddles II
4285.DESCRIPTION: The correct answers for the previous exercise were: Selling pearls, building WC's and baking honey or banana cakes.

4286.NAME: Winter riddles III
4286.DESCRIPTION: The correct answers for the previous exercise were: Obtaining obsidian, fishing for gudgeon and sharks, and rabbits.

4287.NAME: Winter riddles IV
4287.DESCRIPTION: The correct answers for the previous exercise were: Using beehives, getting wool and moving home.

4288.NAME: Winter riddles V
4288.DESCRIPTION: The correct answers for the previous exercise were: Making bone beads, feeding dogs and getting milk in the workshop.

4289.NAME: Winter riddles VI
4289.DESCRIPTION: The correct answers for the previous exercise were: Spending the thorny branches and reaping the beans and corn.

429.NAME: Hunt for rapitograph II
429.DESCRIPTION: The calligraphy guru welcomes you. But he speaks only in riddles.

4290.NAME: Winter riddles VII
4290.DESCRIPTION: The correct answers for the previous task were: Emptying wells, harvesting carrots and building 8 shell storages.

4291.NAME: Winter riddles VIII
4291.DESCRIPTION: The correct answers for the previous exercise were: Planting three-branch palm trees, VISIT Pinaki Island and feeding hedgehogs.

4292.NAME: Winter riddles IX
4292.DESCRIPTION: The correct answers for the previous exercise were: Selling Furrows, Selling Cats and Cooking Carrot Stew.

4293.NAME: Winter riddles X
4293.DESCRIPTION: The correct answers for the previous task were: Build a pond or pool, sell 8 goats and spend 20 energy.

4294.NAME: Winter riddles XI
4294.DESCRIPTION: The correct answers to the previous task were: Gain experience at friends islands, travel 13 times and boil eggs 4 times.

4295.NAME: Winter riddles XII
4295.DESCRIPTION: The answers to the previous task were in the DIARY, more precisely: Using Hives, Building WC's and Feeding Rabbits.

4296.NAME: Winter riddles XIII
4296.DESCRIPTION: On final stretch the question marks straightened up.

4297.NAME: Winter riddles XIV
4297.DESCRIPTION: On final stretch the question marks straightened up.

4298.NAME: Winter riddles XV
4298.DESCRIPTION: On final stretch the question marks straightened up.

43.NAME: Build fireplace
43.DESCRIPTION: It's time to build some things for survival. Let's start with the easiest - fireplace

430.NAME: Hunt for rapitograph III
430.DESCRIPTION: Calligraphy guru smiles at you and gives the next riddle:

4303.NAME: Cup qualification
4303.DESCRIPTION: Before you head out to the competition you should think things trough, hence this quest.

4304.NAME: Winter cup 2023. I
4304.DESCRIPTION: The bronze discipline is considered the easiest of the three disciplines. Material requirements and volumes are smaller than silver and gold.

4305.NAME: Winter cup 2023. II
4305.DESCRIPTION: As a reminder, in puzzle tasks, the progress will always be displayed as 0/1 while the task is in the process of execution.

4306.NAME: Winter cup 2023. III
4306.DESCRIPTION: All three snow globes are required to compete for the cup. This objective will give you a bronze snow globe..

4307.NAME: Winter cup 2023. IV
4307.DESCRIPTION: This time, anyone who has fixed a stone bridge on their home island will be able to earn a silver snow globe.

4308.NAME: Winter cup 2023. V
4308.DESCRIPTION: You may have already noticed, but the coastlines are not walkable, be careful not to block your way.

4309.NAME: Winter cup 2023. VI
4309.DESCRIPTION: This time, the competition has a particularly strong emphasis on time consumption.

431.NAME: Hunt for rapitograph IV
431.DESCRIPTION: Calligraphy guru smiles at you and gives the next riddle:

4310.NAME: Winter cup 2023. VII
4310.DESCRIPTION: Think about what you are doing, although it is impossible to break the competition, but the alternatives in case of crisis will not be pleasant.

4311.NAME: Winter cup 2023. VIII
4311.DESCRIPTION: A wise man counts twice, it's easy to miscalculate amounts in puzzles. Someone is guaranteed to make a mistake.

4312.NAME: Winter cup 2023. IX
4312.DESCRIPTION: Did you notice one of the two pools was almost finished? Smart management makes things better.

4313.NAME: Cup 2023 reminder
4313.DESCRIPTION: To compete for the cup you must collect all three snow globes. This quest will remain active as a reminder of this task.

4314.NAME: Elvis the Rabbit
4314.DESCRIPTION: Whistling rabbit, or Pika by name Elvis will be the judge of this competition. Pikas communicate by whistling:  Eeep!

4315.NAME: Love yourself!
4315.DESCRIPTION: We can be strong and love ourselves, the people around us, our daily life and the joy we bring ourselves.

4316.NAME: Love your home!
4316.DESCRIPTION: Regardless of the size and luxury, home is where we spend much of our daily lives, but there is always a way to make it more cozy.

4317.NAME: Love your work!
4317.DESCRIPTION: Regardless what brings you income, dedication can bring self satisfaction.

4318.NAME: Love a good meal!
4318.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you can, prepare warm dishes, this will uplift both you and people around you.

4319.NAME: Love your surroundings!
4319.DESCRIPTION: There can be joy in the smallest of life things, often they help recall the happy times of ones life. Caring for things around us is within everyone's grasp.

432.NAME: Hunt for rapitograph V
432.DESCRIPTION: Calligraphy guru smiles at you and gives the last riddle:

4320.NAME: Love people around you!
4320.DESCRIPTION: It is not just your other half, much joy and warmth can be received and given to your friends, family, neighbors and colleges.

4321.NAME: Guess!
4321.DESCRIPTION: Can this really be this simple?

4323.NAME: Balun loves fishing
4323.DESCRIPTION: Throwing his fishing rod over his shoulder and tucking his lunch bag under his arm, Balun forgets his daily worries.

4324.NAME: Pets of Nihiru ruler
4324.DESCRIPTION: When asked about the huge burdens of keeping such a magnificent zoo, he just smiles and waves you away.

4325.NAME: Vipiti coctails
4325.DESCRIPTION: Vipiti can brew more than just magical potions, she excels in cocktails as well.

4326.NAME: Flinzy's paths
4326.DESCRIPTION: Flinzy has a masonry hobby, that is deeply rooted throughout generations.

4327.NAME: Adonsy's colouring
4327.DESCRIPTION: Adonsy adds colours to all types of clothing, both self made, and those of people around her.

433.NAME: Create drawing kit
433.DESCRIPTION: Secondly your workshop will need drawing kit. Try to get all its components

434.NAME: Higher level workshop
434.DESCRIPTION: Finish building the higher level workshop to start creating instruments that will be needed to build a lighthouse

4343.NAME: Secrets of the Lotus Flower
4343.DESCRIPTION: The island's manager, Hideko, says that the Lotus Flower Temple is not yet furnished inside, which is an important task.

4344.NAME: Blessing of the Lotus Temple
4344.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the Flower Temple. It will require silk and gold.

4345.NAME: Valda's Curiosity
4345.DESCRIPTION: In one part of the island, there is a suspicious, very suspicious pond. It doesn't fit in at all.

4346.NAME: Mastering Bamboo
4346.DESCRIPTION: Prove that you can practically process the new material, Bamboo, available here, and you will receive new recipes.

4347.NAME: Find the Pandas
4347.DESCRIPTION: Pandas are VERY IMPORTANT! Befriend them at all costs.

4348.NAME: Befriending Pandas
4348.DESCRIPTION: Pay special attention and do not perform actions with panda cubs that are not specified in the tasks.

4349.NAME: Discover the Golden Panda
4349.DESCRIPTION: All that's left is to place the diamonds in their spots, and the Golden Panda will be visible in all its glory.

435.NAME: Mould for a better pick-axe
435.DESCRIPTION: You will need a better pick-axe to clear away large rocks from the place where your lighthouse should be built.

4350.NAME: The Sleeping Statue
4350.DESCRIPTION: Seeing how clean and restored Kaferoora Island is, the manager promises to entrust its secret - the Golden Panda.

4351.NAME: Finance the First Pond Exploration
4351.DESCRIPTION: Help explore and restore the first Koi pond. It will also require substantial funding for research.

4352.NAME: Finance the Second Pond Exploration
4352.DESCRIPTION: Help explore and restore the second Koi pond. It will definitely require substantial funding for research.

4353.NAME: Finance the Third Pond Exploration
4353.DESCRIPTION: Help explore and restore the third Koi pond. Funding can never be too much - science is worth it!

4354.NAME: Finance the Fourth Pond Exploration
4354.DESCRIPTION: Help explore, restore, and, of course, finance the fourth Koi pond. It will carry our name to the world.

4355.NAME: Grow Bamboo I
4355.DESCRIPTION: Cleaning up the island can only happen with a purposeful approach and methodology. Learn bamboo cultivation.

4356.NAME: Grow Bamboo II
4356.DESCRIPTION: Cleaning up the island can only happen with a purposeful approach and methodology. Learn bamboo cultivation.

4357.NAME: Visit Nihiru Island
4357.DESCRIPTION: The island's elder wishes to ask you to continue helping with the island's restoration.

4358.NAME: Raise Blue Pandas I
4358.DESCRIPTION: Shepherd Gonzo is very interested in exploring whether Pandas could also be raised in the savannah.

4359.NAME: Raise Blue Pandas II
4359.DESCRIPTION: Shepherd Gonzo is very interested in exploring whether Pandas could also be raised in the savannah.

436.NAME: Pick-axe shaft I of II
436.DESCRIPTION: To earn the shaft for the new pick-axe, prove that you know how to spend resources in various ways

4360.NAME: Raise Blue Pandas III
4360.DESCRIPTION: Shepherd Gonzo is very interested in exploring whether Pandas could also be raised in the savannah.

4361.NAME: Build Bamboo Chairs I
4361.DESCRIPTION: Living on the island, design is not the top priority, but it's never too late to start.

4362.NAME: Build Bamboo Chairs II
4362.DESCRIPTION: Living on the island, design is not the top priority, but it's never too late to start.

4363.NAME: Build Bamboo Chairs III
4363.DESCRIPTION: Living on the island, design is not the top priority, but it's never too late to start.

4364.NAME: Build Bamboo Paths I
4364.DESCRIPTION: Can you find and restore the paths that are now overgrown and littered with branches?

4365.NAME: Build Bamboo Paths II
4365.DESCRIPTION: Can you find and restore the paths that are now overgrown and littered with branches?

4366.NAME: Build Bamboo Paths III
4366.DESCRIPTION: Can you find and restore the paths that are now overgrown and littered with branches?

4367.NAME: Build Bamboo Tables I
4367.DESCRIPTION: Living on the island, design is not the top priority, but it's never too late to start.

4368.NAME: Build Bamboo Tables II
4368.DESCRIPTION: Living on the island, design is not the top priority, but it's never too late to start.

4369.NAME: Build Bamboo Tables III
4369.DESCRIPTION: Living on the island, design is not the top priority, but it's never too late to start.

437.NAME: Blade for improved pick-axe
437.DESCRIPTION: Craft blade in UNIQUE section of workshop

4370.NAME: Build Bamboo Fountains I
4370.DESCRIPTION: Living on the island, design is not the top priority, but it's never too late to start.

4371.NAME: Build Bamboo Fountains II
4371.DESCRIPTION: Living on the island, design is not the top priority, but it's never too late to start.

4372.NAME: Build Bamboo Fountains III
4372.DESCRIPTION: Living on the island, design is not the top priority, but it's never too late to start.

4373.NAME: Relative Evia
4373.DESCRIPTION: Maybe you remember, maybe not, Uncle Crazy once visited Oceania, but this time the story will be about his relative.

4374.NAME: Washed away
4374.DESCRIPTION: Search wherever you want, after bathing Evie can no longer find the pet. It may have been washed away with the bathwater.

4375.NAME: Stitched island
4375.DESCRIPTION: A relative knows this crop cultivation, it is just like the touch of mother's twilight. Ideas arise.

4376.NAME: Weeds!
4376.DESCRIPTION: The next furrow cannot be dug until this weed is removed. If only Evie was here, she would surely help.

4377.NAME: Lightning danger
4377.DESCRIPTION: The pod summoned a lightning storm, this will be one of the troubles that will help you find your way to the jelly.

4378.NAME: Snow danger
4378.DESCRIPTION: The pod called a terrible snowfall, this will be one of the troubles that will help you find your way to the jelly.

4379.NAME: Jungle danger
4379.DESCRIPTION: The pod lost its roots while sprouting toothflowers, this will be one of the troubles that will help you find your way to the jelly.

438.NAME: Craft better pick-axe
438.DESCRIPTION: Craft improved pick-axe in UNIQUE section of workshop

4380.NAME: Rock danger
4380.DESCRIPTION: The pod summoned a rain of stones, this will be one of the troubles that will help you find your way to the jelly.

4381.NAME: Fish danger
4381.DESCRIPTION: The earth is so hard that everything falls from the sky, this will be one of the troubles that will help you find your way to the gel.

4386.NAME: Hug the jelly
4386.DESCRIPTION: The washed away jelly is in the middle of the island, you will not get there until you overcome the five curses of this island.

439.NAME: Shattering the rock
439.DESCRIPTION: Find the wide rock pile in the south-east of the island and start chopping it

44.NAME: Rope supply
44.DESCRIPTION: Water hole will need rope, so you should gather some rope supplies

441.NAME: Metal worker I
441.DESCRIPTION: Try out the new workshop and craft the new metal pieces

4415.NAME: Ritual of the Scroll I
4415.DESCRIPTION: A mysterious ritual is described in the scroll. If you manage to complete it, the scroll will turn into a reward.

4416.NAME: Ritual of the Scroll II
4416.DESCRIPTION: A mysterious ritual is described in the scroll. If you manage to complete it, the scroll will turn into a reward.

4417.NAME: Ritual of the Scroll III
4417.DESCRIPTION: A mysterious ritual is described in the scroll. If you manage to complete it, the scroll will turn into a reward.

4418.NAME: Ritual of the Scroll IV
4418.DESCRIPTION: A mysterious ritual is described in the scroll. If you manage to complete it, the scroll will turn into a reward.

4419.NAME: Ritual of the Scroll V
4419.DESCRIPTION: A mysterious ritual is described in the scroll. If you manage to complete it, the scroll will turn into a reward.

442.NAME: Metal worker II
442.DESCRIPTION: Try out the new workshop and craft the new metal pieces

4420.NAME: Ritual of the Scroll VI
4420.DESCRIPTION: A mysterious ritual is described in the scroll. If you manage to complete it, the scroll will turn into a reward.

4421.NAME: Ritual of the Scroll VII
4421.DESCRIPTION: A mysterious ritual is described in the scroll. If you manage to complete it, the scroll will turn into a reward.

4422.NAME: Ritual of the Scroll VIII
4422.DESCRIPTION: A mysterious ritual is described in the scroll. If you manage to complete it, the scroll will turn into a reward.

4423.NAME: Ritual of the Scroll IX
4423.DESCRIPTION: A mysterious ritual is described in the scroll. If you manage to complete it, the scroll will turn into a reward.

4424.NAME: Ritual of the Scroll X
4424.DESCRIPTION: A mysterious ritual is described in the scroll. If you manage to complete it, the scroll will turn into a reward.

443.NAME: Building the foundations I
443.DESCRIPTION: The foundation pit has been dug. Now it's time to build the foundations

444.NAME: Hunt for Divider III
444.DESCRIPTION: Continue educating mathematician's lazy children. They are becoming more hardworking.

445.NAME: Hunt for Divider IV
445.DESCRIPTION: Leo will return soon. Teach his children the last few things

4452.NAME: Bird trouble
4452.DESCRIPTION: Do you remember Wonderbird? The white bird is an insect eater, but its black relative turns out to be a vegetarian.

4453.NAME: Following cockatoo 1
4453.DESCRIPTION: Around the rocks, down the hill, you can see the footprints stopping at the lair of an animal.

4454.NAME: Gift for cockatoo B
4454.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps some useful thoughts will arise as you move your hands.

4455.NAME: Following cockatoo 2
4455.DESCRIPTION: If the foxes are to be believed, the cockatoo hid in the depths of the island. When you finish this task, consider the usefulness of exploring the thicket.

4456.NAME: Gift for cockatoo A
4456.DESCRIPTION: Even if you manage to find a bird, so what? The bird doesn't crave attention, so get a gift.

4457.NAME: Following cockatoo 3
4457.DESCRIPTION: Do not forget that your main goal is to explore the forest and find the lost birds.

4458.NAME: Following cockatoo 4
4458.DESCRIPTION: You get the feeling that you are being watched, most likely the cockatoo is right behind the next tree.

4459.NAME: Black birds
4459.DESCRIPTION: You finally managed to find the dark relatives of the Wonderbirds. Remember there are five birds in the forest.

4460.NAME: Rejected gifts (C)
4460.DESCRIPTION: A cockatoo is sitting on the top of a tree, the things you brought to the bird are of no interest.

4461.NAME: Rejected gifts (D)
4461.DESCRIPTION: The surprise did not work to please the cockatoo, forks and spoons have no use in treetops.

4462.NAME: Treats for cockatoo A
4462.DESCRIPTION: The cause of the misunderstanding was food, it is worth trying to improve with the same method.

4463.NAME: Treats for cockatoo B
4463.DESCRIPTION: Cockatoos do not like beetles or meat. Maybe you will find a piece of cheese?

4464.NAME: Settlement
4464.DESCRIPTION: Help the cockatoo cook delicious food to prove to the Wonderbird that you can eat deliciously without insects.

4465.NAME: The evil relative
4465.DESCRIPTION: It's hard to be the black bird of the family, what to do when you really don't like beetles?

4466.NAME: Feathers in the air
4466.DESCRIPTION: It may be that the Miracle Bird is not so ugly after all, the cockatoo's feathers started to fall out from stress.

4467.NAME: Invitation for lunch
4467.DESCRIPTION: Kakadu has no intention of returning, life in the jungle is not so bad. Make sure the cockatoo comes.

4468.NAME: White is visiting
4468.DESCRIPTION: The celebratory cake with beetles must have been really not nice. Wonderbird apologizes.

4469.NAME: Small overeating
4469.DESCRIPTION: In response to the watermelon's gesture, the cockatoo pulls out a bag of beetles, there is no shortage of insects in the treetops.

447.NAME: Mould for better pick-axe II
447.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and you will get mould for pick-axe

4470.NAME: What's good in the jungle
4470.DESCRIPTION: When your stomach is full, what's a good thing to do to relieve boredom?

4471.NAME: The cockatoo is cleaning
4471.DESCRIPTION: The miracle bird has already arrived, but the jungle is a mess.

4472.NAME: Last of cockatoo
4472.DESCRIPTION: Hopefully you remember, the main goal is to find five cockatoos in the nest. How many cockatoos have you fed?

4473.NAME: Black cockatoos
4473.DESCRIPTION: The cockatoo took offense and began to growl, better that way than eating insects.

448.NAME: Pick-axe shaft II
448.DESCRIPTION: Continue spending resources to gain pick-axe shaft

449.NAME: The native shell-game
449.DESCRIPTION: The natives have invented a colourful shell-game. They're inviting you to join them. When you fulfill all tasks, you'll get rubies as a reward

45.NAME: Bone beads
45.DESCRIPTION: You can create bone beads from that beautiful bone. The natives might pay handsome money for them

450.NAME: The native shell-game
450.DESCRIPTION: The natives challenge you to win them in Fix game. To fulfill this task, visit Fix game via the Fix game table (press USE) on the island

452.NAME: Glass merchants
452.DESCRIPTION: Glass merchants are ready to discuss business only after you renew the ancient temple in the jungle

453.NAME: Emerald for the lighthouse
453.DESCRIPTION: Tasks to get an emerald for the lighthouse

454.NAME: Lighthouse foundations II
454.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade lighthouse to its next stage and finish building the stage

4543.NAME: Qualification
4543.DESCRIPTION: You certainly did not expect that such a dry day would come that you would be happy for a little rain on the summer solstice.

4544.NAME: Ligo Cup 2023 I
4544.DESCRIPTION: Each of the three snow globes is worth 200 reputation. Even getting one ball is a valuable achievement.

4545.NAME: Ligo Cup 2023 II
4545.DESCRIPTION: One area of the island with various goodies is hidden underwater. You will get the directions by completing the biscuit task.

4546.NAME: Ligo Cup 2023 III
4546.DESCRIPTION: Missing seashells? Really missing sea shells? You really can't sell fish from a backpack?

4547.NAME: Ligo Cup 2023 IV
4547.DESCRIPTION: If you haven't completed the Clay Colossus, then the silver quest line may be too difficult for you. Assess your strengths.

4548.NAME: Ligo Cup 2023 V
4548.DESCRIPTION: By building paths of water roses, it is possible to bypass one of the butterflies without feeding it.

4549.NAME: Ligo Cup 2023 VI
4549.DESCRIPTION: Such is the tradition of the cup that the final tasks in each of the disciplines give only reputations, not experience.

455.NAME: Emerald for the lighthouse
455.DESCRIPTION: Tasks to get an emerald for the lighthouse

4550.NAME: Ligo Cup 2023 VII
4550.DESCRIPTION: Gold tasks are only slightly ahead of the silver line in terms of volume. The difficulty lies in the use of rarer materials.

4551.NAME: Ligo Cup 2023 VIII
4551.DESCRIPTION: To make things interesting the cup competitions are always a little different. There will be no puzzles this time.

4552.NAME: Ligo Cup 2023 IX
4552.DESCRIPTION: The fastest players will read this text already on the morning of June 23. Happy Ligo to all Oceanians!!!

4553.NAME: Judge Biscuit
4553.DESCRIPTION: The competition will be watched and managed by a judge named Biscuit. The butterfly promises to be objective and observant.

4554.NAME: Don't forget about the race
4554.DESCRIPTION:
Only those players who are the first to get all three snow globes will receive the trophy after the time allotted for the competition.
The amount of trophies is small, completing this quest does not guarantee a cup. The task records only your finishing time.

456.NAME: Lighthouse foundations III
456.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade lighthouse to its next stage and finish building the stage

457.NAME: Emerald for the lighthouse
457.DESCRIPTION: Tasks to get an emerald for the lighthouse

458.NAME: Lighthouse exterior I
458.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade lighthouse to its next stage and finish building the stage

459.NAME: Emeralds for the lighthouse I
459.DESCRIPTION: Get 2 emeralds in order to upgrade the lighthouse

46.NAME: Water hole
46.DESCRIPTION: The next thing you need for survival is a water hole

460.NAME: Emeralds for the lighthouse II
460.DESCRIPTION: Tasks to get another emerald for the lighthouse

461.NAME: Lighthouse exterior II
461.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade lighthouse to its next stage and finish building the stage

462.NAME: Emeralds for the lighthouse I
462.DESCRIPTION: Get 2 emeralds in order to upgrade the lighthouse

463.NAME: Emeralds for the lighthouse II
463.DESCRIPTION: Tasks to get another emerald for the lighthouse

464.NAME: Lighthouse exterior III
464.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade lighthouse to its next stage and finish building the stage

465.NAME: Emeralds for the lighthouse I
465.DESCRIPTION: Tasks to get another emerald for the lighthouse

466.NAME: Emeralds for the lighthouse II
466.DESCRIPTION: Tasks to get another emerald for the lighthouse

467.NAME: Lighthouse exterior IV
467.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade lighthouse to its next stage and finish building the stage

468.NAME: Emerald for the lighthouse
468.DESCRIPTION: Tasks to get an emerald for the lighthouse

469.NAME: Lighthouse motor
469.DESCRIPTION: Now that you have motor blueprint, craft it

47.NAME: Straw bundle
47.DESCRIPTION: Create some straw bundles. You will need them for your shelter

470.NAME: Lighthouse motor blueprint
470.DESCRIPTION: You will need a blueprint for lighthouse motor. Good old Jarno could help there

471.NAME: Mechanizing lighthouse
471.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade lighthouse with an emerald and start adding its mechanism

472.NAME: Emerald for the lighthouse
472.DESCRIPTION: Tasks to get an emerald for the lighthouse

473.NAME: Mechanizing lighthouse II
473.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the lighthouse, using an emerald, and add the lightbulb and its coil

4731.NAME: Haunting of Papric
4731.DESCRIPTION: Papuan children look forward to the horror festival. The adult Papuans had an idea.

4732.NAME: Light up the house
4732.DESCRIPTION: A bright flame and gloomy corners of the room. Proper lighting is very important.

4733.NAME: Lamp workshop
4733.DESCRIPTION: Papuyans are diligently cutting, painting and gluing, the haunted house will look great today.

4734.NAME: Mechanical spiders
4734.DESCRIPTION: Spiders hide perfectly in the dark, so they were entrusted with the work of puppets.

4735.NAME: Hell hole
4735.DESCRIPTION: A Papuan priest cast a spell on potato starch. Now it shines as bright as lava.

4736.NAME: Spider's corridor
4736.DESCRIPTION: In this hallway, spiders actively move everything while sitting on the ceiling. Remember, decorations are not real.

4737.NAME: Lizard hands
4737.DESCRIPTION: The next stage will help the frightened children to calm down.

4738.NAME: Full circle
4738.DESCRIPTION: There is only one entrance and exit to the haunted house, so you will have to go back the same way.

4739.NAME: Cyclic ghosts
4739.DESCRIPTION: There will definitely be more Papuans who want to be scared than there will be opportunities to scare. Scaring will take place for several days.

4740.NAME: Horror work
4740.DESCRIPTION: The haunted house is an attraction and involves many employees. Everyone is on break now.

4741.NAME: Underground eruption
4741.DESCRIPTION: Deep inside the haunted house was another prop.

4742.NAME: Alleviating fear
4742.DESCRIPTION: The haunted house turned out to be too scary. Some things will have to change.

4743.NAME: Anastasia's help
4743.DESCRIPTION: While the Papuans try to make the house less scary, Anastasia works in the opposite direction.

4744.NAME: Self flow
4744.DESCRIPTION: While having coffe with bats, some expressed the wish to remain on your island after the work day ends.

475.NAME: Light-bulb bars
475.DESCRIPTION: Create bars for light-bulb in the workshop

476.NAME: Light-bulb blueprint
476.DESCRIPTION: The lighthouse will need a light-bulb. Fulfill these tasks to get blueprint for it

477.NAME: Blueprint for light-bulb bars
477.DESCRIPTION: The light-bulb will need protective bars. Fulfill these tasks to get a blueprint for it

478.NAME: Emerald for the lighthouse roof
478.DESCRIPTION: Tasks to get emerald for the lighthouse

4781.NAME: Medium badge
4781.DESCRIPTION: Hey! Great job! You are about to reach Medium badge. We hope you enjoy our game.

4782.NAME: Hard badge
4782.DESCRIPTION: Hard badge is just around the corner. A little bit more and that will be done.

4783.NAME: Impossible badge
4783.DESCRIPTION: Final badge is here! Finish your task and you will get your Kongregate rewards. But we hope you will stay with us a bit longer.

479.NAME: Ligthouse roof I
479.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade roof to its next stage and finish building it

48.NAME: Sand path network
48.DESCRIPTION: Earn money and create a sand path network on your island

480.NAME: Emerald for the lighthouse roof
480.DESCRIPTION: Tasks to get emerald for the lighthouse

4809.NAME: Scary winter stories
4809.DESCRIPTION: The darkest time of the year has arrived. For our ancestors, it was great time for visiting, singing songs and telling scary storries.

481.NAME: Ligthouse roof II
481.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade lighthouse roof to its next stage and finish building it

4810.NAME: Darkness stories
4810.DESCRIPTION: Remember to take stories with simple smile and enjoy the reward at the end.

4814.NAME: Darkness stories I
4814.DESCRIPTION: I just saw my reflection blink.

4815.NAME: Darkness stories II
4815.DESCRIPTION: My dad does his experiments in the basement. He doesn’t let me out. He says that mom will be horrified.

4816.NAME: Darkness stories III
4816.DESCRIPTION: There's nothing like the laughter of a baby unless it’s 1 am and you are home, alone.

4817.NAME: Darkness stories IV
4817.DESCRIPTION: They say that cats have nine lives. I swear I have buried him at least eleven times.

4818.NAME: Darkness stories V
4818.DESCRIPTION: The new job at the blood bank was ideal for me, but I had to leave. They caught me drinking on the job.

4819.NAME: Darkness stories VI
4819.DESCRIPTION: The grinning face stared at me from the darkness beyond my bedroom window. I live on the 14th floor.

482.NAME: Emerald for the lighthouse roof
482.DESCRIPTION: The natives are surprised about the big lighthouse you've built. They are ready to give you an emerald for free

4820.NAME: Darkness stories VII
4820.DESCRIPTION: "Doctor, my imaginary friends don't believe you're real."

4821.NAME: Darkness stories VIII
4821.DESCRIPTION: Someone just opened my fridge. From the inside.

4822.NAME: Darkness stories IX
4822.DESCRIPTION: Yesterday I met a man who was not there at all. He wasn't there today either and probably won't be there tomorrow...

4823.NAME: Darkness stories X
4823.DESCRIPTION: The band was so loud that I couldn't even hear the guy next to me scream as the knife went in.

4824.NAME: Darkness stories XI
4824.DESCRIPTION: I don’t mind that my housemate brings guys home. But just once, I’d like to see one of them leave.

4825.NAME: Darkness stories XII
4825.DESCRIPTION: I’ve been looking for my sister all day long. But I don’t remember where I put all of the pieces.

483.NAME: Finish the big lighthouse!
483.DESCRIPTION: Finish the last stage of the big lighthouse

484.NAME: Remove the majority of large rocks from the island

486.NAME: Rope master
486.DESCRIPTION: Prove your mastery by spending rope

4862.NAME: End of the evening
4862.DESCRIPTION: An unexpected discovery. A real penguin came with the guests. It will not go away and will now live here.

487.NAME: Plank master
487.DESCRIPTION: Prove your mastery by spending planks in various ways

488.NAME: Economy driver
488.DESCRIPTION: Improve the economy in Oceania by spending shells

489.NAME: Nail master
489.DESCRIPTION: Prove your mastery by spending nails in various ways

4896.NAME: Welcome 2024.
4896.DESCRIPTION:
Hooray!!!!!!!
The New Year can and SHOULD be celebrated with noise and strong emotions.

4897.NAME: New Year's Island
4897.DESCRIPTION: No housekeeping and no cooking. Turn up the speakers and order pizza or sushi with home delivery.

4898.NAME: Party!!!
4898.DESCRIPTION: After completing this goal, you will receive festive hats for a more fun New Year's Eve.

4899.NAME: The celebration continues
4899.DESCRIPTION: This task is for everyone who is bored. After completing each of the tasks, you will receive a silver doubloon.

49.NAME: First twig fence
49.DESCRIPTION: Buy and build your first twig fence

490.NAME: Clay brick master
490.DESCRIPTION: Prove your mastery by spending clay bricks in various ways

491.NAME: Feeder
491.DESCRIPTION: Spend food in any possible way

492.NAME: Shard master
492.DESCRIPTION: Prove your ability to spend shards

493.NAME: Knife-sharpener
493.DESCRIPTION: Work as a knife sharpener at the market place

494.NAME: Builder
494.DESCRIPTION: Prove that you are a real builder by spending stone blocks

495.NAME: Pottery master
495.DESCRIPTION: Prove that you are master of using clay pots

496.NAME: Helpful hen farmer
496.DESCRIPTION: Help your friend to grow chicken

497.NAME: Helpful pig farmer
497.DESCRIPTION: Help your friend to grow pigs

4982.NAME: Boiled fish
4982.DESCRIPTION: Throwing a fishing rod into the ocean, you first pull out boiled salmon, then smoked octopus.

4983.NAME: Steam Island
4983.DESCRIPTION: You get the feeling that you are in a sauna. The temperature of the island is well above the tropical norm.

4984.NAME: Boiling disaster
4984.DESCRIPTION: A heating pipe has broken in the basement, boiling water has flooded the entire island.

4985.NAME: The Singing Island
4985.DESCRIPTION: Once this island was filled with the trills of birds, someone even tried to record these birdsongs on vinyl records.

4986.NAME: Olive sawmill
4986.DESCRIPTION: After the last great calamity, new shoots sprout from the trunks of the olive trees.

4987.NAME: Song admirer
4987.DESCRIPTION: Heat, beautiful view, good food and music. There is a neighbor in Oceania whose soul is appealed to by all these things.

4988.NAME: Repair the vase fountain
4988.DESCRIPTION: Not knowing which pipe is the real culprit, you put patches on all the damaged pipes.

4989.NAME: The icy fix
4989.DESCRIPTION: Shaman Howling Squid tried to save the island, but failed, so the eternally frozen icicles are visible on some parts of the island.

4990.NAME: The beautiful bird
4990.DESCRIPTION: The Volcano-god praises the delicious food, the island is beautiful, but quiet. The birds are still afraid to return.

4991.NAME: Gardener signs
4991.DESCRIPTION: While you were busy on the island, Volcano-god was busy painting. It turned out quite nicely.

4992.NAME: Closing the basement
4992.DESCRIPTION: The island is slowly cooling down and it's time for the Vulcan god to go home. Don't forget that your diving suit is left in the basement.

4994.NAME: Wine and juice
4994.DESCRIPTION: The rugged island smells a little like herbal tea, but there were once grape fields here.

5.NAME: Leave the  island
5.DESCRIPTION: Use the repaired raft to leave the small island.

50.NAME: Twig fences
50.DESCRIPTION: Create a twig fence for your animals or garden

501.NAME: Christmas tree decorations
501.DESCRIPTION: To receive gifts, you have to decorate your Christmas tree. Decorations can be found in dwarf shops on friend's islands.

502.NAME: Vast ranch
502.DESCRIPTION: Grow all these animals on your island at the same time. As a reward, you will receive a baby peacock!

5027.NAME: Red thunder
5027.DESCRIPTION: Roars of volcano wake you up once again. The recent eruptions on rose island was just the begining.

5028.NAME: Simple routine 1
5028.DESCRIPTION: Jelly's smile can warm the frozen flowers. To clear path you will need pelican Palko's help.

5029.NAME: Simple routine 2
5029.DESCRIPTION: Remember, you need all three questlines to get the special snow globe.

503.NAME: Animal caretaker
503.DESCRIPTION: The natives want to check how good you are at taking care of animals. You will get spices in return.

5030.NAME: Simple routine 3
5030.DESCRIPTION: By finishing this quest you will gain a barrel of flammable objects for igniting the volcano.

5031.NAME: Advanced route 1
5031.DESCRIPTION: Some useful resources have been scattered around. Check your surroundings, perhaps you will find something useful.

5032.NAME: Advanced route 2
5032.DESCRIPTION: Too bad you can't use the same method for all volcanos. First exhaust simple options before trying more tiresome ones.

5033.NAME: Advanced route 3
5033.DESCRIPTION: By finishing this quest you will gain a barrel of flammable objects for igniting the volcano.

5034.NAME: Serious attempt 1
5034.DESCRIPTION: This is the most complex method of jump-starting the volcano. It will require a lot of effort and unorthodox approach.

5035.NAME: Serious attempt 2
5035.DESCRIPTION: Remember to stop and smell flowers once in a while. The roses on this island are worth checking out.

5036.NAME: Serious attempt 3
5036.DESCRIPTION: By finishing this quest you will gain a barrel of flammable objects for igniting the volcano.

5037.NAME: Freezing island
5037.DESCRIPTION: The quest marker and prize will diminish over time. The quicker you finish all quests, the better prize you will receive.

504.NAME: Hard worker
504.DESCRIPTION: The natives would like to see if you're a diligent worker. In return you will receive some reputation

505.NAME: Strawberry time
505.DESCRIPTION: The native children really love strawberries. If you want to increase your reputation, you can fulfill this task

506.NAME: Cooking fan II
506.DESCRIPTION: Cook these recipes to train in cooking

507.NAME: Cooking fan III
507.DESCRIPTION: Cook these recipes to train in cooking

508.NAME: Cooking fan IV
508.DESCRIPTION: Cook these recipes to train in cooking

509.NAME: Field digger
509.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks to get some plants for harvest

51.NAME: Simple shed
51.DESCRIPTION: Build one of the supply sheds on your island

510.NAME: Actions with trees
510.DESCRIPTION: The natives want to check how good you are at dealing with trees.

5106.NAME: Easter story
5106.DESCRIPTION: Bunny does not keep eggs under a mattress or in boots. This year, for safety, bunny buries the eggs.

5107.NAME: Forest egg
5107.DESCRIPTION: The bunny wonders what the forest egg looked like before it was buried. Help the bunny remember.

5108.NAME: Glass egg
5108.DESCRIPTION: The only egg that was not buried was the glass egg. A bird in an egg is special, it does not care about warmth of the greenhouse.

5109.NAME: Pearl egg
5109.DESCRIPTION: The bunny buried this egg deeper than any other. The depths of the earth were so hot that this egg boiled thoroughly.

5110.NAME: Paper egg
5110.DESCRIPTION: Rice parchment sheets are a true luxury item that doesn't keep well when buried in the ground.

5111.NAME: Wooden egg
5111.DESCRIPTION: Mold, worms and moss. The excavated wood egg has turned into peat. The egg was carved from one huge piece of wood.

5112.NAME: Metal egg
5112.DESCRIPTION: A few spots of rust don't stop the egg from ringing like a hollow church bell. Hopefully a fresh coat of paint will be enough here.

5113.NAME: Forest Faberge
5113.DESCRIPTION: The Forest egg is alive. Its based on a decorated bush. We have no clue how the bunny managed to bury such an egg.

5114.NAME: Glass Faberge
5114.DESCRIPTION: This is the only case of a Faberge egg successfully hatching into a live bird.

5115.NAME: Pearl Faberge
5115.DESCRIPTION: All found details are laid out in the hall. Some pearl pieces go together, others don't. You will have to improvise.

5116.NAME: Fabric Faberge
5116.DESCRIPTION: The spider creates fragments and numbers them. It is not yet possible to say whether the spider is weaving a blanket or an Easter surprise.

5117.NAME: Wooden Faberge
5117.DESCRIPTION: Flowerpots with branches of different colors are lined up and ready for grafting. Time to wake up the baobab.

5118.NAME: Metal Faberge
5118.DESCRIPTION: Exhausted from digging, the bunny recovers his strength by trying out the rebuilt swing. Don't worry, I already painted the shells.

5119.NAME: Visit the island
5119.DESCRIPTION: Time comes to present the eggs, but does the bunny remember where did he bury them?

512.NAME: Gain Flax I
512.DESCRIPTION: A native gardener has invented a new way to make cloth. He's willing to exchange knowledge

5120.NAME: Faberge bunny
5120.DESCRIPTION: You can only move around the island by jumping or using a shovel. The eggs where not found. Help the bunny restore what has been lost in the depths of the ground.

5121.NAME: Golden hen
5121.DESCRIPTION: The Easter Bunny lost some golden hens on this island. To find lost things while doing other things is completely normal.

513.NAME: Gain Flax II
513.DESCRIPTION: If you fulfill this task, flax seeds will be available in the shop

514.NAME: Chili hunt
514.DESCRIPTION: Paprick needs a new clay bowl, cup and plate. Get these things for him and you'll receive seeds for a new plant

515.NAME: Clay bowl for chili
515.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and the potter will give you a clay bowl

5158.NAME: Spring migration
5158.DESCRIPTION: As the winds and the length of the day change, animals have decided to return from the hibernation island.

5159.NAME: Reverse winter
5159.DESCRIPTION: Animals traveled away from the heat that was rising out of the earth. A few months have passed since the eruption.

516.NAME: Iron farmer tasks
516.DESCRIPTION: Very difficult tasks, intended for those who are prepared for a challenge. Final reward - a baby peacock!

5160.NAME: Retain heat
5160.DESCRIPTION: All things can be useful if they are applied properly. The heat of the island may prove indispensable later.

5161.NAME: Winter - as usual
5161.DESCRIPTION: Only part of the island had actual eruption. Surprisingly, some ground is still covered in winter snow.

5162.NAME: Confused flowers
5162.DESCRIPTION: Hot, cold, hot, what season is it? Who knows? Help the flowers regain their sense of time.

5163.NAME: Heat dwellers
5163.DESCRIPTION: No one can live in such a mess. Start arranging the island so that the migrating animals can resettle.

5164.NAME: Persistence
5164.DESCRIPTION: Animals will return in numbers, they will need a lot of housing. Use picks to dig tunnels in lava blocks.

5165.NAME: Lack of time
5165.DESCRIPTION: Chompers calmly rested throughout the winter, the introduction of order was always postponed.

5166.NAME: Caraway season
5166.DESCRIPTION: Garden will distract thoughts of migrating animals. Sitting in flowers they will forget about the hardships.

5167.NAME: Home furnishing
5167.DESCRIPTION: With a bunch of keys, the cat unlocks the gate. Inside the tunnel, the walls are smooth, gray and boring.

5168.NAME: Warm homes
5168.DESCRIPTION: When a ferry docks, the walkway  soon begins to squeak under the clatter of the animal feet.

5169.NAME: Show housing
5169.DESCRIPTION: Winged lions, and lizards riding on dolphins. The last migrating beasts arrive unexpectedly.

517.NAME: Ancient key
517.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill this task to gain the ancient key for the treasure cave

5170.NAME: Tidy island
5170.DESCRIPTION: The herbivore's head is full of thoughts and ideas about the interior. If not for chilly waters, his head would overheat.

5171.NAME: Earned respect
5171.DESCRIPTION: You are being watched. By cats, by dogs, by grass chompers, perhaps by somebody else as well... ?

5172.NAME: Diamond ladies
5172.DESCRIPTION: Helen Lanchester believes that Diamond ladies can beat Iron mens endurance any day of the week.

5173.NAME: Diamond ladies II
5173.DESCRIPTION: Helen doesn't care about gratitude. A Diamond lady will set the bar for all ladies of Oceania.

5174.NAME: Diamond ladies III
5174.DESCRIPTION: Helen smiled? Then things are probably moving in the right direction.

5175.NAME: Diamond strawberries I
5175.DESCRIPTION: The first quest will give you a tangerine bush, the second a baby Peacock, the third a  variation of incense pots.

5176.NAME: Diamond strawberries II
5176.DESCRIPTION: The first quest will give you a tangerine bush, the second a baby Peacock, the third a  variation of incense pots.

5177.NAME: Diamond strawberries III
5177.DESCRIPTION: The first quest will give you a tangerine bush, the second a baby Peacock, the third a  variation of incense pots.

518.NAME: Clay plate for chili
518.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and the potter will give you a clay plate

5189.NAME: Elder brother
5189.DESCRIPTION: Everyone's mother's dearest and closest. Let your mommy rest, feed your brothers and sisters.

519.NAME: Clay cup for chili
519.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill these tasks and the potter will give you a clay cup

5190.NAME: May stroll
5190.DESCRIPTION: The smallest toddlers will give their mothers a smile, then they will fall asleep again in the stroller.

5191.NAME: Convenience for mom
5191.DESCRIPTION: To make the mother's everyday life easier, improve the immediate surroundings. It is much easier to look after children in a safe and thoughtful environment.

5192.NAME: Gardening for mom
5192.DESCRIPTION: For the sake of the children, the mother will also mow the grass and saw the branches. Save your mother this effort, you have more energy.

5193.NAME: Sunny walk
5193.DESCRIPTION: Dedicate this day to mom, don't sit in front of the screen, but take mom by the hand and go enjoy the May sun.

5194.NAME: Fix carousels
5194.DESCRIPTION: During the activity, you noticed several parts from the carousel, which was broken by vandals last year.

52.NAME: More sheds
52.DESCRIPTION: Build two more sheds on your island

520.NAME: Modern house
520.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade your house. It will increase your maximum energy.

521.NAME: Modern bonfire
521.DESCRIPTION: Update the stone era bonfire to a modern bonfire

523.NAME: Growing flax
523.DESCRIPTION: Try out the new plant - flax

5239.NAME: Summer bugs
5239.DESCRIPTION: A buzz just passed your ear, then another one, and another one. After the tenth beetle you started getting suspicions.

524.NAME: Mmmm - pizza
524.DESCRIPTION: As you have been such a good friend to Paprick, he'll reveal to you the recipe of a very tasty pizza

5240.NAME: Long flight
5240.DESCRIPTION: You caught up just in time, a group of wreath adorned  beetles are about to take off.

5241.NAME: Lost wreaths
5241.DESCRIPTION: The flight was long, and the beatle named Turnip lost its flower wreath on the way here.

5242.NAME: Mountain stroll
5242.DESCRIPTION: Turnip is busy making new wreaths, so you must find a way to entertain yourself on your own.

5243.NAME: Mountain salad
5243.DESCRIPTION: You were so eager to travel that you did not bring along a single bread crumb of food.

5244.NAME: Mountain gardening
5244.DESCRIPTION: The whole place would look a lot more pleasing to the eye with just a bit of work.

5245.NAME: Buggy salad
5245.DESCRIPTION: While you were on a stroll, Turnip made more wreaths, but Turnip is hungry again.

5246.NAME: Meeting the guests
5246.DESCRIPTION: The wreaths were not just for fun, the bugs were expecting guests, and now they are slowly starting to arrive.

5247.NAME: Going camping
5247.DESCRIPTION: As the guests arrive, the need for different small utilities arises.

5248.NAME: Grilling mistakes
5248.DESCRIPTION: Remember, you can't grill your own guests. This outing will have grilled vegetables.

5249.NAME: Beetle objections
5249.DESCRIPTION: The bugs swarm you and sweep you off your feet. The whole purpose here is to relax and have fun. Leave the rest of the work to us, and go enjoy the festivities.

525.NAME: Boiled eggs
525.DESCRIPTION: Another way of getting food is boiling eggs. Try it!

526.NAME: New soup
526.DESCRIPTION: You have discovered a new soup from coconuts, milk and chili.

527.NAME: Valentine's day roses
527.DESCRIPTION: Valentine's day is here! A rose will occasionally appear on the island. The longer you remain in the game, the greater the possibility to find a rose. Gather the roses and buy special Valentine's decorations.

528.NAME: Native records
528.DESCRIPTION: The natives have decided to set various records. Help them and, after fulfilling the three tasks, you will receive a baby peacock!

529.NAME: Guests
529.DESCRIPTION: Paprick and his friends are coming to visit. Prepare them a delicious lunch.

5292.NAME: Peach parrot
5292.DESCRIPTION: This probably happens to everyone. You fly up a tree to feast on fruit, fall asleep there and, of course, fall off the tree.

5293.NAME: Follow the parrot
5293.DESCRIPTION: How long has this parrot been sunbathing? The list of delayed works is longer than the tallest palm tree.

5294.NAME: Surfing boards
5294.DESCRIPTION: Lots of good stuff washes up on this end of the island. For example, a bicycle.

5295.NAME: Washed up bears
5295.DESCRIPTION: One mistake on the water can be catastrophic, especially if it happens near coastal cliffs.

5296.NAME: The embrace of the waves
5296.DESCRIPTION: This part of the island is lower, no wonder some of the land is swamped.

5297.NAME: A strange waterfront
5297.DESCRIPTION: The waves are so strong that every morning they wash up some rocks. A strange waterfront.

5298.NAME: Fuzzy in the heat
5298.DESCRIPTION: The further into the island, the more things to do in all directions. Completing this objective will unlock three new ones.

5299.NAME: Left turn
5299.DESCRIPTION: Each time you complete a goal, you will be able to upgrade nearby stumps. You will also open up purchasing options in the store.

53.NAME: First flowers
53.DESCRIPTION: Make your island more beautiful with some flowers

530.NAME: Guests II
530.DESCRIPTION: Paprick and his friends are coming to visit. Prepare them a delicious lunch.

5300.NAME: Neglected island
5300.DESCRIPTION: Shocked by the amount of work, you, like a parrot, fell from the tree. You have to start little by little.

5301.NAME: Right turn
5301.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the stumps and move forward. Choose which direction you like better.

5302.NAME: Corn line
5302.DESCRIPTION: Parrot tries not to think about relaxing in the ocean. Work first, play latter.

5303.NAME: A place to camp
5303.DESCRIPTION: That's it, the day is over. Surfing has happened. The parrot deserves to rest.

5304.NAME: Despite the difficulties
5304.DESCRIPTION: Yes, it's hard, yes blisters and a sore back, but just like with farm work, you have to work on yourself constantly.

5305.NAME: A little rest
5305.DESCRIPTION: Having reached the end of the island, the parrot does not wait and tries the waves already in the middle of the day.

5306.NAME: Staring at the ocean
5306.DESCRIPTION: The entire long arm of the island is left behind. Each of these tasks will yield a surfboard.

5307.NAME: The lazy parrot
5307.DESCRIPTION: There are 55 tree stumps on the island from which a parrot can descend. Discover all the parrots.

5308.NAME: Parrot riddle A
5308.DESCRIPTION: Once in three days the parrot will ask riddles. Each riddle will help you get a surfboard.

5309.NAME: Parrot secret A
5309.DESCRIPTION: More experienced players will get more than one riddle. The second riddlewill be given to everyone who has visited Aldo Island.

531.NAME: Cudsy - the lazy-bones
531.DESCRIPTION: The local girl Cudsy is a true idler. She has plenty of tasks to finish. Help her, and you will have access to sloths at the shop.

5310.NAME: Parrot challenge A
5310.DESCRIPTION: This puzzle line is available after players complete the Nihiru Island quests.

5315.NAME: Parrot riddle B
5315.DESCRIPTION: Once in three days the parrot will ask riddles. Each puzzle will help you get a surfboard.

5319.NAME: Parrot riddle C
5319.DESCRIPTION: Once in three days the parrot will ask riddles. Each riddle will help you get a surfboard.

532.NAME: Sloths
532.DESCRIPTION: Now you can buy sloths at the shop. Practice growing them.

5323.NAME: Parrot riddle D
5323.DESCRIPTION: Once in three days the parrot will ask riddles. Each riddle will help you get a surfboard.

5327.NAME: Parrot riddle E
5327.DESCRIPTION: Once in three days the parrot will ask riddles. Each riddle will help you get a surfboard.

533.NAME: Remove the pile of rocks
533.DESCRIPTION: It is time to reveal the rest of the island! Gyckott has talked the local senior council into helping you.

5331.NAME: Parrot riddle F
5331.DESCRIPTION: Once in three days the parrot will ask riddles. Each riddle will help you get a surfboard.

5336.NAME: First year
5336.DESCRIPTION: On 25th of july year 2023 Oceania rose from the depths of the ocean. Since then many people have been washed upon the shores of this tropical island.

5337.NAME: A joyfull occasion
5337.DESCRIPTION: You have a visitor, a special guest for this happy occasion. To earn the rainbow sheep finish this simple quest.

534.NAME: Powder
534.DESCRIPTION: The elder of the local council has agreed to help you. Submit the following items and he will make some powder that is necessary for the explosive.

5346.NAME: Jellyfish power
5346.DESCRIPTION: When you drink from the well, you feel a rush of strength. The next bucket brings the jellyfish out of the well.

5347.NAME: Rainwater
5347.DESCRIPTION: A jellyfish-shaped cloud fell over several parts of the island, strengthening them. These tasks will give you power potions.

5348.NAME: Storing the nectar
5348.DESCRIPTION: After the rain soaks in, the tree trunks are covered in a strange inedible resin.

5349.NAME: Large volumes
5349.DESCRIPTION: No matter what recipe you use, only your jelly friends can enjoy the gummy potion.

535.NAME: Obtain explosives
535.DESCRIPTION: Cedrick has agreed to make an explosive for blowing up the pile of rocks.

5350.NAME: Jellyfish cloud
5350.DESCRIPTION: Time clears, the cloud of jellyfish power slowly fades away. Hurry and get this power while you still can.

5351.NAME: Water proccessing
5351.DESCRIPTION: Weather clears, the cloud of jellyfish power slowly fades away. Hurry and get this power while you still can.

5352.NAME: Amber drink
5352.DESCRIPTION: The enhanced jellyfish are hidden right here on this island. Perhaps a delicious cookie will be able to lure them out.

5353.NAME: Enjoying rainfall A
5353.DESCRIPTION: After the rain, unusual strength has also been observed in other outskirts of the Festival Island.

5354.NAME: Enjoying rainfall B
5354.DESCRIPTION: I guess the rain of power is not so good when things around you are getting stronger. The strong grass had to be trim for  three hours.

5355.NAME: Choosing flavour
5355.DESCRIPTION: Jellyfish definitely live on the island, but it is impossible to lure them out. Try adding flavor to the nectar.

5356.NAME: Choosing container
5356.DESCRIPTION: It may be that jellyfish are afraid of a clay bowl. How about other containers?

5357.NAME: Charming Jellyfishes
5357.DESCRIPTION: Strangely, the jellyfish are no longer interested in the nectar, but the wine glass left on the table is suddenly empty.

536.NAME: Obtain a lighter
536.DESCRIPTION: The powder will not explode without fire. You need a lighter. Murrick is said to have it. If you fulfill his tasks, you may get a lighter.

537.NAME: Industrious helper I out of III
537.DESCRIPTION: The senior council has announced a contest: "Who is the most industrious helper?" Help friends with various tasks and receive a special reward.

538.NAME: Industrious helper II out of III
538.DESCRIPTION: The senior council has announced a contest: "Who is the most industrious helper?" Help friends with various tasks and receive a special reward.

539.NAME: Industrious helper III
539.DESCRIPTION: The senior council has announced a contest: "Who is the most industrious helper?" Help friends with various tasks and receive a special reward.

5391.NAME: Stars on the lawn
5391.DESCRIPTION: When an unusually large tidal wave rose above the islands of Oceania, a shower of stars began to fall from the blue-water sky. Don't get me wrong, they were real starfish that the big wave threw onto the sand of an Oceanian island.

5392.NAME: Star Island
5392.DESCRIPTION: Pilot Aldo is used to seeing a sheet of stars above his head, currently stars are visible both in the sky and on the ground.

5393.NAME: Frogs with hats
5393.DESCRIPTION: This island is home to frogs with magic hats. Hiding from the rain of stars, frogs hid inside hats.

5394.NAME: Merchant
5394.DESCRIPTION: The island is small, but there was also a merchant who made friends with lobsters. Look, see where the merchant's house is!

5395.NAME: The long journey
5395.DESCRIPTION: There are more frogs and shells on the island than you need to complete the objective.

5396.NAME: Lobster feeding
5396.DESCRIPTION: Lobsters live in a local cave, you can get energy by visiting it. Feed the lobsters and lure them out of the cave.

5397.NAME: Other delivery
5397.DESCRIPTION: Usually a trader has enough camels to trade with lobsters, but now there is an emergency.

5398.NAME: Keep cleaning up
5398.DESCRIPTION: Little by little, well-trodden paths appear on the island. The camel caravan slowly resumes its movement.

5399.NAME: Caravan road
5399.DESCRIPTION: The more caravans are sent, the more hats and feathers attached to the hats are recovered.

54.NAME: Flower garden
54.DESCRIPTION: Create a flower garden on the island

540.NAME: Tussy's helper I out of II
540.DESCRIPTION: Tussy's house and its surroundings need some work. Help her and receive a special reward.

5400.NAME: Lost stock
5400.DESCRIPTION: Shells were not the only cargo of the camels. Other shipments were also lost during the high tide.

5401.NAME: Among the stars
5401.DESCRIPTION: It's a surreal feeling when there are so many stars around you. Thanks to lobsters will no longer need to live in caves.

5403.NAME: Excitement
5403.DESCRIPTION: A Papuan priest, the Howling Squid, sees the destructive tidal wave as a bad omen.

541.NAME: Tussy's helper II
541.DESCRIPTION: Tussy's house and its surroundings need some work. Help her and receive a special reward as well as 1500 sea shells.

542.NAME: Making torches
542.DESCRIPTION: To enter the mines, you will need a torch.

5478.NAME: School assistant
5478.DESCRIPTION: What started as a helping hand in the school's daily work soon turned into a spooky adventure... .

5479.NAME: The Dark Garden
5479.DESCRIPTION: A short trip to nature. A quick round trip, it shouldn't take long.

5480.NAME: Curse of Darkness
5480.DESCRIPTION: Evil reigns in the garden. Until you dispel the darkness, you will remain a goat. Start getting and sharing lamps.

5481.NAME: The noisy curse
5481.DESCRIPTION: Screaming cursed bushes can wake even the dead from their sleep. One of the reasons why there is a sense of unease in the local cemetery.

5482.NAME: The barbed curse
5482.DESCRIPTION: A few minutes' walk on the island and you are already bleeding. The curse has sharpened every twig and creeping root.

5483.NAME: The Red Diplomat
5483.DESCRIPTION: You will need an intermediary to grow other vegetables. No sane kid will want to grow up when there are specters around.

5484.NAME: Curse weavers
5484.DESCRIPTION: Evil energy can be woven, spun and bound into experiential events. Spinners arrive in the garden.

5485.NAME: Unikālais pildījums
5485.DESCRIPTION: Medicines rarely taste good. The candied worms have created specially stuffed beetles.

5486.NAME: Good will
5486.DESCRIPTION: No one has forgotten about the goat. All this time, you could speak to the goat with heartfelt wishes.

5487.NAME: Care of the rose garden
5487.DESCRIPTION: The rose garden is no longer tormented by darkness and screams. There was an uneasy, thoughtful silence.

5488.NAME: Forming a rose garden
5488.DESCRIPTION: Frightened by the curse, the inhabitants of the rose garden are in no hurry to return. help in the matter.

5489.NAME: The forgotten goal
5489.DESCRIPTION:
Did you already forget about ivy branches for Biology class? There are still doubts that the bushes will not start howling again.
You can't fix bushes with candies, thus you will howl at the howlers.

549.NAME: Oceania's birthday!
549.DESCRIPTION: Paprick and Oceania celebrate their birthday!

55.NAME: Upgrade workshop
55.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade your workshop to the next level to unlock new crafting formulas

550.NAME: Longest sand path
550.DESCRIPTION: Set a record by making the longest sand path.

551.NAME: Turrick becomes a carpenter I out of II
551.DESCRIPTION: Turrick dreams of becoming a carpenter. Since he has no prior knowledge, teach him a thing or two about joinery.

552.NAME: Turrick becomes a carpenter II
552.DESCRIPTION: Turrick dreams of becoming a carpenter. Since he has no prior knowledge, teach him a thing or two about joinery.

553.NAME: Miss Oceania I
553.DESCRIPTION: The senior council of the village has decided to organize "Miss Oceania" beauty pageant for the local girls. If you fulfill a few council's tasks, you will be allowed to be on the jury.

554.NAME: Miss Oceania II
554.DESCRIPTION: The senior council of the village has decided to organize "Miss Oceania" beauty pageant for the local girls. If you fulfill a few council's tasks, you will be allowed to be on the jury.

555.NAME: Miss Oceania III
555.DESCRIPTION: The senior council of the village has decided to organize "Miss Oceania" beauty pageant for the local girls. If you fulfill a few council's tasks, you will be allowed to be on the jury.

556.NAME: Microphone I out of II
556.DESCRIPTION: Paprick's friend Turrick will give you one of his home-made microphones if you fulfill his tasks.

5564.NAME: The most beautiful scarf
5564.DESCRIPTION: Cold winds blow from the ocean. The mythical iceberg no longer surprises you, at the end of December a guest is expected, finally you can put on your most beautiful scarf.

5565.NAME: Hitch a ride
5565.DESCRIPTION: All you have to do is step ashore and wave your hands to make the iceberg stop at your stop.

5566.NAME: Spruces
5566.DESCRIPTION: The island is still adorned with last year's magnificent fir trees. Your tree is ready, so let's help the people decorate theirs.

5567.NAME: Hustle and bustle
5567.DESCRIPTION: Spruces are growing rapidly, and the cut branches are taking root well. At these rates, it won't be difficult to provide a Christmas tree for each of the decorations.

5568.NAME: Gift spruces 1 of 2
5568.DESCRIPTION: Papuan Ajo is diligently distributing the Christmas trees you have donated to all the Papuans in the area. Meanwhile, other guests also want to receive Christmas trees.

5569.NAME: Gift spruces 2 of 2
5569.DESCRIPTION: The skeleton also visited Shaman Island, Shepherd Gonzo and some other islands along the way. The Christmas trees were successfully delivered.

557.NAME: Microphone II
557.DESCRIPTION: Paprick's friend Turrick will give you one of his home-made microphones if you fulfill his tasks.

5570.NAME: Winter evenings
5570.DESCRIPTION: Candles in a Christmas tree provide a romantic, subtle light. For a proper celebration, more light will be needed.

5571.NAME: White light
5571.DESCRIPTION: To make the island bright, you will have to light the island's lamps. This job is better left to the forest gnomes.

5572.NAME: Fixing lanterns
5572.DESCRIPTION: If you get all the materials for the elf's workshop, you will soon be able to light all the lanterns on the island.

5573.NAME: Animals 1 of 2
5573.DESCRIPTION: The island elves have full hands and gloves on each hand. The gloves can be taken off when the work is finished.

5574.NAME: Animals 2 of 2
5574.DESCRIPTION: Don't forget to take the mittens you find to the elf's  workshop. It's hard to make bright lanterns with frozen hands.

5575.NAME: Crops 1 of 2
5575.DESCRIPTION: Elves are excellent at weaving, braiding, carving, and pottery. Elves can create from anything you give them.

5576.NAME: Crops 2 of 2
5576.DESCRIPTION: In this forest, ice is both a body and a binder for construction. It is not suitable for filling, though.

5577.NAME: Žibintų sveikinimai
5577.DESCRIPTION: The island shines with brilliance. As lanterns emit light, so do gifted friends.

558.NAME: Miss Oceania IV
558.DESCRIPTION: The senior council of the village has decided to organize "Miss Oceania" beauty pageant for the local girls. If you fulfill a few council's tasks, you will be allowed to be on the jury.

559.NAME: Patient animal feeder
559.DESCRIPTION: Feed grown-up animals and, for these three tasks, you will receive a peacock.

5597.NAME: Poinsettia Island
5597.DESCRIPTION: Hey, poinsettias are blooming on a remote island. No work will be required, the island is meant for enjoyment.

56.NAME: Craft planks
56.DESCRIPTION: Learn the new workshop features by crafting planks

560.NAME: Build an Easter swing
560.DESCRIPTION: An old local saying: If you swing on Easter, mosquitoes will not touch you for the rest of the year.

5609.NAME: Winter Cup 2025. I
5609.DESCRIPTION: This quest line is not worth rushing. The most difficult thing that will await you in this line will be harvesting pumpkins.

5610.NAME: Winter Cup 2025. II
5610.DESCRIPTION: If you can't reach a field, it's very likely that you forgot to sell a hard-to-see wax bee.

5611.NAME: Winter Cup 2025. III
5611.DESCRIPTION: Special rock gardens are designed for obtaining cactus flowers. There is no task dedicated to them in this competition.

5612.NAME: Winter Cup 2025. Bronze
5612.DESCRIPTION: Completing this objective will earn you a Bronze Snowglobe. Remember, all three snowglobes are needed to fight for the cup.

5613.NAME: Winter Cup 2025. IV
5613.DESCRIPTION: Think about rubber trees, the next round will require several hundred cuts on these types of trees.

5614.NAME: Winter Cup 2025. V
5614.DESCRIPTION: Just because a task is easier doesn't mean it's immediately worth doing. Space on this island is limited.

5615.NAME: Winter Cup 2025. VI
5615.DESCRIPTION: Grape seedlings can be obtained in several ways. Here's something to think about while you complete these tasks.

5616.NAME: Winter Cup 2025. Silver
5616.DESCRIPTION: Completing this objective will give you a Silver Snowglobe. Remember, all three snowglobes are needed to fight for the cup.

5617.NAME: Winter Cup 2025. VII
5617.DESCRIPTION: The next stage of gold quests will require fuel oil pumps. Plan routes according to the situation.

5618.NAME: Winter Cup 2025. VIII
5618.DESCRIPTION: You will need a large supply of sandstone and savanna grass for this competition. For example, to build figurines.

5619.NAME: Winter Cup 2025. IX
5619.DESCRIPTION: The pythons, at least on the first night, will let the players sleep. Other things can also be adjusted to this rhythm.

562.NAME: Tyckott knows! I
562.DESCRIPTION: You are visited by an old local man Tyckott who promises to give you information about the final part of the island in exchange for a couple of things.

5620.NAME: Winter Cup 2025. Gold
5620.DESCRIPTION: Completing this objective will give you a Golden Snowglobe. Remember, all three snowglobes are needed to fight for the cup.

5621.NAME: Python task 1 of 2
5621.DESCRIPTION: Five pairs of eyes will be watching you in this competition. Let's meet, this hairy python is called Dakota.

5623.NAME: Cup 2025 reminder
5623.DESCRIPTION:
This is a reminder, cups will be awarded based on who completes this task the fastest.
Cups will be distributed only AFTER THE END OF THE COMPETITION.
Completion of this task is mandatory to qualify as a cup recipient.

5624.NAME: Python exercise 2 of 2
5624.DESCRIPTION: Huricane talismans can also be used to remove ice crystals. However, bridges are more important! Work wisely!

5625.NAME: Silver break
5625.DESCRIPTION: The competition judge pulls you aside for a serious conversation. Prepearing workshop stuff before is a game of chance. May the judge appreciate your diligence and ingenuity, this time, before continuing the silver line, complete this small task.

5626.NAME: Romantic birds
5626.DESCRIPTION: The rooster and hen eagerly raise their legs and walk in circles. It is possible that the birds' legs are simply cold, but it is also possible that they have been touched by the touch of a warm spirit.

5627.NAME: A sincere festival
5627.DESCRIPTION: During romantic days, dimly lit niches and corners to hide from prying eyes are especially popular.

5628.NAME: Cloudy joy
5628.DESCRIPTION: Winter and cold have made the flowers pale and sad. To find a solution to the problem, you will have to use chemistry.

5629.NAME: Romantic corner
5629.DESCRIPTION: You feel a romantic, warm touch trying to push you forward. Just a little more patience.

563.NAME: Tyckott knows! II
563.DESCRIPTION: Continue fulfilling Tyckott's tasks and he will tell you how to reach the final part of the island.

5630.NAME: Sincere words
5630.DESCRIPTION: When you return from caffe, you feel you are no longer alone. A romantic spirit is following you.

5631.NAME: Eager spirits
5631.DESCRIPTION: Such spirit is not one of a kind, they flock to romantinc areas, further increasing warm atmosphere.

5632.NAME: Siren's Song
5632.DESCRIPTION: Don't overdo it. Familiar voices are carried on the wave crests, someone is in a good mood right now.

5633.NAME: Golden Fish Island
5633.DESCRIPTION: This relative of the brown agae is found in freshwater pools, so why is a whole mountain of this golden wonder visible on the horizon?

5634.NAME: Algae and Vines
5634.DESCRIPTION: On the rich fertile land, bushes grow wildly, the root network has turned the island into a massive raft.

5635.NAME: Mermaids Visiting
5635.DESCRIPTION: On the island, you meet the well-known Oceanian mermaids. When the island appeared, the mermaids took the opportunity to enjoy and settled on the beach.

5636.NAME: Practical Delfina
5636.DESCRIPTION: The scent under the water will mix with the water and quickly fade. A way should be found to fill perfume bottles.

5637.NAME: Charlotte's Suggestion
5637.DESCRIPTION: According to Charlotte, almost everything necessary to preserve this scent for later use is right here on the island.

5638.NAME: Saffron Wine
5638.DESCRIPTION: Combining golden fish with saffron strands resulted in a bitter saffron wine. Perhaps honey should be added.

5639.NAME: Bud Wine
5639.DESCRIPTION: Lilac flowers and saffron strands. Tasteless. The barrels need to be rubbed with charcoal, otherwise the wine will taste like rainwater.

564.NAME: Tyckott knows! III
564.DESCRIPTION: Continue fulfilling Tyckott's tasks and he will tell you how to reach the final part of the island.

5640.NAME: Golden algae wine
5640.DESCRIPTION: You can't fit the whole island into barrels, so use the best parts of the island, namely golden fish ants and lilac flowers.

5641.NAME: Sinking Island
5641.DESCRIPTION: Did we mention that the island floats? Filling the barrels sank the island by a few centimeters.

5642.NAME: Home Delivery 1 of 3
5642.DESCRIPTION: The island will be sunk at the most convenient place for the mermaids. Prepare for this event in advance.

5643.NAME: Home Delivery 2 of 3
5643.DESCRIPTION: It's time to move the island to the sinking location. Getting this green raft moving won't be easy.

5644.NAME: Home Delivery 3 of 3
5644.DESCRIPTION: We have reached the sinking location. All that's left is to load the island sufficiently and the job will be done.

5645.NAME: Wave Goodbye
5645.DESCRIPTION: The island sinks, and the mermaids wave goodbye to you. The barrels have been delivered exactly where needed. From here, the ladies will manage on their own.

5646.NAME: New dress
5646.DESCRIPTION: In honor of International Women's Day, a beautiful dress was ordered. Seamstress Nadine will sew this dress for you if you provide some materials.

5649.NAME: Building Boom
5649.DESCRIPTION: The third neighbor has come to borrow nails. Suspicious. Where did this sudden interest in construction come from?

565.NAME: Myckott knows! I
565.DESCRIPTION: Tyckott has sent his brother Myckott who is the true source of information about the final part of the island. He will tell you everything if you fulfill his tasks.

5650.NAME: Stylish Houses
5650.DESCRIPTION: The photos in the magazine were taken just around the corner. Let's see if the exhibits are still on display.

5651.NAME: Visit the Construction Island
5651.DESCRIPTION: The photo session is missed. The stylish furniture cannot be viewed or touched.

5652.NAME: Tower Materials
5652.DESCRIPTION: I still think that a tower made from a trunk is the best design option. We will need some things for construction.

5653.NAME: Asian Manor Resources
5653.DESCRIPTION: In a civilized environment, you don't have to do everything yourself. Traders exist so you can exchange your work for what you need.

5654.NAME: Organize the Growing Plot
5654.DESCRIPTION: Gonzo has persuaded the craftsmen to help. The Volcano god also knows some traders with materials.

5655.NAME: Return to the Alley
5655.DESCRIPTION: Note that the New Construction displays accumulated materials. This peculiar board is very useful.

5656.NAME: Baobab Line
5656.DESCRIPTION: Choose to arrange the manor or build a tower from the baobab. You will only be able to COMPLETE ONE of the two tasks.

5657.NAME: Asian Manor Line
5657.DESCRIPTION: Choose to build the manor or arrange a house inside the baobab trunk. You will only be able to COMPLETE ONE of the two tasks.

5659.NAME: Baobab Line II of IV
5659.DESCRIPTION: If you choose the Baobab line, these tasks will be more advantageous for you.

566.NAME: Myckott knows! II
566.DESCRIPTION: Myckott will tell you everything about the final part of the island if you fulfill these tasks.

5660.NAME: Baobab Line III of IV
5660.DESCRIPTION: To receive the Baobab IV task, it will be necessary to complete both this and the Manor Line II task.

5661.NAME: Baobab Line IV of IV
5661.DESCRIPTION: Gonzo reminds you that the total amount of materials exceeds what is needed for construction. Working is good, but don't get carried away.

5662.NAME: Consequences of Choice
5662.DESCRIPTION: If you are not building the manor, then you need to find another use for the leftover materials.

5663.NAME: Manor Line II of IV
5663.DESCRIPTION: If you choose the Manor task line, these tasks will be more advantageous for you.

5664.NAME: Manor Line III of IV
5664.DESCRIPTION: To receive the Manor IV task, it will be necessary to complete both this and the Baobab Line II task .

5665.NAME: Manor Line IV of IV
5665.DESCRIPTION: The Volcano god advises not to get carried away. Continuing at this pace, there will be leftovers after construction. Count and think.

5666.NAME: Consequences of Choice
5666.DESCRIPTION: If you are not building the tower, then you need to find another use for the leftover materials.

5667.NAME: Helpful Tip
5667.DESCRIPTION: You will obtain special materials by completing Baobab or Manor line tasks. We remind you how to use these items.

5668.NAME: Build a Monument
5668.DESCRIPTION: Regardless of which monument you choose to build, each of the constructed stages gives nice rewards. It's not important to complete tasks; it's important to build one of the structures. Note that materials can be collected in several ways. By completing tasks, you will gain more raw materials and need to engage less in item exchange. By completing fewer tasks, you will need to be more active on the island. By working diligently, some line tasks may prove unnecessary.

567.NAME: Myckott knows! III
567.DESCRIPTION: Myckott will tell you everything about the final part of the island if you fulfill these tasks.

5671.NAME: What?
5671.DESCRIPTION: There is no logic to the tasks of the first of April, strange.

5672.NAME: What's next?
5672.DESCRIPTION: Searching for meaning at the start of April is like stroking a bun with noodles, you have to get off at the next bus stop.

5673.NAME: Further in the trees?
5673.DESCRIPTION:
What is the point anyway? For you, me, these skies, and all the chickenhood. Thick as kefir porridge, there is meaning to everything.
Wait, do you seriously take everything seriously? A tough case.

5674.NAME: April, what?
5674.DESCRIPTION: Keep in mind that today is the first of April. Things are going in the wrong direction, and everything is correct.

5675.NAME: Further in April?
5675.DESCRIPTION: If you hang the calendar upside down, the week starts with the weekend.

5676.NAME: April in the trees?
5676.DESCRIPTION: To make the task go smoother, we recommend making a picture with Paprick text. Why? You'll see in a moment.
