4026.DESCRIPTION: Admiral needed this metal object. Craft it 6 times.

4027.NAME: Shells from the deep
4027.DESCRIPTION: While fishing for shells he managed to catch several fish as well. Sell 5 of these fish.

4028.NAME: Sticky thing
4028.DESCRIPTION: Nearby Admiral found a thing that can be used as a glue. Gather this thing 50 times.

4029.NAME: Hammer
4029.DESCRIPTION: This elongated object Admiral used in the place of a hammer. Use this object 50 times.

403.NAME: Moon riddle II
403.DESCRIPTION: Chop down small or grown-up (but no just planted) tall palms as many times as there are tall palms on Paprick's island

4030.NAME: Local food
4030.DESCRIPTION: During the repairs Admiral lived on what he could find. Gather these edibles 60 times.

4031.NAME: Guest
4031.DESCRIPTION: Sometimes Admiral could see this forest animal in the distance. Feed it 30 times.

4032.NAME: Sleeping spot
4032.DESCRIPTION: Admirals sleeping space costs less than 10 shells in the shop. Sell 20 such things.

4033.NAME: Digging the canal
4033.DESCRIPTION: Shovel broke during the repairs. Gather 50 times thing, that Admiral used instead of a shovel.

4034.NAME: Important information
4034.DESCRIPTION: Before sailing the seas, you need to know all the conditions. Built this object 5 times.

4035.NAME: Uninitiated guests
4035.DESCRIPTION: It's not clear how this happened, but these horned animals had crawled into the boat. Sell 25 of these animals.

4036.NAME: Sticky situation
4036.DESCRIPTION: Admiral had to do this to escape drowning. Do this action 25 times.

4037.NAME: Eyes ahead
4037.DESCRIPTION: With his only eye, Admiral spotted land in the distance. Gather plant that allegedly improves eyesight 30 times.

4038.NAME: Excess weight
4038.DESCRIPTION: Sell objects with pearls, that Admiral had to throw overboard.

4039.NAME: Dry clothes
4039.DESCRIPTION: Admiral was wet trough the bone. Do the same thing the rinsed Admiral did.

404.NAME: Moon riddle III
404.DESCRIPTION: Craft the one thing which requires both clay and coal as many times as wood is required to craft a plank

4040.NAME: Sitting by the fire
4040.DESCRIPTION: Admiral was wet like a fish, but there's a special place for wet fishes. Use this building.

4041.NAME: Slouched hat
4041.DESCRIPTION: Admiral didn't slouch even if his hat did and with all that, a colorful butterfly landed on it. Gather them 2 times.

4042.NAME: Message in the bottle. Ingredient I
4042.DESCRIPTION: Message should be thrown in the sea. Buy the first ingredient 10 times.

4043.NAME: Message in the bottle. Ingredient II
4043.DESCRIPTION: Collect second ingredient 30 times. It's contents you can drink yourself.

4044.NAME: Smoke signals
4044.DESCRIPTION: Smoke signals can be sent with a hat. Admiral already has that you only need to provide the rest. Gather 100 units.

4045.NAME: Fire signal
4045.DESCRIPTION: Craft an object that can be used as signal fire in the workshop 15 times.

4046.NAME: Soft landing
4046.DESCRIPTION: Large sand field is a good landing spot. To make such a field you'll need 50 fields.

4047.NAME: Hat in the air
4047.DESCRIPTION: Out of joy Admiral threw his hat in the air but it didn't land down. Perform 10 actions so the hat can get down.

4048.NAME: Intruding animals
4048.DESCRIPTION: Story had to be cut short cause after dusk a swarm of annoying animals started harassing you. Sell 30 of them.

4049.NAME: Deserved rest
4049.DESCRIPTION: Don't be stingy with doubloons. Gift Admiral a hot bath. Sell one such object.

405.NAME: Corn - Level 5
405.DESCRIPTION: Harvest corn on your friend's islands

4050.NAME: Morning birds
4050.DESCRIPTION: To let Admiral properly rest, lock morning birds in a barn. Sell 50 of these birds.

4051.NAME: Placate the Queen I
4051.DESCRIPTION: The especially large bee angrily buzzed. Craft 3 drinks for particularly proud animals.

4052.NAME: Special home
4052.DESCRIPTION: Blueprint is ready. Buy 5 of the new beehives.

4053.NAME: Busy workers
4053.DESCRIPTION: These will be in different colour so you can tell them apart. Finish building the new hives.

4054.NAME: Cargo plane
4054.DESCRIPTION: Airfoil family plane needs to be refilled. Craft the needed item 15 times.

4055.NAME: Pies for the pilots
4055.DESCRIPTION: Make snacks for the long flight. Craft 30 of flyers favourite pies.

4056.NAME: Flowers for goodbyes
4056.DESCRIPTION: Craft 3 special flower presents to say farewell to Admiral.

4057.NAME: Gathering fish
4057.DESCRIPTION: Admiral wants to test this fishing tool. Use it 10 times.

4058.NAME: Stock for the travels
4058.DESCRIPTION: A long road is ahead of Admiral. Gather 2500 units of the most important thing.

4059.NAME: Sturdy decor
4059.DESCRIPTION: Toby insists that this flower needs to be brought along. Make 10 extra sturdy plants.

4060.NAME: Regain the lost
4060.DESCRIPTION: Craft the same cargo, that was thrown overboard.

4061.NAME: Chance to profit
4061.DESCRIPTION: Offer exclusive fabric, craft it 8 times.

4062.NAME: Plant in the name of an oceanian
4062.DESCRIPTION: Admiral's cargo will new 240 fresh vegetables.

4063.NAME: Honey animal
4063.DESCRIPTION: This is the biggest honey specialist in Oceania. Let him try the honey 50 times.

4064.NAME: Sweets for comparison
4064.DESCRIPTION: Buy five extra large portions of bee food, to perform a synchronised bee comparison.

4065.NAME: Old vs new
4065.DESCRIPTION: Knocking on the red roof 50 times proves, that the old stock is no worse.

4066.NAME: Zesty
4066.DESCRIPTION: To regain your feelings buy 30 zesty things.

4067.NAME: Salty
4067.DESCRIPTION: Too much zest! Spend 100 salty things.

4068.NAME: Sour
4068.DESCRIPTION: It's still not alright. Gather sour things 50 times.

4069.NAME: Placate the Queen II
4069.DESCRIPTION: It turned out to be a real glutton. All the usual bee food quickly disappeared. Sell 200 units.

407.NAME: Moon riddle III
407.DESCRIPTION: Craft the one thing which requires both clay and coal as many times as many different food sheds can be found in the shop.

4070.NAME: Placate the Queen III
4070.DESCRIPTION: All the planted large berries disappeared without a trace. Harvest 10 fields with this berry.

4071.NAME: Busy workers
4071.DESCRIPTION: The new species work with greater scope. Pay them attention, perform 7 actions.

408.NAME: Moon riddle IV
408.DESCRIPTION: Feed any grown up animal with horns as many times as much energy you had, when you were at level 1

409.NAME: Moon riddle V
409.DESCRIPTION: Dig fields as many times as Power elixir costs in rubies

41.NAME: Corn farmer
41.DESCRIPTION: Plant and gather 10 corn fields. You make corn pie out of them

410.NAME: Moon riddle VI
410.DESCRIPTION: Grow the plant without which cinemas would earn much less money as many times as there are small flowers on Paprick's island

411.NAME: Wheat - Level 3
411.DESCRIPTION: Harvest wheat on your friend's islands

412.NAME: Wheat - Level 4
412.DESCRIPTION: Harvest wheat on your friend's islands

413.NAME: Wheat - Level 5
413.DESCRIPTION: Harvest wheat on your friend's islands

414.NAME: Moon riddle VII
414.DESCRIPTION: Grow and harvest orange colored vegetable which can become very large as many times as it costs in shells

415.NAME: Moon riddle VIII
415.DESCRIPTION: Build as many stone gardens as many separate elements you needed for clay colossus (including its foundation)

416.NAME: Moon riddle IX
416.DESCRIPTION: Craft the thing which requires sheep to make it, as many times as you have free slots in timed crafting section

4160.NAME: Living quarters for koalas
4160.DESCRIPTION: Koalas spend almost all their lives in trees. Plant 20 trees so they can feel right at home.

4161.NAME: If drought comes up
4161.DESCRIPTION: Koalas usually don't drink, cause they get enough water from their food. Only during high drought they drink water.

4162.NAME: Prepare a meal
4162.DESCRIPTION: Grown koala consumes almost half a kilo leaves each night. Prepare 30 hay bundles for their meal.

4163.NAME: Special animal
4163.DESCRIPTION: Platypus is one of the rare mammals that lay eggs. Gather 30 eggs.

4164.NAME: Weird prosthesis
4164.DESCRIPTION: Platypuses lack proper teeth. That's way they keep stones in their beaks to grind food with.

4165.NAME: Prepare a meal
4165.DESCRIPTION: Platypuses mostly eat worms, maggots and other such things that live in water. Hand in 30 maggots.

4166.NAME: Prepare a meal
4166.DESCRIPTION: Wallabies are plant eaters and eat various leaves, roots and fruits. In captivity they are often fed carrots. Harvest carrots.

4167.NAME: It won't quench your thirst
4167.DESCRIPTION: Wallabies are one of there are animals that can quench thirst with salt water. It's needed to boil eggs as well.

4168.NAME: A place where to splash
4168.DESCRIPTION: Wallabies are not only great jumpers, but also quick swimmers. Built a clay pool for them to swim in.

417.NAME: Onions - Level 1
417.DESCRIPTION: Harvest onions on your friend's islands

4170.NAME: Clear a path
4170.DESCRIPTION: Some trees are blocking the road, remove them to reach turtles.

4171.NAME: Clear the bushes
4171.DESCRIPTION: Smoe bushes are obstructing your path. Clear 2 bushes.

4172.NAME: Feed a turtle
4172.DESCRIPTION: This turtle will eat only special fishes. Don`t forget to bring keys, for opening the boxes.

4173.NAME: Collect fishes
4173.DESCRIPTION: Fish hunter loves to eat bugs. Feed fish hunter with a special bug.

4174.NAME: Collect worms
4174.DESCRIPTION: Give the worm hunter bird two fishes and he will reward you with two worms.

4175.NAME: Open one chest
4175.DESCRIPTION: Open any of the chests, the contents of the chests vary.

4176.NAME: Hissing Shamans
4176.DESCRIPTION: Shamans believe that there is magic in snakes too. They will help make the ritual stronger. Sell snakes to the shamans.

4177.NAME: Foundation of Spells
4177.DESCRIPTION: A ritual spell must be written on paper for it to work. Prepare the parchment.

4178.NAME: Form of the Spell
4178.DESCRIPTION: For the spell to work well, it must be written with high-quality paint. Create the high-quality paint.

4179.NAME: Stable Foundation
4179.DESCRIPTION: Prepare sandstone blocks for the altar's foundation.

418.NAME: Onions - Level 2
418.DESCRIPTION: Harvest onions on your friend's islands

4180.NAME: Pure Foundation
4180.DESCRIPTION: Salt will help cleanse the magic in the statue from Ahao's evil. Use the salt.

4181.NAME: Taming the Earth
4181.DESCRIPTION: There is power in the stones of the earth too. Quartz will help concentrate the magical energy. Submit the quartz.

4182.NAME: Air Trapped in the Earth
4182.DESCRIPTION: Volcanic rocks are porous and combine the elements of earth and air. Use the volcanic rocks.

4183.NAME: Seeking Direction
4183.DESCRIPTION: Weather vanes show the wind its path. They will also guide your thoughts. Build the weather vanes.

4184.NAME: Taming the Air
4184.DESCRIPTION: The wind easily catches in the long feathers of a pheasant. Submit the pheasant feathers.

4185.NAME: Inhabitants of the Depths
4185.DESCRIPTION: Hammerhead sharks are hard to catch, but they might know a lot about the depths of the water. Sell them!

4186.NAME: Holding Water
4186.DESCRIPTION: A camel, even in the hot desert, can retain water for a long time. It surely knows a lot about it! Feed the camel.

4187.NAME: Taming the Water
4187.DESCRIPTION: Deepwater is gathered in pink swirl-shells. It will be perfect for the ritual! Submit the pink swirl-shells.

4188.NAME: Burning Nature
4188.DESCRIPTION: Among plants, chili has the most fire. Harvest chili on Shaman Island.

4189.NAME: Burning the Air
4189.DESCRIPTION: In the light of wax candles, the words of the spell will sound stronger. Sell the wax candles.

419.NAME: Onions - Level 3
419.DESCRIPTION: Harvest onions on your friend's islands

4190.NAME: Taming the Fire
4190.DESCRIPTION: Fire is hidden in the lighter. Submit the lighter.

42.NAME: Wheat farmer
42.DESCRIPTION: Plant and gather 10 wheat fields. You can use them to bake wheat bread

420.NAME: Star riddle I
420.DESCRIPTION: Get the blackest and dirtiest resource as many times as many different tools you can find in your bag.

421.NAME: Star riddle II
421.DESCRIPTION: Grow and harvest the plant that is "required" to make a snowman as many times as you get energy if you eat delicious cake.

4213.NAME: Get a holliday key
4213.DESCRIPTION: The keys from the boxes are long lost, but the strange device can help in recovering them.

4214.NAME: Feed a holliday turtle
4214.DESCRIPTION: Your path is blocked by a turtle, who loves bugs. Feed him, and he will leave.

422.NAME: Star riddle III
422.DESCRIPTION: There's a yellow duck floating in one of the decorations. Find it and build it

423.NAME: Onions - Level 4
423.DESCRIPTION: Harvest onions on your friend's islands

4235.NAME: Chicken for Cudsy
4235.DESCRIPTION: Cudsy want's to talk in local chicken to create wonders. Sell 20 chickens to Cadsy.

4236.NAME: Eggs for Tussy
4236.DESCRIPTION: Tussy thinks that the secret is how you cook the eggs. Cook 10 eggs.

4237.NAME: Corn for Paprick
4237.DESCRIPTION: Paprick will try to lure wonderchickens with corn meal. Give 15 corn.

4238.NAME: go to Festival island
4238.DESCRIPTION: Turrick announces competition of wonderegg crafting. Go there and take a part of it.

4239.NAME: Buy frame of Wood wonderegg
4239.DESCRIPTION: Turrick have created frames for wondereggs. You can trade them for golden chicken's at store section BUILDINGS.

424.NAME: Onions - Level 5
424.DESCRIPTION: Harvest onions on your friend's islands

4240.NAME: Start to build Wood wonderegg
4240.DESCRIPTION: When You place frame on the island it's time to start to work. Build wonderegg 8 times.

4241.NAME: Build Wood wonderegg
4241.DESCRIPTION: Finish to create Wood wonderegg and let Turrick to see is it good enough.

4242.NAME: Egg masterclass I
4242.DESCRIPTION: Your talent is beyond competition. Create any 3 wondereggs.

4243.NAME: Egg masterclass II
4243.DESCRIPTION: I see that Your getting really good at it. Create any 5 wondereggs.

4244.NAME: Egg masterclass III
4244.DESCRIPTION: Lets suprise The natives with great number of eggs. Show what You got, create any 9 wondereggs.

4245.NAME: Chop any 10 trees
4245.DESCRIPTION: Next egg will be created from wood. Gather the materials.

4246.NAME: Gather shards
4246.DESCRIPTION: You will need fine carvings, what you will create with help of shards. Gather 15 shards.

4247.NAME: Frame of Wood wonderegg
4247.DESCRIPTION: After preparations in shop is available new frame. Buy frame of Wood wondereg.

4248.NAME: Buy glass
4248.DESCRIPTION: o create next egg You will need glass. Buy 3 pieces of glass.

4249.NAME: Create pearl paint
4249.DESCRIPTION: Turrick have trusted You special recepies. Open workshop section UNIQUE and create pearl paint.

425.NAME: Carrrots - Level 1
425.DESCRIPTION: Harvest carrots on your friend's islands

4250.NAME: Frame of Glass wonderegg
4250.DESCRIPTION: After preparations in shop is available new frame. Buy frame of Glass wondereg.

4251.NAME: Gather the pieces of iron
4251.DESCRIPTION: For this egg you will need to forge iron by special recepie. Gather 10 shards of iron.

4252.NAME: Pearl savings
4252.DESCRIPTION: Turrick is worried that You will run out of pearls to create enough paint. gather 10 pearls.

4253.NAME: Frame of Iron wonderegg
4253.DESCRIPTION: After preparations in shop is available new frame. Buy frame of Iron wondereg.

4254.NAME: Build clay table
4254.DESCRIPTION: When you work with gold You cant loose single shard of dust, thats why you need smooth sourface. Create clay table.

4255.NAME: Good meal
4255.DESCRIPTION: Take a good meal before work, that You wouldnt create mess eating while working. Create 350 units of food.

4256.NAME: Frame of Gold wonderegg
4256.DESCRIPTION: After preparations in shop is available new frame. Buy frame of Gold wondereg.

4257.NAME: Free the space on table
4257.DESCRIPTION: Please prepare before You start. Free up the space on table, sell 3 units of silk thread.

4258.NAME: Create model
4258.DESCRIPTION: Before this seriose project You must create model of it. Gather 25 units of clay.

4259.NAME: Frame of Royal wondereg
4259.DESCRIPTION: After preparations in shop is available new frame. Buy frame of Royal wondereg.

426.NAME: Star riddle IV
426.DESCRIPTION: Plant and harvest the plant that is needed to create nails as many times as an ostrich requires food

4260.NAME: Water for flowers
4260.DESCRIPTION: Hube amounts of flowers will need water. Give 30 units of water.

4261.NAME: Machetes for cake
4261.DESCRIPTION: You have the honor to cut celebration cake for event. Give 15 units of primitive machete.

4262.NAME: Chain for medal
4262.DESCRIPTION: You are congratulated with medal, but the ribbon is broken. Attach medal to golden chain.

4263.NAME: Color of milk
4263.DESCRIPTION: Next egg will have color of milk. Gather 15 units of milk to have something to compare with.

4264.NAME: Sheep feeding
4264.DESCRIPTION: You will need some wool thread. Feed lamb or sheep 35 times.

4265.NAME: Buy ostrich
4265.DESCRIPTION: Work with creation of wondereggs have used lots of your egg savings. Deal with that by buying 12 ostriches.

4266.NAME: Care for nature
4266.DESCRIPTION: Egg will need flowers. But you must not harm nature, so you need to put some in place. Sell 10 flower trees.

4267.NAME: Beeswax
4267.DESCRIPTION: To work with beeswax you need some experience. For training purposes gather 10 units of beeswax.

4268.NAME: Create Glass wonderegg
4268.DESCRIPTION: Glass are brittle and cranky to work with. Create Glass woneregg and see what will be Turricks judgement of it.

4269.NAME: Create Wood wonderegg
4269.DESCRIPTION: Its easy to work with wood and show your talent. Create Wood woneregg and see what will be Turricks judgement of it.

427.NAME: Star riddle V
427.DESCRIPTION: Grow and harvest as many wheat as is required to bake pumpkin pie

4270.NAME: Create Iron wonderegg
4270.DESCRIPTION: Iron is durable and that gives You chance to make unique forms. Create Iron woneregg and see what will be Turricks judgement of it.

4271.NAME: Create Gold wonderegg
4271.DESCRIPTION: jewelers work is particularly delicate. Create Gold woneregg and see what will be Turricks judgement of it.

4272.NAME: Create Royal wonderegg
4272.DESCRIPTION: This design will impress even the biggest critic. Create Royal woneregg and see what will be Turricks judgement of it.

4273.NAME: Listen to Easter-bunny I of VII

4274.NAME: Carving masterclass
4274.DESCRIPTION: Its easy to work with bone, it will be great material to test carwing skills. Gather 15 bones.

4275.NAME: Paint masterclass
4275.DESCRIPTION: If you will give him right materials, Bunny will show You best techniques. Give 15 blueberries.

4276.NAME: Masterclass of attitude
4276.DESCRIPTION: Small nice elements can create right feeling of work of art. Feed 30 baby meerkat.

4277.NAME: Listen to Easter-bunny II of VII

4278.NAME: Dig fields
4278.DESCRIPTION: In order to create Earth egg Bunny wil need earth. Dig fields 30 times.

4279.NAME: Gather clay
4279.DESCRIPTION: Some clay is needed to have good mass for Earth egg. Gather 20 units of clay.

428.NAME: Star riddle VI
428.DESCRIPTION: Harvest beans as many times as many chops are needed to remove the smallest rock

4280.NAME: Sense of responsibility
4280.DESCRIPTION: Bunny mentions, if You created hole in the ground then make a dyke. Build 1 dyke.

4281.NAME: Listen to Easter-bunny III of VII

4282.NAME: Dont forget meerkats
4282.DESCRIPTION: I hope You did not forget to feed Your meerkats. Feed grown meerkats 30 times.

4283.NAME: Fish soup
4283.DESCRIPTION: When you did fish pearls you did catch some sea gudgeons. Make a fish soup 15 times.

4284.NAME: Help Your friends
4284.DESCRIPTION: Bunny reminds You that you havn't helped your friends for a while. Make any 50 actions on Your friends islands.

4285.NAME: Listen to Easter-bunny IV of VII

4286.NAME: Gather water
4286.DESCRIPTION: Ice egg will need ice. You need to collect water to prepare for that. Gather 20 units of water.

4287.NAME: Watch the fireplace
4287.DESCRIPTION: Real Oceania resident won't allow fire to go out at his home. Use bonfire 3 times.

4288.NAME: Buy snowdrops
4288.DESCRIPTION: Bunny have heard that in Oceania You can buy snow together with the snowdrops. Buy 8 snowdrops.

4289.NAME: Listen to Easter-bunny V of VII

429.NAME: Star riddle IV
429.DESCRIPTION: Plant and harvest the plant that is needed to create nails as many times as an ostrich requires food

4290.NAME: Butterfly for inspiration
4290.DESCRIPTION: nature can create really great color palettes. Grow corn and gather 1 purple-wing nightfly.

4291.NAME: Beautiful feathers
4291.DESCRIPTION: Parrots have really beautifull feathers, take a closer look. Gather 1 parrot feather by feeding ducks.

4292.NAME: Collect spider
4292.DESCRIPTION: Some spider nets have fantastic patterns. Cut down broad palms to gather 1 spider.

4293.NAME: Listen to Easter-bunny VI of VII

4294.NAME: Plants for composition
4294.DESCRIPTION: You will need a lot of fern to create forest background. At the same time have 15 units of fern on your island.

4295.NAME: Bunny composition
4295.DESCRIPTION: Little bunnies does look lovely. At the same time have 20 baby bunnies on your island.

4296.NAME: Flax
4296.DESCRIPTION: Flax sprouts gives You spring feeling. Plant flax 20 times.

4297.NAME: Listen to Easter-bunny VII of VII

4298.NAME: Medical knowledge
4298.DESCRIPTION: Cure 10 animals on friends islands (maybe meerkat).

4299.NAME: Obsidian trader
4299.DESCRIPTION: Probably You don't remeber when was the last time You did sell obsidian. Open bag and sell obsidian 10 times.

4300.NAME: Remove fields
4300.DESCRIPTION: You live on this island for so long time. Do you remeber how to memove fields? Remove 30 fields.

432.NAME: Star riddle VII
432.DESCRIPTION: Build five times in the workshop the building resource that is in orange-red color

433.NAME: Star riddle VIII
433.DESCRIPTION: Build and sell the building that requires planks and wine to build it

434.NAME: Star riddle IX
434.DESCRIPTION: Buy so many torches in the shop that each native on Paprick's island could have 3 torches

435.NAME: Carrots - Level 5
435.DESCRIPTION: Harvest carrots on your friend's islands

4356.NAME: Study of rocks
4356.DESCRIPTION: Landscaping studies should begin with ordinary stones. Get the basic stone 15 times.

4357.NAME: Examine coal
4357.DESCRIPTION: Coal is softer than both stone and volcanic rock. Get 30 coal.

4358.NAME: Get volcanic rocks
4358.DESCRIPTION: Volcanic rocks are porous, so it would be easy for plants to take root in them. Collect 12 Volcanic Rocks.

4359.NAME: Grow carrots
4359.DESCRIPTION: Carrots are very close to the ground, so the shamans ask you to harvest 30 carrot fields.

436.NAME: Pumpkins - Level 1
436.DESCRIPTION: Harvest pumpkins on your friend's islands

4360.NAME: Sell your roosters
4360.DESCRIPTION: Roosters greet the sun every morning. To strengthen the connection with nature, 30 adult roosters are raised and sold.

4361.NAME: Harvest coconuts
4361.DESCRIPTION: Everything in nature flows and changes and rolls forward. Roll in step with nature and harvest coconuts 8 times.

4362.NAME: Fully green
4362.DESCRIPTION: Show Mother Nature your best skills! Complete the sculpture by fully covering it with greenery.

4364.NAME: Perform the ritual
4364.DESCRIPTION: Perform an action on Ahao statue to perform the ritual.

4365.NAME: Reach the Deep Underground
4365.DESCRIPTION: Find the stairs and go explore the darker depths of the underground.

4366.NAME: View the Road Sign
4366.DESCRIPTION: Deep underground is dark and quiet, perhaps the road sign will help find answers.

4367.NAME: Auxiliary Materials
4367.DESCRIPTION: It seems that recently seen lost bags may contain pulleys for moving stones. Secure a set of pulleys.

4368.NAME: Repair the Passage
4368.DESCRIPTION: Someone has dismantled the passage, leaving blocks right in the way, to get through, it will need to be repaired. Restore the underground passage.

4369.NAME: Underground Inhabitants
4369.DESCRIPTION: Once the path is cleared, it's time to find the deep underground inhabitants. Discover who lives in this underground.

437.NAME: Pumpkins - Level 2
437.DESCRIPTION: Harvest pumpkins on your friend's islands

4370.NAME: Talk to the Gnome
4370.DESCRIPTION: To start a conversation, click on the gnome with the left mouse button.

4371.NAME: Tried Technique
4371.DESCRIPTION: Once you managed to calm the gnome with horseradish, maybe it will work this time too?

4372.NAME: Gnome's Recipe
4372.DESCRIPTION: The gnome is right, anyone can collect horseradishes, but only a few know the special recipe. Submit the Horseradish Concentrate.

4373.NAME: Ask Frārs
4373.DESCRIPTION: Ask Frārs how to clear the passages of particularly large blocks. Click on Frārs.

4374.NAME: Light Repairs I
4374.DESCRIPTION: While Frārs prepares new pulleys, you'll have to make do with what you have. Use a simple set of pulleys.

4375.NAME: Heavy Repairs I
4375.DESCRIPTION:
The new pulleys seem more durable.
Find a passage where you could test the set of good pulleys and put it to use.

4376.NAME: Repair Passages I
4376.DESCRIPTION: Frārs will need time to prepare new pulleys. Meanwhile, you can finish repairing two of the existing passages.

4377.NAME: Talk to Frārs
4377.DESCRIPTION: Upon seeing you, Frārs hands you the newly finished pulleys. It seems Frārs has something to say, click on him.

4378.NAME: Light Repairs II
4378.DESCRIPTION: Good materials should be saved for the future, use one simple Pulley Set.

4379.NAME: Heavy Repairs II
4379.DESCRIPTION: In the toughest spots, you can't do without good pulleys. Use the Good Pulley Set.

438.NAME: Animal herder
438.DESCRIPTION: Help your friend feed animals. Spend 800 food by feeding animals on your friends' islands

4380.NAME: Fix passages II
4380.DESCRIPTION: Cooperation is a great skill. You've been trusted to fix to more passages. Meanwhile Fraer will make new pulleys.

4383.NAME: Extinguishing Bushes
4383.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps the thorns are not particularly valuable, but the fire must not be allowed to spread. Extinguish the burning thorns 36 times.

4384.NAME: Extinguishing Flames
4384.DESCRIPTION: Flame bubbles freely drift through the large underground hall. Fight the fire disaster, extinguish 20 flame bubbles.

4385.NAME: Help the Snails
4385.DESCRIPTION: The poor snails are suffering from stomach aches. Care for the sick snails until they are fully recovered.

4386.NAME: Find More Snails
4386.DESCRIPTION: One small snail will be lonely, find more by disturbing 3 old snails.

4387.NAME: Snail Breeding
4387.DESCRIPTION: Find a suitable place in this underground and place 3 snails.

4388.NAME: Snail Feeder
4388.DESCRIPTION: Be a caring snail breeder, feed the small snails 9 times.

4389.NAME: Snail Babies
4389.DESCRIPTION: Oceania lacks snail sellers, you'll have to feed 10 adult snails to get babies.

439.NAME: Quick garden helper
439.DESCRIPTION: Gather the fast growing plants (radish, beans, tomatoes, onions and strawberries)on your friends islands

4390.NAME: Snail Merchant
4390.DESCRIPTION: There is a high demand for your snails, sell 10 adult snails.

4391.NAME: Small Snail Merchant
4391.DESCRIPTION: There is also a high demand for small snails, place and sell 10 small snails.

4392.NAME: Friend of Snails
4392.DESCRIPTION: If you have freed 3 small snails from cages, Ulfars will recognize you as a friend of snails.

4393.NAME: Fire Warrior
4393.DESCRIPTION: Some snails underground have overeaten horseradishes and started spewing fire. Capture all the hot-headed troublemakers.

4394.NAME: Floods
4394.DESCRIPTION: A spring has flooded one of the underground halls, mop up all the puddles.

4398.NAME: Porous Rock
4398.DESCRIPTION: The first is a light and porous rock in a bright color, you need to obtain 5 such rocks.

4399.NAME: Rock Fragment
4399.DESCRIPTION: The second rock is actually a part of any large rock. Obtain this rock 30 times.

440.NAME: Garden helper
440.DESCRIPTION: Gather the moderately slowly growing plants (corn, blueberries, carrots, chilli and bananas)on your friends' islands

4400.NAME: The Most Valuable Rock
4400.DESCRIPTION: The third rock is a rare and very expensive mineral. Obtain this rock 3 times.

4401.NAME: Talk to Ulfars
4401.DESCRIPTION: To start talking to Ulfars, click on him.

4402.NAME: Try the New Pulleys
4402.DESCRIPTION: The new pulleys look very impressive, they must be tried! Find a suitable passage and use the Set of strong pulleys.

4403.NAME: Clearing the Passage
4403.DESCRIPTION: To reach the unexplored area, some obstacles still need to be overcome. Repair the underground passage.

4404.NAME: Another Gnome
4404.DESCRIPTION: Somewhere deep underground, footsteps can be heard, move forward and find the unknown gnome.

4405.NAME: Trapped Snails
4405.DESCRIPTION: It seems Galvira has set traps to reclaim the pets. Empty all the snail cages.

4406.NAME: Old Snails
4406.DESCRIPTION: Old, sluggish snails are easy to spot. Find all the old snails.

4407.NAME: Shortage
4407.DESCRIPTION: Snails are a good meal for underground monsters. To compensate for the shortage, submit 20 small snails.

441.NAME: Patient garden helper
441.DESCRIPTION: Gather the slow growing plants (pumpkins, coconuts, grapes, wheat, pitaya tree, pandanus tree and prickly melons) on your friends' islands

4410.NAME: Talk to Ulfars
4410.DESCRIPTION: Go to Ulfars and talk to him, click on him.

4411.NAME: Copper Skills
4411.DESCRIPTION: To prove your skills, you will have to forge something useful from copper in the workshop 6 times.

4412.NAME: Iron Skills
4412.DESCRIPTION: Quick work will not be accepted, prepare something useful from pure iron. Prepare reinforcement 6 times.

4413.NAME: Metal Expert
4413.DESCRIPTION: If you know both metals, then try using both simultaneously in the workshop 6 times.

4416.NAME: Underground Secret
4416.DESCRIPTION: It may happen that the underground will still manage to surprise you. Perhaps, over time, this puzzle will be unraveled...

442.NAME: Shell hunter
442.DESCRIPTION: Gain 200 shells when visiting your friends.

443.NAME: Experience gainer
443.DESCRIPTION: Gain 800 experience when visiting your friends.

444.NAME: Tomato soup
444.DESCRIPTION: Cook 10 portions of tomato soup in workshop

445.NAME: Blueberry drink
445.DESCRIPTION: Make 10 portions of blueberry drink in workshop

446.NAME: Spicy soup
446.DESCRIPTION: Cook 10 portions of spicy soup in workshop

4464.NAME: Make Torches
4464.DESCRIPTION: It would be worth experimenting in the workshop, maybe you could make brighter torches. Make torches 12 times.

4465.NAME: Buy Torches
4465.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps local traders have a better offer. Purchase 12 torches from the store.

4466.NAME: Hotter Fire
4466.DESCRIPTION: Try to obtain the hottest flame, maybe this way you can dispel the darkness.

4467.NAME: Advice from the Volcano God
4467.DESCRIPTION: Visit the Volcano God and perhaps receive an answer.

4468.NAME: Healer's Concerns
4468.DESCRIPTION: Your desire may bring misfortune to the island. I must be prepared, submit 50 bottles of medicine to me.

4469.NAME: Rice Expert
4469.DESCRIPTION: If you have my respect, then you have my favor. Grow 30 rice. If you are my friend, then you know how to grow rice.

4470.NAME: New Knowledge
4470.DESCRIPTION: Help would be useful! The book about eagles is missing some pages. Study the eagle of Aldo's island so I can recover the missing information.

4471.NAME: Underground Apprentice I
4471.DESCRIPTION: Before passing on our skills, you will have to prove yourself. Complete 15 limestone paths on any island.

4472.NAME: Underground Apprentice II
4472.DESCRIPTION: I am an expert in limestone sculptures, show what you can do. I want to see 6 turtle sculptures.

4473.NAME: Underground Apprentice III
4473.DESCRIPTION: Limestone is a very peculiar material. I want to see the finesse of your craftsmanship by making bird sculptures.

4474.NAME: Gold for Decorations
4474.DESCRIPTION: For the next masterpiece, I will need gold, maybe you want to exchange it for limestone?

4475.NAME: Wine Barrels
4475.DESCRIPTION:
I can exchange other stone reserves for wine barrels.
Sell 8 wine barrels.

4476.NAME: Stone Eaters
4476.DESCRIPTION: I am a practical gnome, I am only interested in materials that I can put to use. Make me purple stone eaters.

4477.NAME: Build a Jewel Table
4477.DESCRIPTION: Find the templates, place them, build! It's that simple!

4478.NAME: Build a Jewel Throne
4478.DESCRIPTION: Find the templates, place them, build! Don't ask silly questions! Smart questions are allowed.

4479.NAME: Mines Are Very Unsafe
4479.DESCRIPTION: With every stone we extract, the walls will become weaker. Provide timber, make 700 cuts in trees.

4480.NAME: Fuel for Light
4480.DESCRIPTION: To avoid getting lost in the dark, we will need to frequently refill the lanterns. Obtain 7 units of Fire-Oil.

4481.NAME: Meerkats for Safety
4481.DESCRIPTION: Only every 100th meerkat submits to my training, but this messenger will get through the landslide. Sell meerkats.

4482.NAME: Build an Underground Lantern
4482.DESCRIPTION: The task is clear and simple, inform me when the work is done.

4483.NAME: Silk Traps
4483.DESCRIPTION: For some unknown reason, underground ghosts dislike silk. Produce silk 12 times.

4484.NAME: Giant Noise
4484.DESCRIPTION: Spirits especially stir during loud noise. Prepare 30 lights simultaneously, then you can bring them here.

4485.NAME: Masks for Scaring
4485.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps you already noticed, the spirits are afraid of masks. Obtain a full collection to choose the most suitable ones.

4486.NAME: Ghost in the Workshop I
4486.DESCRIPTION: Try the first recipe for obtaining a blue spirit in the workshop.

4487.NAME: Ghost in the Workshop II
4487.DESCRIPTION: Try the second recipe for obtaining a blue spirit in the workshop.

4488.NAME: Marble Supplies
4488.DESCRIPTION: To make improvements, marble will be needed. Make sure you have at least 10 marble bricks in your bag.

4489.NAME: Redwood Supplies
4489.DESCRIPTION: To make improvements, redwood will be needed. Make sure you have at least 10 redwood planks in your bag.

449.NAME: Craft machetes
449.DESCRIPTION: Find machetes in workshop section OTHER and craft them

4490.NAME: Pearl Supplies
4490.DESCRIPTION: It is unknown how many pearls will be needed. Refresh your skills, obtain 12 pearls.

4491.NAME: Upgrade the Jewel Throne
4491.DESCRIPTION: Ulfar wishes for you to add something of yourself to the design. Upgrade the jewel throne and finish it.

4492.NAME: Upgrade the Jewel Table
4492.DESCRIPTION: Ulfars is convinced that your surface experience will be very useful. Upgrade the jewel table and finish it.

4493.NAME: Tincture for Snails
4493.DESCRIPTION: You will have to search for the tincture ingredients on the distant islands of Oceania. There is no other option except for making medicine in the workshop.

4494.NAME: Back Underground
4494.DESCRIPTION: Time for new discoveries, visit the deep underground once more!

4495.NAME: Iron Tables
4495.DESCRIPTION: Sturdy 3 tables will be needed to select useful books. Complete the iron tables.

4496.NAME: Feathers
4496.DESCRIPTION: To mark the places of interest to us, bookmarks will be needed. Obtain 7 feathers of any kind.

4497.NAME: Ink for Notes
4497.DESCRIPTION: Time to refill the ink pots, I think notes will pile up. Sell 3 octopuses from the bag.

4498.NAME: Treasure Cave
4498.DESCRIPTION: The texts mention that a mystical secret is engraved in this cave. Go there and explore it. Visit the treasure cave.

4499.NAME: Purchase Glass
4499.DESCRIPTION: The text specifically emphasized using only freshly made glass without memory. Buy glass from the store.

450.NAME: Test machetes
450.DESCRIPTION: Spend 10 earned machetes by cutting through the jungle tiles and earn 100 shells as a result

4500.NAME: Wax Candles
4500.DESCRIPTION: The second thing that will be needed is beeswax candles. Build 5 candles.

4501.NAME: Silver from the Store
4501.DESCRIPTION: Also, you need silver that hasn't belonged to you. Open the store and purchase silver doubloons.

4502.NAME: Snail Scroll
4502.DESCRIPTION: Examine the powerful words in the Snail Scroll, apply it.

4503.NAME: Earth Scroll
4503.DESCRIPTION: Clay and stone symbolize nature. Such a scroll is certainly made from valuable knowledge. Apply this scroll.

4504.NAME: Bee Scroll
4504.DESCRIPTION: This scroll has something mystical about it. Explore one such scroll by applying it.

4505.NAME: Mirror Making
4505.DESCRIPTION: Such a mirror cannot be bought, you will have to rely on your skills. Make a mirror in the workshop.

4506.NAME: Placing the Mirror
4506.DESCRIPTION: The mirror itself does not possess magic, however, placing it in the underground cave next to the Portal should make everything work.

4507.NAME: Bone Sample
4507.DESCRIPTION: The archaeologist wants to examine the previously found bones for comparison. Submit 30 bones.

4508.NAME: Clean the Sand
4508.DESCRIPTION: First, the top layer of light sand needs to be cleaned. Sell 15 sand paths.

4509.NAME: Dig into the Ground
4509.DESCRIPTION: With great excitement, the archaeologist hands you a shovel. Explore the soil, dig the ground 30 times.

451.NAME: Jungle treasures
451.DESCRIPTION: Start jungle explorer's business. Remove enough jungle to earn 500 shells

4510.NAME: Depths of the Earth
4510.DESCRIPTION: The claypit is deep enough for exploring lower layers. Use the claypit 15 times.

4511.NAME: Bean Harvest
4511.DESCRIPTION: Part of the digging area is under the bean beds. Harvest 30 bean fields.

4512.NAME: Tomato Harvest
4512.DESCRIPTION: It seems some bones need to be searched for in the tomato field. Harvest 15 tomato fields.

4513.NAME: Corn Harvest
4513.DESCRIPTION: To get to the bones, you'll need to mow the corn. Harvest 15 corn fields.

4514.NAME: Eggs
4514.DESCRIPTION: A little training won't hurt. Gently collect eggs 20 times.

4515.NAME: Feathers
4515.DESCRIPTION: Archeologist needs a feather duster, submit 10 hoopoe feathers for its preparation.

4516.NAME: Paths
4516.DESCRIPTION: To avoid raising dust near the bones, paths will be needed. Complete 20 paths.

4517.NAME: Sandstone
4517.DESCRIPTION: Rocks will be needed for geological dating. Provide 5 sandstones for research.

4518.NAME: Marking the Site
4518.DESCRIPTION: Archeologist wants to mark the excavation sites, special markers are to be made from planks. Use 50 planks.

4519.NAME: Shells
4519.DESCRIPTION: To prove that part of the island was once underwater, fish out 5 shells from the well.

452.NAME: Renew pavement
452.DESCRIPTION: Renew some of the discovered ancient pavement in the ancient city

4520.NAME: Tyrannosaurs
4520.DESCRIPTION: Some dinosaurs used to stand on 2 legs. Sell 30 meerkats for structural research.

4521.NAME: Pterosaurs
4521.DESCRIPTION: Could it have been a flying reptile? For special research, feed 20 adult roosters.

4522.NAME: Stegosaurs
4522.DESCRIPTION: Most ancient giants were quadrupedal creatures. Acquire 20 pigs.

4523.NAME: Lemonade
4523.DESCRIPTION: Archeologist is used to hot climates, cactus lemonade will surely please her. Prepare lemonade 35 times.

4524.NAME: Expanding Research
4524.DESCRIPTION: To Curiosity's delight, show enthusiasm. Explore a wider area. Dig the ground 35 times.

4525.NAME: Friend's Advice
4525.DESCRIPTION: Paprick is busy building guest houses. Complete the guest houses and Paprick will find some time for conversations with Curiosity.

4526.NAME: Bears
4526.DESCRIPTION: To carry such heavy bones, Bear strength is needed. Show your bears to the professional, sell them.

4527.NAME: Dogs
4527.DESCRIPTION: Bones are heavy, but sometimes strength lies in numbers. Raise 20 adult speckled dogs simultaneously.

4528.NAME: Fangs
4528.DESCRIPTION: Canines don't gnaw bones, but the found fangs suggest otherwise. Test this theory, feed 5 cheetahs.

4529.NAME: Sandwiches
4529.DESCRIPTION: The cartographer insists on living off sandwiches throughout the measurements. Prepare bread 15 times.

453.NAME: Explore jungle
453.DESCRIPTION: Go deep into the jungle and explore what hides in it

4530.NAME: Fans
4530.DESCRIPTION: The cartographer dislikes the heat, perhaps fans will help. Build fans on Atafu Island.

4531.NAME: Horse Feeding
4531.DESCRIPTION: The cartographer always travels on his trusty horse. Provide food and feed the noble Horse 15 times.

4532.NAME: Cutting Down Trees
4532.DESCRIPTION: Trees need to be removed carefully, a falling tree can crush bones. Make 80 cuts on Atafu Island trees.

4533.NAME: Thickets
4533.DESCRIPTION: Thorns, branches, and other sticks prevent turning around. Weed the thorn bushes on Atafu Island 30 times.

4534.NAME: Jungle Clearing
4534.DESCRIPTION: To clear the jungle, machetes will be needed. Provide 90 of any kind of machetes.

4535.NAME: Landmarks
4535.DESCRIPTION: Some landmarks are needed. Windmills, Sparkling Fountain, .. hmm, even an anthill will do.

4536.NAME: First Aid
4536.DESCRIPTION: Surprisingly, many have managed to injure themselves while taking measurements. Prepare first aid kits.

4537.NAME: Sending Signals
4537.DESCRIPTION: The distances between some Landmarks are quite large. Submit 15 silk fabrics for making signal flags.

4538.NAME: Search Team
4538.DESCRIPTION: Help will be needed to search the island. Persuade friends to help, perform 200 actions on friends' islands.

4539.NAME: View from the Water
4539.DESCRIPTION: Captain McManus suggested inspecting the coastline from the ship, but first, an octopus that might interfere needs to be caught.

4540.NAME: View from Above
4540.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps a view from above will provide a clue. Refuel Aldo's plane, submit 20 fire-oil.

4541.NAME: Fossils
4541.DESCRIPTION: Look, a fossil! Curiosity has often seen fossils in friends' clay pits, they are as interesting as bones. Find them!

4542.NAME: Bones
4542.DESCRIPTION: Dinosaurs have large bones, your help will be greatly appreciated. Collect bones on Atafu Island.

4543.NAME: Turtle Shells
4543.DESCRIPTION: Among the bones, turtle shells are also found, strange and interesting, usually seen in friends' bonfires. Find 7 turtle shells.

4544.NAME: Get Stones
4544.DESCRIPTION: This is a rarely ungrateful area, obstacles everywhere. Roll away the big stones.

4545.NAME: Remove Soil
4545.DESCRIPTION: This is a job for a hero! Dig up the soil and remove it. Sell 35 fields.

4546.NAME: Sponges
4546.DESCRIPTION: Any water or moisture will need to be removed. Prepare sharp sponges for moisture absorption.

4547.NAME: Food Storage
4547.DESCRIPTION: Modern food storages are ideally suited for storing sorted bones. Build storages.

4548.NAME: Weight Set
4548.DESCRIPTION: Bones can be sorted by shape and weight, huge weights will be needed. Prepare iron in the workshop.

4549.NAME: Strawberry Marking
4549.DESCRIPTION: To sort the bones, marking will be needed. All materials must be natural. Harvest 45 naturally red strawberry beds.

4550.NAME: Coconut Porridge
4550.DESCRIPTION: The sorters will need to be treated with delicacies to maintain energy.

4551.NAME: Light
4551.DESCRIPTION: Darkness does not scare the sorters. Prepare lava lamps, wax candles, mahogany lamps, or underground lanterns.

4552.NAME: Live Music
4552.DESCRIPTION: To cheer up the weary sorters, provide music. Go to Paprick Island and pay the musicians.

4553.NAME: Wax
4553.DESCRIPTION: A layer of wax will help repel moisture. Sell 20 units of wax from the bag.

4554.NAME: Milk
4554.DESCRIPTION: Tikots reminds that milk strengthens bones. It's unclear how this will help, but obtain 30 bottles of milk.

4555.NAME: Ants
4555.DESCRIPTION: Insects can cause serious damage to bones, perform prevention. Use 30 ants in any form.

4556.NAME: Bricks
4556.DESCRIPTION: Bricks may not be the most durable material, but they are light and geometrically correct. Prepare bricks.

4557.NAME: Cement
4557.DESCRIPTION: A strong binder will be needed for the foundation, use cement in any form.

4558.NAME: Soil Compaction
4558.DESCRIPTION: To compact the soil, Mikots suggests driving antelopes over the intended area. Sell 20 antelopes.

4559.NAME: Stegosaurus
4559.DESCRIPTION: Show the noble Stegosaurus. Allow visitors to see this dinosaur on Atafu Island. Move this dinosaur.

4560.NAME: Tyrannosaurus
4560.DESCRIPTION: Show the mighty Tyrannosaurus. Allow visitors to see this dinosaur on Atafu Island. Move this dinosaur.

4561.NAME: Pterosaurus
4561.DESCRIPTION: Show the agile Pterosaurus. Allow visitors to see this dinosaur on Atafu Island. Move this dinosaur.

4562.NAME: Sell Tyrannosaurus
4562.DESCRIPTION: The museum wants to exhibit your Tyrannosaurus for a while. Sell this dinosaur, the museum promises to provide you with another exhibit.

4563.NAME: Sell Pterosaurus
4563.DESCRIPTION: The museum wants to exhibit your Pterosaurus for a while. Sell this dinosaur, the museum promises to provide you with another exhibit.

4564.NAME: Sell Stegosaurus
4564.DESCRIPTION: The museum wants to exhibit your Stegosaurus for a while. Sell this dinosaur, the museum promises to provide you with another exhibit.

4565.NAME: Baked Hammerhead
4565.DESCRIPTION: Curiosity recalls a visit to Haraiki, so she offers to help serve Hammerhead in lemons, prepare this dish.

4566.NAME: Fruits
4566.DESCRIPTION: Friends offer their natural gifts. Go to friends and collect any table-worthy fruits.

4567.NAME: Cactus Flowers
4567.DESCRIPTION: Paprick promises to take care of the cocktails. You need to prepare "those funny umbrellas." Obtain cactus flowers.

4568.NAME: Swimming
4568.DESCRIPTION: Time to cool off! Build a plank, clay, or modern pool and enjoy swimming.

4569.NAME: Cats
4569.DESCRIPTION: Sometimes a good rest is enough with a cat curled up in your lap. Feed cats or kittens.

457.NAME: Buy machetes
457.DESCRIPTION: The natives will gladly trade machetes for food. Buy a pack of machetes in the shop section SPECIAL

4570.NAME: Provide a Blanket
4570.DESCRIPTION: Unnoticed, archeologist has fallen asleep and quietly murmurs to herself. Curiosity is already dreaming of the next discovery.

46.NAME: Gather bananas
46.DESCRIPTION: Clear the way to the banana palm and gather bananas, so that the next portion would start growing

466.NAME: Iron for the engineer
466.DESCRIPTION: An engineer has arrived on your island and will craft a cog for you. Craft and submit 2 units of iron

4661.NAME: Get the weird part
4661.DESCRIPTION: Weird part has stubbornly stuck and refuses to budge. Get 10 big stones to release it.

4662.NAME: Get coconuts
4662.DESCRIPTION: Paprick wanted to trade coconuts. Get 10.

4663.NAME: Show the metal object
4663.DESCRIPTION: It's not entirely clear what this object is. Show the weird part to Papric.

4664.NAME: Trade milk
4664.DESCRIPTION: Deliver on promised. Bring 20 milk bottles to Papric.

4665.NAME: Lever
4665.DESCRIPTION: considering the surroundings, the big stone will need to be rolled away. Cut 3 sturdy palms to make a lever.

4666.NAME: Splitting stones
4666.DESCRIPTION: There's an old and trusted method. Heat up the stone and then douse it with cold water. Use fireplace 4 times.

4667.NAME: Cutting stones
4667.DESCRIPTION: To search the pile of stones, some stones will need to be removed. Get 30 big stones.

4668.NAME: Visit Takiak island
4668.DESCRIPTION: There is no other option than visiting the natives again. Go to Takiak island.

4669.NAME: Hand in the first part
4669.DESCRIPTION: Words won't be enough. Let the native elders examine the first part.

467.NAME: Copper ore for the engineer
467.DESCRIPTION: He also needs 3 copper ore units

4670.NAME: Hand in the second part
4670.DESCRIPTION: Maybe the familiar shape will bring back some memories. Show the second part.

4671.NAME: Patience
4671.DESCRIPTION: Old people don't like to rush. Train patience, boil eggs 20 times.

4672.NAME: Lovely sit down
4672.DESCRIPTION: Sit down, talk about life and have a cup of tea with the honey cake you've brought. Make it 10 times.

4673.NAME: Experience exchange
4673.DESCRIPTION: Old people so rarely get to hear something new. Tell about your adventures. Get 2000 experience.

468.NAME: Monocle club member I
468.DESCRIPTION: To earn admittance to the club you have to earn 1800 reputation

4680.NAME: Building's corners
4680.DESCRIPTION: First you need to set the corners for the new building. Build any 4 stone fence corners.

4681.NAME: Safe floor
4681.DESCRIPTION: Both clay and stone will do for making the floor. Build 12 clay or stone paths.

4682.NAME: Building's walls
4682.DESCRIPTION: The walls as well need to be from inflammable materials. Build any 6 straight stone fences.

4683.NAME: Flower trees
4683.DESCRIPTION: In his old place the craftsman had blooming trees outside his window. Make flower trees.

4684.NAME: Gudgeons
4684.DESCRIPTION: Craftsman will take his cat with him. Gather tasty gudgeons for his fluffy buddy.

4685.NAME: Appropriate attire
4685.DESCRIPTION: It's time to change clothes and welcome the new craftsman in a formal look.

4686.NAME: Material for trade I
4686.DESCRIPTION: At the moment merchants want to buy honey. Gather 100 units of honey.

4687.NAME: Material for trade II
4687.DESCRIPTION: Paprick suggests to prepare flax for trade. Grow and harvest 50 flax fields.

4688.NAME: Material for trade III
4688.DESCRIPTION: Sometimes it's best to trade with currency. Get 3 silver doubloons.

4689.NAME: Corn pie
4689.DESCRIPTION: This time while visiting the elders you need to bring a different snack. Bake 5 corn pies.

4690.NAME: Dispel the boredom
4690.DESCRIPTION: To dispel the boredom best thing to do is take a set of dominoes carved in bone. Gather bone for crafting the set.

4691.NAME: Latest news
4691.DESCRIPTION: While visiting you might as well share your experiences since the last visit. Get 2500 experience.

4692.NAME: Feed koalas
4692.DESCRIPTION: Little grey bears look cute but they are so choosy with their diet. Feed grown koalas.

4693.NAME: Herd of platypuses
4693.DESCRIPTION: Some of the animals were really funny. Have 12 baby platypuses on the main island at the same time.

4694.NAME: Herd of wallabies
4694.DESCRIPTION: Old folks called them mini kangaroos even though they probably has never seen a kangaroo. Sell wallabies.

4695.NAME: Additional ingridient
4695.DESCRIPTION: Maybe some additional ingredients will make it stronger. Get 15 obsidians to try out.

4696.NAME: Better templates
4696.DESCRIPTION: Try replacing templates with coconut shells. Use 20 coconuts.

4697.NAME: Time ticks
4697.DESCRIPTION: For some jobs timing is key to successes. Buy 3 sandglasses.

4698.NAME: Onions
4698.DESCRIPTION: Some of the needed things can be traded for black onions. Hand in 150 black onions.

4699.NAME: Guppies
4699.DESCRIPTION: To get what's needed you're missing exactly 7 guppies. Catch them!

47.NAME: Spend energy for sapphires
47.DESCRIPTION: Spend 10 energies in any way, then return to Fix and reload it to receive a sapphire

470.NAME: Ancient pump
470.DESCRIPTION: Finish renewing the ancient burnoil pump

4700.NAME: Foxes
4700.DESCRIPTION: One of the merchants were bad at growing rabbits. Now he needs foxes. Sell 40 grown foxes.

4701.NAME: Snacks
4701.DESCRIPTION: Let craftsmen work without stopping. Craft gingerbread for snacks. You can get spices by harvesting friends fields.

4702.NAME: Refreshments
4702.DESCRIPTION: The heat of working can affect the craftsmen. Gather water to make refreshing drinks.

4703.NAME: Gnats
4703.DESCRIPTION: With the evening comes gnats. Make flypaper by spending honey.

4704.NAME: Try out the stone eater
4704.DESCRIPTION: This tool will help cutting down regular stones as well as limestones, vulcano rocks and even underground stalagmites.

4705.NAME: Wine barrels
4705.DESCRIPTION: A wholesaler offers to exchange their stone eaters for wine barrels. Sell 3 wine barrels.

4706.NAME: Bear hunter
4706.DESCRIPTION: Beekeeper have some stone eaters. If you help with the bear problem, there can be a deal. Sell 20 bears.

4707.NAME: Geologists service
4707.DESCRIPTION: Geologist is not so keen to give up such comfortable tools. She really needs serpentines and lazurites. Get them!

4708.NAME: Geologists visit
4708.DESCRIPTION: A geologist wants to examine ground layers in the gem mine. Use gem mine 12 times.

4709.NAME: Biologists visit
4709.DESCRIPTION: Some biologist is interested in baobabs roots. Sadly, they stretch deep underground. Dig ground in Atafu island 200 times.

471.NAME: Create jam
471.DESCRIPTION: You can create jam from wild berries in the workshop. Gather them and get some jam

4710.NAME: Anthropologists visit
4710.DESCRIPTION: An anthropologist is really interested in the standard of happiness amongst natives. Get 3 smiling masks.

4711.NAME: Eggplants
4711.DESCRIPTION: Merchants specially emphasised that they want fresh eggplants. Harvest 100 eggplant fields.

4712.NAME: Machetes
4712.DESCRIPTION: Merchants need to deliver an order deep into jungle. Hand in 150 machetes.

4713.NAME: Black fashion
4713.DESCRIPTION: Currently volcano rock furniture is in fashion. Finish any 10 such furniture objects.

4714.NAME: Crocodiles
4714.DESCRIPTION: The craftsman is very afraid of crocodiles, help overcome this fear by jointly feeding the crocodiles and their babies.

4715.NAME: Horseradishes
4715.DESCRIPTION: After working in the heat, all food seems bland. Harvest 50 fields of spicy horseradishes.

4716.NAME: Tool Tester
4716.DESCRIPTION: The craftsman is looking for opportunities for improvements. Test and use 5 stone eaters.

4717.NAME: Noises in water?
4717.DESCRIPTION: Maybe they come from the water? Work near waters to hear better.

4718.NAME: Loud animals
4718.DESCRIPTION: Maybe animals are being noisy? Feed animals x times.

4719.NAME: Racketing neighbours
4719.DESCRIPTION: Maybe neighbours are at fault? Visit your friends! Perform 25 actions while visiting friends.

472.NAME: Pickle mushrooms
472.DESCRIPTION: Find some mushrooms on the island and pickle them in the workshop

4720.NAME: Noisy plants
4720.DESCRIPTION: Maybe plants are going wild and making noise? Check - harvest X beans or corn fields.

4721.NAME: Echoes in holes
4721.DESCRIPTION: Maybe someone has fell in a hole? Check your water, clay and stone pits and wells 20 times.

4722.NAME: With ear to the ground
4722.DESCRIPTION: Put your ear to the ground and listen! You might as well collect some quartz and sphalerite.

4723.NAME: Use the hole
4723.DESCRIPTION: Go through the hole. Take it form your bag and place it on the ground.

4724.NAME: Source of sad
4724.DESCRIPTION: In the corner you notice a group of sad skeletons. Talk with them and find out what's upset them.

4725.NAME: Get glowsticks
4725.DESCRIPTION: You can get glow sticks by visiting friends and working in their islands. After all, best parties are with friends!

4726.NAME: Search the rock
4726.DESCRIPTION: Booddy's nails can get itchy, so he likes to scratch the rock. Search the rock.

4727.NAME: What to do next?
4727.DESCRIPTION: Ask skeletons for an advise what to do next.

4728.NAME: Strong torch
4728.DESCRIPTION: Skeletons have an especially strong torch. That should be enough to get through the bushes. Remove the bushes.

4730.NAME: Head in the clouds
4730.DESCRIPTION: Search the nearby bushes for the missing bone.

4731.NAME: Remove bushes!
4731.DESCRIPTION: There are horrible bushes in your way again. Train to deal with other bushes.

4732.NAME: Make light
4732.DESCRIPTION: Skeletors doesn't have anymore torches. Maybe other light sources will do. Make wax candles and lava lamps.

4733.NAME: Spend energy
4733.DESCRIPTION: If you do some things, skeletons promise to find another torch.

4735.NAME: Gain experience
4735.DESCRIPTION: To get further you'll need another torch. Skeletons advice to do some other things, while they look for a torch.

4736.NAME: Red mush
4736.DESCRIPTION: Tomatoes are not only tasty, but they can also be used in horror decorations. Harvest tomatoes.

4737.NAME: Pure horror
4737.DESCRIPTION: Meerkats are cute, but growing them can turn into a nightmare. Grow meerkats.

4739.NAME: Step ahead
4739.DESCRIPTION: Search the nearby bushes and find the bone!

4740.NAME: Visit Toby
4740.DESCRIPTION: Those horrible bushes are in the way again. Vent to Toby.

4741.NAME: Dry bushes
4741.DESCRIPTION: Toby politely listens to your troubles. Repay the kindness by spending water on this horridly dry island.

4742.NAME: Desert cacti
4742.DESCRIPTION: Work with withered cacti and desert bones.

4744.NAME: Quench your thirst
4744.DESCRIPTION: When Booddy gets tired and hot after running around, he quenches his thirst in the lava pool. Make the refreshing blueberry drink.

4745.NAME: Misterious cave
4745.DESCRIPTION: Get used to the dark. Visit mysterious cave 5 times.

4746.NAME: Mini fears
4746.DESCRIPTION: Face your fears, but start carefully. Catch mini sharks.

4748.NAME: Give a hand
4748.DESCRIPTION: Find the last bone in the nearby bushes!

4749.NAME: Make the skeletons happy!
4749.DESCRIPTION: Give the bones back to their owners and make them happy again. Click on them and choose UPGRADE.

475.NAME: Proudflower present
475.DESCRIPTION: Charm the ladies with some flowers. Sell 50 proudflowers (any)

4750.NAME: Find Booddy!
4750.DESCRIPTION: If you listen carefully, you can hear rustling in the nearby bushes. Search them!

4751.NAME: Choose your new friend I
4751.DESCRIPTION: Sadly you only have one glasses, that can protect them from the sunlight.

4752.NAME: Choose your new friend II
4752.DESCRIPTION: Choose ONLY ONE, who will come with you. You can do that by either click on skeletons or Booddy and choosing UPGRADE.

476.NAME: Fancy furniture
476.DESCRIPTION: Show off with your furniture. Buy a cocktail table in the shop section DECORATIONS

477.NAME: Money has no meaning
477.DESCRIPTION: Show that you don't care about money. Let 20 grape fields rot and then remove them

478.NAME: Jewelry
478.DESCRIPTION: Give the ladies some fancy jewelry. Give 20 bone beads

479.NAME: The fancy lawn
479.DESCRIPTION: Place 30 times fancy lawn tiles on the island (you can remove them afterwards, if you with to)

48.NAME: Flower lover
48.DESCRIPTION: Make the island more beautiful with at least 10 various flower decorations

480.NAME: Eccentric present
480.DESCRIPTION: Give as a present to some old club gentleman 20 baby ostriches

4817.NAME: Round form
4817.DESCRIPTION: Cube likes round shapes, plant pumpkins.

4818.NAME: Green legs
4818.DESCRIPTION: Cube likes long slender legs, this insults the snail. Feed any animals on Sand island.

4819.NAME: Cube storage
4819.DESCRIPTION: Cube likes square buildings, make some building material storages for him.

482.NAME: Finish the sawmill
482.DESCRIPTION: Renew and finish the ancient sawmill to make use of it's global bonuses

4820.NAME: Foamy flowers
4820.DESCRIPTION: Hedgehogs have a lot of common with bubbly speech of foamy critter. Feed hedgehogs.

4821.NAME: From above
4821.DESCRIPTION: Let other critters check where foamy went, build some spider bushes.

4822.NAME: Sand in different well
4822.DESCRIPTION: Use any well, perhaps you will spot the foamy in hiding.

4823.NAME: Smell and hearing
4823.DESCRIPTION: Feed dogs, what you can't find with sight, you can find with other senses.

4824.NAME: Teary eyes
4824.DESCRIPTION: Crying is so much worse if you have only one eye. Harvest onions

4825.NAME: Colorful world
4825.DESCRIPTION: Bring joy to the single eye with makeshift rainbow. Plant and chop tropical trees.

4826.NAME: Snail feathers.
4826.DESCRIPTION: Appease the snail, sell grown chickens that he despises so much.

4827.NAME: Salty fish
4827.DESCRIPTION: Snail does not like ocean because it has too many salty gudgeons. Fish out these fishes at gudgeon bay.

4828.NAME: Sweet harvest
4828.DESCRIPTION: Guess who was the person that hit these fruits in the temple? Harvest more sweet shells.

4829.NAME: Green food
4829.DESCRIPTION: Harvest beans, since leaf eater like this kind of treats.

4830.NAME: Tropical green
4830.DESCRIPTION: Plant more tropical palmtrees than chop them, you get the wood, someone else will munch on the leaves.

4831.NAME: Goat friends
4831.DESCRIPTION: Enough to go around, while you feed goats watch as the cube sneaks a bit of food away for itself.

4832.NAME: Mice and spiders
4832.DESCRIPTION: Catch the flying rodents that kitty loves so much. Build spider bushes.

4833.NAME: Kitty kittens
4833.DESCRIPTION: Sell grown cats, help them visit their distant relatives in sand area.

4834.NAME: Hide and seek
4834.DESCRIPTION: Plant some wheat so that kitty could set up an ambush in the golden fields.

4835.NAME: Munch munch 1
4835.DESCRIPTION: Cruncher can be lured with carrots, easy, right? Harvest carrots.

4836.NAME: Munch munch 2
4836.DESCRIPTION: Cruncher can crunch on timber, but it prefers real wood over planks. Cut trees.

4837.NAME: Munch Yumm
4837.DESCRIPTION: To your surprise cruncher ate all the porridge and bowl too.  Feed any Sand-Field animals.

484.NAME: Finish the metal mine
484.DESCRIPTION: Renew and finish the ancient mine to make use of it

486.NAME: Finish the windmill
486.DESCRIPTION: Renew and finish the ancient windmill to make use of it

4873.NAME: Baking bread
4873.DESCRIPTION: White bread for your own house and for guests. Bake 10 whitebreads.

4874.NAME: Drawing from the well
4874.DESCRIPTION: You'll need a lot of water for a proper clean up. Draw from your well 30 times.

4875.NAME: Goat herd
4875.DESCRIPTION: Get a heard worth boasting about. Make sure there are 30 brown goats on your island at the same time.

4876.NAME: Ladybugs
4876.DESCRIPTION: All little creatures are beautiful and lovable. Gather 5 ladybugs by harvesting beans.

4877.NAME: Sweet life
4877.DESCRIPTION: Make your and your neighbours lives sweeter. Spend sugar in any way.

4878.NAME: Mean twigs
4878.DESCRIPTION: Provide comfort. Gather 20 thorny twigs so they wouldn't prick anyone's foot.

4879.NAME: Wisptrees
4879.DESCRIPTION: It would be good to replant your flowers at a freer moment. Finish building 10 wisptrees.

488.NAME: Finish laboratory
488.DESCRIPTION: Renew and finish the ancient laboratory to make use of its global bonuses

4880.NAME: Useful bricks
4880.DESCRIPTION: A good farmers workshop works all throughout the year. Craft 60 clay bricks.

4881.NAME: Foxy foxes
4881.DESCRIPTION: Ginger dodgers are planning some mischief again. Grow 30 foxes on your island at the same time.

4882.NAME: Shiny stones
4882.DESCRIPTION: Any shiny stones will do to decorate yourself and your surroundings. Use gem mine.

4883.NAME: Wrapping torches
4883.DESCRIPTION: Make your life brighter. Craft torches in your workshop.

4884.NAME: Harvesting flax
4884.DESCRIPTION: Flax thread is a bound with the olden times. Continue running the centuries old thread. Harvest 30 flax fields.

4886.NAME: Getting presents
4886.DESCRIPTION: Open workshop's section UNIQUE and pick one of four decors.

4887.NAME: Broad palms
4887.DESCRIPTION: Local trees grow by days, not years. Grow 20 small board palms on Atafu island at the same time.

4888.NAME: Digging for obsidian
4888.DESCRIPTION: Shiny, pretty, black stone oceanians can find by simply digging up ground. Gather 3 obsidian shards.

4889.NAME: Carrot mishaps
4889.DESCRIPTION: What a misfortune! All carrots have been fed to wild animals. Nothing left for ourselves. Plant carrots from STORE.

489.NAME: Hammocks for the drones
489.DESCRIPTION: Ensure two hammocks for two very lazy gentlemen. Sell 2 hammocks.

4890.NAME: Boiling and brewing
4890.DESCRIPTION: For the vigorous Oceanians boiling and brewing is an everyday occurrence. Gather food.

4891.NAME: Missing vegetables
4891.DESCRIPTION: After the big food preparations, some ingredients are missing again. Plant any plants from the STORE.

4892.NAME: Missing things
4892.DESCRIPTION: You can find missing things when cleaning out storage rooms. Build storage's until you find 3 sickles or vases.

4893.NAME: Golden wheat
4893.DESCRIPTION: Golden fields of wheat makes every Oceanian happy. Harvest 20 wheat fields on your islands.

4894.NAME: Brewing wine
4894.DESCRIPTION: Celebrations are not that far away and soon you'll have to put some home brewed wine on the table. Make 4 bottles.

4895.NAME: Sweet tooth
4895.DESCRIPTION: Not every bear has winter sleep. Some of them want a snack. Grow 15 grown bears at the same time.

4896.NAME: Getting iron ore
4896.DESCRIPTION: Since you have to climb down to get jam anyway, might as well bring up some iron ore. Gather iron ore.

4897.NAME: Drying fish
4897.DESCRIPTION: Some fish to preserve them for winter. Activate smoke house (you can get it after restoring laboratory).

4898.NAME: Anchor the island
4898.DESCRIPTION: There's such a lifting spirit all around. Hopefully the island won't fly away. Gather stones to anchor it down.

49.NAME: 2 of 3 steps
49.DESCRIPTION: Earn 220 reputation and the natives will give you some obsidian

490.NAME: Gazebo for tea
490.DESCRIPTION: Build 2 gazebos (you can sell them afterwards, if you want).

4900.NAME: Getting presents
4900.DESCRIPTION: Open workshop's section UNIQUE and pick one of the four unique items.

4901.DESCRIPTION: The celebration time is here and as per feast some snacks are in order. Harvest banana palm 2 times.

4902.DESCRIPTION: Everything around is so white and fluffy... or it will be, after you have 20 grown sheep at the same time.

4903.DESCRIPTION: This tasty pie will fit any celebratory table. Bake pumpkin pie 3 times.

4904.NAME: Round beginning
4904.DESCRIPTION: From eggs - chickens, from chickens - eggs. Gather this philosophically round wonder 15 times.

4905.NAME: Feeding pigs
4905.DESCRIPTION: Celebration is here! Last opportunity to properly and richly fed up your pigs. Feed grown pigs 15 times.

4906.NAME: Good reputation
4906.DESCRIPTION: Make sure that you are talked about long after the celebrations. Gather 30 good reputation.

4907.NAME: Grow melons
4907.DESCRIPTION: Behind the little pricks hides a truly sweet core. Harvest 20 fields of prickly melons.

4908.NAME: Grown ostriches
4908.DESCRIPTION: It won't be easy, but what has to be done, needs to be done. Grown 20 grown ostriches at the same time.

4909.NAME: Wine barrels
4909.DESCRIPTION: The day is not yet done, but wine barrels are already dry... Built 2 new barrels full of wine.

491.NAME: Classic breakfast
491.DESCRIPTION: Gentlemen need lots of eggs for their breakfast. Give 20 eggs.

4910.NAME: Lucky sailing
4910.DESCRIPTION: For sailing to go well, it would be advisable to check wind direction. Build 4 weather cocks.

4911.NAME: Swimming jelly
4911.DESCRIPTION: Throw out the reel and catch swimming jello. Sadly it tastes like water... Catch 5 jellyfish.

4912.NAME: Carrot cruncher
4912.DESCRIPTION: Snowman is missing a nose... Someone clearly hasn't fed wallabies again. Feed grown wallabies.

4914.NAME: Getting presents
4914.DESCRIPTION:
Open workshop's section UNIQUE and choose your reward. Each 
set has 20 bouquets.

4915.NAME: Sitting around the fire
4915.DESCRIPTION: When it's cold outside, watching a live fire is twice as pleasant. Gather from your fireplace 6 times.

4916.NAME: Searching forests
4916.DESCRIPTION: It's so good that Oceania is the land of everlasting sun! Go and gather 150 wild berries or mushrooms.

4917.NAME: Wooden spoon
4917.DESCRIPTION:
Porridge time!!! 
If you are hungry, build tables and the spoons will appear by themselves.

4918.NAME: Silver doubloons
4918.DESCRIPTION: Searching caves goes smoother if you have a torch! Get 2 silver doubloons from any island.

4919.NAME: Obsidian again
4919.DESCRIPTION: The obsidian you found a week ago have become very popular. Get 2 more of these black beauties.

492.NAME: Cigar placebo
492.DESCRIPTION: To stop smoking cigars, the gentlemen eat a lot of carrots. Give them 40 carrots

4920.NAME: Kitties
4920.DESCRIPTION: Purr, mew-mew, I want to eat now! Feed 20 grown cats in any of your islands.

4921.NAME: Feed goats
4921.DESCRIPTION: I stubbornly refuse to eat! Feed grown goats 25 times.

4922.NAME: Grow
4922.DESCRIPTION: You can't get far without patience! Harvest pumpkins 30 times on any if your islands.

4923.NAME: Spend lobworms
4923.DESCRIPTION: Of course, you could just sit and look how the pumpkins grow, but you could also spend in by fishing. Spend lobworms.

4924.NAME: Elephants
4924.DESCRIPTION: This time you're getting a hard task. Feed small or grown elephants.

4925.NAME: Metal sheets
4925.DESCRIPTION: This task is not from the easy ones as well... Craft metal sheets 8 times.

4926.NAME: Especially spicy soup
4926.DESCRIPTION: When doing hard tasks a spice is needed. Craft spicy coconut soup.

4928.NAME: Getting presents
4928.DESCRIPTION: Open workshop's section UNIQUE and pick your reward. Remember, you can only pick ONE!

4929.NAME: Bone beads
4929.DESCRIPTION: The change of years asks for decoration! Craft 15 bone beads.

493.NAME: Milk for tea
493.DESCRIPTION: For breakfast tea, the gentlemen need a lot of milk (give them 20 bottles)

4930.NAME: Sell things
4930.DESCRIPTION: Time to increase your funds a bit. Sell any things from your island 30 times.

4931.DESCRIPTION: After the new years celebration you might experience some head ache. Get medicine ahead of time. Buy from store.

4932.NAME: Spending food
4932.DESCRIPTION: Fill your and other stomachs ahead of time, so you can party afterwards. Spend food in any way.

4933.NAME: Bumblebee
4933.DESCRIPTION: Everyone around is chatting and buzzing. Harvest tomatoes and get a bumblebee.

4934.NAME: Fix game
4934.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your you might as well play a game. Click on Fix shell-game and choose USE.

4935.NAME: Clay storage sheds
4935.DESCRIPTION: Natives wants to watch fireworks from the roof of a shed. Build any clay sheds.

4936.NAME: Be sure to come back!
4936.DESCRIPTION: Plant 20 tall palms today and come back tomorrow. Grow new tall palms on Atafu island at the same time.

4937.NAME: Spend bugs
4937.DESCRIPTION: Enough bugging about, time to reel in! Spend 70 bugs.

4938.NAME: Necklaces
4938.DESCRIPTION: You need to be decorated when waiting for new year. Craft 12 pearl, obsidian or gem necklaces.

4939.NAME: Honey cake
4939.DESCRIPTION: New years eve can't do without a cake. Bake 10 sweet honey cakes.

494.NAME: Machetes for adventures
494.DESCRIPTION: Both gentlemen plan to explore the jungle. Give them 20 machetes

4940.NAME: Game of fix
4940.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your you might as well play a game. Click on Fix shell-game and choose USE.

4942.NAME: Getting presents
4942.DESCRIPTION: Open workshop's section UNIQUE and pick your reward. You can't make the items you already have.

4943.NAME: Blueberry bush
4943.DESCRIPTION: This bush is an integral part of Oceania. Harvest blueberry bush 4 times.

4944.NAME: Being neighbors
4944.DESCRIPTION: New year, old friends. Visit Parpic and help him out 10 times.

4945.NAME: Hey stacks
4945.DESCRIPTION: If after partying you get sleepy, stack up 10 hey stacks and sleep softly and warmly.

4946.NAME: Feed grown hedgehogs
4946.DESCRIPTION: All errands for the first time this year. Grow and feed 20 grown hedgehogs.

4947.NAME: First business of the year
4947.DESCRIPTION: Start selling and earn your first shells this year.

4948.NAME: First luck story
4948.DESCRIPTION: Try out your luck for the first time this year. Buy small yellow flowers to get a Giant speckled butterfly.

4949.NAME: Materials for wine
4949.DESCRIPTION: To be able to fill the bottles again, you first need raw materials. Harvest 20 grape fields.

495.NAME: Activate bonus for 2 days
495.DESCRIPTION: Activate the global bonus, which will provide you with 1 extra wood when chopping palms

4950.NAME: Fish trophies
4950.DESCRIPTION: This will be the years first fisherman story... Built 5 angelfish trophies.

4951.NAME: Platypus was first
4951.DESCRIPTION: Every animal asks for food with hungry eyes, but this year platypus was first. Feed 30 grown platypuses on your islands.

4952.NAME: Building strong
4952.DESCRIPTION: Before wandering around, you need to finish working at your own home. Finish masonry jobs. Spend 40 cement.

4953.NAME: Gather cold sparkles
4953.DESCRIPTION: Ice island is truly beautiful. Admire it's beauty and gather cold sparkles.

4954.NAME: Desert conqueror
4954.DESCRIPTION: After all the work with ice it would be nice to warm up. Travel to desert island and perform any actions 36 times.

4956.NAME: Getting presents
4956.DESCRIPTION: Open workshop's section UNIQUE and pick your reward. Remember, you can only pick ONE!

4957.NAME: Coconut palms
4957.DESCRIPTION: It is time to return to the normal daily rhythm. Harvest coconut palms 5 times.

4958.NAME: Treasure island
4958.DESCRIPTION: It seems like something might have been left in the treasure cave... Visit Pinaki treasure cave.

4959.NAME: Restore the palace
4959.DESCRIPTION: To finish this task you must restore the ice palace. Travel to ice island and look at it.

496.NAME: Small village
496.DESCRIPTION: Give wood for the restoration of the small village. You will gain a lot of experience and fame as the savior of the natives

4960.NAME: Little calves
4960.DESCRIPTION: Weather has turned warmer. Calves have gotten a better appetite. Feed your calves 20 times.

4961.NAME: Sleeping trees
4961.DESCRIPTION: Rare who still remembers - it's better to cut trees in winter, when they have less sap. Gather wood.

4962.NAME: Braiding straws
4962.DESCRIPTION: In the dark hours you can peacefully sit and do crafts like braiding straws. Craft straw bundles.

4963.NAME: Making paint
4963.DESCRIPTION: Don't sit in one place, make your life brighter and more colorful! Gather paint buckets.

4964.NAME: Candles
4964.DESCRIPTION: Closing curtains, lighting candles - warm and cozy. Craft wax candles.

4965.NAME: Brisk animals
4965.DESCRIPTION: If there is one animal that never stops, it's the sharks, that keep moving even while sleeping. Fish in shark coast.

4966.NAME: Restore palace
4966.DESCRIPTION: To finish this task you must restore the ice palace. Travel to ice island and look at it.

4967.NAME: Taking it slow
4967.DESCRIPTION: Arm yourself with patience and wait until sloths show signs of hunger. Feed 15 baby sloths.

4968.NAME: Pearl chests
4968.DESCRIPTION: The celebration is over. Time to store the decorations. Craft 3 neat pearl chests to store things in.

497.NAME: Mid-sized village
497.DESCRIPTION: Give wood for the restoration of the mid-sized village. You will gain a lot of experience and fame as the savior of the natives

4970.NAME: Getting presents
4970.DESCRIPTION: Open workshop's section UNIQUE and pick your reward. Remember, you can pick only ONE!

4971.NAME: Wait for the snowman
4971.DESCRIPTION: To receive the quests visit Ice sile and wait for one newly arrived snowman on the dates specified above.

4972.NAME: Warm socks
4972.DESCRIPTION: Before visiting the icy island you need to prepare warm socks. Give some shells for sock purchase and then head for the new isle.

498.NAME: Big village
498.DESCRIPTION: Give wood for the restoration of the big village. You will gain a lot of experience and fame as the savior of the natives

4980.NAME: Bumblebee
4980.DESCRIPTION: Everyone around is chatting and buzzing. Harvest tomatoes and get a bumblebee.

4981.NAME: Ice blocks
4981.DESCRIPTION: To cross the lake you will need to freeze it solid. Collect ice blocks to lower the lakes temperature.

4982.NAME: Freeze the lake
4982.DESCRIPTION: Keep throwing ice blocks in to the chilly waters and soon you will be able to walk the glassy surface of the lake.

4983.NAME: Clear a path
4983.DESCRIPTION: You should clear a path before doing anything else. Dig out most of the walking tiles.

4984.NAME: Restore sculptures
4984.DESCRIPTION: The sculptures used to be so pretty. To boost the holiday spirit you will need to restore 4 of the ice sculptures.

4985.NAME: Repair the walls
4985.DESCRIPTION: Thick walls of ice used to protect the beauty of this island from the angry snowmen. Repair some of the broken walls.

4986.NAME: Restore the ice flowers
4986.DESCRIPTION: Dig out the marvelous producers of the winter miracles  To ensure future of the island restore 12 of the damaged plants.

4987.NAME: Winter sparkles
4987.DESCRIPTION: The true source of power of the island lies within the cold sparkles of ice flowers. Collect this magical resource.

4988.NAME: Winter beauty
4988.DESCRIPTION: Use the blessing of the winter to empower small spruce trees or the finished lanterns or use it to restore the ice castle.

4989.NAME: The winter citadel
4989.DESCRIPTION: To restore this demolished building you will need lots of winter blessings. Remember flowers are boostable.

499.NAME: Clay mass for the mould
499.DESCRIPTION: Craft two clay masses for the engineer, so he can create the cog

4990.NAME: Bumblebee
4990.DESCRIPTION: Everyone around is chatting and buzzing. Harvest tomatoes and get a bumblebee.

5.NAME: Repair raft
5.DESCRIPTION: Repair the broken raft by clicking on it 4 times.

50.NAME: 3 of 3 steps
50.DESCRIPTION: Earn 300 reputation and you will be able to start building the EAGLE TOTEM!

500.NAME: Shards for the alchemist
500.DESCRIPTION: The archipelago has been visited by a famous alchemist. He wants 15 stone shards in exchange for the pestle

501.NAME: Flowers for the alchemist
501.DESCRIPTION: The alchemist also needs 40 colorful star flowers. Buy and sell them

5011.DESCRIPTION: Visit the Festival island and put things in order. All previous festival objects will disappear in a while.

502.NAME: Iron ore
502.DESCRIPTION: Lastly the alchemist needs a lot of metal. Give him 10 units of iron ore

503.NAME: Earn iron ore
503.DESCRIPTION: Buy torches in the shop, visit the mine and earn 4 units of iron ore

504.NAME: Earn copper ore
504.DESCRIPTION: Earn 2 units of copper ore in the metal mine

505.NAME: Craft iron
505.DESCRIPTION: Visit the workshop section MATERIALS and craft iron from iron ore

506.NAME: Craft flour
506.DESCRIPTION: Gather the necessary ingredients and obtain flour from the sawmill

507.NAME: Bake a pretzel
507.DESCRIPTION: In the workshop section FOOD, find a pretzel and bake it using flour

5070.NAME: Off to the ball
5070.DESCRIPTION: Put on your best clothes, and go and visit the Festival island.

5071.NAME: Gifts for ladies I
5071.DESCRIPTION: Some ladies will reveale their face in exchange for flowers. Visit flower tent.

5072.NAME: Gifts for ladies II
5072.DESCRIPTION: Sweets are good for enthrall ing ladies. Visit sweets tent.

5073.NAME: Gifts for ladies III
5073.DESCRIPTION: Beautifull words are captivating. Visit poetry tent.

5074.NAME: Whim of cavaliers I
5074.DESCRIPTION: Persuade ladies to  help you unmask gents. Collect some carnival drinks.

5075.NAME: Whim of cavaliers II
5075.DESCRIPTION: Talk to ladies, "accidentaly" dropped handkerchief can do wonders.

5076.NAME: Whim of cavaliers III
5076.DESCRIPTION: A womans smile is strong enough to disarm. Add this innocent resource to your arsenal.

5077.NAME: Unmask the ladies
5077.DESCRIPTION: Chat and unmask some ladies, perhaps you can gain a new friend.

5078.NAME: Unmask cavaliers
5078.DESCRIPTION: People are different, perhaps among thease gents hides a true, undiscovered friend.

5079.NAME: Good reputation
5079.DESCRIPTION: The most heartfull guest will receive a special prize. Helping Paprick and chatting with guests will boost your esteeme.

508.NAME: Legendary feast
508.DESCRIPTION: Prepare a legendary feast for the most important inhabitants of Oceania

5080.NAME: Find Mr. Paprick
