5080.DESCRIPTION: Chat with cavaliers until you find Paprick.

5081.NAME: Find Mrs. Paprick
5081.DESCRIPTION: Somewhere among the ladies is Papricks wife. Find her.

5082.NAME: An opinion in gardening
5082.DESCRIPTION: A gardner has agreed to help if you share your farmers experiance. Harvest tomato fields.

5083.NAME: Milk bath
5083.DESCRIPTION: You're entitled a gratitude for advice on switching to coconut milk. Show how to make it.

5084.NAME: Natural sweets
5084.DESCRIPTION: Cheer up the bitter lady with some fresh picked strawberries and send ther to chat with gents. Spend strawberries.

5085.NAME: Beaver distress
5085.DESCRIPTION: Favour for a favour, you agreed to test baiting vile beavers. Plant sturdy palmtrees.

5086.NAME: Safari days
5086.DESCRIPTION: Once he visited Africa just to find Koalas, but koalas don't live in Africa. Sell some koalas and earn a favour.

5087.NAME: Sweet-tooth
5087.DESCRIPTION: Ladies are not the only ones that like sweets, get me some corn pies and i will share some of my poems.

5088.NAME: Indentical masks
5088.DESCRIPTION: Cavalier has trouble keeping track of ladies already addressed. Give bone beeds to help him.

5089.NAME: Hay stacks
5089.DESCRIPTION: Some volunteers brag that helping exhausts them. Build some hay stack so they can fall over, if tired.

509.NAME: Obtain information
509.DESCRIPTION: Get information from your guests about becoming the governor of Oceania

5090.NAME: Collect spices
5090.DESCRIPTION: Please provide a topic for chat with ladies. Gather some spices for cooking discussion. (Friend's fields)

5091.NAME: Tenging a bunny
5091.DESCRIPTION: If you need someone to smile for cavalier, she can help. Meanwhile look after her bunny. Feed bunnies.

5092.NAME: Eye line
5092.DESCRIPTION: In anxiety the eye line was ruined. If you wish for help, gather some coal for make-up corrections.

5093.NAME: Gathering berries
5093.DESCRIPTION: This lady will help with unmasking patient gents only. Gathering berries is patient work? Try it!

5094.NAME: Off to Competiton isle!
5094.DESCRIPTION: A quick snack, and off you go! Harvest one radish field.

5095.NAME: Bronze Qualification
5095.DESCRIPTION: Axe was the first thing you crafted, what was the second one? Produce this item in workshop!

5096.NAME: Silver Qualification
5096.DESCRIPTION: Although sharp and dangerous, this item is used only as tool in Oceania. Craft this item in workshop.

5097.NAME: Gold Qualification
5097.DESCRIPTION: Most of this items volume conists of nothing but air. Craft this item in Workshop.

51.NAME: Chop-down the rest of the baobabs
51.DESCRIPTION: Let's get rid of the rest of these baobabs!

510.NAME: Tables for the feast
510.DESCRIPTION: Craft 10 tables of any kind and sell them

511.NAME: Chairs for the feast
511.DESCRIPTION: Craft 30 stools of any kind and sell them

5127.NAME: Visit Festival island
5127.DESCRIPTION: To make a bouquet of flowers, you decided to visit festival island.

5128.NAME: Shy mermaid I
5128.DESCRIPTION: This mermaid blushes and shys away, and refuses to talk to you. Decorate this island with flowers, so she would be happy.

5129.NAME: Shy mermaid II
5129.DESCRIPTION: Other mermaid due to the excitement fainted. Give water to calm down this mermaid.

513.NAME: Roasts for the feast
513.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill the roast task chain and submit 3 roasts for the feast

5130.NAME: Shy mermaid III
5130.DESCRIPTION: One of the mermaids looks in the distance dreamily and pays no attention to you. Craft bone beads to attrackt her attention.

5131.NAME: Meal
5131.DESCRIPTION: The task of hosting guests will be up to you. Provide mermaids with a meal, gather some food.

5132.NAME: Plesant company
5132.DESCRIPTION: House work keeps you from attending your guests all the time, so furry friends would be of great help. Sell cats.

5133.NAME: Removing obsticles
5133.DESCRIPTION: If waves wash away one of your nets, the mermaids might get entangled. Remove your nets for now, collect Sea gudeons.

5134.NAME: What do mermaids wish for? I
5134.DESCRIPTION: Something fragile and beuatifull. Collect three-coloured monarch by harvesting corn fields.

5135.NAME: What do mermaids wish for? II
5135.DESCRIPTION:
Perhaps ladies prefer sweets?
Make some coconut porridge.

5136.NAME: What do mermaids wish for? III
5136.DESCRIPTION: Since you are not sure of the current inclination, seek wisdom of the Wise owls. Sell these decorations.

5137.NAME: Compliment Tussy
5137.DESCRIPTION: Congratulate and seek advice, Tussy recently has taken interest in geolog. Collect obsidian shards.

5138.NAME: Compliment Cudsy
5138.DESCRIPTION: Congratulate and seek advice,  	Cudsy needs a jay feather fan, feed roosters and collect thease feathers.

5139.NAME: Compliment Mrs. Paprick
5139.DESCRIPTION: Congratulate and seek advice, mrs. Paprick needs eggs for backing biscuits. Instead of flowers please provide eggs.

514.NAME: Food for the feast
514.DESCRIPTION: Earn 250 units of food for the feast

5140.NAME: Visit mermaids again
5140.DESCRIPTION: All that was needed was giving them a bit of your attention, but you are capable of special attention as well.. .

5141.NAME: Simple comb
5141.DESCRIPTION: Offer your own comb, while searching is in progress. Build any tables and collect a comb.

5142.NAME: Checking the bushes
5142.DESCRIPTION: Remove some thorn bushes, the comb should still be somewhere close by.

5143.NAME: Check the sea-side
5143.DESCRIPTION: Check any fishing place, perhaps comb was swept away by a tide.

5144.NAME: Pick some flowers
5144.DESCRIPTION: Oceania has many flowers and many of them have a lovely scent. Collect Pansies, Irises or Callas.

5145.NAME: Visit the merchants
5145.DESCRIPTION: Early march is active season for flower merchants. Collect some silver doubloons for expenses.

5146.NAME: Blooming beans
5146.DESCRIPTION: Although regular beans have more simple look than sweet peas, they still bloom beautifully. Harvest bean fields.

5147.NAME: Observing fashion
5147.DESCRIPTION: Gallantly observe indigenous women to grasp the newest trends in fashion. Sell some bone beads, in case of misunderstandings.

5148.NAME: Fur animals
5148.DESCRIPTION: Go pet the bunnies, their fur is so soft! Sell grown rabbits.. just to evaluate the fur.

5149.NAME: Accessories
5149.DESCRIPTION: Add a special touch, use some parrot feathers. Collect these feathers by feeding ducks.

515.NAME: Drinks for the guests
515.DESCRIPTION: Give 40 units of water for the drinks

5150.NAME: Comb for Delfina
5150.DESCRIPTION: Recover the lost comb and return it to Delfina. Select UPGRADE option.

5151.NAME: Flowers for Adella
5151.DESCRIPTION: Complete the flower gathering quest and select UPGRADE option afterwards.

5152.NAME: Charlotte's dress
5152.DESCRIPTION: After acquiring the desired dress, do not forget to compliment her looks. Select UPGRADE option.

5153.NAME: Vase of tulips
5153.DESCRIPTION: Collect 30 tulips, you can use shop to exchange them for simple decor at Atafu island.

5154.NAME: Luxurious vase of tulips
5154.DESCRIPTION: Collect 150 tulips, you can use shop to exchange them for expensive decor at Atafu island.

516.NAME: Pay the first envoy
516.DESCRIPTION: Pay the native Tarick, so he can go and invite the old priest Screaming Squid

517.NAME: Pay the second envoy
517.DESCRIPTION: Pay the native Murick, so he can go and invite the royal admiral Edmund Oneeye

518.NAME: Pay the third envoy
518.DESCRIPTION: Pay the native Tomar, so he can go and invite the governess lady Hellen Lanchester

5182.NAME: Tree climbing rabbit
5182.DESCRIPTION: The bark of nearby trees has been scrached. Could the bunny have climed thease trees? Chop any tree on main isle.

5183.NAME: Fishy Rabbit
5183.DESCRIPTION: Look, above your wells water level two ears can be seen. Probably bunny is laying eggs at the bottom. Use your well.

5184.NAME: Fried eggs
5184.DESCRIPTION: Smell of burned hair spreads trough the main island. What did the rabbit do this time? Poke your fireplace.

5185.NAME: Visit Festival isle
5185.DESCRIPTION: Beter to see, than to listen to the rumours. To grasp what is happening on festival isle, you must head there.

5186.NAME: Collect an egg producer
5186.DESCRIPTION: One of the festival tents sells colored egg production device. Extra golden hens you can earn by doing quests.

5187.NAME: Place egg producer
5187.DESCRIPTION: This kind of thing can not be carried far. Place the device right here on the island.

5188.NAME: Chocolate eggs
5188.DESCRIPTION: The weather is warm and sunny, while taking a walk, find out how chocolate egg exchange works on Festival isle.

5189.NAME: Chocolate bunnies
5189.DESCRIPTION: Chocolate bunnies are sold out as soon as they hit shelves. Overcome problems and get your share of thease bunnies.

519.NAME: Tomatoes for trade
519.DESCRIPTION: A roast master is visiting. Give him tomatoes

5190.NAME: Calm your cattle
5190.DESCRIPTION: Calves have their eyes wide, how did eggs end up in their barn, cows don't lay eggs. Feed the terrified cows.

5191.NAME: Pranks and mischief
5191.DESCRIPTION: Very long ears, very short conscience, somebody has visited carrot fields. Harvest your carrot fields.

5192.NAME: Other storages
5192.DESCRIPTION: The lock on celler door has been picked. For now store your yummy goodies elsewere. Build food storages.

5193.NAME: Pre-Prepared
5193.DESCRIPTION: While boiling eggs for breakfast they suddenly changed colour. Strange. Try boiling some more eggs.

5194.NAME: Similar size
5194.DESCRIPTION: If ostriches have laid coconuts, than what will the palms give you? Harvest some coconut trees.

5195.NAME: Deceiving manoeuvre
5195.DESCRIPTION: In the egg battle there will definitely be a cheater. Check how much clay is left in your clay pit.

5196.NAME: A bit of color
5196.DESCRIPTION: For the sake of child safety you will need natural colorants. Harvest some tomato fields.

5197.NAME: Hard eggs
5197.DESCRIPTION: The list mentions fishing. Amber shells from gudgeon bay make the eggs harder. Collect some amber shells.

5198.NAME: Cat paw pattern
5198.DESCRIPTION: To make a fun pattern you can use cat paw prints. Grow and sell some cats, and copy some nice paw prints.

5199.NAME: Remove thorns
5199.DESCRIPTION: The most convenient place to hide eggs is bushes, so thorns have to go. Remove some thorn bushes.

5200.NAME: Mole eggs
5200.DESCRIPTION: Eggs can be dug in to the ground, but for a marker, you need to leave a hill mimicking moles. Dig fields.

5201.NAME: Bunny eggs
5201.DESCRIPTION: Kids will definitely search for Easter rabbit in the bunny pen. Feed some bunnies, so they would remain calm.

5202.NAME: Shine
5202.DESCRIPTION: Rub some eggs with greasy cloth, let it shine. Best lard comes from pigs, that is why you should feed pigs and piglets.

5203.NAME: Soft delivery
5203.DESCRIPTION: A nice reed basket, cute but hard. Lay something soft, like a hay bundle, cloth or wool. Gather any of thease resources.

5204.NAME: Good guards
5204.DESCRIPTION: Just like dealing with bees, you never know how egg delivery will go. Gather some bones to appease the guard dpgs.

5205.NAME: Color palette
5205.DESCRIPTION: The tasks bunny had are not in logical order. Get gem package from exchanging a collection, to make color palette.

5206.NAME: Grasshopper
5206.DESCRIPTION: One of the jokes can be turned on the joker. Collect some grashoppers from choping tall palmtrees.

5207.NAME: Shining shoes
5207.DESCRIPTION: Everybody in Oceania walks barefoot, bunny is no exception. Still, the list contains this task. Spend water.

5208.NAME: Secret stash
5208.DESCRIPTION: Swap last years eggs for fresh ones. And I thought there was sulfur springs in cave. Visit treasure cave.

5209.NAME: Friend fields
5209.DESCRIPTION: Bunny has other bunnies as allies, you need to check how they hide the eggs. Harvest any type of friend fields.

5210.NAME: Friend animals
5210.DESCRIPTION: You have good friends, thus you should neutralize animal jokes made by other bunnies in advance. Feed friend animals.

5211.NAME: Duck eggs
5211.DESCRIPTION: Have you ever wondered why you never see duck eggs in Oceania? Grow ducks,

5212.NAME: Other egg-fight tricks
5212.DESCRIPTION: Long explanation in tiny writing. Summarizing it all: you need wax. Collect wax.

5213.NAME: Shoe-shine II
5213.DESCRIPTION: You still don't know why bunny needs boots, but collecting those are on the list. Find some boots.

5214.NAME: Bitter experiance
5214.DESCRIPTION: BUY the most bitter radishes on the market, put them in fields and put carrot tops in fields on top.

5215.NAME: Night patrol
5215.DESCRIPTION: Hedgehogs are night animals, feed them and ask them to sit at the fence. When bunny jumps over he is in for a surprise.

5216.NAME: Ants in the coat
5216.DESCRIPTION: Another good lesson. Plant some ants in the tall grass around the egg basket. Collect some ants.

5217.NAME: Move ????
5217.DESCRIPTION: Bunny has hid the biggest treasure underneath some object with two heads and wings. Move this specific item on main isle.

5218.NAME: Planting on Festival isle
5218.DESCRIPTION: You agreed to help provide seedlings for your acquaintances. Atafu isle will not handle such an amount, visit Festival isle.

5219.NAME: Mineral fertilizer
5219.DESCRIPTION: After many festivals, the soil is flattened and empty. Open workshop and make some simple mineral fertilizer.

5220.NAME: Sturdy plants
5220.DESCRIPTION: On festival isle open shop and sow some peas.

5221.NAME: Warmth seekers
5221.DESCRIPTION: Some of the plants will need a greenhouse. Buy a box of  cucumbers.

5222.NAME: First seedlings
5222.DESCRIPTION: These plants are not ment for your consumption, everything will be packed and sent away. Harvest first pea seedlings.

5223.NAME: Build first greenhouse
5223.DESCRIPTION: Simple and cute, put some supports in the box, cover it up, and greenhouse is complete. Upgrade cucumber box.

5224.NAME: First cucumbers
5224.DESCRIPTION: Since greenhouse protects from harmful climate, all plants grow really fast. Harvest cucumber greenhouse.

523.NAME: Fox caretaker
523.DESCRIPTION: Demonstrate your ability to look after foxes. Feed foxes 10 times

5249.NAME: Personal garlic
5249.DESCRIPTION: The porridge has the same boring taste every day, perhaps time for new flavors? Grow 25 garlic fields.

5250.NAME: New snacks
5250.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps you noticed, there is a recipe for garlic practical use in workshops FOOD section. Try it!

5252.NAME: Historian's Challenge for Elixir
5252.DESCRIPTION: Finish building any dinosaurs and get one moon apple.

5253.NAME: Feeder's Challenge for Elixir
5253.DESCRIPTION: Feed a hedgehog or baby hedgehog and get one moon apple.

5254.NAME: Jeweler's Challenge
5254.DESCRIPTION: Spend two golden doubloons and get one moon apple.

5255.NAME: Designer’s Challenge for Elixir
5255.DESCRIPTION: Sell fans and get one moon apple.

5256.NAME: Forester's Challenge for Elixir
5256.DESCRIPTION: Plant any type of saplings and get one moon apple.

5257.NAME: Pearl Fisher's Challenge
5257.DESCRIPTION: Obtain mussels and get one moon apple.

5258.NAME: Juicer's Challenge
5258.DESCRIPTION: Make lemon juice and get one moon apple.

5259.NAME: Goldsmith's Challenge
5259.DESCRIPTION: Make 10 souvenirs and get one moon apple.

5260.NAME: Farmer's Challenge for Elixir
5260.DESCRIPTION: Harvest rice fields and get one moon apple.

528.NAME: Reputation for the wise priest
528.DESCRIPTION: Earn enough reputation to invite the honorable guest - priest Screaming Squid

529.NAME: Reputation for the brave admiral
529.DESCRIPTION: Earn enough reputation to invite the honorable guest - admiral Edmund Oneeye

53.NAME: Remove fields
53.DESCRIPTION: Remove 10 freshly dug fields. You won't need energy for it, so it will be easy to do

530.NAME: Reputation for the graceful governess
530.DESCRIPTION: Earn enough reputation to invite the honorable guest - governess Helen Lanchester

534.NAME: Edmund Oneeye's task I
534.DESCRIPTION: Give 2 iron units. Where to get it? Visit the jungle and look for the mine

535.NAME: Edmund Oneeye's task II
535.DESCRIPTION: Give 2 copper units. Where to get it? Visit the jungle and look for the mine

54.NAME: Construct a wooden table
54.DESCRIPTION: Buy and construct one wooden table

540.NAME: Renew the cursed temple
540.DESCRIPTION: There lies a cursed temple deep in the jungle. You have to renew it

541.NAME: Build the grand stone lighthouse
541.DESCRIPTION: To mark the island in the official maps, it needs a grand lighthouse

542.NAME: Build a habitat worthy of a governor
542.DESCRIPTION: A real governor requires a castle as a place of habitation

543.NAME: Monocle club member II
543.DESCRIPTION: To show off, build 4 shell sheds of any kind

544.NAME: Monocle club member III
544.DESCRIPTION: Build and finish 6 beach chairs (you can sell them afterwards)

546.NAME: Monocle club member V
546.DESCRIPTION: Appear in public with important people (fulfill the quest about preparing the feast and getting info)

547.NAME: Ancient temple
547.DESCRIPTION: You see an ancient temple in the distance

548.NAME: Renewing the temple
548.DESCRIPTION: Fulfill the tasks to get emeralds for renewing the temple

549.NAME: Finish renewing the temple
549.DESCRIPTION: Finish renewing the temple and you will gain control of the cursed city

5537.NAME: Visit festival isle
5537.DESCRIPTION: Kids don't want to say goodby to summer thrills, but school can be fun too, check out festival Isle.

5539.NAME: Unblock path
5539.DESCRIPTION: To advance further click on happy board and select IMPROVE. Afterwards the sign can be moved.

5540.NAME: Clear the bushes
5540.DESCRIPTION: You can't see teacher at all trough the leaves. Clear some bushes.

5541.NAME: Remove thorns
5541.DESCRIPTION: Thorny twigs will hinder  your movement and will obstruct sport classes. Remove thorny bushes.

5542.NAME: No mischief
5542.DESCRIPTION: You can play during brake time, but for now hand in the tools of mischief - your sling shots.

5543.NAME: Content of lessons
5543.DESCRIPTION: On festival isle you will learn multiple subjects. All necessary thing can be found in shop. Purchase anything.

5544.NAME: Additional work
5544.DESCRIPTION: School work on Fest. Isle, home work on main isle. Lunch time, craft some food.

5545.NAME: First class
5545.DESCRIPTION: Any language needs to be cultivated. Buy comon language seeds and cultivate this language.

5546.NAME: Second class
5546.DESCRIPTION: Logic is built on basic princaples. Learn basics of logic, build monument of numbers.

5547.NAME: Third class
5547.DESCRIPTION: Muscles grown as a resault to hard work. Let us start with basics, help gymnasts and grow your abilities.

5548.NAME: Practicing cultivation
5548.DESCRIPTION: Cultivation of beans does not take up much time, grow beans and revise your work.

5549.NAME: Practicing logics
5549.DESCRIPTION: You can practice logics by counting shells, Build shell storages and build your logic with it.

5550.NAME: Little excercise
5550.DESCRIPTION: Life is in motion, release bunnies and try to cache them, perhaps this way you will grow some muscles.

5551.NAME: First class
5551.DESCRIPTION: Jogging in the morning will advance your skills. Grow some runners, so you have someone to chalange.

5552.NAME: Second class
5552.DESCRIPTION: If you know the language basics, than learning additional languages is easy. Cultivate foreing language.

5553.NAME: Third class
5553.DESCRIPTION: Math is expanded logic of numbers, build your understanding of math by finishing monument of math.

5554.NAME: Understanding logics
5554.DESCRIPTION: To grasp right angles (90*) and logical chain, build corners of twig fences.

5555.NAME: Burning the fat
5555.DESCRIPTION: Move yourself and move everyone around. Excercising your pigs is a job that will make you sweat.

5556.NAME: Difficult languages
5556.DESCRIPTION: Languages are alive and emotional, cultivate onions and get used to shedding tears during lessons.

5557.NAME: Knowlage about language
5557.DESCRIPTION: Ypu will recieve better test score (and reward) if you demonstrate 25 time knowlage of each language.

5558.NAME: Group assignment
5558.DESCRIPTION: Visit your friends and create a project. Do any work on friend isles.

5559.NAME: Competition
5559.DESCRIPTION: Sport is all about result. Eliminate competition sell sturdy runners and gymnasts.

5560.NAME: Ancient language
5560.DESCRIPTION: If you have good knowlage in languages, then, perhaps, you will be able to decipher ancient languages. Cultivate it.

5561.NAME: Sturdy muscles
5561.DESCRIPTION: After proper warm up you can try to grow your strength. Grow sturdy weightlifters and get inspired.

5562.NAME: Scientific logic
5562.DESCRIPTION: Physics and chemistry is also logical. Build logic of science, finish science monument.

5563.NAME: Ribbon
5563.DESCRIPTION: No matter if it's used in hair, or as a necklace, ribbons give dignified looks. Craft some ropes to make ribbons.

5564.NAME: Growth
5564.DESCRIPTION: Learn to value all your accomplishments. Have 12 not fully grown tall palms on main island.

5565.NAME: Sand fields
5565.DESCRIPTION: During sunny days sport classes are held outside. Freshen up the stadium, place some fresh sand paths.

5566.NAME: Glue for crafting class
5566.DESCRIPTION: For ecological purposes glue will be made from eggs. Collect fresh eggs.

5567.NAME: Feathers
5567.DESCRIPTION: Paprick already  brought some octopuses to re-supply ink, you need to get parrot feathers (by feeding ducks).

5568.NAME: Candy
5568.DESCRIPTION: Everyone feels down once in a while, hand in some candy to help overcome difficulties of life.

5569.NAME: Collect speckled butterfly
5569.DESCRIPTION: Looks like you not longer need to help at school. Plant small flowers and watch how Giant speckled butterfly takes flight.

559.NAME: Emerald task I
559.DESCRIPTION: Burn 60 units of wood in the fireplace

56.NAME: Enough of these thorns!
56.DESCRIPTION: Clear 5 thorny bushes from the island

562.NAME: Emerald task I
562.DESCRIPTION: Feed any animal when visiting other islands 10 times

566.NAME: Emerald task II
566.DESCRIPTION: Harvest any plants 10 times when visiting other islands

57.NAME: Feed 10 grown-up chicken
57.DESCRIPTION: Grow 10 chicken into hens, wait until they're hungry and feed them again to gain experience points

570.NAME: Emerald task III
570.DESCRIPTION: Sell red or yellow flower tree (from decorations) 4 times

5706.NAME: Prepare for darkness
5706.DESCRIPTION: The chosen isle is always covered in black clouds, therefor you must bring some light. Use fireplace.

5707.NAME: Visit darkened isle
5707.DESCRIPTION: Get on your raft and head in to the dark cloud. Visit darkened isle.

5708.NAME: Forest pests
5708.DESCRIPTION: The more you wait, the less effort you will need. Remove any tree, infested tree or pile of shreds.

5709.NAME: Spooky roses
5709.DESCRIPTION: Some of the roses already match the desired look, decorate the remaining roses in matching looks.

5710.NAME: Unfinished makeover
5710.DESCRIPTION: There is a guest house, but it needs a makeover, you will have to give it a spooky look.

5711.NAME: Unpacking decorations I
5711.DESCRIPTION: Fortunately you had brought decorations in advance, now you need to unpack them. Unpack scary statues.

5712.NAME: Unpacking decorations II
5712.DESCRIPTION: Scary  torch packs have already been delivered, find them and unpack scary torches.

5713.NAME: Trap for imps
5713.DESCRIPTION: Purchase tar pit and put some lure, then for arrival of the imp.

5714.NAME: Imps for background
5714.DESCRIPTION: Unfortunately you can catch only one imp at a time. At the end of October Imps will be more frequent. Catch more imps.

5715.NAME: Bat tree
5715.DESCRIPTION: Bats are needed for the setting as well. Unpack the crates with bat tree decoration.

5716.NAME: Extra decorations
5716.DESCRIPTION: Now you can buy extra decorations at the shop. Build any of the three Halloween decoration types.

5717.NAME: Spooky rocks
5717.DESCRIPTION: How fortunate that someone figured out how to move these rocks. Use ( $ ) sign and sell a few spooky rocks.

5718.NAME: Tend to imps
5718.DESCRIPTION: Some imps are very rude. Keep the imps with good manners. Give a spanking to 20 imps for being rude.

572.NAME: Emerald task II
572.DESCRIPTION: Chop a tree 10 times when visiting other islands

5723.DESCRIPTION: Travel to Takiaki island and invite Paprick to Halloween celebration.

5724.NAME: Dangerous book
5724.DESCRIPTION: The book stubbornly refuses to part with incantations. You will have to persuade it to get every single word of power.

5725.NAME: Blessing of the earth
5725.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps earth ritual will give you a word of power. Try growing beans until you collect this word.

5726.NAME: Chant words of power
5726.DESCRIPTION: Scare off all the ghosts by using obtained words of power.

5727.NAME: Find the priest Calmar
5727.DESCRIPTION: Calmar was seen heading to dark isle, get on your raft and make him hurry up. Visit darkened island.

5728.NAME: Burning island
5728.DESCRIPTION: You complained about cold october? I will make a pyre! Have simultaneously 75 scary torches.

5729.NAME: Scary army
5729.DESCRIPTION: Don't call folks witches, i have a griffin army! Have simultaneously 75 scary statues.

5730.NAME: Spooky forest
5730.DESCRIPTION: I miss the cleared forest, till i can have simultaneously 75 bat trees to imitate a forest.

5731.NAME: Free the bats
5731.DESCRIPTION: The candy has glued the wings of poor bats. Pick up the candy and free the bats.

5732.NAME: Plants some pumpkins
5732.DESCRIPTION: The winter pumpkin stockpile was turned in to decorations, guess you will have to plant some more. Plant 32 pumpkins.

5733.NAME: Halloween treats
5733.DESCRIPTION: Build a candy basket so friends can have a snack. When bowl becomes empty press [UPGRADE] and sell the basket.

5734.NAME: An imp for each guest
5734.DESCRIPTION: All guests loved your imps, but you don't have enough imps to give to each guest as a present. Grow more imps.

5735.NAME: Jay feather
5735.DESCRIPTION: Bluish and black, these feathers will look nice on your costume. Feed some roosters and collect few jay feathers.

5736.NAME: Demonic fishing
5736.DESCRIPTION: Candy basket is a game for everyone. Try your luck 28 times.

574.NAME: Emerald task I
574.DESCRIPTION: Gain water on your friend's islands 10 times

578.NAME: Emerald task II
578.DESCRIPTION: Spend 100 units of food (in any way)

5785.NAME: Floor Cleaning
5785.DESCRIPTION: Some of your friends had soft toys. Don't think about it, clean the floor using water.

5786.NAME: Candle Removal
5786.DESCRIPTION: Friends praised seamstress Nadine's talent, but don't think about it, sell the melted wax candles.

5787.NAME: Best Discussions
5787.DESCRIPTION: Toys are in fashion, it's a wonder you don't have a toy. Feed (submit) food leftovers to the pigs.

5788.NAME: Neighbor Knowledge
5788.DESCRIPTION: Visit neighbors and inquire how to get toys. Perform any actions in the neighbor's halls.

5789.NAME: Missing Guest
5789.DESCRIPTION: The Volcano god is wise, but he wasn't at the party. Check if everything is fine, spend energy in the volcano island.

5790.NAME: In a Cheerful Mood
5790.DESCRIPTION: Toby was the happiest about the toys. Visit Toby and feed the camel gentleman.

5791.NAME: Valuable Memories
5791.DESCRIPTION: If you help the jeweler, you will get a model plane during the souvenir-making process. Obtain obsidian shards.

5792.NAME: Precious Stones
5792.DESCRIPTION: Sometimes a model plane is found during the construction of a jewel table. Use the gem mine.

5793.NAME: Sleeping Places
5793.DESCRIPTION: Usually, model planes can be found next to pirate hammocks. We don't have any, so build hammocks.

5794.NAME: Giraffe Food
5794.DESCRIPTION: By feeding horses, you might also find a giraffe, giraffes rarely eat grass, but they do eat it. Prepare straw bundles.

5795.NAME: Striped Spots
5795.DESCRIPTION: Zebra stripes have a hidden meaning, if you feed zebras, you'll find spotted giraffes. Obtain paint.

5796.NAME: Horns and Antennas
5796.DESCRIPTION: Horned antelopes while eating tend to talk about giraffe's soft antennas. Bring me bumblebees with antennas.

5797.NAME: Elephant Farm
5797.DESCRIPTION: The owner with a bat puppet kept elephants, maybe there's a connection? Feed adult elephants.

5798.NAME: Cephalopods
5798.DESCRIPTION: The puppet owner studied snails. This time we'll replace snails with another cephalopod, catch octopuses.

5799.NAME: Fruit for Bats
5799.DESCRIPTION: “If you want a bat, feed the bats.” These were the words of the puppet holder. Provide fruits for feeding bats.

58.NAME: Move the workshop
58.DESCRIPTION: Click on the workshop, choose MOVE and place the workshop in a different position

5800.NAME: Snake Multiplication
5800.DESCRIPTION: By feeding snakes, they multiply, logically? Check what eggs your hens are incubating because you need to feed snakes.

5801.NAME: Howling Panda
5801.DESCRIPTION: Nature once gave a sign, while feeding the Panda, another soft snake was found. Interrogate nature, clear bushes.

5802.NAME: Yet a Squid
5802.DESCRIPTION: When the squid toy was eaten by a llama, it was a sign to change the name. Obtain any sickles for cutting reeds.

5803.NAME: Piglets in the East
5803.DESCRIPTION: Even flying to eastern lands where risotto is served, you'll see a piglet. Harvest corn for risotto.

5804.NAME: Piglets Underground
5804.DESCRIPTION: Some mountain tribe inhabitants gladly ate oyster omelets and raised pigs. Use salt reserves.

5805.NAME: Piglets in Eggplants
5805.DESCRIPTION: Natives prepared stuffed eggplants and gave all the excess to piglets. Spend shards carving eggplants.

5806.NAME: Lemons for Paths
5806.DESCRIPTION: Chameleons won't be able to camouflage on your marble paths. Obtain lemons for marble maintenance.

5807.NAME: Wax for Paths
5807.DESCRIPTION: Chameleons won't be able to hide on Chinese ornament paths. Obtain wax for maintaining these wooden paths.

5808.NAME: Path Cementing
5808.DESCRIPTION: Limestone paths can expose chameleons. Spend cement to reinforce the paths.

5809.NAME: Weather Indicators
5809.DESCRIPTION: Sango claims everything is in your diligent hands. Build weather indicators, and you'll get a toucan toy.

581.NAME: Emerald task II
581.DESCRIPTION: Buy 5 thorny bushes in the shop

5810.NAME: Hive Toucans
5810.DESCRIPTION: Here too, Sango sees no need to help. Build beehives and you'll get a toucan toy.

5811.NAME: Feather Rainbow
5811.DESCRIPTION: Indeed, by building peacock fans, you would find a toucan toy, but I ask you to obtain a seed pack.

5812.NAME: Lemon Dish
5812.DESCRIPTION: A hammerhead in lemons, sounds scary? Luckily sometimes a koala comes to dispel fears. Prepare this dish.

5813.NAME: Potato Pancakes
5813.DESCRIPTION: Flattened potatoes with spices, the koala will protect you! Fry some portions of pancakes.

5814.NAME: Salmon Dish
5814.DESCRIPTION: Sometimes koalas will only help with sushi, but this time you need to tackle any salmon dish.

5815.NAME: Gift for a Lady
5815.DESCRIPTION: Provide Nadine with jewelry, no woman can resist a pearl necklace gift. Sell pearl necklaces.

5816.NAME: Cunning Bluff
5816.DESCRIPTION: Appeal to professionalism, loudly announce that this fabric batch is intended for handkerchiefs. Prepare silk fabric.

5817.NAME: Crunchy Compliment
5817.DESCRIPTION: To avoid the risk of chocolate allergy, submit another type of sweets. Provide and submit gingerbread cookies.

5818.NAME: Advance in Gold
5818.DESCRIPTION: These are not costumes and the job will be tricky. Part of the payment Nadine wants to receive in golden doubloons, submit them.

5819.NAME: Advance in Silver
5819.DESCRIPTION: Nadine won't skimp on quality materials, submit silver doubloons as payment for fabric.

5820.NAME: Advance in Bronze
5820.DESCRIPTION: To find the right button, you need to try a hundred other neat buttons. Submit bronze doubloons for small items.

5821.NAME: Empty the Bag
5821.DESCRIPTION: Doubloons are hidden deep in Nadine's bag, build tables to be able to look through and find the lost ones.

5822.NAME: Move Stones
5822.DESCRIPTION: The mess and the doubloon are already rolling away. Rearrange the stone mines, recover the lost coin.

5823.NAME: Change Money
5823.DESCRIPTION: Maybe you can exchange a silver doubloon? Submit bronze doubloons, Nadine will grant you silver.

5824.NAME: Put the Saw Aside
5824.DESCRIPTION: Spend the saws so that there won't be any tree cutting today.

5825.NAME: Put the Gasoline Aside
5825.DESCRIPTION: Baking in the sun in a tractor? Luckily, I just ran out of gasoline. Spend gasoline.

5826.NAME: Put the Net Aside
5826.DESCRIPTION: Get rid of the nets to leave more time for your toys.

5830.NAME: Prepare the Raft
5830.DESCRIPTION: The barrel is quite far from the shores, use ropes and tightly pull all the tied knots to the raft.

5831.NAME: Crossing the Shoal
5831.DESCRIPTION: Strengthen yourself by spending food, halfway the raft will need to be pulled over the shoal, the way back will be difficult.

5832.NAME: Wire Hook
5832.DESCRIPTION: Lifting a floating object is not easy. Submit wire for making a hook.

5833.NAME: Soft Ground
5833.DESCRIPTION: Better let the barrel sink into the ground from blows than transfer the impact to the paths. Sell stone paths.

5834.NAME: Oops, Rolled Over
5834.DESCRIPTION: Obtain big stones and surround the barrel with a small embankment, now the barrel won't go anywhere.

5835.NAME: Collect Shells
5835.DESCRIPTION: From swimming in the ocean, the barrel is covered with various shells. Obtain bull-horn shells.

5836.NAME: Rough Force I
5836.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps a forceful approach is the best solution. Machetes will definitely be broken in the process, prepare them.

5837.NAME: Rough Force II
5837.DESCRIPTION: If even machetes can't pry it open, then it's time to try using lava picks. Spend lava picks.

5838.NAME: Elephant Technique
5838.DESCRIPTION: Time to use the giant's strength, surely the barrel won't be stronger than an elephant? Sell adult elephants.

5839.NAME: Palm Pulling
5839.DESCRIPTION: Tall palms grow quickly, tie the lid to a newly planted palm. Grow 4 small tall palms simultaneously.

5840.NAME: Melting
5840.DESCRIPTION: Can't know if the lid wasn't welded shut, heat the lid's joints with torches, submit them.

5841.NAME: Scrubbing
5841.DESCRIPTION: Obtain sharp sponges and start scraping the joints. Somehow the lid must be opened.

5842.NAME: Cunning Foxes
5842.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps the barrel has a trick or a gimmick, sharpen your mind by competing with foxes. Feed the cunning foxes.

5843.NAME: Psychology
5843.DESCRIPTION: Place other barrels next to it and open and close them. Prepare barrels.

5844.NAME: Ants and Termites
5844.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps ant jaws can soften the top of the lid. Obtain ants.

5845.NAME: Open the Barrel
5845.DESCRIPTION: Place the barrel (if not already done) and press UPGRADE.

5846.NAME: Check the Contents
5846.DESCRIPTION: Once the barrel is opened, start sorting its contents. Perform an action with this barrel.

5847.NAME: Barrel Treasure
5847.DESCRIPTION: Only by completely unloading the barrel will you solve this mystery.

5848.NAME: Instruction in Horticulture I
5848.DESCRIPTION: Each mouth eats only 2-4 times before it falls like a leaf. Prepare any bean dish.

5849.NAME: Instruction in Horticulture II
5849.DESCRIPTION: The pitcher plant can digest food for up to 10 days. Obtain cloth worth 10 days in any form.

5850.NAME: Instruction in Horticulture III
5850.DESCRIPTION: The pitcher plant cannot be kept forever, they need to hibernate from time to time. Feed bears, study hibernation.

5851.NAME: First Attempt
5851.DESCRIPTION: Papuyans will regularly buy seedlings from you, growing this plant will bring you additional income.

5852.NAME: Additional Seedlings
5852.DESCRIPTION: One seedling for cultivation, one for sale, sometimes you'll get another seedling. Harvest this crop 10 times.

5853.NAME: Plantation
5853.DESCRIPTION: After long cultivation, the stocks of this plant will increase. Simultaneously grow 25 common pitcher plants.

5855.NAME: Try to Propagate
5855.DESCRIPTION: Honestly, the chances that this plant will give even one seedling are slim, but try and plant it.

5856.NAME: Red Pitcher Plants
5856.DESCRIPTION: You need to grow any pitcher plants and hope for the best, you might get a couple more reds, try it!

5857.NAME: Red Harvest
5857.DESCRIPTION: It seems that the unique pitcher plant business is going well, cultivate the red pitcher plant 35 times.

5859.NAME: The Only Plant
5859.DESCRIPTION: The violet pitcher plant will definitely be pampered and cared for. Plant the first seedling.

5860.NAME: Gift for the Botanist
5860.DESCRIPTION: This plant is valuable, but friends are more important. Submit violet pitcher plants for the birthday gift.

5861.NAME: Popular Plant
5861.DESCRIPTION: Many people let this capricious plant go to waste, so the demand is huge. Plant violet pitcher plants.

5862.NAME: Pitcher Plant Stocks
5862.DESCRIPTION: How large must the stocks be for you to say it's too much? Submit 650 common pitcher plants.

5863.NAME: Diligent Planter
5863.DESCRIPTION: Don't forget to cultivate the red pitcher plants as well. Plant red pitcher plants.

5864.NAME: Giant Plantation
5864.DESCRIPTION: To complete this task, the planter must know how to build stocks. Simultaneously grow 112 violet pitcher plants.

5865.NAME: Pitcher Plant Processing
5865.DESCRIPTION: Open the workshop section OTHER and process the pitcher plants by selecting them.

588.NAME: Emerald task III
588.DESCRIPTION: Feed a goat or a baby goat 5 times

59.NAME: Craft rope
59.DESCRIPTION: You can find rope formula in the workshop and craft it. Create one rope

592.NAME: Emerald task I
592.DESCRIPTION: Feed a calf or a cow 5 times

596.NAME: Emerald task II
596.DESCRIPTION: Submit 1 sack of flour (you can get it in the windmill)

598.NAME: Emerald task I
598.DESCRIPTION: Sell 4 barrels (from decorations, not wine barrels)

6.NAME: Complete the raft
6.DESCRIPTION: Complete repairing the raft, using the rope you found. Click on the raft and then - FINISH

60.NAME: Buy fireplace
60.DESCRIPTION: Earn enough shells and buy a fireplace in the shop

6011.NAME: Blow up balloon
6011.DESCRIPTION: Balloon is not damaged, but no matter how much the natives blow it, it remains empty. To check again gather water.

6012.NAME: Rooster breath
6012.DESCRIPTION: Roosters have powerful lungs, feed grown roosters and make them blow in the balloon.

6013.NAME: Balloons knot
6013.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps the knot is leaking air, craft more ropes.

6014.NAME: Extra salty water
6014.DESCRIPTION: Local waters have become more salty, perhaps balloon came from spice transporting ship? Use salt.

6015.NAME: Seismic activetie
6015.DESCRIPTION: I can feel it trough the feet, tuk... tuk..  tuk... . Dig up some sphalerites and listen to the sounds of earth.

6016.NAME: Check notes
6016.DESCRIPTION: You have collected volumes of data about local traditions and events, reorganize the books and move your house.

6017.NAME: Salty winds
6017.DESCRIPTION: At some moments even the wind feels salty. The clothes are still drying, get them inside quickly. Sell clothe poles.

6018.NAME: Bloating bricks
6018.DESCRIPTION: The clay brick path seems bloated. Disassemble (sell) clay brick paths and re-check their measurements.

6019.NAME: Pot flowers
6019.DESCRIPTION: Even flowers are showing protest, time to move flowers to window sills. Craft pots for flower replanting.

6020.NAME: Rain of bees
6020.DESCRIPTION: Unbelivable, bees have become confused and are flying in cloud patern. Calm the bees, feed them with sugar.

6021.NAME: Confused flax
6021.DESCRIPTION: This time flax is literally spinning out of control. The field looks like a macaroni factory. Harvest the confused flax.

6022.NAME: Meerkat watchtower
6022.DESCRIPTION: Usually meerkats scout for predators, this time all ears are pointed in a single direction. Feed meerkats and their cubs.

6023.NAME: Sphalerite potatoes
6023.DESCRIPTION: After enthusiastic digging there are a lot of voids, where sphalerite was taken out. Fill them with potatoes.

6024.NAME: Detecting direction
6024.DESCRIPTION: If wind brings odd breezes, then, by going against wind, you will find the source. Build weather cock.

6025.NAME: Iron okside
6025.DESCRIPTION: Yet again, bump... bump... but direction is different from salt breezes. Check underground and collect iron ore.

6026.NAME: Clam shells
6026.DESCRIPTION: Mussels are fleeing to dry land, just to escape salty water. Collect mussels

6027.NAME: Bleached animals
6027.DESCRIPTION: Excessive salt has bleached brown bunnies completely white. Sell rabbits.

6028.NAME: Salt rock
6028.DESCRIPTION: Last time you were here, this salt rock was not here, neither was this rubber duck. Use salt crystals in workshop.

6029.NAME: Smiling faces
6029.DESCRIPTION: Make some stationary smiles and inspire others to smile. Build smiling boards or totem masks.

603.NAME: Emerald task III
603.DESCRIPTION: Craft from coconuts 5 units of milk (in the workshop)

6030.NAME: White bath
6030.DESCRIPTION: Bleach the troubles, put the rubber ducky in a bath of milk. Collect some milk.

6031.NAME: Sunny attitude
6031.DESCRIPTION: Take the ducky to desert island, sunny sand and any help for Toby will definitely warm your heart.

6032.NAME: Strawberries in whipped cream
6032.DESCRIPTION: Sweeten the mood, this is the right time for strawberries and some whipped cream. Harvest strawberries.

6033.NAME: Friendly platypuses
6033.DESCRIPTION: Rubber ducky is as alien to a real duck as a real duck to platypus, but at least platypuses is friendly, feed them.

6034.NAME: Wisptrees
6034.DESCRIPTION: In correct lighting the wisp tree resembles glow-bug colony, and is a great mood lifter. Build wisptrees.

6035.NAME: Nice view
6035.DESCRIPTION: Improve wisptree sight by adding some royal water lilies to the scenery. Build a few royal lilies.

6036.NAME: Some chili
6036.DESCRIPTION: All that whipped cream, turned tongue far too sweet, but ducky just sighs and does not complain. Gather and chew some chili.

6037.NAME: Horse rides
6037.DESCRIPTION: Yellow ducky on a mighty steed, but ducky is sad. Feed some stallions and go for a ride.

6038.NAME: Strange cache
6038.DESCRIPTION: While trying to cache an octopus, your net has cought something very big. Throw an extra fishing line in any fishing spot.

6039.NAME: Empty net
6039.DESCRIPTION: The giant object turned out to be another slightly warm heart shaped balloon. Warm it up more with hot water dips. Sell troughs.

6040.NAME: Possible inflate
6040.DESCRIPTION: This balloon is similar to first one, but maybe this one can be inflated? Bake some bread to gain strength and blow!

6041.NAME: Empty sound
6041.DESCRIPTION: While hugging the ducky, it makes no sound what so ever. Stroke the ducky the same way you stroke cats. Feed cats.

6042.NAME: Watching horizon
6042.DESCRIPTION: Ducky stares in the distant empty waters, climb a coconut tree, look at the horizon, and collect some coconuts.

6043.NAME: Dash for the heart
6043.DESCRIPTION: Pink ducky, pink heart, logical? Dash home and bring it. Take the shortcut trough bushes, remove thorny bushes.

6044.NAME: Yellow balloon
6044.DESCRIPTION: You just realised, that you should have brought the other balloon as well. Run like the wind, collect eagle feathers.

6045.NAME: Happiness
6045.DESCRIPTION: Ever since you brought the second balloon ducky's gaze is glued to it. To tie down the balloon plant some trees.

6046.NAME: Deliver pink balloon
6046.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps yellow ducky is waiting for pink balloon? Cross the corn field with balloon in-tow. Harvest corn.

6047.NAME: Deduction
6047.DESCRIPTION: This time air mail had failed duckies, the hearts were sent but got lost. Put some markers, collect smiling mask.

6048.NAME: Deduction II
6048.DESCRIPTION: Duckies were upset that they gave away their hearts, but received nothing. Visit friends and clear similar misunderstandings.

6049.NAME: Dating duckies
6049.DESCRIPTION: Duckies now have excellent mood. Organize a date, craft romantically red tomato soup.

6050.NAME: Flowers for pink ducky
6050.DESCRIPTION: Yellow ducky is filled with joy. Help rubber quacker express his feelings

6051.NAME: A compliment for yellow ducky
6051.DESCRIPTION: Pink ducky has so many warm things she wants to say. Provide her with some hearfull aphorisms.

6052.NAME: Cach one balloon
6052.DESCRIPTION: Balloon amount has no limits, catch as many as you like, but be wary, you won't cache them in a single try.

607.NAME: Emerald task I
607.DESCRIPTION: Grow and harvest 5 prickly melon fields

609.NAME: Emerald task III
609.DESCRIPTION: Craft in the workshop  color pots 3 times (3 pots each time)

61.NAME: Complete fireplace
61.DESCRIPTION: Earn wood and shards, and build and complete the fireplace

610.NAME: Pumpkins for the guild
610.DESCRIPTION: The parchment guild member loves pumpkins. Submit 100 pumpkins

611.NAME: Milk for guild
611.DESCRIPTION: Guild members also love milk. Submit 80 units of milk

612.NAME: Cloth for guild
612.DESCRIPTION: They require lots of cloth. Submit 15 units of cloth

617.NAME: Proof of hard work
617.DESCRIPTION: Feed 30 times any animals on other islands

618.NAME: Reputation for the guild
618.DESCRIPTION: Earn enough reputation, so that the parchment merchants start offering their product in the shop

619.NAME: Taking care of hens
619.DESCRIPTION: The architect is interested in hens. Show him how it's done by feeding hens or chicken 100 times

62.NAME: Craft 5 ropes
62.DESCRIPTION: Find 5 lianas in the bushes and craft 5 ropes out of them

620.NAME: Gardening lessons
620.DESCRIPTION: He is also interested in gardening. Harvest any plants 100 times

6209.NAME: Red sweets
6209.DESCRIPTION: It makes sense, that red sand stormer likes red sweet things. Harvest sweet shells.

621.NAME: Proof of skill
621.DESCRIPTION: Demonstrate your wood-chopping skills. Chop down 20 fully grown palms

6210.NAME: Pink divers
6210.DESCRIPTION: Pink birds are awesome, but regular ducks are nice as well, so feed them.

6211.NAME: Diving in sand
6211.DESCRIPTION: Submarine can't travel trough sand, thus there is water below island. Fish in shark bay and collect info on axalotl.

6215.NAME: Sugar for energy
6215.DESCRIPTION: For quick energy boost use very sweet coffee. Spend sugar in any way.

6216.NAME: Gift for scouts
6216.DESCRIPTION: Striped angelfish would be a nice gift to vigilante scouts, cache one striped angelfish.

6217.NAME: Traveling food
6217.DESCRIPTION: Get yourself a hefty loaf of bread, so you can spend longer time on the new island. Harvest wheat fields.

6218.NAME: Scout ahead
6218.DESCRIPTION: You can find this island half way between Pinaki and Tikei islands. Go there.

6219.NAME: Smiling totems
6219.DESCRIPTION: I think this island was once inhabited. Find proof of this fact by searching the island.

622.NAME: Taking care of pigs
622.DESCRIPTION: He wants to learn about pigs as well. Feed  pigs (or piglets) 100 times

6220.NAME: Usefull tokens
6220.DESCRIPTION: Intuition tells you, that these plain looking coins can be very useful. Pocket them, before going further.

6221.NAME: Money for research
6221.DESCRIPTION: The studies will take a few days, meanwhile start collecting compensation, find some bronze doubloon.

6222.NAME: Harvest coconuts
6222.DESCRIPTION: Nuts increase brain activity, harvest coconut trees.

6223.NAME: General outline
6223.DESCRIPTION: Find at least 20 totems, perhaps there will be a pattern, perhaps not.

6224.NAME: White miracle
6224.DESCRIPTION: Round as a sun, white as fresh snow. Only the whitest pearls will suffice. Sell some pearls.

6225.NAME: Dark miracle
6225.DESCRIPTION: Give the blackest obsidian shards so natives can start preparing last step.

6226.NAME: Difficult task
6226.DESCRIPTION: There are only five spots on the entire island where soil is not hard as a rock. Dig earth on all five spots.

6227.NAME: Make the earth cry
6227.DESCRIPTION: The solution has been found. Plant some black onions to collect your prize.

623.NAME: Proof of skill
623.DESCRIPTION: Show that you are a great craftsman. Craft anything in the workshop 70 times

624.NAME: Torches for the architect
624.DESCRIPTION: The architect wants to explore the jungle during the night. Give him 10 torches

625.NAME: Wine for the architect
625.DESCRIPTION: Wine for inspiration: submit 3 bottles of wine

626.NAME: Architect's wages
626.DESCRIPTION: He wants some payment in advance. Submit 1500 shells

627.NAME: Reputation for the architect
627.DESCRIPTION: The last task is to earn reputation for the architect

628.NAME: Parchments for the work
628.DESCRIPTION: Gustaff Paolo needs some parchments. Buy (in the shop section SPECIAL) and submit 3 parchments

629.NAME: Comfy workplace
629.DESCRIPTION: The architect requires a fancy table to work on. Build and sell a clay table

63.NAME: Craft bone beads
63.DESCRIPTION: In the workshop you can find bone bead formula. Get the needed components and craft them. The natives will give you shells for them

630.NAME: Bones for the quill
630.DESCRIPTION: Paolo needs bones to create quills. Give him some bones

631.NAME: More parchment
631.DESCRIPTION: Paolo needs more parchments. Submit 3 more

632.NAME: Food for work
632.DESCRIPTION: The architect requires food supplies. Give him 250 units of food

633.NAME: Stone blocks
633.DESCRIPTION: Paolo wants to research stone blocks. Give him 10 blocks

634.NAME: More parchment
634.DESCRIPTION: Paolo needs more parchments. Submit 3 more

635.NAME: Beads for Paolo's wife
635.DESCRIPTION: Give her some bone beads, so she is not disappointed by her husband's long absence

636.NAME: Color to finish blueprints
636.DESCRIPTION: Everything is almost done. Give him 5 color pots, so he can color his blueprints

637.NAME: Onions for the glass merchants
637.DESCRIPTION: Give the merchants some onions. They love spicy food

6374.NAME: Build a lighthouse
6374.DESCRIPTION: Locate the rock pile and build a monumental structure.

6375.NAME: Harvest wheat
6375.DESCRIPTION: Harvest wheat, but remember to plant it in an area, that is accessible tomorrow as well as today.

6376.NAME: Three branch palms
6376.DESCRIPTION: Cut down three branch palms. Take note, palms are not walkable.

6377.NAME: Grow carrots
6377.DESCRIPTION: This is the most difficult task, some of your carrots will definitely spoil. Harvest fresh carrots.

6378.NAME: Lake fishing
6378.DESCRIPTION: It is too dangerous to swim in cold waters, but fishing is safe. Try fishing in the lake.

6379.NAME: Harvest coconuts
6379.DESCRIPTION: Coconuts trees do not rot, and that is good. Harvest coconuts 24 times.

638.NAME: Salt for the glass merchants
638.DESCRIPTION: Give the merchant some salt. He needs it for the stew

6380.NAME: Feed cows
6380.DESCRIPTION: Cows need to eat at least once every 72 hours, so plan accordingly. Feed cows 50 times.

6381.NAME: Harvest corn
6381.DESCRIPTION: Best choice is to plant corn in the area you can harvest the same day. Harvest some corn.

6382.NAME: Cut sturdy palms
6382.DESCRIPTION: This palm takes a lot of time to grow. Think of the best growing area. Cut down sturdy palms.

6383.NAME: Feed sloths
6383.DESCRIPTION: One pitaya tree can feed two sloths. Feed sloths 50 times.

6384.NAME: Harvest pumpkins
6384.DESCRIPTION: It is best to plant pumpkins in an area, that will not be available for few days. Harvest pumpkins.

6385.NAME: Dragon fruits
6385.DESCRIPTION: Harvest pitaya trees, remember, thease trees need 96 hours to grow fruits!

6386.NAME: Finish the tasks
6386.DESCRIPTION: To gain respect of the wise owl you need to finish all the riddle quests.

6387.NAME: Diligence award
6387.DESCRIPTION: If you finish all the tasks before July 20th, you will get extra gasoline, tools and extra cake.

639.NAME: Copper for the glass merchant
639.DESCRIPTION: He will need some copper units. You can get them in the metal mine in the jungle

64.NAME: Buy water hole
64.DESCRIPTION: Earn enough shells and buy the water hole in the shop

640.NAME: Cloth for glass merchant's wife
640.DESCRIPTION: The merchant's wife likes to sew dresses. Give her 5 units of cloth as a present

641.NAME: Color for glass merchant's wife
641.DESCRIPTION: She also enjoys painting. Give her 10 units of color for her painting practices

642.NAME: Beads for glass merchant's wife
642.DESCRIPTION: Give her the traditional bone beads as a present. Submit 10 beads

643.NAME: Strawberries for glass merchant's children
643.DESCRIPTION: They love sweet things. Give them 60 strawberries

644.NAME: Sugar for glass merchant's children
644.DESCRIPTION: They love sweet things. Submit 100 units of sugar

645.NAME: Milk for glass merchant's children
645.DESCRIPTION: And they are very thirsty. Give them 40 bottles of milk

646.NAME: Move the sawmill
646.DESCRIPTION: Now you can move the sawmill. Try it

647.NAME: Change your look
647.DESCRIPTION: You can change your sex and appearance in the look-editing window. Change something to fulfill this task.

648.NAME: Move the windmill
648.DESCRIPTION: Now you can move the windmill. Try it

649.NAME: Renew and sell the pavement
649.DESCRIPTION: Choose one ancient pavement tile. Renew it and now you can move or sell it. Sell it.

65.NAME: Complete water hole
65.DESCRIPTION: Earn enough resources to build and complete constructing the water hole

650.NAME: Renew and sell the ancient wall
650.DESCRIPTION: Choose one ancient wall tile. Renew it and now you can move or sell it. Sell it.

651.NAME: Experienced manufacturer
651.DESCRIPTION: Submit 160 bones. You will earn 70 reputation and 10 000 experience

652.NAME: Experienced farmer
652.DESCRIPTION: Submit 600 units of wheat. In exchange, you will receive 70 reputation and 10 000 experience.

653.NAME: Experienced animal tender
653.DESCRIPTION: Submit 250 units of milk. In exchange, you will receive 70 reputation and 10 000 experience.

654.NAME: Famous craftsman
654.DESCRIPTION: Submit 1000 planks. In exchange, you will receive 150 reputation and 20 000 experience.

655.NAME: Famous farmer
655.DESCRIPTION: Submit 2000 carrots. In exchange, you will receive 150 reputation and 20 000 experience.

656.NAME: Famous animal tender
656.DESCRIPTION: Submit 800 eggs. In exchange, you will receive 150 reputation and 20 000 experience.

657.NAME: Professional philanthropist
657.DESCRIPTION: Submit 20 000 shells. In exchange, you will receive 200 reputation and 20 000 experience.

658.NAME: Professional farmer
658.DESCRIPTION: Submit 3000 tomatoes. In exchange, you will receive 200 reputation and 20 000 experience.

659.NAME: Professional animal tender
659.DESCRIPTION: Submit 900 units of wool. In exchange, you will receive 200 reputation and 20 000 experience.

66.NAME: Craft 3 straw bundles
66.DESCRIPTION: Grow corn and craft in the workshop straw bundles from corn and ropes

660.NAME: Animal herder
660.DESCRIPTION: Feed any animal on your friend's island 50 times

661.NAME: Crop guard
661.DESCRIPTION: Harvest any crops on your friend's island 50 times

6617.NAME: Interrogating the Chief
6617.DESCRIPTION: Click on the chief with the left mouse button and listen to what the chief has to say.

6618.NAME: Path to the Mountains
6618.DESCRIPTION: Head to the village boundary, click the left mouse button on the sign 'Path to the right' and select USE.

6619.NAME: Landslides
6619.DESCRIPTION: After a short climb, you realize that the path is no longer possible, search the nearest available area.

662.NAME: Tree chopper
662.DESCRIPTION: Chop trees on your friends' islands

6620.NAME: Search the Bushes
6620.DESCRIPTION: Search the reeds, one reed bush will behave differently than the others.

6621.NAME: Help a Stranger
6621.DESCRIPTION: Sitting in the mountains, I've caught a cold and would like to finally eat some decent food. Take care of the stranger.

6622.NAME: Blankets for the Stranger
6622.DESCRIPTION: It's warm in the nest, but I'd also like to sleep comfortably. Provide cloth for warm blankets.

6623.NAME: Burden Bearers
6623.DESCRIPTION: The stranger stands up wanting to hug, but his legs give way. Llamas are excellent climbers, raise them.

6624.NAME: The Great Llamas
6624.DESCRIPTION: No, I won't climb down, you can move excellently through the mountains with llamas. Rent llamas and tie them to the posts.

6625.NAME: Overcoming Obstacles
6625.DESCRIPTION: Some of the llamas can be put to work and slowly pull away these landslide rocks. Try it.

6626.NAME: Rent More Llamas
6626.DESCRIPTION: Open the shop and you'll see additional burden bearer services available. Spend silver doubloons, buy bags.

6627.NAME: Move Forward
6627.DESCRIPTION: Clear the path and proceed along the mountain trails. Remove the landslides.

6628.NAME: Campsite
6628.DESCRIPTION: You won't explore all the mountains in one day. Clear the thorns so we can camp in this clearing.

6629.NAME: Boil the Kettle
6629.DESCRIPTION: Thank you for clearing this patch of land. Here, put the kettle on the fire.

663.NAME: 3rd level pumpkins
663.DESCRIPTION: Harvest pumpkins on your friend's islands

6630.NAME: Try Traveling
6630.DESCRIPTION: First, try leaving and returning with the campfire burning, then try climbing the mountain with the campfire extinguished.

6631.NAME: Extinguish the Campfire
6631.DESCRIPTION: Removing the kettle from the campfire will extinguish it. This way, you can move the camp to any place in the mountains.

6632.NAME: Jump from the Mountain
6632.DESCRIPTION: If you're not careful, you'll get stuck in the mountains just like I did. On one of the islands, there will definitely be a friend with advice. Find this island.

6633.NAME: Find a Specialist
6633.DESCRIPTION: Aldo shows off his warm coat, Nadine really knows how to sew! Refuel the plane and I'll take you.

6634.NAME: Flat Food
6634.DESCRIPTION: Once everything is discussed, Aldo talks about his flights to distant lands, prepare a pizza according to Aldo's descriptions.

6635.NAME: Dress Up
6635.DESCRIPTION: You can't appear before Nadine looking like this. Polish your reputation. (Use insectivores or roses)

6636.NAME: Silk for the Parachute
6636.DESCRIPTION: To make a parachute, a large amount of silk fabric is needed, provide the silk.

6637.NAME: Gifts for Nadine
6637.DESCRIPTION: Prepare a splendid thank-you gift by selling any of the gemstone souvenirs.

6638.NAME: Special Needles
6638.DESCRIPTION: Make special sewing needles for Nadine by cooling iron in underground water. Spend iron ore.

664.NAME: 4th level pumpkins
664.DESCRIPTION: Harvest pumpkins on your friend's islands

6640.NAME: Jumping Spot
6640.DESCRIPTION: Aldo suggests flying over the mountains with the plane and exploring the best jumping spots. Head to the misty mountains.

6641.NAME: Jump from the Plane
6641.DESCRIPTION: Since you're in the mountains, let's jump right here. Leave and return to the misty mountains.

6642.NAME: Try the Parachute
6642.DESCRIPTION: Jumping from the cliff ledge, the wind will carry you to another island. Click on the parachute and find out where the wind is blowing.

6643.NAME: Mythical Birds
6643.DESCRIPTION: Look, do you see there in the distance? They look a lot like Andean condors, but this local species seems larger. Try to feed them.

6644.NAME: Tagging
6644.DESCRIPTION: My goal in these mountains is to tag all the local condors. I hope you'll help find the other birds?

6646.NAME: Extract the Core
6646.DESCRIPTION: Don't be afraid to use the pickaxe, it seems the inner crystal is indestructible. Completely free the crystal tip.

6647.NAME: Bridges of Light
6647.DESCRIPTION: The crystal in the sunlight has created an unusual bridge, and the bridge seems stable enough for walking. Uncover the next tip.

6648.NAME: Path of Light
6648.DESCRIPTION: A person can walk, stones fall through. Very practical. Create light paths to other mountain areas.

6649.NAME: Bird Cages
6649.DESCRIPTION: To prove your skills, showcase the birdhouses built over the years. Sell them.

665.NAME: 5th level pumpkins
665.DESCRIPTION: Harvest pumpkins on your friend's islands

6650.NAME: Hens and Roosters
6650.DESCRIPTION: Introduce the bird researcher to the hens and baby roosters you've raised. Feed them.

6651.NAME: Hens in the Neighborhood
6651.DESCRIPTION: Your care for birds extends far beyond your yard. Feed the neighbor's chickens and hens.

6652.NAME: Ostrich Breeder
6652.DESCRIPTION: The condor is large, but it can't surpass the size of an ostrich. Salī's eyes literally sparkle. Feed the ostriches.

6653.NAME: Bird Feed
6653.DESCRIPTION: I hope you know? Bread is not healthy for birds. Better scatter rice for the birds. Prepare a rice dish in the mountains.

6654.NAME: Ornithologist's Dilemma
6654.DESCRIPTION: Knābītis knows nothing about those animals that aren't birds. Feed the platypuses and prove that this mammal is not a bird.

6656.NAME: Acquire More Crystals
6656.DESCRIPTION: Well, you can't do much with just one crystal, try to extract another handful of shiny stones.

6657.NAME: Explore the Crystals
6657.DESCRIPTION: Go to the jeweler and determine the value of the crystals. Pay the master for help by selling wine barrels.

6658.NAME: Storage Box
6658.DESCRIPTION: Such a beautiful find can't be stored in an ordinary suitcase. Provide painted planks for making the box.

6659.NAME: Crystal Butterfly
6659.DESCRIPTION: Try your sculpting skills on the recently unearthed crystals. Create a butterfly.

666.NAME: Bead gift
666.DESCRIPTION: Give the glass merchant bone beads

6660.NAME: Crystal Fruit
6660.DESCRIPTION: The initially intended crystal tear eventually turned into a pineapple, it happens. Build this sculpture.

6661.NAME: Gem Sculpture
6661.DESCRIPTION: Create some gem trees that you can display alongside the crystal sculptures.

6662.NAME: Limestone Exhibition
6662.DESCRIPTION: For contrast, you'll also need some of your limestone sculptures. Make them.

6663.NAME: Sandstone Exhibition
6663.DESCRIPTION:
Sandstone Exhibition
Create some artworks from the finest sandstone.

6664.NAME: Crystal Decorations
6664.DESCRIPTION: The exhibition definitely needs to feature the new sculptures. Create crystal decorations in large numbers.

6665.NAME: Decorative Stone
6665.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps it would be good to add something with a nature motif? Build fish sculptures or royal water lilies.

6666.NAME: Wax Bees
6666.DESCRIPTION: I heard that at the last exhibition, the wax figures melted. I hope yours will be more durable. Make wax bees.

6667.NAME: Condor Eggs
6667.DESCRIPTION: Open the shop and purchase some condor eggs, and try to hatch them.

6668.NAME: Condor Chicks
6668.DESCRIPTION: Feed the condor chicks and help them grow strong and healthy.

6669.NAME: Release into the Wild
6669.DESCRIPTION: After raising them, let the condors return to the mountains. Sell the adult specimens.

667.NAME: Bean harvest -  level 2
667.DESCRIPTION: Submit beans and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

6678.NAME: Aphids
6678.DESCRIPTION: As you can see, the turmeric flowers are currently wilting. It seems they need to be replanted in pots. Spend clay pots.

6679.NAME: Honey Jam
6679.DESCRIPTION: Taste it! Great flavor! A jar of honey fell into my jam pot. The recipe turned out great! Obtain honey.

6680.NAME: New Building
6680.DESCRIPTION: After a lightning strike, my shed burned down. I built the new one from stone. Finish the stone building material storage.

6681.NAME: Elephant Growth
6681.DESCRIPTION: My heart rejoices at every elephant family, in recent years the number of elephants has increased. Release (sell) the elephants.

6682.NAME: Screw Problem
6682.DESCRIPTION: You're right, some hinges are missing screws, in the savannah some building materials are rare. Will you help? Spend screws.

6683.NAME: Soft Landing
6683.DESCRIPTION: I'm not surprised the mountain winds brought you here. But if you plan to jump again, better prepare a soft landing.

6684.NAME: Talk About Birds
6684.DESCRIPTION: Sit by the campfire, relax, and chat about life. Find out what the bird expert has been doing in the mountains.

6685.NAME: 25 Bee Feathers
6685.DESCRIPTION: I've heard tales about your special bee species. Would you like to trade a bee queen? Collect pretty beehives.

6686.NAME: 35 Feather Truffles
6686.DESCRIPTION: Please obtain 70 fresh truffle seeds for me, and I'll give you 35 peacock feathers.

6687.NAME: 45 Reptile Feathers
6687.DESCRIPTION: If you let me feed your reptiles, I'll gift you some more feathers.

6688.NAME: 25 Savannah Feathers
6688.DESCRIPTION: Zebras aren't rare? Then tell me, when was the last time you raised zebras? I'll trade your zebra herd for my feathers.

6689.NAME: 35 Moon Feathers
6689.DESCRIPTION: I agree, the price is high. Such an amount of apples is obtained by working for 25 days. Provide moonlight elixirs.

669.NAME: Bean harvest - level 3 submission
669.DESCRIPTION: Submit beans and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

6690.NAME: 45 Reed Feathers
6690.DESCRIPTION: I have a client who urgently needs reed sickles. Provide and submit the sickles to me. We'll split the profit 40/60.

6691.NAME: Peacock Art
6691.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps Sali Beaks is to blame, but your thoughts are currently only about birds. Sell peacock fans for the exhibition.

6692.NAME: Live Exhibit
6692.DESCRIPTION: Live fish against the backdrop of fans, excellent! Build large aquariums for the exhibition.

6693.NAME: Volcanic Island Art
6693.DESCRIPTION: The exhibition has no set theme. Introduce guests to culture from other islands. Build hanging volcanic-rock seats.

6694.NAME: Dinosaurs for the Exhibition
6694.DESCRIPTION: Such things are usually only seen in museums. Your exhibition will become famous. Sell any dinosaur models for the exhibition.

6695.NAME: Peacock Decorations
6695.DESCRIPTION: Salī Knābītis can't be persuaded to go to the exhibition, so you must quickly deliver some peacock statues to the exhibition. Build them.

6696.NAME: Shark Decorations
6696.DESCRIPTION: The exhibition doesn't look 'Oceanic' enough, to fix this situation, place shark trophies in all corners. Build them.

67.NAME: Buy 8 twig fences
67.DESCRIPTION: Buy and place 8 twig fences. Previously placed fences are not taken into account

671.NAME: Tomato harvest - level 1 submission
671.DESCRIPTION: Submit tomatoes and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

673.NAME: Tomato harvest - level 2 submission
673.DESCRIPTION: Submit tomatoes and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

675.NAME: Tomato harvest - level 3 submitting
675.DESCRIPTION: Submit tomatoes and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

677.NAME: Corn harvest - level 1 submission
677.DESCRIPTION: Submit corn and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

679.NAME: Corn harvest - level 2 submission
679.DESCRIPTION: Submit corn and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

68.NAME: Complete 8 twig fences
68.DESCRIPTION: Complete 8 twig fences. Previously completed fences are not taken into account

681.NAME: Corn harvest - level 3 submission
681.DESCRIPTION: Submit corn and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes

6812.NAME: Visit the island
6812.DESCRIPTION: Is it just me, or is that a giant snow hill in the middle of the ocean? Go check it out.

6813.NAME: Find snow shovels
6813.DESCRIPTION: Visit Pinaki treasure island, go inside the cave, and retrieve snow shovels from last yera. You can also make them in workshop section UNIQUE.

6814.NAME: Feed forest animals
6814.DESCRIPTION: The blizzard has covered all of the shrubbery, forest animals have nothing to eat. Feed them.

6815.NAME: Re-stock the feeders
6815.DESCRIPTION: Most animals are afraid of humans. Stock up the feeders and let animals enjoy the food once you leave.

6816.NAME: Pleasent sounds
6816.DESCRIPTION: Ring a bell to notify the beginning of changes, fix the bells and let the animals enjoy crisp sounds.

6817.NAME: Check the ice bridge
6817.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps during summer the bridge looks impressive, but at the moment you can walk on ice. Still, you should check the bridge.

6818.NAME: Clear the path
6818.DESCRIPTION: Plow your way forward, but keep in mind, forecast predicts another blizzard.

6819.NAME: Re-stock the feeders
6819.DESCRIPTION: Listen, do things nice and slow, no need for rush. Feeders are setting pace, 2 feeders mean 2 days for finishing the quests.

6820.NAME: Hungry inhabbitants
6820.DESCRIPTION: It's a celebration, so let the fish enjoy some carrots, and let the birds eat salmon. Feed the forest animals.

6821.NAME: Other work I
6821.DESCRIPTION: Ever heard of winter wheat? Look for places that are soft enough to dig and sow some wheat fields.

6822.NAME: Winter bells II
6822.DESCRIPTION: Birds of the forest are enjoying the bells ringing, but try as you might, other bells are not moving. Fix them.

6823.NAME: Skating ring
6823.DESCRIPTION: To complete this task you need to have 80 ice tiles on the map. Some tiles will need to be cleaned twice.

6824.NAME: Enough demolition
6824.DESCRIPTION: Speak truthfully how many spruces did you cut already? Dig the earth and plant new spruces.

6825.NAME: Giant ice field
6825.DESCRIPTION: I did not say it will be easy, but you will need to clear entire island from snow heaps.

6826.NAME: Ring some bells
6826.DESCRIPTION: Let the bells ring loud and clear. Fix every bell on the island.

6827.NAME: Cozy home
6827.DESCRIPTION: There is enough space to put 10 houses on this island, but no need to waste all of the free space, there will be other building quests.

6828.NAME: House with a spruce
6828.DESCRIPTION: You have unlocked another decoration. You will need multiple of these houses AT THE SAME TIME.

6829.NAME: Beautifull x-mas tree
6829.DESCRIPTION: One or two seashell from the ocean, top it with a starfish, whola! A cute x-mas tree. Place some decorated x-mas trees.

683.NAME: Wheat harvest - level 1 submission
683.DESCRIPTION: Submit wheat and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

6830.NAME: Re-stock feeders
6830.DESCRIPTION: Three feeders, that means you have three days. I know you have more pressing matters.

6831.NAME: Fatten up
6831.DESCRIPTION: Since the next task will take longer, you need to prepare the animals for longer absence.

6832.NAME: Snowy trees
6832.DESCRIPTION: Look for snow trees in the shop. If you lack resources for purchase you can use seed pack from collections. Place 10 snow trees.

6834.NAME: Dig a new path
6834.DESCRIPTION: If you clear 50 snow path tiles you will get 6 coffees and 6 cakes.

6835.NAME: Snowball the snowmen
6835.DESCRIPTION: Enjoy the snowball fight! The island has multiple snowmen to practice. Throw 56 snowballs and you will gain 6000 experience.

6836.NAME: Winter repairs
6836.DESCRIPTION: Fix the wooden lanterns, ice walls, tea houses, snow trees and ice lakes. This job is worth 5 silver doubloons.

6837.NAME: Don't starve
6837.DESCRIPTION: Don't wait for the animals, re stock the feeders now.

6838.NAME: Build a snowman
6838.DESCRIPTION: I promised a snowman, right? Now why are you upset, when i said 25? Press UPGRADE on snow globes.

6839.NAME: Overheated bunnies
6839.DESCRIPTION: Winter rabbit feels too hot at festival island. Feed these rabbits both inside the snow pile and outside of it.

6840.NAME: Re-stock feeders
6840.DESCRIPTION: It is nice, when your efforts are being recognized. Fully eaten carrots is best proof of animal happy spirits.

6841.NAME: Heavy feeding
6841.DESCRIPTION: It is possible to feed 95 animals in a single day, so 90 in three day span is easy, right? Feed animals.

6842.NAME: Warm shelter
6842.DESCRIPTION: Under the snow was so warm! Let the animals rest under a pile of straw. Build few wigwams.

6843.NAME: Feeders, feeders
6843.DESCRIPTION: Give the animals some awesome snacks, it is a celebration after all.

6844.NAME: Spices for gingerbread
6844.DESCRIPTION: Generate some happiness , help friends harvest their fields and collect spices for gingerbread crafting.

6845.NAME: Grain conffeti
6845.DESCRIPTION:
Dip rice, wheat, corn or beans in eatable paint and whola, an organic conffeti.
Sow these seeds.

6846.NAME: Last feeder
6846.DESCRIPTION: Look at all that nice fat! Animals are prepared for long winter. Feed them just one last time before leaving.

6847.NAME: Housewifes cows
6847.DESCRIPTION: One of the farmers wife's decided to take a day off. You will need to feed her cows and sheep for a while.

6848.NAME: Remove x-mas lights
6848.DESCRIPTION: Time to put all these decorations back in to boxes. Time to bag the stars and candles. Collect bone beads.

6849.NAME: Find the flowers
6849.DESCRIPTION: We decided to help out a bit. Find and repair 5 hidden ice flowers and we will gift you 3 pieces of cake.

685.NAME: Wheat harvest - level 2 submission
685.DESCRIPTION: Submit wheat and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

6855.NAME: Click-clack direction
6855.DESCRIPTION: Use sound for guidance and find the tropical crab island.

6857.NAME: Big apetite
6857.DESCRIPTION: Crabs are so hungry, that they could eat a cow (so leave cows at home) Satiate their hunger.

6858.NAME: Diet
6858.DESCRIPTION: After the holidays crabs were trying fasting, so the eating schedule is strict. Feed white crabs regularly.

6859.NAME: Jungle guid
6859.DESCRIPTION: Don't worry all is not that hopeless, regular twigs can be chopped without restraint. Move trough bushes.

6860.NAME: Wild crops
6860.DESCRIPTION: The further you move from raft, the thicker wild wheat becomes. Keep in mind, it has almost the same nutrition value as regular wheat.

6861.NAME: White guest
6861.DESCRIPTION: Take one white crab home. Open Shop menu and place a crab on Atafu island.

6862.NAME: Sell one crab
6862.DESCRIPTION: Selling an adult crab will net you more reputation than a baby crab, so best course of action is feeding the crab.

6863.NAME: Colorfull duck
6863.DESCRIPTION: Look, beautiful, isn't it? At this time of the year the island is inhabited by Mandarin ducks. You will gain tropical mood by feeding them.

6864.NAME: Favorite crabs
6864.DESCRIPTION: Feed crabs and boost the happiness in tropical island. This is the easiest way of collecting tropical mood 50 times.

6865.NAME: Tropical crab
6865.DESCRIPTION: Two days plus two crabs, if you feed this amount, you will net another 100 units of tropical mood.

6866.NAME: Feed crabs
6866.DESCRIPTION: Crabs quit the diet and went to your neighbors for snacks. Feed white crabs at your island or friend's place.

687.NAME: Wheat harvest - level 3 submission
687.DESCRIPTION: Submit wheat and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

689.NAME: Onion harvest - level 1 submission
689.DESCRIPTION: Submit onions and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

69.NAME: Place 1 twig fence
69.DESCRIPTION: Buy and place 1 twig fence on the island

691.NAME: Onion harvest - level 2 submission
691.DESCRIPTION: Submit onions and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

6922.NAME: Find the right island
6922.DESCRIPTION: Look at the map, and try to guess, where did the cupid go.

6923.NAME: Quick date - Chickens
6923.DESCRIPTION: Chickens would gladly go out for dinner, they are not picky, just feed them.

6924.NAME: Quick date - Roosters
6924.DESCRIPTION: Roosters insist on paying the bill. Sell roosters.

6925.NAME: Warm the heart
6925.DESCRIPTION: Open the shop and arrange a date for snake couple. (You need two actions on each snake)

6926.NAME: Arrow heads
6926.DESCRIPTION: Don't worry i will reshape the arrowheads, they won't cause harm. Craft me some nails.

6927.NAME: Feathers
6927.DESCRIPTION: For precise trajectory i need Jay feathers. Collect some by feeding roosters.

6928.NAME: Arrow base
6928.DESCRIPTION: Love is in the air! Get me some wheat or flax straws. In such a lighted mood such arrows will travel far.

6929.NAME: Sour blush
6929.DESCRIPTION: Plant some of these cherry-sour tomatoes and then harvest them. (Plant regular tomatoes).

693.NAME: Onion harvest - level 3 submission
693.DESCRIPTION: Submit onions and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

6930.NAME: Soft roses
6930.DESCRIPTION: For the love potion i need lots of fragrant roses. I just sowed them. Collect them please.

6931.NAME: Sweet  sincerity
6931.DESCRIPTION: Love potion needs to be mixed with sincerely sweet help of your neighbors. Use your friends beehives.

6932.NAME: Accidental help
6932.DESCRIPTION: Working together creates a bond. Ask your friends to fetch some firewood. Build a simple wood storage building.

6933.NAME: Mutual pet
6933.DESCRIPTION: This is no ordinary cat, his name is Valentine. Leave both of your friend alone with this cat. Feed cats and kittens.

6934.NAME: Staining themselves
6934.DESCRIPTION: Ask both friends to help in the kitchen. Ask them to craft ether corn pie, strawberry soup or tangerine cocktail.

6935.NAME: Palmtree ally
6935.DESCRIPTION: How fortunate, that palm-trees grow fast, this will be the first cover. Plant three branched palms.

6936.NAME: Hiding in flowers
6936.DESCRIPTION: Second cover will be near those flowers. Flowers are meant as a distraction. Build some flower boxes.

6937.NAME: Cloud cover
6937.DESCRIPTION: Finally, collect some wool so we can make a huge heart shaped cloud in the sky. It will be a good observation spot.

6938.NAME: Soft rose bushes
6938.DESCRIPTION: Some pink envelopes are stuck in the branches. Collect 35 envelopes and then buy the soft rose bush on your main island.

6939.NAME: Romantic setting
6939.DESCRIPTION: If you have spare time, please decorate this island with some hanging flower baskets. This task will give some romantic packages.

6940.NAME: Cause of draft
6940.DESCRIPTION: Visit Festival island and buy the tunnel from the shop.

6941.NAME: Source of chilling
6941.DESCRIPTION: When winter tunnel is placed, go in and try to find solution to this coldness. Press USE on the tunnel.

6942.NAME: Few snow heaps
6942.DESCRIPTION: You can plow the snow right in to the ocean. Start removing snow from the island.

6943.NAME: Fields in snow
6943.DESCRIPTION: Some places are as solid as ice, others are softer, and dig-able. Dig some fields on this island.

6944.NAME: Planting tulips
6944.DESCRIPTION: Visit Festival island. Wait for tulips to pop out, collect them and re-plant them on snowy island.

6945.NAME: Cold hedgehogs
6945.DESCRIPTION: Paprick gives you a basket of hedgehogs: "Take care of these while i search for tulips." Feed hedgehogs.

6946.NAME: Bead tulips
6946.DESCRIPTION: Paprick got carried away with search for tulips, his wife will be angry. Craft some bone beads.

6947.NAME: Winter beans
6947.DESCRIPTION: Bean sprouts are constantly tripping Papric. Harvest the bean plantations to collect tulip buds.

6948.NAME: Limitations
6948.DESCRIPTION: Paprick helps you, you help your native friend as well. Fix (build) some fences while Paprick looks for more buds.

6949.NAME: Onions and onions
6949.DESCRIPTION: "You can not tell apart onions from tulip heads, let me sort these." Plant the leftover onions.

695.NAME: Carrot harvest - level 1 submission
695.DESCRIPTION: Submit carrots and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

6950.NAME: Goat tulips
6950.DESCRIPTION: Feed goats, so that these horned lawnmowers do not eat up the sprouted tulips.

6951.NAME: Spring tunel
