6951.DESCRIPTION: When tulips are planted press UPGRADE on the cold tunnel. Upgrade the tunnel twice.

6952.NAME: Spring aroma
6952.DESCRIPTION: Return to the island trough the new tunnel. To speed up the spring, you will need pixie dust. Collect some.

6953.NAME: Trough the flowers
6953.DESCRIPTION: Don't walk on a cold ground. Open shop and exchange pixie dust for flowers. Use these flowers to move around the island.

6954.NAME: Frozen flower
6954.DESCRIPTION: Only one flower has not bloomed yet. Defrost the stone flower from it's winter slumber.

6955.NAME: Start the fountain
6955.DESCRIPTION: Stone flower is actually a nice spring fountain. It would be nice if you could activate it.

6957.NAME: Runaway crab
6957.DESCRIPTION: Don't let the crabs freeze solid. Feed them and send them back home.

6959.NAME: Hoard tulips
6959.DESCRIPTION: Seeing that women's celebration is drawing near, the Festival tulips grow three times faster. Collect some tulips.

6960.NAME: Papriks female guest
6960.DESCRIPTION: Shortly before March 8th Papriks isle will be refreshed. When you see the guests, present them with tulips.

6961.NAME: Find the pixie
6961.DESCRIPTION: The special flower that you got from Paprik has started to whitter away. Re-plant it at your island.

6962.NAME: Friend's pixies
6962.DESCRIPTION: Visit friends island and look around you, perhaps some winged lady has landed on friend islands. Gift the guest.

6963.NAME: Tulips for your guest
6963.DESCRIPTION: If you wish to congratulate your own pixie, you will need a lot more tulips. Wait for pixie blossoming and try it out.

6964.NAME: Tulips for all pixies
6964.DESCRIPTION: It does not matter where these pixies live, all of them deserve to be acknowledged.

6965.NAME: Pixie bunch
6965.DESCRIPTION: By congratulating one pixie, you will find two pixies that also desire your attention. Prepare to congratulate (hand in) 300 pixies.

6966.NAME: Feminine bees
6966.DESCRIPTION: Congratulate queen bees on woman's day. Make some wax figurines in their honor.

6967.NAME: Flax tulips
6967.DESCRIPTION: How fortunate, that Oceania has eternal summer. If you run out of tulips, try flax. (beginners can find flax seeds in seed packs)

6968.NAME: Feminie plytapuses
6968.DESCRIPTION: Lady platypuses are too busy laying eggs and nurturing the infants. As a means of congratulations, feed them.

697.NAME: Carrot harvest - level 2 submission
697.DESCRIPTION: Submit carrots and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

6971.NAME: Follow instructions
6971.DESCRIPTION: You, Raft, Map, Cake island, Go!

6972.NAME: Read the task
6972.DESCRIPTION: To clear the clouds you will need to burn one candle every 10 minutes. Collect a candle and use it.

6973.NAME: First cloud
6973.DESCRIPTION: If you clear the first section a bit, i'll give you some candles to explore further, but jungle does not count.

6974.NAME: On a hot trail
6974.DESCRIPTION: Two candles will be gifted if you extinguish flaming thorns or flame bubbles.

6975.NAME: Flaming snails
6975.DESCRIPTION: This task will be a bit more difficult, but two candles will be given non the less.

6976.NAME: Plank tunnel
6976.DESCRIPTION: Without this task you can not go further anyway, but completing it will net you a candle. Clean shacks.

6977.NAME: Breaking fortifications
6977.DESCRIPTION: To bypass the fortifications you will need to break steering wheel or anchor.

6978.NAME: Eat the obsticles
6978.DESCRIPTION: There is no prize for over eating, sorry, that is just how it is.

6979.NAME: Spooky quest
6979.DESCRIPTION: Even if they look horrible, these spooky neighbours wish to make friends with you. Feed them

6980.NAME: Skeleton fur
6980.DESCRIPTION: Warming up the Skeletons is not very profitable. So, how about 5 candles for it?

6981.NAME: Entertain the octopus
6981.DESCRIPTION: This octopus does not wish to join the celebration, he has been moody lately. Lighten him up, spend vinyl plates.

6982.NAME: Grow cabages
6982.DESCRIPTION: Few prizes never return to Oceania, but you can still enjoy them like this. Examine cabbages.

6983.NAME: Table for drinks
6983.DESCRIPTION: If you want a candle, clean the tables.

6984.NAME: Unmask the guests
6984.DESCRIPTION: Find out, who are these masked guests. There is a chance, that one guest is special.

6985.NAME: Anniversary cake
6985.DESCRIPTION: You will need heaps of candles for this cake. Finish eating the cake.

6987.NAME: Anniversary stone
6987.DESCRIPTION: The illusionary castle has to be build from good memories, and not physical blocks. Collect materials, use workshop.

6988.NAME: Collect castle stone
6988.DESCRIPTION: Part of the stones were collected from workshop, others will be earned by doing tasks. Expand supply of these rocks.

6989.NAME: First rock
6989.DESCRIPTION: While chickens are still hatching, start building your memory castle. Building process will net you all sorts of prizes.

699.NAME: Carrot harvest - level 3 submission
699.DESCRIPTION: Submit carrots and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

6990.NAME: Finish construction
6990.DESCRIPTION: The building process is at least twice as long as building lighthouse. If you succeed, you will earn  1 to your energy supply.

6991.NAME: Egg stones
6991.DESCRIPTION: How interesting, chickens have laid stones in stead of eggs. Ridiculous? Than how do you explain these blocks?

6992.NAME: Well stones
6992.DESCRIPTION: No, this time camel and jelly fish simply won't do. Collect water from the well if you want some blocks.

6993.NAME: Carrot stones
6993.DESCRIPTION: Blocks don't grow underground? Carrots will disagree, but who ever listens to a vegetable... .

6994.NAME: Pond stones
6994.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps some blocks are at the bottom of this pond? Build a pond and find out.

6995.NAME: Pumpking stones
6995.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps some merchants will trade your pumpkins for blocks. Will you grow them?

6996.NAME: Dog stones
6996.DESCRIPTION: Dogs have traced some memory block veins. Reward your dogs, feed adult dogs.

6997.NAME: Shark stones
6997.DESCRIPTION: Try fishing some sharks, and perhaps memory block will take the bait.

6998.NAME: Barrel stones
6998.DESCRIPTION: Don't let the stones hide in barrels, quickly sell barrels before they have gotten in.

6999.NAME: Ostrich stones
6999.DESCRIPTION: An ostrich was almost used as a memory block, while doing masonry work. They do look similar... Sell these giant saboteurs.

7.NAME: Leave the island
7.DESCRIPTION: Click on the raft and leave the island.

70.NAME: Complete 1 twig fence
70.DESCRIPTION: Complete 1 twig fence in the shop

7000.NAME: Stones in sea shells
7000.DESCRIPTION: Check it, perhaps shell shacks have some memory blocks. Build stone shell shacks.

7001.NAME: Fox stones
7001.DESCRIPTION: Foxes have hidden some stones. Sell foxes to recover the stones.

7002.NAME: Strawberry stones
7002.DESCRIPTION: Memory blocks are suspiciously red. Check strawberry fields.

7003.NAME: Fishing stones
7003.DESCRIPTION: Ocean waves indicate location of some memory blocks. Go fishing in sea cabbage and octopus fishing spots.

7004.NAME: Pearl stones
7004.DESCRIPTION: The memory block hunt is not going well. Concentrate! Train concentration by making pearl necklaces.

7005.NAME: Aquarium stones
7005.DESCRIPTION: If you work with fish, you will need aquariums. Work on any type of aquariums.

7006.NAME: Horse-shoe stones
7006.DESCRIPTION: Feed young and adult horses or zebras, hop on and go find those stones.

7007.NAME: Chili stones
7007.DESCRIPTION: Hmm, stones were not in strawberry fields, so time to check chili fields.

7008.NAME: Silk stones
7008.DESCRIPTION: The real castle had silk curtains, that may have hid the stones. Roll up the silk curtains (collect silk).

7009.NAME: Lemon rocks
7009.DESCRIPTION: Chili stones were not the right color. Bleach these with lemon juice. Collect lemons.

701.NAME: Pumpkin harvest - level 1 submission
701.DESCRIPTION: Submit pumpkins and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

7010.NAME: Meerkat stones.
7010.DESCRIPTION: Since you need to wait for lemons and morss-drink anyway, entertain adult meerkats.

7011.NAME: Morss stones
7011.DESCRIPTION: Brewing helps thinking, so brew some morss and think of a way to get more memory blocks.

7012.NAME: Potatoe sones
7012.DESCRIPTION: Save your strength before using those blocks. Grow potato, eggplant or rice fields for healthy meal.

7013.NAME: Exotic stones.
7013.DESCRIPTION: Memory stones look exotic. Question your exotic animals, feed adult bats or crocodiles.

703.NAME: Pumpkin harvest - level 2 submission
703.DESCRIPTION: Submit pumpkins and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

705.NAME: Pumpkin harvest - level 3 submission
705.DESCRIPTION: Submit pumpkins and, when both tasks are completed, you will receive golden spikes.

706.NAME: Meerkat herder
706.DESCRIPTION: Demonstrate your meerkat growing skills. Grow and sell meerkats

707.NAME: Plant a pumpkin from the shop
707.DESCRIPTION: Go to the shop section PLANTS and buy a pumpkin plant. Plant it in a free patch of land

708.NAME: Take the prize
708.DESCRIPTION: Take the reputation prize from your bag. When the beauty contest is over, you can sell the pumpkin, if you want.

7085.NAME: Start the adventure
7085.DESCRIPTION: "Hey, this archipelago has lots of mysteries. You know the local waters, i know where the adventures are. Let's go?"

7086.NAME: Special beads
7086.DESCRIPTION: "Wait, i need to thank the locals, craft the beads only from section UNIQUE"

7087.NAME: Upgrade obstacle
7087.DESCRIPTION: I am looking for ancient things, they are all related to combat... . Upgrade that skull pole, it bothers me.

7088.NAME: Place paths
7088.DESCRIPTION: List has lots of things, but first let us find antique shield, it has to be on this island... . Place paths.

7089.NAME: Spend energy
7089.DESCRIPTION: We can go to other islands once we find Talalau tribe's shiled. Spend energy.

709.NAME: Wool gift
709.DESCRIPTION: Give the glass merchant some units of wool. His wife likes soft pillows.

7090.NAME: Pick up fragments
7090.DESCRIPTION: No, no, no, i disagree that palm-tree does not look suspicious, i know better. Recover all 5 shards.

7091.NAME: Collect cyphers
7091.DESCRIPTION: It says here, that you can gain some cyphers by improving islands surroundings. So, you must finish some tasks!

7092.NAME: Find the hidden
7092.DESCRIPTION: To locate hiding spots you must spend two cypers. Find suspicious objects and start experimenting.

7093.NAME: Chop birches
7093.DESCRIPTION: See those birch trees? That is a good spot for a camp. Chop birch trees or bird cherry trees.

7094.NAME: Local danger
7094.DESCRIPTION: Those glowing things look dangerous. Feed them onions and they will run away.

7095.NAME: Cactus juice
7095.DESCRIPTION: We can not drink sea water. For survival we must find and revive cactuses

7096.NAME: Discover water
7096.DESCRIPTION: And i thought we will have to survive on cactus juice. See that well? Gather some water from it.

7097.NAME: Build a shelter
7097.DESCRIPTION: No matter what kind, as long as it is roof above head. Build a local house.

7098.NAME: Onions for supper
7098.DESCRIPTION: Next meal will be onions! Do we have any left? No? Then grow some onions!!!!!

7099.NAME: Feed ostriches
7099.DESCRIPTION: Ostriches is part of one riddle. Feed small or big ostriches.

710.NAME: Finding an engineer
710.DESCRIPTION: Put up announcements in all Oceania. Submit parchments

7100.NAME: Build totems
7100.DESCRIPTION: Mmm.... no, don't understand.... mmm, oh! Build totem masks.

7101.NAME: Plant carrots
7101.DESCRIPTION: Grows below ground and is orange? Right answer must be carrots! Sow carrots

7102.NAME: Extension of house
7102.DESCRIPTION: I think we need to build extra section for this house. Build some toilets.

7103.NAME: Cunning advice
7103.DESCRIPTION: Foxes are cunning, so they can advise. Feed foxes and plan your next actions.

7104.NAME: Illogical strawberries
7104.DESCRIPTION: Foxes say that the answer is 'strawberry.' Although doubt full, you still should try it. Collect strawberries.

7105.NAME: Build a clay pond.
7105.DESCRIPTION: It is written and so shall it be. Build a clay pond.

7106.NAME: Grow goats
7106.DESCRIPTION: I am starting to doubt if Olaf has translated it right. But he said goats, so let us try.

7107.NAME: Sticky honey
7107.DESCRIPTION: Is this the famous Olaf honey glue recipe? To recover a cypher you will need honey, so let us look for some honey.

7108.NAME: Flax straw sign
7108.DESCRIPTION: Is flax common on such hot island? Looks like it! Collect flax straws.

7109.NAME: Clay storages.
7109.DESCRIPTION: By guessing correctly you can summon guiding wind. Wooden storage's did not work. Let 's try and build clay ones.

711.NAME: Reputation
711.DESCRIPTION: Reach enough reputation for the engineer to be interested in helping you.

7110.NAME: Where hedgehogs go
7110.DESCRIPTION: Go where hedgehogs can go? Strange riddle, time to feed hedgehogs.

7111.NAME: Move clay pit
7111.DESCRIPTION: To find cypher you will need to relocate the clay pit. If you have not built it, than do so, then move it.

7112.NAME: Food for antilopes
7112.DESCRIPTION: The hint turned out to be a bird, that is running away. Mount (feed) antilopes nad cach the bird.

7113.NAME: Plant potatoes
7113.DESCRIPTION: There were instructions on the carrots you pulled. Perhaps sowing potatoes might help?

7114.NAME: Guiding wind
7114.DESCRIPTION: Caching the wind direction can be hard, solution - build weather cocks.

7115.NAME: Juice for cypher
7115.DESCRIPTION: This metal piece has something below the stains. Collect lemons to remove the stains with lemon acid.

7116.NAME: Dugged up hint
7116.DESCRIPTION: Truffle pig dug up both truffle and a clue. Good work, feed truffle pigs.

7117.NAME: Volcanic furniture
7117.DESCRIPTION: Build some volcanic chairs and tables for dinner setup.

7118.NAME: Spicy dinner.
7118.DESCRIPTION: Do you remember? Olaf loves spicy food. Cook lots of spicy coconut soup.

7119.NAME: Wine for dinner
7119.DESCRIPTION: Good soup, eh? Still i find it dry. Spend some wine bottles for desert.

7123.NAME: Glowing friend
7123.DESCRIPTION: Long trip in the boat will be boring, plant a glowing friend in dirt.

713.NAME: Gift for the house I
713.DESCRIPTION: Give Jarno some coal for keeping the house warm during wintertime.

7138.NAME: Musical underground
7138.DESCRIPTION: Seven flute players were buried in ancestral cave, but their spirits continue to play their songs. Visit this cave.

7139.NAME: Anti-darkness Olaf
7139.DESCRIPTION: It is rather dark. How about you lit your lantern? Check the workshop section UNIQUE.

714.NAME: Gift for work II
714.DESCRIPTION: Make and sell painted stools to Jarno.

7140.NAME: Sleeping flute player
7140.DESCRIPTION: Nice! You lit the lantern and the dark blue flute is laying on the ground. Light the lantern, press [UPGRADE].

7141.NAME: Knock on trees
7141.DESCRIPTION: The flute players are quiet, so you do not know where they rest. Knock on the trees until you find someone to talk to.

7142.NAME: Read and work
7142.DESCRIPTION: Carvings appeared on the tree. Hover the mouse pointer on the tree and read the tasks.

7143.NAME: Let spirit rest
7143.DESCRIPTION: When you completed one group of riddle tasks tell the flute player. Press UPGRADE on the flute player tree.

7144.NAME: Seven flutes
7144.DESCRIPTION: Before eternal slumber each flute player gifts you his flute. Upgrade all flute player trees.

715.NAME: Gift for work III
715.DESCRIPTION: Build and sell Stone sheds for planks.

716.NAME: Gift for the house II
716.DESCRIPTION: Give Jarno some cloth, so that he can make warm blankets.

7163.NAME: Place Olafs trophy
7163.DESCRIPTION: Flutes and Olaf's shield returns to your bag once sold. Once both of prizes are in the bag, you can purchase double prize.

717.NAME: Gift for the house III
717.DESCRIPTION: Buy and sell cocktail tables. Then Jarno will be able to organize parties.

7170.NAME: Elephant's value
7170.DESCRIPTION: Natives have lots of dried grass, but not enough fertilizer. Lend them some elephants, sell elephants.

7171.NAME: Clam cacther
7171.DESCRIPTION: Natives are modernizing sea shell currency. Get some sea clams for prototypes.

7172.NAME: Fishes homework
7172.DESCRIPTION: The ocean fishes were tasked to observe natives. Build salt water aquariums.

7173.NAME: Re-paint the island
7173.DESCRIPTION: Change your skirt or tuxedo, and remember to change your household as well. Use paint cans.

7174.NAME: Sell meerkats
7174.DESCRIPTION: Meerkats watch natives that watch meerkats watching natives. Sell meerkats.

7175.NAME: Compare the rocks
7175.DESCRIPTION: Natives determine mineral composition of a rock by tasting it. Collect rocks underground.

7176.NAME: Souvenir gift
7176.DESCRIPTION: Natives have already hanged the lantern, it would be a shame to take it down. Craft some souvenirs, and perhaps we can strike a deal.

7177.NAME: Give cement
7177.DESCRIPTION: One of the natives decided to build a bank, but bank needs thick walls. Hand in cement.

718.NAME: Gift for the family I
718.DESCRIPTION: Make and sell clay tables, so that Jarno's wife can decorate the house.

719.NAME: Gift for the family II
719.DESCRIPTION: Make and give Jarno's grandfather some bottles of wine.

720.NAME: Gift for the family III
720.DESCRIPTION: Submit strawberries, so that Jarno's wife can prepare a delicious dessert.

721.NAME: Torch gift
721.DESCRIPTION: The representatives of the guild are planning to enter the caves. Give them some torches.

722.NAME: Buy candy in the shop
722.DESCRIPTION: Buy 10 units of candy in the shop section SPECIAL for feeding guests from the spirit world.

723.NAME: Give the ghosts some treats
723.DESCRIPTION: From time to time, ghosts will appear. In exchange for candy, they will give you ghost shells. Feed a sufficient number of ghosts

7230.NAME: Place the sunflower
7230.DESCRIPTION: This time you will work on the quality not quantity. Open shop and place a single sunflower.

7231.NAME: Upgrade tents
7231.DESCRIPTION: Special flower - special watering. On Fest. isle open two tents that will provide the water.

7232.NAME: Rosy water
7232.DESCRIPTION: Finally, to upgrade the flower you will need special droplet found only deep below Pinaki isle.

7233.NAME: Upgrade sunflower
7233.DESCRIPTION: Tiny tiny flower. Water it and upgrade it to the next level.

7234.NAME: Different wattering
7234.DESCRIPTION: Try different watering, use other droplets.

7235.NAME: Upgrade the flower 2
7235.DESCRIPTION: Two droplets can be found in a silver chest, and three in a gold chest. Keep upgrading.

7236.NAME: Upgrade the flower 3
7236.DESCRIPTION: Keep growing the sunflower. How far have you gotten?

7237.NAME: Upgrade the flower 4
7237.DESCRIPTION: It is pleasant to hear words of praise, let your neighbors see your work. Keep upgrading.

7238.NAME: Upgrade the flower 5
7238.DESCRIPTION: Do you think it could grow bigger? Keep upgrading.

7239.NAME: Upgrade the flower 6
7239.DESCRIPTION: It is not fully grow yet, but it gives a small boost already.

724.NAME: Parchment gift
724.DESCRIPTION: Give the glass merchants some parchments.

7240.NAME: Upgrade the flower 7
7240.DESCRIPTION: Rich and juicy leaves, beware of insects. Keep upgrading.

7241.NAME: Upgrade the flower 8
7241.DESCRIPTION: After this upgrade the flower will show its full potential.

7242.NAME: Open festival tent
7242.DESCRIPTION: Now you will need rose water in bulk. Open the third tend on Fest isle.

7243.NAME: Collect rosy dropplet
7243.DESCRIPTION: To fully water this giant you will need three days worth of water. Try watering.

7244.NAME: Chop dow sunflower.
7244.DESCRIPTION: Relax! The flower will not disappear, after you are done, it will transform in to a decoration and you can grow another flower.

7245.NAME: Happy dropplets
7245.DESCRIPTION: I hope you collected some spares. Spend happy droplets by watering the sunflower.

7246.DESCRIPTION: You will not need many of these. Spend rosy droplets by watering the sunflower.

7247.NAME: Sunny dropplets
7247.DESCRIPTION: Spend happy droplets by watering the sunflower.

7248.NAME: Last sunflower 1
7248.DESCRIPTION: Work on the last three stages of the sunflower. Water it 30 times.

7249.NAME: Last sunflower 2
7249.DESCRIPTION: Keep working on the last three stages of the sunflower. Make total of 75 actions on it.

725.NAME: Letters for the craftsmen
725.DESCRIPTION: Send all craftsmen letters and let them know that you are looking for pliers. Submit parchment

7250.NAME: Last sunflower 3
7250.DESCRIPTION: Finishing the second flower is no joke. Do it!

7251.NAME: Wild savanna
7251.DESCRIPTION: Just in case you pinned a route note to the eagle totem. Select function USE on the totem.

7252.NAME: Golden toothed hammer
7252.DESCRIPTION: After pondering for some time, you conclude that you hammer needs a harder coating. Craft hammer in workshop.

7253.NAME: Free the bugs
7253.DESCRIPTION: Splitting the first rock reveals a living beetle. Looking closely you discover some tractor fuel. Save all beetles.

7254.NAME: Free drangonflies
7254.DESCRIPTION: Dragonflies will gift you some energy in thanks for their liberation.

7255.NAME: Quick saw
7255.DESCRIPTION: Trees should be cleared quickly, before the reptile rain starts. Craft gold toothed saw.

7256.NAME: Jumping lizards
7256.DESCRIPTION: A few quick movements and top of the tree falls. The lizard decided to glide. Clear more trees.

7257.NAME: Who climbs there?
7257.DESCRIPTION: Smallest vibration and the turtle falls. Careful, he's spiky. Drop other turtles.

7258.NAME: Wooden net
7258.DESCRIPTION: After few failures in field, you decided to make more durable nets. Craft wooden nets.

7259.NAME: Shake the fishes
7259.DESCRIPTION: Little extra effort, who-la, the fish is extracted. There are plenty of flower fishes left though... .

726.NAME: Egg gift
726.DESCRIPTION: Give the glass merchant some eggs.

7260.NAME: Carefull with your hands
7260.DESCRIPTION: Jelly ropes belong to jellyfish, therefor wooden net will work like a charm. Extract medusas.

7261.NAME: Yellow starfish
7261.DESCRIPTION: Dig up the dry savanna soil and plant the starfish! Look for the stars inside your bag's plant compartment.

7262.NAME: Pink Starfish
7262.DESCRIPTION: Dig up the dry savanna soil and plant the starfish! Look for the stars inside your bag's plant compartment.

7263.NAME: Orange starfish
7263.DESCRIPTION: Dig up the dry savanna soil and plant the starfish! Look for the stars inside your bag's plant compartment.

7264.NAME: Still wild
7264.DESCRIPTION: Are rocks pulverized, and trees trimed, did you free all the fishes? Finish all savanna tasks.

7268.NAME: Help inside the pavilions
7268.DESCRIPTION: Open any of the three Pavilions. Select UPGRADE. To successfully transport everything you need to open all three of them.

7269.NAME: Pickaxes, scythes, sickles
7269.DESCRIPTION: A well know tools already can be used again. Collect these tools inside pavilions.

727.NAME: Obsidian gift
727.DESCRIPTION: Give the glass merchant some obsidian

7270.NAME: Split the treasure
7270.DESCRIPTION: Chose one of the treasure objects, split and it in parts for easy transporting.

7271.NAME: Treasure flower
7271.DESCRIPTION: Savanna flower sprouts more than one sapling upon arriving on Festival isle. Buy several flowers.

7272.NAME: Treasure boulder
7272.DESCRIPTION: Unbelievable, the rock multiplies! Restore several rock formations on Festival island. Use shop.

7273.NAME: Treasure tree
7273.DESCRIPTION: A bit from this, a bit of that. Treasure trees can be placed in a larger quantity. Check the shops shelves.

729.NAME: Wood gift
729.DESCRIPTION: The representatives of the guild need to fix their ship. Give them some wood

73.NAME: Place 2 more twig sheds
73.DESCRIPTION: Buy and place 2 sheds of any kind. Previously placed sheds are not taken into account

730.NAME: Improve reputation
730.DESCRIPTION: Gain more reputation, so that everyone would want to help you.

731.NAME: Gift for the elder of the village
731.DESCRIPTION: Give the local council some foxes. Sell 7 grown-up foxes.

732.NAME: Candy for the seekers
732.DESCRIPTION: Buy candy in shop section SPECIAL and give it to the local kids, and they will help you in the search.

733.NAME: Flour for the seekers
733.DESCRIPTION: Taric is also ready to help in exchange for some flour (it can be obtained in the mill, in the jungle)

734.NAME: Pigs for the seekers
734.DESCRIPTION: Muddrick says that he can conduct the search with the help of pigs. Grow and sell grown-up pigs.

735.NAME: Glass gift
735.DESCRIPTION: You can buy glass in shop section SPECIAL. Give it to him (you can buy glass after finishing the temple).

7355.NAME: Space travel
7355.DESCRIPTION: Visit Outland planet and check the crash site.

736.NAME: Milk gift
736.DESCRIPTION: The loner really likes pancakes. Give him some bottles of milk.

7360.NAME: Checking the instructions
7360.DESCRIPTION: Dismantle the small traveling rocket and build an antena to coordinate the landing

7361.NAME: Short travel
7361.DESCRIPTION: Select USE option on the rocket and travel 5 times. You need one rocket and one signal receiver.

7362.NAME: Traveling set
7362.DESCRIPTION: Antenna is the landing site, rocket - starting site. Recover more small rockets.

7363.NAME: Gears and wires
7363.DESCRIPTION: Salvage the broken bus (or UFO) and collect parts for temporary camp site.

7364.NAME: Chemical analysis
7364.DESCRIPTION: Place chemical tester (shop) and test substances from geysers.

7365.NAME: Metal analysis
7365.DESCRIPTION: Place engineering block (shop) and check physical properties of the unearthed shard.

7366.NAME: Outland language I
7366.DESCRIPTION: Give a shard to a linguist (language expert) buy runes and harvest them.

7367.NAME: Outland language II
7367.DESCRIPTION: Translation will need extra bits. Harvest the written document fields.

7368.NAME: Outland language III
7368.DESCRIPTION: Precise translation needs time. Harvest common language fields.

7369.NAME: Recover the frame
7369.DESCRIPTION: Visit the clearing and recover frame built by outlanders. Select UPGRADE.

737.NAME: The broken roof
737.DESCRIPTION: The roof of the loner's hut is leaking. Help him and submit some planks.

7370.NAME: New fuel
7370.DESCRIPTION: Discovered gas is excellent source of fuel. Craft more rocket fuel.

7371.NAME: Plating for UFO
7371.DESCRIPTION: Physics lessons were worth it. Create plates for UFO shielding.

7372.NAME: Biology
7372.DESCRIPTION: Blah! None of these are. edible. Cut bushes and find food.

7373.NAME: Sport (with axe)
7373.DESCRIPTION: Local trees grow very fast. Plant a sprout and instantly chop it down.

7374.NAME: Zoology
7374.DESCRIPTION: Hunt or domesticate the local animals. At school you used to excel in  Animal study.

7375.NAME: Snakes in Outland
7375.DESCRIPTION: Snakes were easy to domesticate, open shop and grow more snakes.

7376.NAME: Softleaf fishing
7376.DESCRIPTION: Only edible plants are leafs below ground. Pull out the leaves using the fishing rod.

7377.NAME: Hunting the flowers
7377.DESCRIPTION: Teeth-flowers are not edible, but their juice was excellent as glue. Usefull, hunt more.

7378.NAME: History usage
7378.DESCRIPTION: Just like detective, collect all outlander bones. Hand them in for research.

7379.NAME: Mathematical way
7379.DESCRIPTION: Buy the computing module and start feeding it some mathematical formulas.

738.NAME: Announce the screwdriver search
738.DESCRIPTION: Get parchment for announcements that you are looking for a screwdriver.

7380.NAME: Radio trasmition
7380.DESCRIPTION: Try SOS signal in lithuanian, french, english, russian, spanish and chinese. Build antena multiple times.

7381.NAME: Trajecotry
7381.DESCRIPTION: Use computing module to determine the optimal flight path.

7382.NAME: Food for UFO
7382.DESCRIPTION: Start stocking up on food. Collect eggs from snakes.

7383.NAME: Fuel up
7383.DESCRIPTION: I do hope you kept processing fuel all the time. Fuel up and finish fixig the UFO.

7384.NAME: Essay
7384.DESCRIPTION: How I spent the summer? Feed pigs, ducks and meerkats.

7385.NAME: Visual impression
7385.DESCRIPTION: Draw beautiful vacation. Remember hide and seek in corn field. Harvest corn.

7386.NAME: Wooden spoons
7386.DESCRIPTION: Summer break was spent by flexing fingers when you crafted wooden spoons and wheels. Collect them.

7387.NAME: Xeno-Biology
7387.DESCRIPTION: Scientist that studies life forms not from this planet. Feed snakes in outland.

7388.NAME: Robotic engineer
7388.DESCRIPTION: Physics and mechanics expand human boundaries. Build robotic suits.

7389.NAME: Xeno-linguist
7389.DESCRIPTION: A non existing job will be in demand in the future. Cultivate runes and pictograms.

739.NAME: Improving reputation
739.DESCRIPTION: Gain a little bit more reputation to encourage the seekers.

7390.NAME: Flag in outland
7390.DESCRIPTION: Buy a flag, as a symbol, that You managed to survive here.

74.NAME: Complete 2 more twig sheds
74.DESCRIPTION: Complete the placed sheds. Previously completed sheds are not taken into account

740.NAME: Rope for the expedition
740.DESCRIPTION: Taric is ready to go on an expedition. He only needs some rope.

741.NAME: Water for the expedition
741.DESCRIPTION: Give the travelers some water, just in case.

743.NAME: Worshipers want some chickens
743.DESCRIPTION: Grow and sell grown-up hens to the priests.

744.NAME: Obsidian for the Volcano god
744.DESCRIPTION: Obsidian is volcanic glass. Sacrifice some obsidian to the priests.

745.NAME: Reputation for the saw
745.DESCRIPTION: Gain some reputation, in order to start searching for the saw.

7451.NAME: Festival isle
7451.DESCRIPTION: Tired from summer, critters fell asleep on the beach of Festival isle. Visit the isle.

7452.NAME: Count the sheep
7452.DESCRIPTION: Open workshop and provide sheep for counting. By counting sheep it is easier to fall asleep.

7453.NAME: Traveling dreams
7453.DESCRIPTION: Open shop and use the dream sheep to open path towards critter dreams.

7454.NAME: Four dreams
7454.DESCRIPTION: Visit critter dreams (click USE) and help overcome the difficulties. Place for dream paths.

7455.NAME: Better view
7455.DESCRIPTION: Can't see trough the trees. Make a clearing, chop down rubber trees.

7456.NAME: Swamp walker
7456.DESCRIPTION: Busy critter dreams about big farming fields. Clear the swamp.

7457.NAME: Stubborn tree
7457.DESCRIPTION: Fear has rooted deep. Try to chop immortal rubber trees 20 times.

7458.NAME: Forest happieness
7458.DESCRIPTION: Silver lining in this case is forest goodies. Look for mushrooms and berries and fear will disperse.

7459.NAME: Lookout tower
7459.DESCRIPTION: Can't do anything while the fixable walls sit in front of you. In this dream walls must be fixed.

746.NAME: Parchment for the search
746.DESCRIPTION: Send messages that you are looking for a saw. Submit some parchment

7460.NAME: Critter harvest
7460.DESCRIPTION: Spaces for digging can be found just below the roots of these bushes. Harvest onions or tomatoes 28 times.

7461.NAME: Huge work
7461.DESCRIPTION: First clear enough space. Remove rocks and other obstacles.

7462.NAME: Move the Volcano
7462.DESCRIPTION: This time the huge obstacle is volcano. Move it three rows to the side and one row up.

7463.NAME: Dream thug
7463.DESCRIPTION: Some goblin once told that the critter is not strong. Catch this miscreant and tell him to stop talking nonsense.

7464.NAME: Colorfull adventure
7464.DESCRIPTION: There is specific system based on colors. Try to figure out which of the paths are right, and which ones are not.

7465.NAME: Hidden dream
7465.DESCRIPTION: Recover hidden dream, overcome hurdles and there will be a generous reward for you.

7466.NAME: Other treasures
7466.DESCRIPTION: Critter has lesser dreams as well. Recover one of the lesser dream boxes.

7468.NAME: Big dream
7468.DESCRIPTION: Visit the biggest dream of all critters. Place the dream portal and use it.

7469.NAME: Caught critters
7469.DESCRIPTION: Dream has become a lot less

747.NAME: Prickly melons
747.DESCRIPTION: Give the hippo so many sweet melons that it gets sick.

7470.NAME: Jungle dream
7470.DESCRIPTION: Now the critters can enjoy adventures together. Feed the wood spirits.

7471.NAME: Critters inside forest
7471.DESCRIPTION: Forming a jolly critter party, return to the forest dream for more mushrooms and berries.

7472.NAME: Sow the walls
7472.DESCRIPTION: It is only a dream! Let the gardening critter plot some stairs or walls.

7473.NAME: Cut down walls
7473.DESCRIPTION: Stairs and walls are actually only bushes, test this. Towers are trees, and should not be damaged.

7474.NAME: Wait for walls
7474.DESCRIPTION: A tower takes 2 days to grow. If you are in hurry, fix existing towers. At the same time have at least 8 towers.

7476.NAME: Critter secret
7476.DESCRIPTION: Poke the lava block for more heat. Press UPGRADE. I wonder what happens if afterwards i select [USE]?

749.NAME: Tools for the new workshop
749.DESCRIPTION: Enter the workshop section UNIQUE and make a tool box.

75.NAME: Place 1 flower decoration
75.DESCRIPTION: Buy and place 1 flower decoration in the shop

750.NAME: More reputation
750.DESCRIPTION: Improve your reputation in order to convince Michael.

751.NAME: Blueprint creation kit
751.DESCRIPTION: Open the workshop section UNIQUE and make a drafting kit

752.NAME: Facilitate the negotiation
752.DESCRIPTION: Treat Michael to some high quality wine to convince him to help.

753.NAME: Beads for the spouse
753.DESCRIPTION: Offer Michael's wife some beautiful beads

754.NAME: Pot souvenir
754.DESCRIPTION: Give Michael some clay pots as a souvenir from local ceramists.

755.NAME: Pretty blue flowers
755.DESCRIPTION: Michael's family is fascinated by the local flora. Buy and sell simple blue flowers.

756.NAME: A farewell gift
756.DESCRIPTION: Give Michael some machetes and you will receive a ruler in exchange.

757.NAME: Lazy Johan
757.DESCRIPTION: Teach the lazy son Johan some gardening skills - harvest corn on your island

758.NAME: Lazy Margaret
758.DESCRIPTION: Show the lazy daughter Margaret how to take care of sheep. Feed sheep and lambs on your island.

759.NAME: Milking
759.DESCRIPTION: Show Margaret how to milk a cow. Feed grown-up cows on your island.

76.NAME: Complete the EAGLE TOTEM
76.DESCRIPTION: Find two emeralds in the bushes on the island and complete building the EAGLE TOTEM

760.NAME: Crafting skills
760.DESCRIPTION: Show Johan how to make things. Make some birdhouses.

761.NAME: Countryside labour
761.DESCRIPTION: Show the children how work is done in the country. Harvest wheat, pumpkin or prickly melon fields on your island

7614.NAME: Visit islands
7614.DESCRIPTION: Check the map and visit the unexplored island.

7615.NAME: Create a path
7615.DESCRIPTION: Water roses can be moved, for the sake of practice try making new path in direction of olive tree.

7616.NAME: Fish stop
7616.DESCRIPTION: To understand which way to go, you are given an extra task. Fish in gudgeon bay.

7617.NAME: Dream spirit
7617.DESCRIPTION: Spirit is already waiting at the olive tree. Pet the dream spirit.

7618.NAME: Silver bugs
7618.DESCRIPTION: Path to bugs can be started on the left side of the big wave

7619.NAME: Friend of the critters
7619.DESCRIPTION: Do you see the blush-violet chicks? They are friends of critters. Greet the chicks.

762.NAME: Workshop tasks
762.DESCRIPTION: Show Margaret how to make things in the workshop. Make nails, ropes or bundles (all will do)

7620.NAME: Bird - regular one
7620.DESCRIPTION: Sea-shore birds have hatched little ones. Feed the baby birds.

7621.NAME: Arthropods
7621.DESCRIPTION: Some dreams float, others crawl. Catch both types of bugs, search for butterflies and silver bugs.

7622.NAME: Chick behind the tree
7622.DESCRIPTION: Look carefully, there are five chicks. Feed sea-shore chicks 21 times.

7623.NAME: Violet chick
7623.DESCRIPTION: Critter friends have moved elsewhere. Find them and talk to them.

7624.NAME: Bugs for wolf
7624.DESCRIPTION: Sharp the wolf spirit is smart, caching bugs for both of you will be easy.

7625.NAME: Sharp's fun
7625.DESCRIPTION: Bluish critter friends and butterflies are a good company, just like Sharp. Visit them together with Sharp.

7626.NAME: Fishing for Sharp
7626.DESCRIPTION: Paws are ethereal, but don't get them wet. Catch some sea-food for Sharp. Use any fishing spots.

7627.NAME: Feed seashore birds
7627.DESCRIPTION: Birds have grown up, feed them.

7628.NAME: Count the lizards.
7628.DESCRIPTION: Grow lizards in all accessible locations until they reach adulthood.

7629.NAME: Giant carving
7629.DESCRIPTION: Can't decide which of the two spirits is smarter. Craft special baobabs.

763.NAME: Kitchen tasks
763.DESCRIPTION: Show Johan how to prepare various dishes. Make tomato soup, bean stew or spicy soup

7630.NAME: Few bugs
7630.DESCRIPTION: Small task, still needed. Catch silver bugs.

7631.NAME: Spring
7631.DESCRIPTION: Total of three, but one spring has extra amount of water. Use the spring.

7632.NAME: Bird handler
7632.DESCRIPTION: All birds have new nests. Help small birds grow up.

7633.NAME: Palm chicks
7633.DESCRIPTION: Do not mistake regular violet chicks for these special ones, there is a visual difference. Greet them.

7634.NAME: Catch a wave.
7634.DESCRIPTION: Who works a lot needs to rest a bit. Carefully! Catch waves, small waves cost less energy to handle.

7635.NAME: More lizards
7635.DESCRIPTION: These lizards are VERY hungry, patience, and everything will be alright. Grow lizards.

7636.NAME: Big flowers
7636.DESCRIPTION: Do not rush, by following other quests this quest will progress as well. Reward - 10 lunch boxes.

7637.NAME: All flowers
7637.DESCRIPTION: If you manage to create all water roses you will receive 10 more lunch boxes, as well as some fertilizer and tractor fuel.

764.NAME: Building tasks
764.DESCRIPTION: Show the children how to build things. Build some stone sheds.

7640.NAME: Sleepy critters
7640.DESCRIPTION: Place sleepy critters (check shop), transform them in to spirits, then pet the spirits.

7641.NAME: Comfy critters
7641.DESCRIPTION: Buy from shot comfy critters and grow them in to Sharp spirits, then pet the spirtis.

7642.NAME: Finish quests
7642.DESCRIPTION: Critters want to sleep, the baton has been passed to Stag and Wolf. Finish quests: Stag II and Wold II.

765.NAME: Woodcutter's work
765.DESCRIPTION: Demonstrate what a woodcutter does. Do some chopping on your island

766.NAME: Coconut milk
766.DESCRIPTION: Teach the children to make milk out of coconuts. Make it 10 times

767.NAME: A farewell gift
767.DESCRIPTION: Johan and Margaret have become very industrious. Give them lots of candy as a farewell gift.

768.NAME: Improve reputation
768.DESCRIPTION: Gather enough reputation in order to meet the guru

769.NAME: Gift
769.DESCRIPTION: Give the calligrapher a gift. Of course, he would prefer some parchment.

77.NAME: Place 7 more flowers
77.DESCRIPTION: Buy in the shop and place 7 more flowers on the island

770.NAME: Riddle I
770.DESCRIPTION: It is sweet, but pricks your hands. Plant it in the ground as many times as there are days in a month once in four years.

771.NAME: Riddle II
771.DESCRIPTION: A fragile shell guards the white and the yolk. Obtain this thing as many times as the morning star has beams

772.NAME: Riddle III
772.DESCRIPTION: Long and flexible as a snake, it can tie up your enemies. Spend this thing for devil's dozen times

773.NAME: The final riddle
773.DESCRIPTION: Which planet counting from the sun is the ancient Roman water lord? Feed the brown goat that many times.

774.NAME: Improve the workshop
774.DESCRIPTION: Begin improving the workshop to its highest stage.

775.NAME: Finish the workshop
775.DESCRIPTION: Finish building the new workshop in order to obtain access to new technologies.

776.NAME: Feed the rooster
776.DESCRIPTION: Feed a chicken or a rooster 5 times to finish this task

777.NAME: Metal bar
777.DESCRIPTION: Make a metal bar in the workshop section MATERIALS

778.NAME: Metal wire reel
778.DESCRIPTION: Make a wire reel in the workshop section MATERIALS

7781.NAME: Obsidian qualification
7781.DESCRIPTION: Judges will not bend just like obsidian. Get few pieces of obsidian to qualify.

7782.NAME: Bronze challenge I
7782.DESCRIPTION: Plant 65 times the plant that gives only 4 food when cooking in workshop. Plant only by using backpack.

7783.NAME: Bronze challenge II
7783.DESCRIPTION: Craft reed bundles. The amout needed equals xp from rock chopping.

7784.NAME: Bronze challenge III
7784.DESCRIPTION: Cut down 16 fully grown trees. Only grown trees that give dragonflies qualify.

7785.NAME: Bronze challenge IV
7785.DESCRIPTION: Collect thorny twig, the amount equals  egg count in one egg pack.

7786.NAME: Bronze challenge V
7786.DESCRIPTION: Craft bread, the amount of times needed equals the amount of main component for one cooking.

7787.NAME: Bronze challenge VI
7787.DESCRIPTION: Feed 30 GROWN animals that get sick if starved for 8 hours.

7788.NAME: Bronze challenge VII
7788.DESCRIPTION: Simountaniously have adult rabbits, the amount equals selling price of 80 baby rabbits.

7789.NAME: Bronze challenge VIII
7789.DESCRIPTION: Build 5 shell shacks without using nails.

779.NAME: Iron plate
779.DESCRIPTION: Make an iron plate in the workshop section MATERIALS

7790.NAME: Bronze challenge IX
7790.DESCRIPTION: This quest is obvious. Amount equals food collected form spicy soup. (Svogūnų sriuba)

7791.NAME: Silver challenge I
7791.DESCRIPTION: Remove jungle tiles, amount is 4x of Paprick's coconut trees.

7792.NAME: Silver challenge II
7792.DESCRIPTION: Sell the source of mushrooms and berries 40 times.

7793.NAME: Silver challenge III
7793.DESCRIPTION: Remove the most sturdy trees on this island. When done 3 such trees will remain.

7794.NAME: Silver challenge IV
7794.DESCRIPTION: Components: Eggs, milk, berries (Šilauogės). Craft 5 times. Note: start on other island finish on Competition island.

7795.NAME: Silver challenge V
7795.DESCRIPTION: Feed roosters and their young. The amount equals bronze doubloon amount needed for 3 gold doubloon.

7796.NAME: Silver challenge VI
7796.DESCRIPTION: Sell tables without using nails 10 times.

7797.NAME: Silver challenge VII
7797.DESCRIPTION: Use beehives the amount of times equal amount of hours for crafting 9 wine bottles.

7798.NAME: Silver challenge VIII
7798.DESCRIPTION: Simultaneously have on the island 180 flowers. Choose only those flowers that are worth 5 reputation.

7799.NAME: Silver challenge IX
7799.DESCRIPTION: SELL most primitive shell shacks, amount equals the amount of trees and fruit trees on Paprick's island.

780.NAME: Metal screws
780.DESCRIPTION: Make some metal screws in the workshop section MATERIALS

7800.NAME: Gold challenge I
7800.DESCRIPTION: Harvest plantations that grow as fast as onions, but are not onions 100 times.

7801.NAME: Gold challenge II
7801.DESCRIPTION: Find a way to produce milk, the times needed are equal of hours needed to grow corn.

7802.NAME: Gold challenge IV
7802.DESCRIPTION: Plant the most expensive plant, but use seeds only from backpack 10 times.

7803.NAME: Gold challenge III
7803.DESCRIPTION: Finish three unique buildings that are already presant on the island.

7804.NAME: Gold challenge V
7804.DESCRIPTION: Collect toy koala or toy bat the amount of times you can help one friend in a single day.

7805.NAME: Gold challenge VI
7805.DESCRIPTION: Hiding the task is impossible, but it is still very difficult.

7806.NAME: Gold challenge VII
7806.DESCRIPTION: feed animals that get hungry every 12 hours. Times needed equal selling price of a grown bear.

7807.NAME: Gold challenge VIII
7807.DESCRIPTION: Bird that does not eat or get sick and is very expensive. Place three such birds on the island.

7808.NAME: Gold challenge IX
7808.DESCRIPTION: Have 6 of these decors at the same time. Each is worth 85 reputation.

7809.NAME: Fight to get the cup
7809.DESCRIPTION: To finish this task you will need to finish all Bronze, Silver and Gold challanges.

781.NAME: Screws for the chisel mould merchant
781.DESCRIPTION: There is a merchant on the island who is offering a chisel mould in exchange for 15 screws.

7810.NAME: PoKo pigs
7810.DESCRIPTION: Help me tend to the swines on this island, no, not you... perhaps. Feed pigs and piglets.

7811.NAME: PoKo beans
7811.DESCRIPTION: I am a genius! If you plant beans under pigs noses you can try skipping the feeding... . I hope.

7812.NAME: Any challange
7812.DESCRIPTION: It is not that scary try finishing any challenge course and collect any one of the three snow globes.

7813.NAME: Flower  event
7813.DESCRIPTION: Collect lilies irises or calla flowers and collect prizes.

7814.NAME: Craft jewlery
7814.DESCRIPTION: Make a cute accessory for your girls. How about an engraved necklace? Craft bone bead necklace.

7815.NAME: Visiting friends
7815.DESCRIPTION: Visit friends and compliment the ladies. Do any work on friend islands.

7816.NAME: Early flowers
7816.DESCRIPTION: Check the shop, buy tulip bulbs and plant them.

7817.NAME: Rose water
7817.DESCRIPTION: Collect rose water to water tulips. Some food in workshop gives rose water, cook food, and collect special droplets.

7818.NAME: Spend rose water
7818.DESCRIPTION: Water tulips with warmth and care. Spend rose water.

7819.NAME: Cosmetics
7819.DESCRIPTION: Feed chicken, rabbits, cats, ostriches, foxes and ducks, and their young to collect special cosmetics.

782.NAME: A respectable person
782.DESCRIPTION: Gain enough reputation to show that you are an important person.

7820.NAME: Spring messanger
7820.DESCRIPTION: A butterfly surprise hidden in flowers. Collect Trispalvis valdovas or Romantiškas plačiasparnis.

7821.NAME: Beauty treatment
7821.DESCRIPTION: Check section UNIQUE and prepare for a beauty-treatment course.

7822.NAME: From heart
7822.DESCRIPTION: Spend 11 rubies and you will be awarded 12 rubies. (Note sending ruby gifts causes error for this quest)

7825.NAME: Feeding colibri
7825.DESCRIPTION: Find a way to feed hummingbirds. Restocking the feeder does not count.

7826.NAME: Golden eage
7826.DESCRIPTION: Start by building the eagle totem. Then keep going, and find a way to build the golden eagle TWICE !

7827.NAME: Tropical tree
7827.DESCRIPTION: Chop the purple tropical tree. Note, that no such trees are on the island at the moment.

783.NAME: Wood materials for the castle
783.DESCRIPTION: The merchant is delivering wood to some viking konung. Submit 300 units of wood

7831.NAME: Start the Easter
7831.DESCRIPTION: Rainbow flashes are coming from Festival island. Visit it.

7832.NAME: Make way
7832.DESCRIPTION: Click on the withered shrub and select UPGRADE to clear the path before you.

7833.NAME: Easter bushes
7833.DESCRIPTION: Clear some space by removing some of the happy Easter shrubberies.

7834.NAME: Open pavilions
7834.DESCRIPTION: Once you have enough resources, open all three of Festival pavilions.

7835.NAME: Start hatching
7835.DESCRIPTION: Hatching starts with an egg. No egg - no hatching. Find the Tough egg and place it on the island.

7836.NAME: Continue hatching
7836.DESCRIPTION: Keep hatching in Oceania style - with an hatchet. Remove two layers of the Tough egg.

7837.NAME: Finish hatching
7837.DESCRIPTION: You knock on the egg, the egg knocks back. Free the happy inhabitant of this egg.

7838.NAME: Aprils fools
7838.DESCRIPTION: Honor the Easter animals, feed bunnies, and chicken. You will need the resources earned from these actions.

7839.NAME: Pearl paint
7839.DESCRIPTION: Easter is a colorful celebration. Open workshop section UNIQUE and craft special pearl paint.

7840.NAME: Easter baskets
7840.DESCRIPTION: Build three Easter baskets. Once done hover mouse over them to check your supplies.

7841.NAME: Egg painters
7841.DESCRIPTION: Place three egg painters on the island to succeed in coloring the huge amount of commissioned colored eggs.

7842.NAME: Paint the eggs
7842.DESCRIPTION: Diligent chicks will be promoted. Simultaneously keep five eager egg painters on the island.

7843.NAME: Eager eaters
7843.DESCRIPTION: Let the eager painters recuperate, feed them. Be careful while doing so, think about sequence of your actions.

7844.NAME: Forest egg
7844.DESCRIPTION: This egg will deplete your onion supplies. Build a Forest egg.

7845.NAME: Bronze egg
7845.DESCRIPTION: To build Bronze egg you will need to deal with the Tough egg first. Build one Bronze egg.

7846.NAME: Pearl egg
7846.DESCRIPTION:
To build this egg you will need 
colored eggs, that are provided by egg painters. Such painters can be found in the shop.

7847.NAME: Juicy bushes
7847.DESCRIPTION: While looking for eggs do not neglect forest treats that you spot. Collect mushrooms and berries.

7848.NAME: Safe search
7848.DESCRIPTION: Remove thorn bushes in case kids would crawl trough the grass in search for eggs.

7849.NAME: Soft spot
7849.DESCRIPTION: Create some straw bundles so that you can put the eggs you find in a safe place.

7850.NAME: Cloth egg
7850.DESCRIPTION: Silkworms can weave fantastic silk. To build this egg you need butterfly food, that is given by feeding bunnies and chicks.

7851.NAME: Native egg
7851.DESCRIPTION: Native ornaments painted with pearl paint on a fine carved base. Finish one Native egg.

7852.NAME: Glass egg
7852.DESCRIPTION: Pussy-willows for this egg come from feeding the butterflies and from crafting Waster baskets.

7854.NAME: Share the joy
7854.DESCRIPTION: Leave some egg bushes for the kids. Have 16 egg bushes simultaneously on the map.

7855.NAME: Shell necklaces
7855.DESCRIPTION: Rabbit wishes to hide shell necklaces as an extra surprise. Collect special shells from the well.

7856.NAME: Preparing for Easter
7856.DESCRIPTION: To receive next batch of quests finish all quests labeled: "Easter Celebration."

7857.NAME: Crunch a carrot
7857.DESCRIPTION: Who seeks eggs finds necklaces and vice-versa. Rabbit enjoys this show. Harvest carrot to crunch while watching.

7858.NAME: Forest egg
7858.DESCRIPTION: Simultaneously keep 8 forest eggs on your island. Out of six eggs this one is simple, but not very economic.

7859.NAME: Hug pixies (Pavasarinės snieguolės)
7859.DESCRIPTION: By hugging a pixie once (after buying from shop) it will be added to your backpack PLANT section. Hug more pixies.

786.NAME: Rooster market
786.DESCRIPTION: The merchant wants to show this colourful bird to foreigners. Grow and sell roosters

7860.NAME: Tricky spring
7860.DESCRIPTION:
Sometimes you can ski in april. Poke grass / spring shrubbery or butterflies.
(Pavasario žalumynai / Žolė / Drugelių būrys)

7861.NAME: Rabbit in 5 minutes
7861.DESCRIPTION: With enough energy you can finish this task of selling 70 rabbits in 5 minutes.

7862.NAME: Bronze egg
7862.DESCRIPTION: Collecting materials for this egg is easy. Simultaneously keep 8 Bronze eggs.

7863.NAME: Egg - common
7863.DESCRIPTION: This task can be done in conjunction with chick feeding task. Collect regular chicken eggs.

7864.NAME: Feed the eared
7864.DESCRIPTION: Little chicks are childish wearing rabbit ears. Feed little chicks.

7865.NAME: Hatch a chick
7865.DESCRIPTION: To finish this task hatching a single chick from sturdy egg (Kietas kiaušinis) is enough, for building one is not enough.

7866.NAME: Glass egg
7866.DESCRIPTION: Simultaneously keep 8 Glass eggs. Since this task is difficult it will give bigger chunk of experience.

7867.NAME: Cloth challange
7867.DESCRIPTION: Simultaneously keep 4 Cloth eggs. Better skip this quest, unless you intend to feed an enormous chick horde.

7868.NAME: Colored eggs
7868.DESCRIPTION: The coloring chicks brush is getting dry! Prevent that by coloring more eggs with egg painter.

7869.NAME: Chose onions
7869.DESCRIPTION: Help yourself by doing this task. Harvest 40 fields of onions.

787.NAME: Chisel blade
787.DESCRIPTION: Make the chisel blade from metal and the mould.

7870.NAME: Easter baskets
7870.DESCRIPTION: Easter bunny will need those baskets even if you do not. Build a few more Easter Baskets.

7871.NAME: Native challange
7871.DESCRIPTION: Simultaneously keep 7 Cloth eggs. If you found the extra recipe for paint this will become a bit easier.

7872.NAME: Dark tent
7872.DESCRIPTION: Brown, white or colored, all eggs are eaten with salt. Collect chocolate eggs.

7873.NAME: Give pearl paint
7873.DESCRIPTION: To color the nature from winter to spring you need paint. Give 46 pearl paints.

7874.NAME: Give pussy willows
7874.DESCRIPTION: Give spring pussy willows (Pavasario kačiukai) to thwack out any April fools jokes.

7875.NAME: Pearl egg
7875.DESCRIPTION: Simultaneously keep 7 pearl eggs. Chose if you rather build egg baskets or these eggs.

7876.NAME: Collect 12 eggs
7876.DESCRIPTION: For each task you shall receive 2 eggs, finishing a quest (3x task) you will earn 1 extra egg. Collect 12 eggs.

7877.NAME: Collect 18 eggs
7877.DESCRIPTION: Reward for collecting 12 eggs is chocolate, for collecting 18 it's cake. Chose carefully not all tasks must be finished.

7878.NAME: Collect 25 eggs
7878.DESCRIPTION: It is enough to do one of the six Faberge egg quests, not all of them. Reach 25 eggs mark.

788.NAME: Brick spender
788.DESCRIPTION: Spend some clay bricks in any way you want.

7880.NAME: Easter champion 42
7880.DESCRIPTION: By doing this quest you will earn extra Rabbit bush (Velykų krūmas), as well as 50 fodder and 50 fertilizer packs.

7881.NAME: Cooling the eggs
7881.DESCRIPTION: To cool large amount of boiled eggs you need many troughs. (Medinis lovys) Build them.

7882.NAME: Headbutt
7882.DESCRIPTION: Egg fight is a headbutt duel. Learn from goats, sell goats.

7883.NAME: Butterfly paint
7883.DESCRIPTION: Check the workshop, for collecting 15 egg bushes you have unlocked extra recipe. Use butterfly wings for crafting paint.

789.NAME: Rope spender
789.DESCRIPTION: Spend some ropes in any way you want.

79.NAME: Build the new workshop
79.DESCRIPTION: Gather resources and build the new workshop

790.NAME: Paint spender
790.DESCRIPTION: Spend some paint pots in any way you want.

791.NAME: Cement spender
791.DESCRIPTION: Spend the stated amount of cement in any way you want.

792.NAME: Nail spender
792.DESCRIPTION: Spend the stated amount of thorn nails in any way you want.

7921.NAME: Visit Backyard
7921.DESCRIPTION: When all farm work is done, get on your raft, and visit Native back yard island.

7922.NAME: Thorn kindle
7922.DESCRIPTION: Cut thorns to collect kindle for fireplace.

7923.NAME: Firewood for grilling
7923.DESCRIPTION: Any wood that burns will qualify. Collect wood.

7924.NAME: Fireplace
7924.DESCRIPTION: Locate the fireplace and finish building it.

7925.NAME: Any well
7925.DESCRIPTION: You need reliable water source. Dig a well (look inside the shop) and use the well once done.

7926.NAME: Washing hands
7926.DESCRIPTION: Build some troughs to collect water for washing hands.

7927.NAME: Cover from water
7927.DESCRIPTION: Collect umbrellas to shield yourself from rain, in case it really does rain.

7928.NAME: Fried pig
7928.DESCRIPTION: Fatten your pigs, feed piglets. That will be a delicious meal.

7929.NAME: Bird meat
7929.DESCRIPTION: For those who like white meat, sell some ducks.

793.NAME: Clay pot spender
793.DESCRIPTION: Spend the stated amount of clay pots in any way you want.

7930.NAME: Grilled corn
7930.DESCRIPTION: For vegetarians, some grilled corn. Harvest corn fields.

7931.NAME: Small tables
7931.DESCRIPTION: First neighbors have arrived. Place old furniture (shop) and polish it.

7932.NAME: Lighbulbs
7932.DESCRIPTION: Change light bulb strips around the tall palms.

7933.NAME: Cloudy
7933.DESCRIPTION: Light rain. Take umbrellas and distribute them. Remove rain clouds.

7934.NAME: Ignore rain
7934.DESCRIPTION: Collect more umbrellas and hand them out. Weather fluctuation can not scare us.

7935.NAME: Table for four
7935.DESCRIPTION: You did have tables with umbrellas. Check shop for dinner tables, and build them.

7936.NAME: Better well
7936.DESCRIPTION: The water pit has run dry. Improve water pit, build wooden , clay, stone or modern well, and then use it.

7937.NAME: Spotlights
7937.DESCRIPTION: Purchase coconut projectors and build them. Latter there will be dancing.

7938.NAME: Light rain
7938.DESCRIPTION: Hand out umbrellas for new arrivals, don't worry, it looks as raining will stop soon.

7939.NAME: WC
7939.DESCRIPTION: There is a long line to use some specific utilities. Guess you need to make additional ones. Build toilets.

794.NAME: Better stone chisel
794.DESCRIPTION: Make the new chisel from the obtained blade and handle.

7940.NAME: Change tune
7940.DESCRIPTION: Open the workshop and change the tune. Collect lanterns while doing so.

7941.NAME: Place lanterns
7941.DESCRIPTION: Mark the corners of the dance floor with night lanterns. Place the lantern bells on this island or your home island.

7942.NAME: Disperse the clouds
7942.DESCRIPTION: It still rains, from time to time. Monitor the clouds and push them away.

7943.NAME: Sell wine
7943.DESCRIPTION: Let your guests enjoy this moment. Sell wine barrels.

7944.NAME: Build hammocks
7944.DESCRIPTION: Ground is moist, so, hang some hammocks to rest in.

7945.NAME: Candle light
7945.DESCRIPTION: Create a romantic corner. Have 16 wax candles at the same time.

7946.NAME: Crossing the dirt.
7946.DESCRIPTION: Fix existing stone paths or create new ones. You will not have to dance in the mud.

7947.NAME: Bite a pepper
7947.DESCRIPTION: Collect pepper bells, then punish everyone who criticizes your party by feeding them some of them.

7948.NAME: Meerkat partners
7948.DESCRIPTION: Meerkats are on the dance floor, whoops, you forgot to feed them. Feed meerkat cubs.

7949.NAME: Purple night plants
7949.DESCRIPTION: Night plant team - aubergines. Plant some aubergines as a team symbol.

795.NAME: Rock pile
795.DESCRIPTION: Begin splitting the pile of rocks to clear the spot for a lighthouse.

7950.NAME: Riding the antelopes
7950.DESCRIPTION: Sell antelopes, so that the team aubergine can ride them.

7951.NAME: Fisherman's tale
7951.DESCRIPTION: Who caught the biggest fish? Papric! Second biggest? Hmm, have simultaneously many aquariums and take measure.

7952.NAME: Famous night plants
7952.DESCRIPTION: Up to neck in mud, just like a potato. Some guests hate this comparison. Harvest potato fields.

7953.NAME: Grow horses
7953.DESCRIPTION: Feed fowls and horses, so that they could compete. No horns for steering, but that is not an issue.

7954.NAME: Stone fish
7954.DESCRIPTION: Biggest fish is not on the ground, place the sculpture back! Build fish-fountains.

7955.NAME: Backyard snake
7955.DESCRIPTION: Translation not needed  LT skips this one.

7956.NAME: Lemon in coffe
7956.DESCRIPTION: Translation not needed  LT skips this one.

7957.NAME: Free the snails
7957.DESCRIPTION: Translation not needed  LT skips this one.

7958.NAME: Fresh sweets
7958.DESCRIPTION: Grapes, in spring? Strange, but, ok. Plant some grapes.

7959.NAME: Neighbor's strawberries
7959.DESCRIPTION: Neighbor probably grew these in greenhouse. Harvest some strawberries.

796.NAME: Lighthouse foundation
796.DESCRIPTION: Dig the foundations for the lighthouse.

7960.NAME: Stockpile firewood
7960.DESCRIPTION: Make a shed for firewood out of clay, you will need a lot of firewood tonight.

7961.NAME: Fool fix
7961.DESCRIPTION: Invisible for players. Pre-prepared in case of foolishness.

7963.NAME: Eggs for breakfast
7963.DESCRIPTION: "Sweetie, go visit the hen-house, we shall have fresh eggs for breakfast." Collect eggs.

7964.NAME: Carrot juice
7964.DESCRIPTION: "Carrot juice will make you grow healthy, for your mothers sake drink it all down." Harvest carrot fields.

7965.NAME: Push the stool
7965.DESCRIPTION: "Here, take this spoon, now push the stool up, and dig in." Take actions to build stools.

7966.NAME: Comb your hair
7966.DESCRIPTION: "Sweetie, wash your face and comb your hair, we are going for a walk." Collect combs.

7967.NAME: Feeding birds
7967.DESCRIPTION: "Here, take this bread loaf, tear off a piece and throw it to the birds. Yes, that's the way." Feed grown up birds.

7968.NAME: Energetic puppy
7968.DESCRIPTION: "Holding on to your mother's skirt makes you feel safe, but don't be afraid, the puppy just wanted to play." Feed puppies.

7969.NAME: Warm hug
7969.DESCRIPTION: Warmer than summer sun, softer than duck feathers. Mothers lap is the safest place. Collect wool.

797.NAME: Place game table
797.DESCRIPTION: Go to shop section BUILDINGS to buy Fix game table and place it on your island

7970.NAME: Sweet dreams
7970.DESCRIPTION: Mother sings lullaby in quiet voice. Craft dream sheep in your workshop.

7971.NAME: Light and quiet
7971.DESCRIPTION: Soft wind blows, light rocking back and forth. Collect Trispalvis valdovas (drugelis) and Rožinis drugelis.

7972.NAME: Berries for mother
7972.DESCRIPTION: Sneak away to shrubbery nearby and collect berries for mother. Collect forest berries.

7973.NAME: Peaches for mother
7973.DESCRIPTION: Peaches in mother's greenhouse are sweet. Harvest some peach greenhouses.

7974.NAME: Surprised mother
7974.DESCRIPTION: Mother is almost here, to surprise her decorate the trees. Use white flowers that spawn on fest-island.

7975.NAME: Blooming fountain
7975.DESCRIPTION: "Thanks for the berries sweetheart, will you help me with this fountain?" Find a fountain in the shop and build it.

7976.NAME: Tie the creepers
7976.DESCRIPTION: "There is a task, that only you can do my sunshine. Help mommy by making knots on these strings." Craft beads necklaces.

7977.NAME: Wallaby games
7977.DESCRIPTION: "Honey, i think wallaby wants to leave, put him down from fountain." Find wallaby footprints, and sell adult wallabies.

7978.NAME: Masks for games
7978.DESCRIPTION: "Such a cute mask, oh, you are a monster? Indeed a scary mask!" Collect Vaiko kaukė.

7979.NAME: Feeding toucans
7979.DESCRIPTION: "You liked feeding ducks? There are no ducks on this island, how about toucans?" Sell toucans to earn 130 shells each time.

798.NAME: Learn to play Fix
798.DESCRIPTION: Play at least 3 matches of the shell game, visiting it through Oceania. Then reload to get 1 ruby

7980.NAME: Golden flower coralls
7980.DESCRIPTION: "Try putting a sea-shell to your ear, like this. Do you hear the ocean?" Simultaneously have 16 corrals on this island.

7984.NAME: Hockey island
7984.DESCRIPTION: Sharpen your skates and head out, after all, you are the manager of OK home team.

7985.NAME: Team herald
7985.DESCRIPTION: Polish your team's badge in UNIQUE section of workshop. Collect a puck.

7986.NAME: Showing off
7986.DESCRIPTION: If in a friendly match you outrun Peacock players, the crowd will cheer. Feed runners.

7987.NAME: Unity of flag
7987.DESCRIPTION: Change flag color to green, make sure there are 7 green flags on the island.

7988.NAME: Power play
7988.DESCRIPTION: Team Bears will gladly share their knowledge of power maneuvers. Feed weight lifters.

7989.NAME: Unite in thinking
7989.DESCRIPTION: To be on the same thought wave you need to raise blue flags, to do this you will also need to freeze the lake.

7990.NAME: Strategic thinking
7990.DESCRIPTION: Friendly games give a chance to test ideas. Write them down on the blackboard.

7991.NAME: Team colors
7991.DESCRIPTION: Red is definitely the color of home team. Raise nine red flags.

7992.NAME: Hockey barriers
7992.DESCRIPTION: The current barriers are hard, blow some balloons to soften them. Upgrade hockey barriers.

7993.NAME: Don't brake bones
7993.DESCRIPTION: There is no room for hatred, hand in bones to support friendly attitude.

7994.NAME: Few pucks
7994.DESCRIPTION: Collect one puck, and sponsors will gift you with a cup of cocoa.

7995.NAME: Boutiful pucks
7995.DESCRIPTION: For excellent collaboration with your fans, you receive a chocolate bar.

7996.NAME: Puck production
7996.DESCRIPTION: Pucks can be earned in daily friendship games as well. Collect pucks and you shall receive a cake.

7997.NAME: Keep up the tempo
7997.DESCRIPTION: Hockey players run for a minute, and then swap. Use running tracks.

7998.NAME: Pause for muscles
7998.DESCRIPTION: While you rest, let us study tactics. Use blackboards.

7999.NAME: Back muscles
7999.DESCRIPTION: Weights from the shop must be planted in fields. Use weights 30 times.

8.NAME: Clear the shore
8.DESCRIPTION: Clear 6 obstacles on the shore to make place for the workshop.

80.NAME: Finish the new workshop
80.DESCRIPTION: Gather the resources and finish building the new workshop

800.NAME: Beat natives in shell game
800.DESCRIPTION: Reach at least 3rd level in Fix, visiting it through Oceania. Then reload to get 2 rubies

8000.NAME: Friendship ice
8000.DESCRIPTION: Local friendship games can use small ice fields, freeze them. If you need ice blocks, you can get them from other quests.

8001.NAME: Check balloons
8001.DESCRIPTION: Check the reliability of softened barriers. Use force play on balloon barriers.

8002.NAME: Freezing the swamp
8002.DESCRIPTION: For play-offs you will need big skating rings. Shove snow inside the swamp.

8003.NAME: Roosters on field
8003.DESCRIPTION: You have not met Roosters since last championship. Greet them, feed roosters.

8004.NAME: Polishing thorns
8004.DESCRIPTION: Plenty of thorny situations inside the team. Polish thorny bushes.

8005.NAME: Friendly bond
8005.DESCRIPTION: Game ended 3-3, improve your friendship bonds craft some ropes.

8006.NAME: Nose wrinkling
8006.DESCRIPTION: Proud Peacocks have become fussy. There is a special place for that kind of opinion. Build WC's or ponds.

8007.NAME: Peacocks hold out
8007.DESCRIPTION: Second period is about to end, result is 2-2. Use more force, build barrels.

8008.NAME: Peacock counter
8008.DESCRIPTION: Peacocks never get depressed, situation is still risky. Goal, and Victory! Craft nails or wooden planks.

8009.NAME: Sell the painted
8009.DESCRIPTION: “Foxes” have freshened up, helmets have a fresh coat of paint. Sell painted tables.

801.NAME: Attract glass merchants
801.DESCRIPTION: Explore the jungle and renovate the ancient temple to permanently involve glass merchants.

8010.NAME: Red tails
8010.DESCRIPTION: For teasing purposes “Foxes” added red tails to their uniforms, and they give off a strawberry scent. Harvest strawberries.

8011.NAME: Psychology
8011.DESCRIPTION: “Foxes” test psychological tactics, ignore it. Feed foxes.

8012.NAME: Juicy game
8012.DESCRIPTION: Foul for OK team, 0-1, missed pass, 0-2. The game is full of juicy moments. Plant juicy grapes.

8013.NAME: Sinking result
8013.DESCRIPTION: 1-2 “Toucans” clack again, the OK team gets advantage, 1-3. Fish in octopus or hammerhead spots.

8014.NAME: Unpolished diamond
8014.DESCRIPTION: Last minute 3-4, OK switches out goalie for sixth player, 4-4, whistle, end of period. Dig in gem mine.

8015.NAME: Flowers for friends
8015.DESCRIPTION: This team has helped you lots of times, sow some flax to collect flower bouquet.

8016.NAME: Examining beehives
8016.DESCRIPTION: Massive, but quick as a bee, “Bears” know how to play. Harvest beehives.

8017.NAME: Cement your victory
8017.DESCRIPTION: Excellent, truly excellent. Memorize today's success. Collect bags of cement.

8018.NAME: Cash office income
8018.DESCRIPTION: Keepsake market flourishes, Your team is on a green branch. Build clay era shell storages.

8019.NAME: Spicing the game
8019.DESCRIPTION: Your team puts effort in every game, thus it's more interesting, today is no exception. Harvest chili.

802.NAME: First stage
802.DESCRIPTION: Begin and finish building the first stage for the foundation of the lighthouse.

8020.NAME: Win “Meerkats”
8020.DESCRIPTION: 4-1 Out of respect for opponent game is kept on the highest level until the very end. Sell meerkats.

8021.NAME: Stone moster
8021.DESCRIPTION: “Goats” trained their strength in a stone quarry, their arms are thick as logs. Collect regular or decorative stone blocks.

8022.NAME: Metal maniac
8022.DESCRIPTION: Players learned dodging in forge, where sparks fly around. Build gem trees.

8023.NAME: Potato relaxation
8023.DESCRIPTION: The activities for free time were harvesting potatoes, or similar. Plant potatoes.

8024.NAME: Center player
8024.DESCRIPTION: Center helps both attack and defense, an universal player. Harvest rice or watermelons.

8025.NAME: Attacker
8025.DESCRIPTION: Chose your attacker, zebra or crocodile. Feed ether of them.

8026.NAME: Defender
8026.DESCRIPTION: Build your defense, make building actions on limestone or sandstone decorations, Ornamentinis takelis works as well.

8027.NAME: Open the team house
8027.DESCRIPTION: When you finish quest “Team spirit,” you can upgrade team house. Select UPGRADE.

8028.NAME: Gain symphaty
8028.DESCRIPTION: When you finish quest “Hockey pucks” you will receive turtle ice statue. Select UPGRADE.

8029.NAME: Discuss tactic
8029.DESCRIPTION: When you finish quest “Training program” you can open ice teahouse. Select UPGRADE.

8030.NAME: Hockey badges
8030.DESCRIPTION: Check collection window for hints, every badge has one. Collect hockey badges.

8031.NAME: Hockey bonus
8031.DESCRIPTION: After collecting some black pucks, try activating one of the bonuses on hockey island. Bonuses are located in special buildings.

8032.NAME: Hockey shirt
8032.DESCRIPTION: There are a total of three bonuses, they can run sanctimoniously, and the effects stack. Get one Hockey collection.

8033.NAME: Some badges
8033.DESCRIPTION: Collect 3 golden pucks. Bonuses last one hour, that equals three hockey periods.

8034.NAME: Many badges
8034.DESCRIPTION: Collect 6 golden pucks. Before activating bonus, check to see you actually have where to spend it.

8035.NAME: Avalanch of badges
8035.DESCRIPTION: Collect 10 golden pucks. All three bonuses are identical, non is superior to another, but they do stack.

8036.NAME: Sponsor pucks
8036.DESCRIPTION: Pucks can be collected ether trough friendly matches or hockey daily quests. Get some pucks, but don't be shy to spend them.

8037.NAME: Golden pucks
8037.DESCRIPTION: Golden pucks come from Hockey collection. Trade badges for golden pucks 15 times.

8038.NAME: Score a goal
8038.DESCRIPTION: Freeze the swamp and play tournament games. You will need all three bonuses active to have a chance on scoring.

8039.NAME: Score 12 times
8039.DESCRIPTION: Try to score more then just the minimum. By doing this task you will be awarded one golden puck.

8040.NAME: Score 36 times
8040.DESCRIPTION: Try to score more then just the minimum. By doing this task you will be awarded two golden pucks.

8041.NAME: Score 72 times
8041.DESCRIPTION: Try to score more then just the minimum. By doing this task you will be awarded three golden pucks.

8042.NAME: Visit the island
8042.DESCRIPTION: Head over and check out the meteorite island.

8043.NAME: Empty once
8043.DESCRIPTION: You will need water for various tasks on the island. Empty all the wells once.

8044.NAME: Empty twice
8044.DESCRIPTION: If you have sufficient energy, you can finish this task the same day 2 hours 15 minutes latter.

8045.NAME: Empty compleatly
8045.DESCRIPTION: From well, directly on to the plants, do not flood the island.

8046.NAME: Watery plants
8046.DESCRIPTION: It looks like Violetiniai stiebai have been planted for their juice, but they are an obstacle, cut them down.

8047.NAME: Red flower test
8047.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps Violetiniai stiebai juice was used to create better plant rejuvenator. Water the red flower cactuses.

8048.NAME: Sheeps that shred
8048.DESCRIPTION: After milking the juice you are left with a lot of green mass. Feed them to your sheep.

8049.NAME: Sloths
8049.DESCRIPTION: Do not distress food for these creatures should be somewhere around here. Feed the sloth.

8050.NAME: Lost in bushes
8050.DESCRIPTION: Here lies the dump of all unnecessary. Check Violetinių žiedų krūmas and Vijoklinis krūmelis.

8051.NAME: Thicketry
8051.DESCRIPTION: After the rocky rain some things could of been catapulted in to the bushes. Check kupranugario erškėčiai and alijošius.

8052.NAME: Dried cactus
8052.DESCRIPTION: Yellow flower cactus consumes more water than usual. Rejuvenate all three.

8053.NAME: Brwon-blue
8053.DESCRIPTION: Cows in Oceania need to be fed less often, hence they are picky.

8054.NAME: Tropical
8054.DESCRIPTION: All four corners are well suited for farming. Cut down tropical trees.

8055.NAME: Harvest carrots
8055.DESCRIPTION: Carrots will be ready on very specific date, if you do not wish to wait, you can plant your own carrots.

8056.NAME: Onions
8056.DESCRIPTION: I think that this harvesting task should be prioritized.

8057.NAME: Pumpkins
8057.DESCRIPTION: And this one should be left for latter time, harvest pumpkins.

8058.NAME: Chop sturdy palms
8058.DESCRIPTION: It would be a shame to leave such fine trees to rot. Chop any level of sturdy palms

8059.NAME: Sell roosters
8059.DESCRIPTION: Roosters are easy to evacuate, they don't take up much space. Sell roosters.

806.NAME: Improve foundations of the lighthouse
806.DESCRIPTION: By using the obtained emerald, improve the foundation to the next stage.

8060.NAME: Feed puppies
8060.DESCRIPTION: One of the boulders smashes dog hut, fortunately no one got hurt. Feed puppies and dogs.

8061.NAME: Hope
8061.DESCRIPTION: The spirit of the island will not let everything rot. If you gift a hopeful alyvinė šaka you will get net for catching medusas.

8062.NAME: Alyvinė šaka
8062.DESCRIPTION: The island has spirit of its own, by finishing (other) quests, you will receive a branch, try it!

8063.NAME: Catching medusas
8063.DESCRIPTION: Clear as much paths as possible, remove medusas. To do this task you will need to finish other quests first.

8064.NAME: Dig for metiorites
8064.DESCRIPTION: You can ether pick up meteorites each morning, or you can collect salt crystals from friend gifts.

8065.NAME: Long term plan
8065.DESCRIPTION: Plant tropical trees in all four corners, the trees will surely survive until you return.

8066.NAME: Motivation
8066.DESCRIPTION: The island will have option to recover lost reputation, each Joninių gėlės bush gives 1 reputation, each Rožės žiedas gives 5 reputation.

8067.NAME: Bronze discipline I
8067.DESCRIPTION: No need to guess what will you need to chop. Clear fully frown rubber trees or sturdy palms.

8068.NAME: Bronze discipline II
8068.DESCRIPTION: It is time to take pigs to town to show how the grill things are made.

8069.NAME: Bronze discipline III
8069.DESCRIPTION: Simountaniously grow 40 tomato fields. Does not matter if they are sown, harvestable or whitered.

807.NAME: Improve foundations of the lighthouse
807.DESCRIPTION: Finish building the second stage of the foundation.

8070.NAME: Bronze discipline IV
8070.DESCRIPTION: This quest is more about shells and less about energy. Simountaniously grow 24 thorn fields.

8071.NAME: Bronze discipline V
8071.DESCRIPTION: Here is something difficult for begginers: hand over 180 pumpkins.

8072.NAME: Bronze discipline VI
8072.DESCRIPTION: Time to dig up your supplies of forest goodies. Craft Uogienė or Marinuoti grybai.

8073.NAME: Bronze discipline VII
8073.DESCRIPTION: Carefull, before you buy animals check if you are able to feed them. Feed chicks.

8074.NAME: Bronze discipline VIII
8074.DESCRIPTION: Plant beans. No one ever reads to the bottom of the task, this planting is valid only from shop.

8075.NAME: Bronze discipline IX
8075.DESCRIPTION: Try not to burn down the island. Finish and sell 10 hay stacks.

8076.NAME: Silver discipline I
8076.DESCRIPTION: All cup quests need to be considered carefully. Give 70 bones.

8077.NAME: Silver discipline II
8077.DESCRIPTION: Some quests are a bit more easy, so it would not feel so heavy. Finish building toilets.

8078.NAME: Silver discipline III
8078.DESCRIPTION: Some Cup tasks never change. Chop down 16 jungle tiles.

8079.NAME: Silver discipline IV
8079.DESCRIPTION: Island has 310 workable tiles, place 180 ferns (Papartis).

808.NAME: Cutting long palm-trees
808.DESCRIPTION: Cut small or fully-grown (not partially grown) long palms.

8080.NAME: Silver discipline V
8080.DESCRIPTION: This is a task that you can not do on the first day. Activate any of the 4 scrolls multiple times.

8081.NAME: Silver discipline VI
8081.DESCRIPTION: Since you have to wait anyway, feed the adult ducks 30 times.

8082.NAME: Silver discipline VII
8082.DESCRIPTION: Island has no clay pit on it, figure out how to empty the clay pit 50 times.

8083.NAME: Silver discipline VIII
8083.DESCRIPTION: Shop has a simplified lighthouse available, build 3 such monuments.

8084.NAME: Silver discipline IX
8084.DESCRIPTION: Orca (Daugiapelekis delfinas) likes milk, feed 16 adult cows. Orca does not like to wait, third option is also valid.

8085.NAME: Gold discipline I
8085.DESCRIPTION: Animals can be moved to areas not accessable yet. Feed any horses.

8086.NAME: Gold discipline II
8086.DESCRIPTION: This time island got burned (in cooking sense) chop down 4 of 6 volcanic rocks.

8087.NAME: Gold discipline III
8087.DESCRIPTION: Craft peackok feather fans. Quests for peackoks were unlocked after wine, sawmill and lighhouse foundation.

8088.NAME: Gold discipline IV
8088.DESCRIPTION: This competitin will not waste your doubloons, purchase Stebuklingų galių eliksyras.

8089.NAME: Gold discipline V
8089.DESCRIPTION: Building block paths, most plants and animals do not. Plan your placement. Harvest potatoes.

8090.NAME: Gold discipline VI
8090.DESCRIPTION: Sometimes it is better to sell and then buy back, weather cocks are cheap. Sell finished weather cocks.

8091.NAME: Gold discipline VII
8091.DESCRIPTION: All the fun quests were used in Bronze and Silver. Do the mundane, collect flax straws. (Linai)

8092.NAME: Gold discipline VIII
8092.DESCRIPTION: This competition has extra recepie for diamond necklacess. Collect them any way you can.

8093.NAME: Gold discipline IX
8093.DESCRIPTION: Simountaniously have 5 clay ponds. The area with Aštrialapis augalas has no 4x4 spots available.

8099.NAME: My - Your friends
8099.DESCRIPTION: Both of you could visit your friends, help them by doing any chores.

81.NAME: Craft 20 planks
81.DESCRIPTION: Now you can craft planks in the workshop. Craft 20 planks, spending wood and energy

810.NAME: Reputation for an emerald
810.DESCRIPTION: Gather more reputation to get an emerald

8100.NAME: Awaiting sunset
8100.DESCRIPTION: Oceania pastime, punch a radish in to the ground, and it will pop back up in 5 minutes. Harvest radishes.

8101.NAME: Playfull animals
8101.DESCRIPTION: Kittens and puppies do not understand that mermaid is not a fish. Feed them, then treat the cute bites on the mermaid.

8102.NAME: Goat tales
8102.DESCRIPTION: You just feed the goats, but never talk to them, and boy do they have tales. Feed small goats.

8103.NAME: Mermaid in the well
8103.DESCRIPTION: Charlotte would like to take this conversation in-land, but then she would dry. Empty the well, refresh the mermaid.

8104.NAME: Fixing the dress
8104.DESCRIPTION: All that talking and cheese eating made Charlotte uncomfortable. Release the straps. Craft ropes.

8105.NAME: Spare combs
8105.DESCRIPTION: Delfina looks disshelved by coming ashore. Get Delfina a few combs.

8106.NAME: Butterflies in the hair.
8106.DESCRIPTION: Delfina declined flower wreath, get her some Rožinis drugelis.

8107.NAME: Quiet spot
8107.DESCRIPTION: Build some storage buildings from branches, and move with the mermaid to the roof to watch the sunset in peace.

8108.NAME: Feed whales
