8108.DESCRIPTION: Treat the whales with Ligo cheese made of seal milk. No seal was harmed in this process.

8109.NAME: Find the mermaids
8109.DESCRIPTION: Three mermaids are watching the sunset. They know the macot Kirkt very well. Find the mermids.

811.NAME: Improve the foundation of the lighthouse
811.DESCRIPTION: By using the emerald, improve the foundation of the lighthouse to the next stage.

8110.NAME: Mermaid blessing
8110.DESCRIPTION: If you wish to move Kirk the Orca to your island, than you need to do tasks from all three mermaids.

8113.NAME: Lunch on the field
8113.DESCRIPTION: When eating outside, it is best to take compact food. Boil some eggs.

8114.NAME: Earth Quakers
8114.DESCRIPTION: While dining Paprick finds a strange hammer. Oh, it is the garlic summoner! Craft hammers in workshop.

8115.NAME: While using well
8115.DESCRIPTION: While working on well Paprick tells you that hammer is special despite its strange looks. Empty well.

8116.NAME: Fill troughs
8116.DESCRIPTION: Hammers were designed to squeeze juice from a rock, but the end result was different. Build troughs.

8117.NAME: Tieing up beans
8117.DESCRIPTION: While working on beans Paprick tells you that it was not juice that was extracted, but garlic. Harvest beans.

8118.NAME: Behind baobab
8118.DESCRIPTION: This island has three garlic cliffs, try locating them by chopping 2 babobabs.

8119.NAME: Who bit my leg?
8119.DESCRIPTION: Ah, i forgot, island has ants, i think we will need them, so empty the anthills.

812.NAME: Finish the foundations
812.DESCRIPTION: Finish building the 3rd stage of the foundations

8120.NAME: Antelope does not bite
8120.DESCRIPTION: To prevent antelopes from eating your garlics you should feed the antelopes on Garlic island.

8124.NAME: Small roosters
8124.DESCRIPTION: Hitting the garlic cliff produces unique sound, and roosters sing along. Feed your support choir, feed roosters.

8125.NAME: Other oddities
8125.DESCRIPTION: Did you notice the wooden poles on Garlic island? Try studying them by building them.

8126.NAME: Small onion
8126.DESCRIPTION: For more spicy experience try adding an onion here or there. Harvest onions.

8127.NAME: Ostrich meat
8127.DESCRIPTION: Garlic snacks go well with bird meat. Sell adult ostriches.

8128.NAME: Cucumber marinade
8128.DESCRIPTION: Paprick used his share of garlics to make pickle marinade. Build few barrels for your neighbor.

8129.NAME: Adding carrots
8129.DESCRIPTION: Garlic snacks need carrots as well, harvest carrots.

813.NAME: Reputation for an emerald
813.DESCRIPTION: Gather more reputation to get an emerald

8130.NAME: Burinig feeling
8130.DESCRIPTION: Build few toilets for those with weaker stomachs for spicy food.

8131.NAME: Sharpness specialists
8131.DESCRIPTION: Hedgehogs eat earth worms and drink milk, why did you think they will know about spicy things? Feed hedgehogs.

8132.NAME: Candy workshop
8132.DESCRIPTION: A candy for your suffering! Build candy factory and bake few candies.

8133.NAME: Unbelivable asortiment
8133.DESCRIPTION: Sell specially assorted sea-shells, sell stone shell storages.

8134.NAME: Garlic goats
8134.DESCRIPTION: Goats need to dance in ritual by going in circles and shouting "garlic!" Feed goats, but is this really the ritual?

8135.NAME: Use beehives
8135.DESCRIPTION: In ritual bees need to loop in garlic head pattern. Come on Papric, this is a fishermen's tale! Use beehives.

8136.NAME: Weaver
8136.DESCRIPTION: This tapestry has records of garlic cliff history.. eem, where is the tapestry? Build and use weaver.

8137.NAME: Grapes
8137.DESCRIPTION: Power over garlic has similar social status as it is with grapes. Harvest grapes.

8138.NAME: Feed foxes
8138.DESCRIPTION: The fox snobs wave their heads in approval, yes, garlic is a good thing, since it comes with bird meat. Feed foxes.

8139.NAME: Fish cabages
8139.DESCRIPTION: Oh, buzz off Paprick with these fairy tales! How could a cliff be fished out? Fish for some sea-cabbages.

8140.NAME: Snacks for antelopes
8140.DESCRIPTION: If you do not believe, ask antilopes! I will do just that! Feed antelopes on any island.

8141.NAME: Plant strawberries
8141.DESCRIPTION: For end result you need to stuff your cheeks with strawberries. You just wanted straberries, didn't you? Plant them.

8142.NAME: Balun's aquarium
8142.DESCRIPTION: Scientist Balun needs to study garlic impact on organisms, build big aquariums for research.

8143.NAME: Some lemon trees.
8143.DESCRIPTION: Potter Adoni is eating your garlic snacks, you can pick some lemon trees while you wait on him.

8144.NAME: Dig in gems
8144.DESCRIPTION: When Gelar gets bored of dishes, then no gem is equal to garlic. Dig in gem mines.

8145.NAME: Pyromaniac garlic
8145.DESCRIPTION: Pilot has experience, when spicy food sets furniture on fire. Build non-burning volcanic chairs and tables.

8146.NAME: Use cheese workshop
8146.DESCRIPTION: Aldo wishes to taste his favorite cheese with garlic. Use cheese workshop after you build it.

8147.NAME: Chop rubber trees
8147.DESCRIPTION: While flying over i noticed that rubber trees overshadow garlic fields. Use axe one any rubbetree.

8151.NAME: Garlic quake
8151.DESCRIPTION: Find all three garlic cliffs and press them dry. Use special hammers.

8152.NAME: Twigs for firewood
8152.DESCRIPTION: By cutting 24 split-branch palms you will earn 5 chocolateds. Leaving some trees uncut will earn respect from squirls.

8153.NAME: Removing baobabs
8153.DESCRIPTION: You can chose to remove all baobabs, and that will score you 5 cakes, and menacing stares from local squirls.

816.NAME: Improve foundations
816.DESCRIPTION: Improve the foundations of the lighthouse by using the emerald to decorate.

817.NAME: Build the frame of the lighthouse
817.DESCRIPTION: Finish building the 1st stage of the frame.

818.NAME: Reputation for an emerald
818.DESCRIPTION: Gather more reputation to get an emerald

8184.NAME: Washed out cipher
8184.DESCRIPTION: Open workshop and carefully clean the stone tablet, perhaps you can get additional clues.

8185.NAME: Use cipher
8185.DESCRIPTION: Visit the mysterious cave island and use the gained clues to decipher large stone plate in the cave.

8186.NAME: Dig up and analyse
8186.DESCRIPTION: Cave has extra pointers, find any of the 8 small riddle stones and compare the symbols.

82.NAME: Craft 10 nails
82.DESCRIPTION: Now you can craft nails in the workshop. Craft 10 nails from thorns

821.NAME: Totem masks for an emerald
821.DESCRIPTION: Buy and finish totem masks (section DECORATIONS)

8215.NAME: CCOO
8215.DESCRIPTION: Buy seeds ONLY FROM SHOP and plant ???? ???? ????

8219.NAME: First cipher
8219.DESCRIPTION: Check the picture, you need to do this 12 times.

8220.NAME: Second cipher
8220.DESCRIPTION: This will be a bit more troubling, the picture tells you, you need 48 actions.

8221.NAME: Third cipher
8221.DESCRIPTION: It is easy to do this task in completely wrong way, the number needed is 39.

8222.NAME: Fourth cipher
8222.DESCRIPTION: Some icons are self explaining. Key number is 7.

8223.NAME: Fifth cipher
8223.DESCRIPTION: You are tasked 54 times, i wonder what kind of task it is.

8224.NAME: Sixth cipher
8224.DESCRIPTION: This cipher is a lot tougher, 38 is only thing you understand, the rest looks like a doctors handwriting.

8225.NAME: Seventh cipher A
8225.DESCRIPTION: Do not get confused, icon is a bit misleading, chop 48 times.

8226.NAME: Seventh cipher B
8226.DESCRIPTION: Only 6, that is strange, you would think it is that easy.

8227.NAME: Seventh cipher C
8227.DESCRIPTION: What is this, does this really exist? Do it three times.

8228.NAME: Eight cipher A
8228.DESCRIPTION: You are tasked to work with luxurious

8229.NAME: Eight cipher B
8229.DESCRIPTION: 44 times, this will take some time, better start right away.

823.NAME: Feed foxes for an emerald
823.DESCRIPTION: Feed a grown-up or baby fox 10 times

8230.NAME: Eight cipher C
8230.DESCRIPTION: Icon should have two entities, other must have blurred, do it 51 times.

8231.NAME: Ninth cipher A
8231.DESCRIPTION: Once, you need to do this only once.

8232.NAME: Ninth cipher B
8232.DESCRIPTION: This will strain your brain to the limit, only 6 times, and the icon is correct, what is it?

8233.NAME: Ninth cipher C
8233.DESCRIPTION: The number 80 is misleading, yes, the result of your actions will be 80, but it is not really 80.

8234.NAME: First compartment
8234.DESCRIPTION: Poke the obelisk buttons at random (By activating the bonuses) until this compartment opens.

8235.NAME: Second compartment
8235.DESCRIPTION: Poke the obelisk buttons at random (By activating the bonuses) until this compartment opens.

8236.NAME: Third compartment
8236.DESCRIPTION: Poke the obelisk buttons at random (By activating the bonuses) until this compartment opens.

824.NAME: Improve the lighthouse
824.DESCRIPTION: Improve the frame of the lighthouse, using the emerald.

8240.NAME: Vase above ground
8240.DESCRIPTION: We noticed that vase has rooted in the underground. Sell the vase and put it on main island.

8241.NAME: Secret of the Vase
8241.DESCRIPTION: Vase has a secret function, press USE.

8242.NAME: Place for action
8242.DESCRIPTION: Sell any object that is present in the underground.

8243.NAME: Underground craze
8243.DESCRIPTION: Remember, no free spot means no hazelnuts. Wait for nuts and then collect them.

8244.NAME: Ghostlight
8244.DESCRIPTION: Remember, no free spot means no Ghostlight. Wait for firesparks and then collect them.

8245.NAME: Squirrel riddle
8245.DESCRIPTION: To finish this quest you will have to spend previously collected items.

8246.NAME: Nutcracker riddle
8246.DESCRIPTION: To finish this quest you must not sell specific thing.

8247.NAME: Light bringer
8247.DESCRIPTION: A part of this quest will require you to spend 100 ghostlights.

8248.NAME: Bluish riddle
8248.DESCRIPTION: Riddle that is related to ghostlights.

8249.NAME: Backpack riddle
8249.DESCRIPTION: This riddle is related to selling.

825.NAME: Build the lighthouse
825.DESCRIPTION: Finish building the 2nd stage of the frame

8250.NAME: Brownish
8250.DESCRIPTION: Riddle that is related to nuts.

8251.NAME: Seventy five
8251.DESCRIPTION: You can find more than one way to do this task.

8252.NAME: Hundred and fifty
8252.DESCRIPTION: This task has multiple approaches as well.

8254.NAME: Greeting the teacher
8254.DESCRIPTION: Beginning of school is friendly both to knowledgeable owls and educatable pipsqueaks. Buy school desk or Owl.

8255.NAME: Sit down
8255.DESCRIPTION: Select USE on school desk or Owl decoration and visit School isle.

8256.NAME: Planned lunch
8256.DESCRIPTION: By crafting any food you can get a collection item. All recipes have same probability. Craft food.

8257.NAME: History rings
8257.DESCRIPTION: Each trunk ring records the history of the tree. Chop trees to get an collection item.

8258.NAME: Morning walk
8258.DESCRIPTION: During this quest cycle, each day you will receive some mushroom baskets with daily bonus. Collect some.

8259.NAME: Curiousity
8259.DESCRIPTION: Try checking out the small pyramids on the island. You will need mushroom baskets to enter tho.

826.NAME: Reputation for emeralds
826.DESCRIPTION: Gather more reputation to get emeralds

8260.NAME: Hidden autumn
8260.DESCRIPTION: Plant autumn dragons you collected from pyramids, this action can be done on any of the isles. Dragons are in backpack's plant section.

8261.NAME: Carrot treats
8261.DESCRIPTION: Collection items can be acquired from things we inform about. Carrots do not have collection items. Harvest carrots.

8262.NAME: Feed kittens
8262.DESCRIPTION: School collection items can be received from animals present on school island or their counterparts at home. Cat's do not give collections.

8263.NAME: Drill and nail
8263.DESCRIPTION: Some yellow bushes hide a certain teacher, that can provide you with boots. Finish building any type of decoration.

8264.NAME: Schoolmates
8264.DESCRIPTION: Island has plenty of space. Simultaneously have 70 backpack hedgehogs.

8265.NAME: Dragon tribe
8265.DESCRIPTION: To finish this you will need to visit small pyramids a lot. Simultaneously have 60 dragons planted.

8266.NAME: Big curiousity
8266.DESCRIPTION: Completely drained pyramid resets each morning. Simultaneously empty all four pyramids

8267.NAME: Yarn ball
8267.DESCRIPTION: Yarn can do so much more than just make scarfs and sweaters. Feed Sheeps and lambs.

8268.NAME: Hedgehog education
8268.DESCRIPTION: Helping others fortifies your own knowledge. Feed hungry hedgehogs.

8269.NAME: Workshop for crafts
8269.DESCRIPTION: Build the workshop at least up to stage II, then use MOVE to relocate it.

8270.NAME: Parent meeting
8270.DESCRIPTION: Simultaneously have 120 knowledgeable owls [note: Wise owl is different object] .If you can not plant language in fields yet, wait a bit.

8271.NAME: Malfunction crafting
8271.DESCRIPTION: This task also can be done only after achieving specific progress. Have 5 smelting stations simultaneously.

8272.NAME: Neighbour kids
8272.DESCRIPTION: While class is being rebuild feed ether your own rabbits or save your strength and feed neighbor rabbits.

8273.NAME: Favorite teacher
8273.DESCRIPTION: The most loved instructor has returned! Some bushes have a hidden instructor, a total of 5 to be exact. Feed them up to full health.

8274.NAME: Joy of teaching
8274.DESCRIPTION: Hedgehogs are proud of their young. Simultaneously have 20 ordinary hedgehogs.

8275.NAME: Wheat farming
8275.DESCRIPTION: Study well, rest well, relax in a field of wheat, but first you have to plant the wheat.

8276.NAME: Harsh entertainment
8276.DESCRIPTION: Fight the healthy sword instructor. Keep in mind his lunch breaks do not count for this task.

8277.NAME: Linguistics
8277.DESCRIPTION: Language cultivation is a never ending process. Plant some language fields.

8278.NAME: Scientific notes
8278.DESCRIPTION: Open class room and clean it up. The key has been lost in the Ignorance pit. Clean junk piles.

8279.NAME: Chemical composition
8279.DESCRIPTION: Find chemical analyzor in the shop and use it to analyze materials from Ignorance pit.

8280.NAME: New metal
8280.DESCRIPTION: Find smelting station in the shop and use it to analyze materials from Ignorance pit.

8281.NAME: Polimarization
8281.DESCRIPTION: Find organic tester in the shop and use it to analyze materials from Ignorance pit.

8282.NAME: Knowlagable owls
8282.DESCRIPTION: You can acquire books by selling purple owls. To gain journals for owl purchase you must cultivate language fields.

8283.NAME: World traveler
8283.DESCRIPTION: Purple ducks, turtles, labradors and german shepherds, as well a flamingo and polar bear, collection globe is hidden here.

8284.NAME: Keep educating
8284.DESCRIPTION: While you are waiting for the exclusive animals to get hungry, you can feed the hungry apple hedgehogs.

8285.NAME: Inquiries
8285.DESCRIPTION: Plant the second language in your fields. It can be purchased in shop by spending journals.

8286.NAME: Formulas
8286.DESCRIPTION: When you have harvested the second language, you will gain seeds for third language. Find them in your bag and plant them.

8287.NAME: Summary
8287.DESCRIPTION: I finally remembered! I am missing musical notes. You can get this collection material only by harvesting ancient language runes.

8288.NAME: Place palmtree
8288.DESCRIPTION: Cash in the first School collection and place the ignorant palmtree on your island.

8289.NAME: Palm rings
8289.DESCRIPTION: Keep on working on the island and acquire more rings from School collection. Keep educating the palmtree.

8290.NAME: Exams
8290.DESCRIPTION: To finish this quest you need to help the palmtree complete the fourth and ninth class exams.

8291.NAME: Quota maker
8291.DESCRIPTION: To make norms about fishing you need to know how much can be caught. Fish in  gudgeon or shark fishing spots.

8292.NAME: Rocket pilot
8292.DESCRIPTION: One mistake and the rocket ends up on the other side of the planet. Harvest beans for canning supplies.

8293.NAME: Ethologist
8293.DESCRIPTION: Ethologist or animal behavior examiner showed interest in the most common dog breed. Feed the common pups and dogs.

8294.NAME: Scientist
8294.DESCRIPTION: Test liana sturdiness, craft anything out of them.

8295.NAME: Student named Martha
8295.DESCRIPTION: Help Martha empty the well, and you can borrow her old school books. Use well.

8296.NAME: Traveler
8296.DESCRIPTION: Traveler has seen many kinds of birds, feed chickens, roosters or duck on your island.

8297.NAME: Historical geography
8297.DESCRIPTION: First, a test in geography. Remember globes can be collected from the rare animals on this island.

8298.NAME: Heap of texts
8298.DESCRIPTION: The island has lots of free space, and backpack hedgehogs can be fed once per day. Hand in ink bottles.

8299.NAME: Discoveries
8299.DESCRIPTION: Natural sciences test is easy for you. Hand in experiments.

83.NAME: Upgrade the fireplace
83.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the fireplace to get more maximum energy

8300.NAME: Middleschool palmtree
8300.DESCRIPTION: Most likely you have already finished this task prior. Finish basic education.

8301.NAME: Finished palmtree
8301.DESCRIPTION: Finish middle education. It is possible you have done this in advance as well.

8302.NAME: Clearing the head
8302.DESCRIPTION: Palmtree wishes to travel after graduating. Travel anywhere 15 times.

8303.NAME: Animal calling
8303.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps palmtree wishes to be an animal specialist? Feed any and all animals.

8304.NAME: Farm calling
8304.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps palmtree would prefer a farmers life? Harvest any fields.

8305.NAME: Science calling
8305.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps sports or science from school is the professional way to go? Gather experiments.

8306.NAME: UFO I
8306.DESCRIPTION: Find the UFO chassis and purchase it, than select UPGRADE.

8307.NAME: UFO II
8307.DESCRIPTION: Even if flying fails, attempts must be made. Finish building 1st stage UFO.

8308.NAME: UFO III
8308.DESCRIPTION: Select UPGRADE on UFO's 2nd stage and finish building 3rd stage.

8309.NAME: Travel to welcome
8309.DESCRIPTION: Palmtree has brought friends, travel to School island to greet them.

8310.NAME: Disembarking
8310.DESCRIPTION: Palmtrees are stiff after travels, move them to islands middle.

8311.NAME: Big head
8311.DESCRIPTION: Palmtree got stuck inside the boat, poke the boat and help the palmtree get off.

8312.NAME: Simple work
8312.DESCRIPTION: Help simple palmtrees get a job. Select UPGRADE.

8313.NAME: Overseer palmtree
8313.DESCRIPTION: These palms have a difficult life, long hours, physical labor. Help them.

8314.NAME: Tired palmtree
8314.DESCRIPTION: These palmtrees are regretting quitting education. Hug them, comfort them.

8315.NAME: Wited palmtrees
8315.DESCRIPTION: These palmtrees are a bit smarter, thus the job will be better. Select UPGRADE.

8316.NAME: Career path
8316.DESCRIPTION: Eager work and effort will help them grow. Help the palmtrees climb the work ladder.

8317.NAME: Top palmtrees
8317.DESCRIPTION: This is highest possition available, help palmtrees hire underlings. Hug the palmtrees.

8318.NAME: Palmtree abilities
8318.DESCRIPTION: The most excelent palmtrees have lot of options in life. Select UPGRADE.

8319.NAME: Successful palm
8319.DESCRIPTION: Nothing comes for free, a big chunk of hard work will pay off. Work until you succeed.

832.NAME: Improve the lighthouse
832.DESCRIPTION: Improve the frame of the lighthouse, using the emerald

8320.NAME: Abundant palm
8320.DESCRIPTION: Palmtree has a goal and plamtree will get it. This task can be done by finishing magistrate degree.

8321.NAME: Next generation
8321.DESCRIPTION: Find in your backpacks plant section next generation plamtrees and plant them in fields. If you went ahead of time, you must finish another career.

8322.NAME: Iron barrel
8322.DESCRIPTION: Carrying iron armor is tiring. Prepare wine cellar, build three months worth of wine barrels.

8323.NAME: Iron chicken
8323.DESCRIPTION: Eggs help you grow muscles, and muscles will definitely be needed. Feed adult chicken.

8324.NAME: Iron chili
8324.DESCRIPTION: Mount your iron steed - tractor and challenge the red, hot dragon that is chili. Collect chili.

8325.NAME: Iron horns
8325.DESCRIPTION: Head butting again, and again, and again. That's called training. Sell adult goats.

8326.NAME: Iron busehs
8326.DESCRIPTION: Move your hands pick fruits from following bushes: Blueberry, desert Aloe and Camel thorns, also lemons.

8327.NAME: Iron bath
8327.DESCRIPTION: Peasants can wash in a creek, your status demands a hot tub (jakuzzi). Build hot tubs.

8328.NAME: Iron guests
8328.DESCRIPTION: What can i say except, oh, no! There goes my bricks that were intended for a clay fortress. Build guest houses.

8329.NAME: Lead fuel
8329.DESCRIPTION: Feed your mighty steed, hand in gasoline.

833.NAME: Build the lighthouse
833.DESCRIPTION: Finish building the 3rd stage of the frame

8330.NAME: Iron eggs
8330.DESCRIPTION: Very, very, very large chicken. That is what happens when you grow big and strong. Feed adult ostriches.

834.NAME: Reputation for emeralds
834.DESCRIPTION: Gather more reputation to get emeralds

8340.NAME: Big waves
8340.DESCRIPTION: Your raft is constantly being pushed ashore. Craft ropes to put on a bigger sail.

8341.NAME: Stopping by
8341.DESCRIPTION: You will have to make a hook. Travel to Fest island before you visit Wave isle.

8342.NAME: Rest midway
8342.DESCRIPTION: You are accompanied by your loyal dogs. Feed adult dogs on Fest isle.

8343.NAME: Meteo service
8343.DESCRIPTION: Build an antenna to analyse  sea currents. Locate in shop and build Meteo station.

8344.NAME: Data experts
8344.DESCRIPTION: Who said sheep are dumb? Teach the sheep to interpret weather forecast data.

8345.NAME: Long notes
8345.DESCRIPTION: Sheep have no agility with their feet. Collect planks for sheep to scribe on.

8346.NAME: Emptying the bay A
8346.DESCRIPTION: To locate starfish empty the sea bed at your home location. Go fishing on Atafu isle.

8347.NAME: Emptying the bay B
8347.DESCRIPTION: Fish on Fest isle and check the sea floor for starfishes.

8348.NAME: Emptying the bay C
8348.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps Wave island? Go fishing, see if any statfishes bite.

8349.NAME: Reflection
8349.DESCRIPTION: Simultaneously have 36 wheat fields to reflect sun and make perfect weather conditions.

8350.NAME: Experts on isle
8350.DESCRIPTION: While you work sheep keep bothering you. Annoying. Sell sheep, drive them back to Wave isle.

8351.NAME: Build a pond
8351.DESCRIPTION: Sheep recommend modeling the waves in local setting. Build any pond.

8352.NAME: Duck scouts
8352.DESCRIPTION: Starfishes are shy, feed your Mandarin ducks and task them to search the isle.

8353.NAME: Clay rocks
8353.DESCRIPTION: Check the hole in the ground, empty clay pit, perhaps starfishes are there.

8354.NAME: Medusas can fly
8354.DESCRIPTION: Waves have summoned very active medusae. Catch them when they fly by.

8355.NAME: Thorny star
8355.DESCRIPTION: Could special thorns be the cause of big waves? Poke both wave types and compare

8356.NAME: Sweet scent
8356.DESCRIPTION: Starfishes  are still nowhere to be seen. Plant flowers with alluring scent.

8357.NAME: Sheep insist
8357.DESCRIPTION: Antenna needs power. Chop trees and feed the antenna some heat power.

8358.NAME: Earthworm fishing
8358.DESCRIPTION: Data informs you that large amount of fishing is expected. Dig fields to find worms.

8359.NAME: Go fishing!!!
8359.DESCRIPTION: Cast the fishing rod in to Fest isles waters, check what's new in lobster gully.

836.NAME: Feeding sheep for emeralds
836.DESCRIPTION: Feed any kind of sheep or lambs on your island.

8360.NAME: Comb coralls
8360.DESCRIPTION: Use foam pearls to check the suspicious corals that can be purchased from the shop.

8361.NAME: Rusty hinges
8361.DESCRIPTION: Moaning diving suit has been washed ashore. Locate it in shop and break open the suit.

8362.NAME: Bird migration
8362.DESCRIPTION: Your raft was used by some Mandarin ducks, now that they arrived they want to be fed some more.

8363.NAME: Small incident
8363.DESCRIPTION: Right... ! The aroma flowers tend to eat their pray. Poke the flowers until they release the fish. Have 20 freed fishes at the same time.

8364.NAME: Silly carrot
8364.DESCRIPTION: Harvest carrot fields, since sheep tend to slack off and eat them instead of working.

8365.NAME: Diver Delta
8365.DESCRIPTION: Your old acquaintance switched to diving hobby. Trade foam pearls for a story. Select UPGRADE.

8366.NAME: Underwater bees
8366.DESCRIPTION: Deep under water Delta found sunken beehives, that were used by special type of bees. Check shop and place them.

8367.NAME: Bad weather
8367.DESCRIPTION: Use meteo station and determine the arrival of the next storm.

8368.NAME: Sleepy bees
8368.DESCRIPTION: During storm bees sleep, perhaps you can call storm by singing lullaby? Use Foam hive.

8369.NAME: Air divers
8369.DESCRIPTION: I hope you kept your flying fishes? They are prone on finding trouble. Poke the happy fishes.

8370.NAME: Fish the stars
8370.DESCRIPTION: You need starfish? I left my collected sack down below. Try fishing, perhaps that will help.

8371.NAME: Safe diving
8371.DESCRIPTION: Scold Mick for being a dare-devil. Show how Delta does diving. Buy and open another diving suit.

8372.NAME: Duck scolding
8372.DESCRIPTION: You have no time to scold. Delegate the task to Mandarin ducks. Feed Mandarin ducks.

8373.NAME: Medusa, medusa
8373.DESCRIPTION: Clean the air. In other words catch flying medusas.

8374.NAME: Clean water
8374.DESCRIPTION: Check how lobsters are doing. Tell them to tidy up, go fishing.

8375.NAME: Tidying the land
8375.DESCRIPTION: Poke sea-stones (check shop) and clean the land Fest isle.

8376.NAME: Bugs in corrals
8376.DESCRIPTION: Collect small bugs off corrals (check shop) do not let ducks eat them.

8377.NAME: Duck yum-yum
8377.DESCRIPTION: Mandarin ducks are hungry, feed them so they would not harm other creatures.

8378.NAME: Protect bees
8378.DESCRIPTION: Sell Foam hives in order to protect them from hungry ducks

8380.NAME: Simple fishing
8380.DESCRIPTION: Nothing special here, this coast is just like any other. Demonstrate by fishing.

8381.NAME: Jay ornament
8381.DESCRIPTION: Rainbow Delta wishes to check on your roosters, seems that someone will get plucked. Collect Jay feathers.

8382.NAME: Dinner star
8382.DESCRIPTION: If you wish to persuade Delta for a star you need to treat her to dinner. Harvest onions.

8383.NAME: Native curiousity
8383.DESCRIPTION: Help out three out of five divers. By doing so natives will gift you a sea-foam hive.

8384.NAME: Ask your friens
8384.DESCRIPTION: If not on this island, perhaps on another? Visit friends and check their beaches.

8385.NAME: Count your stars
8385.DESCRIPTION: Not a single interesting star? Move some stars on your isle.

8386.NAME: Autumn fur
8386.DESCRIPTION: Some leaves can be collected by feeding cats or foxes. This quest requires only the special foxes.

8387.NAME: Red autumn
8387.DESCRIPTION: The second leaf spot is in tomatoes and bean fields. For this quest only tomato fields count.

8388.NAME: Falling leaves
8388.DESCRIPTION: Shake the small autumn tree to get leaves. Tall palms provide same leaves but do not count for this task.

8389.NAME: Fine thread
8389.DESCRIPTION: Wool thread is too thick for handling leaves. Open workshop and make fine thread.

839.NAME: Sugar manufacturer
839.DESCRIPTION: Make 50 units of sugar in the workshop

8390.NAME: Autumn fall
8390.DESCRIPTION: Collect more autumn leaves. We recommend getting all leaves in same quantities and also advise not using the shop option.

8391.NAME: Arranging leafs
8391.DESCRIPTION: Build multiple sorting stations so that natives can help you sort leafs.

8392.NAME: Sort leafs
8392.DESCRIPTION: Use sorting stations to get best leaves for the crown.

8393.NAME: Green leaves
8393.DESCRIPTION: For green color use the aromatic autumn shrubbery (item 3612). Plant shrubs from shop and collect the leaves.

8394.NAME: Trees become red
8394.DESCRIPTION: Plant the big autumn tree (item 3601) and shake it down to get some autumn leaves.

8395.NAME: Sorting the sorted
8395.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade sorting station and use the tree house to re-sort the leaves.

8396.NAME: Washed up roses
8396.DESCRIPTION: By adding sun droplets leaves sprout berries. Collect sun droplets from roses that are washed up on Fest or Wave island.

8397.NAME: Making the crown
8397.DESCRIPTION: Caution! Do this quest only after you do the other two. Use the workshop to tie leaves with fine ropes.

84.NAME: Build the new fireplace
84.DESCRIPTION: Gather resources and build the plank era fireplace to increase your maximum energy

840.NAME: Improve the lighthouse
840.DESCRIPTION: Improve the frame of the lighthouse, using the emerald

8400.NAME: Seal's worries
8400.DESCRIPTION: Nemo is crying, there has been an accident. Calm down the ghost seal, bake corn pies and feed them to the seal.

8401.NAME: Heat underground
8401.DESCRIPTION: The stove that Nemo used was left un-attended. Collect large amount of water to cool the stove.

8402.NAME: Ghost fire in workshop
8402.DESCRIPTION:
(item 1444 = Vaiduoklio šviesa)
All decorations melted, sniff, you will need ghost fires to melt the wax, sniff, sniff. Use workshop to get ghost lights.

8403.NAME: Cage of fear
8403.DESCRIPTION: Don't worry, i gave such a name to the underground just to spook people. Visit the island!

8404.NAME: Melting the wreckage
8404.DESCRIPTION: Peel as much as you want using only hands will not help. Use ghost fire to re-melt wax chaoss.

8405.NAME: Ice in the stove
8405.DESCRIPTION: It's just like with firewood, only reversed. Nemo does not know thermo-dynamics. Fill the stove with ice.

8406.NAME: Melt with fire
8406.DESCRIPTION: There is no place to set a foot, and trust me, you will need all the free space. Clean up wax chaoss.

8407.NAME: Wax of the past
8407.DESCRIPTION: Nemo tries to draw some shapes in the air, old decors looked like this, and that. Build present wax decorations or new wax candles.

8408.NAME: Crazy stove
8408.DESCRIPTION: Right click on stove and select UPGRADE. Cool down the stove to a peaceful temperature.

8409.NAME: Spooky magic
8409.DESCRIPTION: Water in the stove has turned in to oil. Collect it!

841.NAME: Build the lighthouse
841.DESCRIPTION: Finish building the 4th stage of the frame

8410.NAME: Wax house
8410.DESCRIPTION: Check the shop, Nemo has decided to first build a wax decoration resembling a cottage.

8411.NAME: Pumpkin magic
8411.DESCRIPTION: Spooky stuff always has pumpkins, grow some.

8412.NAME: Corn fear
8412.DESCRIPTION: Scarecrows sit in corn fields, scary! Harvest corn.

8413.NAME: Onion terror
8413.DESCRIPTION: The dark onions know how to bring tears of pain to your eyes. Harvest them.

8414.NAME: Stools for inspiration
8414.DESCRIPTION: The thinker needs to sit down and think of a good wax design. Build stools.

8415.NAME: Large houses
8415.DESCRIPTION: Stove keeps producing oil and does no longer need firewood. Sell firewood shacks.

8416.NAME: Purple webbing
8416.DESCRIPTION: Find purple bushes and decorate to get the Halloween feeling. Build some from store.

8417.NAME: Chicken transformation
8417.DESCRIPTION: Let us analyse chickens. Feed grown chicken.

8418.NAME: Pig transformation
8418.DESCRIPTION: Measure and sell grown pigs, write down the observations.

8419.NAME: Goat transformation
8419.DESCRIPTION: Simultaneously keep plenty of grown goats in the horrid cave.

842.NAME: Reputation for anemerald
842.DESCRIPTION: Gather more reputation to get the emerald

8420.NAME: Simple design
8420.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps the form is not perfect, but it is very practical. Build more wax houses.

8421.NAME: 666 uses
8421.DESCRIPTION: Arrange the wax chaos in some way. Spend spooky wax.

8422.NAME: Fire for oil
8422.DESCRIPTION: Nemo has emptied the stove a little to help you out, swap 120 ghost fires with him and you will receive some oil.

8423.NAME: Wax coffins
8423.DESCRIPTION: Vampire theme? Let us build coffins. Check the shop.

8424.NAME: Spookein friend
8424.DESCRIPTION: Call Spookein friend over for a visit, to set the mood. Build proper tables for him.

8425.NAME: Glow mushrooms
8425.DESCRIPTION: Nemo fears bats, so let us stick with other underground things like mushrooms. Find the big box and unpack the mushrooms.

8426.NAME: Withered roses
8426.DESCRIPTION: Clip spooky roses, if you lack such roses check the shop and plant some more.

8427.NAME: Trees memories
8427.DESCRIPTION: This place holds memories of dead trees. Plant autumn trees and unmask them, have simultaneously several dead trees.

8428.NAME: Wax eyes
8428.DESCRIPTION: Plant and polish the wax eyeballs until they grow roots.

8429.NAME: Wax frogs
8429.DESCRIPTION: Feed wax frogs. Don't waste resources, first check how many frogs are enough.

8430.NAME: Ghost rabbits
8430.DESCRIPTION: Ghost rabbits are hiding, feed ghost rabbits, to find them you will need to first feed regular rabbits.

8431.NAME: Griffins cowards
8431.DESCRIPTION: Wax griffins have no spark of courage. Buff the statues and encourage them to fly and haunt. Sell fiery griffins.

8432.NAME: Cultivate eyes
8432.DESCRIPTION: Polish more eyeballs to state of perfectly sprouted roots.

8433.NAME: Hungry frogs
8433.DESCRIPTION: Get rid of the wax by feeding the frogs some more. Both adult and young frogs will count.

8434.NAME: Nail the coffins
8434.DESCRIPTION: Nice design, let's stick to it. Build more wax coffins.

8435.NAME: Spooky feeding
8435.DESCRIPTION: Choose who to feed, feed ether griffins or spooky rabbits.

8436.NAME: Roses or trees
8436.DESCRIPTION: Clip the shrubs in a more scary fashion cut ether roses or dead trees.

8437.NAME: Mushroom tables
8437.DESCRIPTION: Spookein friend has climbed the mushroom. Build more mushrooms or proper tables.

8438.NAME: Spirit of plants
8438.DESCRIPTION: Put an ear against the ground and listen, earth wishes to haunt. Harvest onions pumpkins or corn.

8439.NAME: Animals on their own
8439.DESCRIPTION: The animals you brought over got hungry. Feed baby chicken baby pigs or baby goats.

8440.NAME: Spooky stool
8440.DESCRIPTION: Ghosts took a liking in possessing stools and flying around. Use building action on more stools or purple bushes.

8441.NAME: Sam Spookein
8441.DESCRIPTION: Ride on backs of goats is romantic, sell grown goats.

8442.NAME: Sibill Spookein
8442.DESCRIPTION: Bloody read roses on black stems, gracious and very deadly. Harvest spooky bushes.

8443.NAME: Goof
8443.DESCRIPTION: Butler Goof is busy preparing for the spooky feast. Help him collect the dinner guests - goblins.

8447.NAME: Cat surprise
8447.DESCRIPTION: Don't worry about it, cats will turn back once the event is over. Feed adult cats.

8448.NAME: Trimming the palmtrees
8448.DESCRIPTION: Cut any fully grown three-branch palmtrees. If you don't have any, you can get instant palmtrees in the underground.

8449.NAME: Bowl of candy
8449.DESCRIPTION: Purchase one candy bowl, once 13 guests have visited, or once you have done some quests select UPGRADE with right mouse button.

845.NAME: Mechanism
845.DESCRIPTION: Make the mechanism of the lighthouse. You can find it in the workshop section UNIQUE.

8450.NAME: Silver alergy
8450.DESCRIPTION: Nemo is all white and does not reflect in silver. Collect bronze doubloons to make bronze mirrors.

8451.NAME: Guest house
8451.DESCRIPTION: Find suspicious discovery in shop and build the house for Nemo ghostly guests.

8452.NAME: Suspicious discovery
8452.DESCRIPTION: While tidying up, you find a hidden compartment. Poke the strange temple.

8453.NAME: Secrets of the house
8453.DESCRIPTION: Keep cleaning, don't be surprised that initial work does not count for progress. Discover more suspicious things.

8454.NAME: Bone celebration
8454.DESCRIPTION: Some guests do have physical body, help with the physical luggage, collect bones.

8455.NAME: Spooky chaos
8455.DESCRIPTION: Look in the shops flower section and let loose the ghost butterflies.

8456.NAME: Party ghost (spirit)
8456.DESCRIPTION: Ghost are preparing a huge party, if you select UPGRADE for the house, the party will start in earnest.

8457.NAME: Crazy bushes
8457.DESCRIPTION: Poke the bushes and anything that comes afterwards until you reach the wax ending.

8458.NAME: Crazy bushes
8458.DESCRIPTION: Poke the bushes and anything that comes afterwards until you reach the wax ending.

8459.NAME: Crazy bushes
8459.DESCRIPTION: Poke the bushes and anything that comes afterwards until you reach the wax ending.

846.NAME: Hot tub for engineer Jarno
846.DESCRIPTION: Jarno is planning to buy a hot tub. Sell a clay pool.

847.NAME: Meerkats for Jarno's wife
847.DESCRIPTION: Buy and sell grown-up meerkats to Jarno's wife

848.NAME: Flour for Jarno
848.DESCRIPTION: Jarno wants to make a big pretzel. Submit flour units (you can grind flour in the mill)

849.NAME: Improve the lighthouse
849.DESCRIPTION: Improve the lighthouse to its mechanization stage, using the emerald.

85.NAME: Complete the new fireplace
85.DESCRIPTION: Gather resources and complete the new fireplace to increase your maximum energy and start burning coal

850.NAME: Mechanize the lighthouse
850.DESCRIPTION: Build the next stage of the lighthouse and finish it, using the motor you made.

851.NAME: Reputation for emerald
851.DESCRIPTION: Gain enough reputation for an emerald

8520.NAME: Water buffalo
8520.DESCRIPTION: Feed cows, crocodile or elephants and see what happens.

8521.NAME: Sea horse
8521.DESCRIPTION: Feed antelopes, horses, zebras or dogs and gather diving supplies.

8522.NAME: Bird caviar
8522.DESCRIPTION: These animals will come in handy in snorkeling quests. Feed sheep, ostriches or bats.

8523.NAME: Go snorkeling
8523.DESCRIPTION: Gathering is planed at eagle totem. Click on the totem then go diving.

8524.NAME: Explore depths
8524.DESCRIPTION: So much to see, spend snorkeling masks any way possible.

8525.NAME: Trade pumpkins
8525.DESCRIPTION: Masks are shipped from abroad. Plant pumpkins to cover expenses.

8526.NAME: Collect sickles
8526.DESCRIPTION: Build any storages and collect sickles. Trading tool for a tool is a good deal.

8527.NAME: Rooster feathers
8527.DESCRIPTION: Sell grown roosters, their feathers are on high demand, and you need those masks.

8528.NAME: Petting fishes
8528.DESCRIPTION: Colorful fishes all around, catch some of them.

8529.NAME: Other areas
8529.DESCRIPTION: Check more of the underwater world, spend masks while diving.

8530.NAME: Trim grass
8530.DESCRIPTION: Turik will not be gardening any time soon. Trim his lawn.

8531.NAME: Chop bushes
8531.DESCRIPTION: Chop any three-branch (split-branch) palmtree. Improve the lawn by removing the shrubs.

8532.NAME: Plant beans
8532.DESCRIPTION: Let Turik enjoy the simple bean blossoms. Harvest bean fields.

8533.NAME: Catch the fish
8533.DESCRIPTION: While diving deeper more fish come in view, catch the spawning fishes.

8534.NAME: Maneuvers in riff
8534.DESCRIPTION: This time you have to squeeze trough narrow passages. Remove underwater rocks.

8535.NAME: Carrots for sale
8535.DESCRIPTION: Carrot sticks go well with sushi. Harvest carrots.

8536.NAME: Egg rolls
8536.DESCRIPTION: Trough conversation you find out that sushi shop needs more eggs. Collect eggs.

8537.NAME: Trading fishes
8537.DESCRIPTION: Check your backpack and sell exotic fishes you caught in the riff.

8538.NAME: Fast swiming
8538.DESCRIPTION: Natives suggest a race on who can pet more fishes. Find more fishes.

8539.NAME: Water anemone (Plukė)
8539.DESCRIPTION: This confuses me, what are these spring flowers doing here? Pluck some flowers.

854.NAME: Upgrade lighthouse
854.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade lighthouse to its next stage

8540.NAME: Violetiniai stiebai
8540.DESCRIPTION: While at it pluck some weeds as well. Tear out any Violetiniai stiebai.

8541.NAME: Beans are done
8541.DESCRIPTION: Turik is happy to see bean blossoms, now harvest them please. Harvest beans.

8542.NAME: Harvesting onions
8542.DESCRIPTION: Please grow onions in spaces you cleared from beans, as you can see it would be difficult for me.

8543.NAME: Post office masks
8543.DESCRIPTION: Turik received the mask shipment he made long ago. Build some WC's and you can have the masks.

8544.NAME: Lobster level
8544.DESCRIPTION: This deep down you see your old friends. Say hello to lobsters, give them a handshake.

8545.NAME: More obstacles
8545.DESCRIPTION: Violetiniai stiebai are thick here. Chop trough to make way for the next dive

8546.NAME: Cat eye view
8546.DESCRIPTION: Cats can see in darkness, offer them to become snorkeling guides. Feed cats.

8547.NAME: Carrot vitamins
8547.DESCRIPTION: Sweet potatoes and carrots have lots of vitamin A. Harvest them.

8548.NAME: Pirate guides
8548.DESCRIPTION: Some shiny turtles can be found in far regions of Oceania. Collect Rūko kriauklė with its fogy shine.

8549.NAME: Deepwater turtles
8549.DESCRIPTION: Oh, these must be the turtles! Hug some turtles.

855.NAME: Build lighthouse
855.DESCRIPTION: Build lighthouse and finish its stage

8550.NAME: Illuminate the unknown
8550.DESCRIPTION: Spend snorkeling masks in any way and recheck water world around you.

8551.NAME: Onions ready
8551.DESCRIPTION: Thanks for the onions, i'm salivating just by thinking of them. Harvest onions

8552.NAME: Rabbit on tree
8552.DESCRIPTION: Failing to supervise his pets, Turiks bunnies jupmped on top of the trees. Feed bunnies.

8553.NAME: Crowsn nest
8553.DESCRIPTION: After climbing the tree you see crows nest full of masks and feathers of other birds. Collect jay or parrot feathers.

8554.NAME: Deepwater turtles
8554.DESCRIPTION: Pet the shiny turtles, arrange them for better illumination of the stage.

8555.NAME: Lobster jury
8555.DESCRIPTION: Pet lobsters, the independent jury of the water dances.

8556.NAME: Small helpers
8556.DESCRIPTION: Pet puffer fish, parrot fish or squids. Persuade them to sit in neat rows.

8557.NAME: Move shards
8557.DESCRIPTION: Fishes helped to clear the depths and made a decent pile of stones. Collect stone shards.

8558.NAME: Silt harvest (dumblas)
8558.DESCRIPTION: Large green mass rolled together. Wash this gift from fishes with water. Use well or Gružlių užutekis.

8559.NAME: Train your memory
8559.DESCRIPTION: Let's see if you still remember which animals give masks. Feed those animals.

856.NAME: Lightbulb
856.DESCRIPTION: Go to workshop UNIQUE section and craft lighthouse bulb

8560.NAME: Refill oxygen
8560.DESCRIPTION: Try refiling your oxygen by using underwater bubbles.

8561.NAME: Turtle effort
8561.DESCRIPTION: Hug the turtles, they put an effort to clear the air streams.

8562.NAME: Lobster effort
8562.DESCRIPTION: Lobster also helped on air supply project. Hug lobsters.

8563.NAME: Three fishes
8563.DESCRIPTION: Time to say goodby. Hug puffer fish parrot fish or squid.

8564.NAME: Lobsters and turtles
8564.DESCRIPTION: Hug your dear deepwater friends. Wave goodbye to lobsters and turles.

8565.NAME: Flower field
8565.DESCRIPTION: Last stroll trough water flowers. Pluck some purple shrubs or anemone flowers.

8566.NAME: Fantastic flowers
8566.DESCRIPTION: There are three special flowers, bring fishes to them. You can check your fish amounts using ship steering wheel.

8567.NAME: Exploring depths
8567.DESCRIPTION:
Explore underwater depths, this time focus on:
Calamari, anemones, lobsters, turtles.

8568.NAME: Trading fishes
8568.DESCRIPTION: Let us trade one fish for another, i'll throw in a single lobster as a bonus. Will you trade parrotfishes for stingrays?

8569.NAME: Exploring depths
8569.DESCRIPTION:
Explore underwater depths, this time focus on:
Rocks, purple bushes, lobsters and turtles.

857.NAME: Bars for lightbulb
857.DESCRIPTION: Go to workshop UNIQUE section and craft light-bulb bars

8570.NAME: Trading fishes
8570.DESCRIPTION: Let us trade one fish for another, i'll throw in a single lobster as a bonus. Will you trade pufferfishes for catfishes?

8571.NAME: Exploring depths
8571.DESCRIPTION:
Explore underwater depths, this time focus on:
Parrotfish, puffer fish, rocks and purple bushes.

8572.NAME: Trading fishes
8572.DESCRIPTION: Let us trade one fish for another, i'll throw in a single lobster as a bonus. Will you trade calamari for moray?

8573.NAME: Exploring depths
8573.DESCRIPTION:
Explore underwater depths, this time focus on:
Puffer fish, calamari, lobsters and purple bushes.

8574.NAME: Trading fishes
8574.DESCRIPTION: Let us trade one fish for another, i'll throw in a single lobster as a bonus. Will you trade seahorses for siamese fishes?

8575.NAME: Exploring depths
8575.DESCRIPTION:
Explore underwater depths, this time focus on:
Anemones, calamari, parrotfishes, pufferfishes.

8576.NAME: Trading fishes
8576.DESCRIPTION: Let us trade one fish for another, i'll throw in a single lobster as a bonus. Will you trade stingrays for parrotfishes?

8577.NAME: Exploring depths
8577.DESCRIPTION:
Explore underwater depths, this time focus on:
Rocks, anemones, pufferfishs and lobsters.

8578.NAME: Trading fishes
8578.DESCRIPTION: Let us trade one fish for another, i'll throw in a single lobster as a bonus. Will you trade catfishes for pufferfishes?

8579.NAME: Exploring depths
8579.DESCRIPTION:
Explore underwater depths, this time focus on:
Parrotfishes, purple bushes, turtles or calamari.

8580.NAME: Trading fishes
8580.DESCRIPTION: Let us trade one fish for another, i'll throw in a single lobster as a bonus. Will you trade moray for calamari?

8581.NAME: Exploring depths
8581.DESCRIPTION:
Explore underwater depths, this time focus on:
Anemones and rocks, parrotfishes and turtles.

8582.NAME: Trading fishes
8582.DESCRIPTION: Let us trade one fish for another, i'll throw in a single lobster as a bonus. Will you trade Siamese fish for seahorse?

8583.NAME: Catching lobsters
8583.DESCRIPTION: To finish this task you will need to do Lobster daily qust 5 times, this means, collect 30 lobsters.

8590.NAME: Snow attractions
8590.DESCRIPTION: Look, the winter star shines the way! Visit the winter island.

8591.NAME: Shoot the firecracker
8591.DESCRIPTION: A spark warms your heart, thus warming your hands. In workshop make a firecracker, than shoot it.

8592.NAME: Provide warmth
8592.DESCRIPTION: To work on this island you will need mittens. Find mitten stall in the shop, and get some mittens.

8593.NAME: Thunderous wonder
8593.DESCRIPTION: Ring the bell after you have done the mitten task. You can find the bell inside the shop.

8594.NAME: Grandiose digging
8594.DESCRIPTION: While working on the island this task will finish on its own netting you small goodies.

8595.NAME: Chopping trees
8595.DESCRIPTION: This task will net you some goodies as well, but, since it is smaller, the amount will be smaller as well.

8596.NAME: Fish talk
8596.DESCRIPTION: The aquarium fish is cold and it wants to go home. Select UPGRADE on the aquarium to free the path.

8597.NAME: Spend mittens
8597.DESCRIPTION: Snow, grass, bushes, everything is frozen. Spend some mittens.

8598.NAME: Ring the sky
8598.DESCRIPTION: Choose eastern or western sky and ring the bell upon reaching it.

8599.NAME: Find the red
8599.DESCRIPTION: Dig out the little trees with the tiny red hats.

86.NAME: Upgrade the water hole
86.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the water hole to a plank well to increase your maximum energy. The well must be empty before you begin upgrading it

8600.NAME: Find the purple
8600.DESCRIPTION: Dig out the little trees with the tiny purple hats

8601.NAME: Find the green
8601.DESCRIPTION: Dig out the little trees with the tiny green hats.

8602.NAME: Find spirits
8602.DESCRIPTION: Grass is an excellent choice for a digging guide-line. Find winter spirits hiding in the grass.

8603.NAME: Find reindeers
8603.DESCRIPTION: There are total of nine winter spirits and nine reindeers on the island. Find six deers.

8604.NAME: Find pear
8604.DESCRIPTION: There are seven pear bushes, while this task needs you to uncover only three, you should find more.

8605.NAME: Collect pear
8605.DESCRIPTION: Pears grow slowly and they will be needed for many island tasks. Collect some pears.

8606.NAME: Ice plants
8606.DESCRIPTION: Does not matter how you dived the building actions among the three palmtrees. Hammer the ice sculptures six times.

8607.NAME: Ice trees
8607.DESCRIPTION: Finish building one ice palmtree statue. Each stage will require of you different building matterials.

8608.NAME: Eastern sky
8608.DESCRIPTION: To finish this task you will need to do other quests winter isles. Light up the aurora borealis on the east side.

8609.NAME: Western sky
8609.DESCRIPTION: To finish this task you will need to do other quests winter isles. Light up the aurora borealis on the west side.

8610.NAME: Improve the hats
8610.DESCRIPTION: Little trees got cold so they covered themselves. Select UPGRADE upon any hat-trees.

8611.NAME: Collect party hats
8611.DESCRIPTION: These hats will come in handy even after this task. Collect the cone-shaped party hats.

8612.NAME: Double joy
8612.DESCRIPTION: This decoration has brought joy long time ago in Oceania. Finish the second Ice palmtree.

8613.NAME: Tripple joy
8613.DESCRIPTION: Did you notice that sooner or latter most things are movable on this island? Build the third sculpture.

8614.NAME: Sky runners
8614.DESCRIPTION: Feed reindeers and winter spirits and collect winter postcartds.

8615.NAME: Fix the sleigh
8615.DESCRIPTION: The reindeers are so fast that they need counter weight. Finish building sleighs.

8617.NAME: Snowy nuts
8617.DESCRIPTION: Collect the nuts that will drop from the sky and you will recieve a small prize.

8619.NAME: Dancing green
8619.DESCRIPTION: Find and work with exactly ONE suspicious snow heap, transform it multiple times until you get green bug.

8620.NAME: Snow diversity
8620.DESCRIPTION: Check out all the different types of snow heaps. Poke ANY suspicious snow heap, but for now, ignore the things you uncover.

8621.NAME: Tiger dynasty
8621.DESCRIPTION: Cat is a proud member of the tiger family (or vice versa) Purchase in shop a cat, get it to tiger stage, then sell it.

8622.NAME: Gray stripes
8622.DESCRIPTION: Carefully feed the kittens, keep 15 gray striped kittens simultaneously.

8623.NAME: Different tempo
8623.DESCRIPTION: After fireworks cubs need to sleep. Sell New year's (lion) cubs.

8624.NAME: Dance with the green
8624.DESCRIPTION: Grab the green bug by his claw and star spinning in a dance.

8625.NAME: Dancing space
8625.DESCRIPTION: Sell palmtrees, since they hinder your dance.

8626.NAME: Dancing native
8626.DESCRIPTION: Conga line dance! Make sure you have 10 dancing natives on the isle.

8627.NAME: Tigers at home.
8627.DESCRIPTION: Feed and honor your home islands cats, cheetahs or lions.

8628.NAME: Ice cats
8628.DESCRIPTION: Find ice sculpture in the shop and build several ice kittens.

8629.NAME: Cheetah clothes
8629.DESCRIPTION: Cheetahs run fast but arrive late. Purchase cheetahs and feed them.

8630.NAME: Celebration goat
8630.DESCRIPTION: Gossip about how untimely is an x-mas goat decoration for new years party. Poke the goat.

8631.NAME: Red surprise
8631.DESCRIPTION: Great, just what the green bug wanted, a red bug! Upgrade sleigh then dance with the red bug.

8632.NAME: New sleigh
8632.DESCRIPTION: Since all the sleighs are gone looking for red bugs, build some more sleighs.

8633.NAME: Choose a prize!
8633.DESCRIPTION: You can only get ONE prize from the workshop. If you lack prize tokens, poke some more New year's guests.

8634.NAME: Even more nutty
8634.DESCRIPTION: Collect even MORE nuts, don't worry, you will truly need them.

8635.NAME: This is nuts
8635.DESCRIPTION: Spend some nuts to lure squirs on to your island, buy the squirl statues, and then... FEED the statues or squirls.

8636.NAME: Black and white
8636.DESCRIPTION: Birch is a tree that resembles cows standing vertically. Feed calves and cows.

8637.NAME: What is birch
8637.DESCRIPTION: What kind of a tree looks white all year around? Collect bones as white as the birch trees.

8638.NAME: Forest knowlage
8638.DESCRIPTION: Dust off the dendrology books and gain forest knowledge. Use workshop.

8639.NAME: Visit the isle
8639.DESCRIPTION: Hop on board and visit Birch island.

864.NAME: Reputation for emerald
864.DESCRIPTION: Gain enough reputation for an emerald

8640.NAME: Clear path
8640.DESCRIPTION: Island has only animal size paths, clear the bushes, make your own paths.

8641.NAME: Clearing
8641.DESCRIPTION: Widen the cleared area by chopping down birch trees.

8642.NAME: Hoofs
8642.DESCRIPTION: Find the owners of these hoof prints, feed these animals.

8643.NAME: Wild ducks
8643.DESCRIPTION: These are definitely duck feathers. Find and feed forest ducks.

8644.NAME: Soft prints
8644.DESCRIPTION: This is not a cat, the animal has some hiding spots in desert trees, feed these animals.

8645.NAME: Forest house
8645.DESCRIPTION: The far side of the island has a structure, if fixed it would serve as a house.

8646.NAME: Security
8646.DESCRIPTION: To keep forest animals off your carrot fields, mend the fences.

8647.NAME: Fireplace
8647.DESCRIPTION: Try finding the fireplace that is obscured by trees, light it!

8648.NAME: Russulas
8648.DESCRIPTION: Red and white, these mushrooms could make the forest pigs happy.

8649.NAME: Chanterelles
8649.DESCRIPTION: If you wait, some new chanterelles will eventually grow. Pick them up.

865.NAME: Grow roosters
865.DESCRIPTION: Grow and sell some grown-up roosters

8650.NAME: Boletus
8650.DESCRIPTION: Find some boletus mushrooms. Or ordinary mushrooms.

8651.NAME: D-D-Duck
8651.DESCRIPTION: The quacking in the dark does not scare you any more. Feed regular or forest ducks.

8652.NAME: P-P-Pigs
8652.DESCRIPTION: Strange how perceptions shifts once you grow accustom to wild things. Feed the wild pigs.

8653.NAME: Shifty martins
8653.DESCRIPTION: Pine martins mess around and disappear behind the nearest tree. Feed pine martins.

8654.NAME: Fish-ordinary
8654.DESCRIPTION: Fish in well known locations. Shark spot can be seen from afar.

8655.NAME: Hidden fishing spots
8655.DESCRIPTION: There are some hidden fishing spots on this island, find them!

8656.NAME: Hissing fishing
8656.DESCRIPTION: Normal bait just won't cut it this time, use ants on the hook and try to fish again.

8657.NAME: Other bushes
8657.DESCRIPTION: Clear some more shrubbery or trees. Pumpkins do not count and they will not be used at all.

8658.NAME: Dog hearding
8658.DESCRIPTION: Guard the island with guard dogs, hire them. Sell fully grown dogs.

8659.NAME: Cutting the grass
8659.DESCRIPTION: Sheep can mow the local lawn with their flat, sharp teeth. Feed sheeps.

8660.NAME: Forest bear
8660.DESCRIPTION: Convince the bears in a friendly fashion to relocate to another island. Sell bears.

8661.NAME: Local inhabitants
8661.DESCRIPTION: Feed more martins, forest ducks or pigs.

8662.NAME: Hedgehog group
8662.DESCRIPTION: The little guys are shy, and only when they are simultaneously 12 on the island they dare to speak up.

8663.NAME: Bird house
8663.DESCRIPTION: Make new nesting spots, make some new bird houses for birds to use.

8664.NAME: Forest foxes
8664.DESCRIPTION: Foxes steal duck eggs, catch them, feed foxes and little foxes.

8665.NAME: Deep waters
8665.DESCRIPTION: Go deeper in to the water, maybe the catch will improve? Fish in any spot on this island.

8666.NAME: Reed fences
8666.DESCRIPTION: Finish building all reed fences and collect forest knowledge lock inside the reeds themselves.

8667.NAME: Keeping the light
8667.DESCRIPTION: Try charging the gemstones in the sun, then use them in the dark hours. Use gemstone mine.

8668.NAME: Collect mushrooms
8668.DESCRIPTION: You don't need to feed the pigs anymore, so collect mushrooms for research.

8669.NAME: Small help
8669.DESCRIPTION: A kind word, and a few chocolate bars for your hard work keeps you motivated. Gain forest knowledge.

867.NAME: Upgrade lighthouse
867.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade lighthouse to its next stage

8670.NAME: Sweet help
8670.DESCRIPTION: Cake is a better motivator, but that means putting in more effort. Gain forest knowledge.

8671.NAME: Grand delicacies
8671.DESCRIPTION: If the work got you exhausted try these two coffee pots for a quick recharge. Gain forest knowledge.

8674.NAME: Running water
8674.DESCRIPTION: Quickly empty ether your own well or neighbors well, then hop on your raft and visit Stadium isle.

8675.NAME: Bronze tier I
8675.DESCRIPTION: This quest is manageable while doing other things. Sell 20 adult cats.

8676.NAME: Bronze tier II
8676.DESCRIPTION: This task does not hold back punches. Simultaneously have 60 thorn bushes on the island.

8677.NAME: Bronze tier III
8677.DESCRIPTION: Bronze tier cooking quest requires you to make 40 spicy soups. Svogūnų sriuba

8678.NAME: Bronze tier IV
8678.DESCRIPTION: Cut down 20 fully grown tall palmtrees. You will need to dedicate space for this one.

8679.NAME: Bronze tier V
8679.DESCRIPTION: Goats will eat your grass and free space as well. Have 24 adult goats at the same time.

868.NAME: Build lighthouse
868.DESCRIPTION: Build lighthouse and finish its stage

8681.NAME: Bronze tier VII
8681.DESCRIPTION: Do you remember? Simple fields have the option of being sold. Do it!

8682.NAME: Bronze tier VIII
8682.DESCRIPTION: Unlike fields, selling roosters takes time, since roosters need to grow from chiks. Sell roosters.

8683.NAME: Bronze tier IX
8683.DESCRIPTION: Harvest wheat fields. Dang it, more space lost.

8684.NAME: Silver tier I
8684.DESCRIPTION: You have more jungle tiles than you actually need. Choose and clear 16 jungle tiles.

8685.NAME: Silver tier II
8685.DESCRIPTION: This isle does not grow berries. Find a way and collect wild berries.

8686.NAME: Silver tier III
8686.DESCRIPTION: Item rotation function is sometimes useful. Build long benches (Suolas).

8687.NAME: Silver tier IV
8687.DESCRIPTION: Collect clay pots. This will take a while... .

8688.NAME: Silver tier V
8688.DESCRIPTION: Uff, you need to feed dogs, BIG dogs. This is a test for your patience.

8689.NAME: Silver tier VI
8689.DESCRIPTION: Sugar, coconut, corn. Craft coconut porridges 12 times.

869.NAME: Reputation for emerald
869.DESCRIPTION: Gain enough reputation for an emerald

87.NAME: Build the plank well
87.DESCRIPTION: Gather resources and build the plank well

8702.NAME: Silver tier VII
8702.DESCRIPTION: Spend your brick here: Build clay tables.

8703.NAME: Silver tier VIII
8703.DESCRIPTION: Counting lambs will not progress this task. Feed adult sheeps.

8704.NAME: Silver tier IX
8704.DESCRIPTION: Collect Freesia flowers. Figure out on your own how to complete this task.

8705.NAME: Gold tier I
8705.DESCRIPTION: Plunder your supplies. Sell lots and lots of bone bead necklaces.

8706.NAME: Gold tier II
8706.DESCRIPTION: The shells collected can be spent here: Purchase only from shop pumpkins, and plant them.

8707.NAME: Gold tier III
8707.DESCRIPTION: Consider how many beehives you will need, building those is not cheap. Empty beahives.

8708.NAME: Gold tier IV
8708.DESCRIPTION: Hand in large amount of carrots. Paprick is happy they did not ask for chili peppers.

8709.NAME: Gold tier V
8709.DESCRIPTION: There are multiple ways to gain medicine packs. Get some.

8710.NAME: Gold tier VI
8710.DESCRIPTION: Simple task, in gold tier? Suspicious. Read carefully, have simultaneously 80 Triušiukas.

8711.NAME: Gold tier VII
8711.DESCRIPTION: Unlike bunnies, onions do not have baby tier. Have imultaneously 81 onion field.

8712.NAME: Gold tier VIII
8712.DESCRIPTION: From the many fish in Oceania, you need to build trophies for the sharks.

8713.NAME: Gold tier IX
8713.DESCRIPTION: Doing this task alone will net you hefty amount of reputation. Sell Koala bears.

8714.NAME: Cup competition
8714.DESCRIPTION: Each discipline will give you a snow globe. You will need all three globes if you want to fight for the cup.

8715.NAME: Field walker
8715.DESCRIPTION: Shoebill threads mud with ease, but do not call him mud pig. Sell 33 pigs.

8716.NAME: Cut palmtrees
8716.DESCRIPTION: Make a chopping motion in all palmtrees, since opinion is till divided is the bird a pelican, stork or heron.

8717.NAME: Collect snowglobe
8717.DESCRIPTION: Shoebill loves champions, get a single snow globe to prove him you are worth your salt.

872.NAME: Upgrade lighthouse
872.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade lighthouse to its next stage

873.NAME: Build lighthouse
873.DESCRIPTION: Build lighthouse and finish its stage

874.NAME: Last emerald for the lighthouse
874.DESCRIPTION: Carry out 10 helpful actions on any friend's island and you will receive an emerald

875.NAME: Last stage!
875.DESCRIPTION: Add the last emerald to finish its last building stage

876.NAME: Finish lighthouse!
876.DESCRIPTION: Finish building the lighthouse by adding the glass for windows

877.NAME: Stone mine unlocked
877.DESCRIPTION: By splitting stones, you have unlocked the stone mine. You can find it in the shop section BUILDINGS

8786.NAME: Women's festival
8786.DESCRIPTION: Hop on your raft and check out Festival isle!

8787.NAME: Plant tulips
8787.DESCRIPTION: Plant some tulips while waiting for other tulips to sprout.

8788.NAME: Energy drink
8788.DESCRIPTION: Some tulips will have tough time waking up, craft plant revivifier using ether regular or special recipe.

8789.NAME: Lively buds
8789.DESCRIPTION: After warm rain flower buds have started to sprout. Help them out pull some tulip sprouts.

8790.NAME: Running tulip
8790.DESCRIPTION: In a moments flash, the freed flower is running away. Catch the tulips.

8791.NAME: Fill the vases
8791.DESCRIPTION: Buy some flower vases from shop and put tulips there. Press UPGRADE on the vase.

8792.NAME: Catch orange ones
8792.DESCRIPTION: Cream colored flowers keep messing around the isle. Keep them in check, catch them!

8793.NAME: Eskimo ladie
8793.DESCRIPTION: It's uncommon in the snow lands, present the Eskimo lady with flowers, you can find here in shop section.

8794.NAME: Colorful vases
8794.DESCRIPTION: Arrange tulip vases in a more colorful setting. Decorate existing tulip vases.

8795.NAME: Catch white ones
8795.DESCRIPTION: The island has started sprouting white tulips, just the thing to gift Arabian lady.

8796.NAME: Watering flowers
8796.DESCRIPTION: Water the colored flower vases, if you have sold them water coconut palmtrees.

8797.NAME: Flowers in desert
8797.DESCRIPTION: Present the Arabian lady with the white tulips you just picked. Arabian lady is located in the shop.

8798.NAME: Colored tulips
8798.DESCRIPTION: Other kinds of tulips have surfaced. Catch red, yellow or dark tulips.

8799.NAME: White fields
8799.DESCRIPTION: Don't forget the visitors already present. Have simultaneously 30 white tulips.

88.NAME: Complete the plank well
88.DESCRIPTION: Complete the plank well to increase maximum energy and gather water more effectively

8800.NAME: Desert fields
8800.DESCRIPTION: Both ladies have seen vast empty fields. Have simultaneously 30 orange tulips.

8801.NAME: Indian lady
8801.DESCRIPTION: West of your location lives Native american lady, present her freshly picked tulips.

8802.NAME: European
8802.DESCRIPTION: Land with castles and high walls hide Europeans. Gift the lady some tulips.

8803.NAME: Asia lady
8803.DESCRIPTION: Experience exchange participant can see first hand how we celebrate spring. Gift her flowers.

8804.NAME: Tulip vases
8804.DESCRIPTION: Make more colored tulip vases, so you can gift a flower to every passing skirt.

8805.NAME: Lady secrets
8805.DESCRIPTION: Select UPGRADE on all the ladies, today every lady is special.

8806.NAME: Other ladies
8806.DESCRIPTION: When upgraded, find more foreign ladies in shop and present them flowers again.

8807.NAME: Weird buds.
8807.DESCRIPTION: Upon returning to Fest island you notice weird buds. Check them out!

8808.NAME: Regional ladies
8808.DESCRIPTION: Some of the ladies are from Oceania local islands. Present gifts.

8809.NAME: Temporary visitors
8809.DESCRIPTION: Oceania has had too many ladies to keep count, still, gift these three sweethearts.

881.NAME: Spend shells
881.DESCRIPTION: Spend at least 100 shells in any way

8810.NAME: Beautiful decoration
8810.DESCRIPTION: Mermaids will not participate this time, so they asked to clean their statue.

8811.NAME: Flower celebration
8811.DESCRIPTION: Pick yellow or red flowers (shop) and select USE once you have the flowers o your isle.

8812.NAME: Quick harvest
8812.DESCRIPTION: Harvest the most typical of plants - beans.

8813.NAME: Modest harvest
8813.DESCRIPTION: These things grow over night, harvest ether carrots or chili.

8814.NAME: Long harvest
8814.DESCRIPTION: Harvest some wheat, don't dally, the isle has wheat that will go bad over time.

8815.NAME: Small birds
8815.DESCRIPTION: Smallest of Oceania inhabitants come from eggs. Feed chicks.

8816.NAME: Waiting for puppies
8816.DESCRIPTION: Dogs always make you wait. Feed ether dogs or sheep.

8817.NAME: Everyday cow
8817.DESCRIPTION: Once per day is enough, feed calves or horses.

8818.NAME: Food storage
8818.DESCRIPTION: Before any other storage you need to store food. Build one food shack.

8819.NAME: Poor duck
8819.DESCRIPTION: Build a clay pit, if you are short on planks (or progress too small) do he other quests first.

8820.NAME: Decoration
8820.DESCRIPTION: Furniture is essentially just decoration in Oceania, build a table.

8821.NAME: Going around
8821.DESCRIPTION: If you get stuck, Toby advises you to dive into aquarium. Clear a path.

8822.NAME: Three turtles
8822.DESCRIPTION: To move forward quickly do not feed the same turtle twice in the row. Swap some lure using birds.

8823.NAME: Flower baskets
8823.DESCRIPTION: If you collect the Keen eye first you will not have to make a return trip. Open any flower basket, there are four varieties.

8824.NAME: Rafting
8824.DESCRIPTION: Plow the field, then plant a plant named... RAFT, no i'm not drunk, check the shop!

8825.NAME: Sleepy lizard
8825.DESCRIPTION: Believe it or not, this is not the first time this lizard visits Oceania. Feed baby lizards.

8826.NAME: Anniversary cake
8826.DESCRIPTION: Build a big cake for guests (shop) if you lack candles chop some bushes nearby.

8827.NAME: Golden saw
8827.DESCRIPTION: The toothy flower can be used to clear the bushes? Quickly capture a few of these flowers.

8828.NAME: Clear walls
8828.DESCRIPTION: You do not have to make the walls spotless, just clear the bushes and that will be enough.

8829.NAME: Cake for guests
8829.DESCRIPTION: Did you notice? Strange rubber trees are movable. Build more cakes, candles can be found inside the bushes.

883.NAME: Clay brick master
883.DESCRIPTION: Spend 5 clay bricks in any way

8830.NAME: Overgrown lizard
8830.DESCRIPTION: Don't forget to sell dogs and cows, money is money. Feed more lizards.

8831.NAME: Rafting II
8831.DESCRIPTION: There is a rumor that Toby has a quest for you on another isle. Harvest more rafts.

8832.NAME: Watermelons
8832.DESCRIPTION: Eleven times eleven, that's how many melons you need. The large space was not just for show.

8833.NAME: Pick up and go
8833.DESCRIPTION: To finish this quest you will need to first build the camp site.

8834.NAME: A guest
8834.DESCRIPTION: Eleven guests, help eleven guests get situated on this island! Get simultaneously eleven guests with sunglasses.

8835.NAME: Clean Cannon
8835.DESCRIPTION: Polish the cannon. If you do not have a cannon, you can find it in the shop.

8836.NAME: Load and shoot
8836.DESCRIPTION: Red organic confetti, if you lack watermelons, clear the nearby walls.

8837.NAME: Wrong munition
8837.DESCRIPTION: Do not fall for temptation, tomatoes go splat, and are not suitable for shooting. Harvest tomatoes.

8838.NAME: Saddled lizard
8838.DESCRIPTION: Carousel will have ride-able animals. Feed lizards and take their measurements.

8839.NAME: Roots of baobab
8839.DESCRIPTION: The shop has special roots, find them, place them and select UPGRADE.

884.NAME: Feeder
884.DESCRIPTION: Spend 100 food units in any way

8840.NAME: Special wood
8840.DESCRIPTION: The entire carousel will be carved out of a single tree. Start carving the baobab.

8841.NAME: Saddled raft
8841.DESCRIPTION: You really, really like riding your raft, even the carousel has a raft figurine. Harvest rafts.

8842.NAME: Keep carving
8842.DESCRIPTION: Wait, wait, you have carved too much, hungry? Take a cake break, slice the pink cake.

8843.NAME: Restored baobab
8843.DESCRIPTION: Focus only on a single baobab, you will not have figurines to craft extra carousels. Chop Happy baobab. [note Happy baobab is a different object from a regular baobab]

8844.NAME: Start building
8844.DESCRIPTION: Assemble the carousel, let the kids enjoy this celebration.

8845.NAME: Missing figurine
8845.DESCRIPTION: Tiliki was playing with carousel figurine. Feed Tiliki, recover figurine.

8846.NAME: Finish carousel
8846.DESCRIPTION: The final finishing touches of the carousel finish the last adjustments.

8847.NAME: More cake
8847.DESCRIPTION: Have simultaneously three cake breaks on your island, you know, the ones from baobab trees.

8848.NAME: Fresh cake
8848.DESCRIPTION: If you sell a carousel, you will earn extra candles. Finish three palmtree cakes.

8849.NAME: Tilikis entertainment
8849.DESCRIPTION: The island has too many requests for a ride, build three more carousels to make Tilikis happy.

885.NAME: Shard master
885.DESCRIPTION: Spend 3 stone shards in any way

8850.NAME: Gediminus castle
8850.DESCRIPTION: Buy in shop Gediminus castle then move it. From now on use this castle to travel to birthday isle.

886.NAME: Builder
886.DESCRIPTION: Spend 5 stone blocks in any way

888.NAME: Helpful hen farmer
888.DESCRIPTION: Feed hens on your friend's islands

8885.NAME: Carrot meal
8885.DESCRIPTION: Cheer up the rabbit, the spring is still coming. Craft any food with carrots.

8886.NAME: Visit the rabbit
8886.DESCRIPTION: Board your raft and go check on the rabbit, and try to help him.

8887.NAME: Bright isle
8887.DESCRIPTION: Rabbit was saying that the island is bleak, but that is not true. Look at all these Narcissus, pluck some.

8888.NAME: Narcissus meal
8888.DESCRIPTION: Rabbit hides among the narcissus flowers, poke him and he will give you 24 energies, make sure your HP bar has empty space for it.

8889.NAME: Narcissus I of IV
8889.DESCRIPTION: Rabbit keeps sneezing, remove narcissus flowers so that he can move around.

889.NAME: Helpful pig farmer
889.DESCRIPTION: Feed pigs on your friend's islands

8890.NAME: Narcissus II of IV
8890.DESCRIPTION: Focus on clearing path to rabbits, after all 24 energies is a useful resource.

8891.NAME: Narcissus III of IV
8891.DESCRIPTION: Besides the helpful rabbit, there will be few sweets for each of these three tasks. Keep plucking narcissus.

8892.NAME: Narcissus IV of IV
8892.DESCRIPTION: Unexpectedly the island started sprouting new narcissus flowers. The task remains the same, keep plucking them.

8893.NAME: Narcissus V of IV
8893.DESCRIPTION: Fifteen rabbits are hiding beneath the rocks, when plucking clear paths to rock piles.

8894.NAME: Narcissus VI of IV
8894.DESCRIPTION: Keep an eye out for egg spots, those locations are important. Placing stump paths helps you move around after plucking.

8895.NAME: Pearl paint
8895.DESCRIPTION: Check on the island once every 3 hours for new eggs to appear. Collect some pearl paint by picking up pink eggs.

8896.NAME: Paint sprayer
8896.DESCRIPTION: Craft some paint sprayers in your workshop, colors on this island do not need to be repainted, only refreshed.

8897.NAME: Painting paths
8897.DESCRIPTION: Spray some paint on the floor, try restoring some gloomy path tiles by applying paint sprayer.

8898.NAME: Red color
8898.DESCRIPTION: To get the red color you will need to harvest the red ingredient - tomatoes.

8899.NAME: Eggs and bunnies
8899.DESCRIPTION: Try painting, refresh paint on white bunnies and white eggs.

89.NAME: Upgrade your twig shelter
89.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the twig shelter to plank house to increase maximum energy

8900.NAME: Beige cat
8900.DESCRIPTION: For more sunny feel add a color of a beige cat, feed cats and kittens.

8901.NAME: Blue hue
8901.DESCRIPTION: Blue in spring? No choice, but to open blueberry jam. Build food storages.

8902.NAME: Aapchii x Aapchii
8902.DESCRIPTION: If rabbit is allergic to white color, would it be allergic to his own fur? Feed bunnies and find out.

8903.NAME: Colorful flowers
8903.DESCRIPTION: Use paint sprayers and restore colors of flower statues.

8904.NAME: Mushroom hues
8904.DESCRIPTION: Thorny twigs make zig-zag patterns. Plant and pluck some thorny bushes.

8905.NAME: Shade
8905.DESCRIPTION: The mushroom decorations are not real mushrooms, that are sensitive to sun rays, but just in case build stools for mushrooms to hide under.

8906.NAME: Pig noses
8906.DESCRIPTION: A button pattern made from pressing the pig noses in paint. Feed pigs.

8907.NAME: Green curl
8907.DESCRIPTION: Green paint means you have to harvest green beans, you know, the usual stuff.

8908.NAME: Green bundles
8908.DESCRIPTION: Fresh reed bundles are green as well, craft them.

8909.NAME: Green roosters
8909.DESCRIPTION: Oh, my bad I meant parrots. Sell the grown red roosters, since they are not green.

8910.NAME: Stomping narcissus
8910.DESCRIPTION: Spray the gloomy paths and restore sunny strolls in this island. Paint 20 paths

8911.NAME: Happy paths
8911.DESCRIPTION: Path quest does not have an qualification quest, but it does not have egg rewards ether. More paths!

8912.NAME: Strolling path
8912.DESCRIPTION: The island has way more paths than you need for this quest. This time paint 80 paths.

8913.NAME: Easter flower
8913.DESCRIPTION: Use the minced tomatoes and repaint three of the gloomy flowers.

8914.NAME: Mirror flower
8914.DESCRIPTION: Only the red flowers qualify, so be careful what you paint. Finish painting 7 flowers.

8915.NAME: Red flower
8915.DESCRIPTION: The island has 18 of the pink eggs, so naturally you will need more time to finish everything. Paint 11 flowers.

8916.NAME: Blue ant
8916.DESCRIPTION: Blue ant taps the easter eggs with painted legs for silly patterns. Paint some ants.

8917.NAME: Blue ant
8917.DESCRIPTION: When ant crosses a blue puddle they becomes blue themselves. Paint 5 ants.

8918.NAME: Blue ant
8918.DESCRIPTION: It all started long ago, when easter rabbit painted ant eggs by accident. Paint 9 aints.

8919.NAME: Winter mushroom
8919.DESCRIPTION: Winter washed away color from everything without exceptions, that includes the mushrooms. Restore mushroom color.

8920.NAME: Colorful mushroom
8920.DESCRIPTION: Mushroom got lucky, there are no pesky bugs this early in the spring. Paint more mushrooms.

8921.NAME: Rainbow mushroom
8921.DESCRIPTION: Despite the different amounts of resources, in the end all painting jobs are the same. Paint more mushrooms.

8922.NAME: Blue ladybug
8922.DESCRIPTION: Ladybugs are freezing, just look at their blue color. Repaint ladybugs in warm colors.

8923.NAME: Paining ladybugs
8923.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps the statue itself is not prominent at all, but any living crawly thing warms the eye in early spring.

8924.NAME: Ladybug curls
8924.DESCRIPTION: Unlike ants, these bugs do not wish to remain blue, why couldn't the winter chill bleach them white like it did to everything else?

8925.NAME: Golden hens
8925.DESCRIPTION: Spend a golden hen, you can earn them doing the painting jobs.

8926.NAME: Two hens
8926.DESCRIPTION: By spending two hens you will also earn a body suit made from leftover eggs.

8927.NAME: Golden easter
8927.DESCRIPTION: You can spend golden hens in workshop, also this task nets you a colorful mushroom worth 111 reputations.

894.NAME: Place the Chirstmas tree
894.DESCRIPTION: Buy a Christmas tree in the shop section BUILDINGS and place it on the map.

8941.NAME: Peas on the roll
8941.DESCRIPTION: Little peas keep rolling around, visit small Tikei island.

8942.NAME: Catch the peas
8942.DESCRIPTION: Open the workshop and rally the pea kids inside (craft them).

8943.NAME: Antons pigs
8943.DESCRIPTION: Anton kept rolling in mud, but when he was told to sleep in the barn, he finally agreed to take a bath,

8944.NAME: Antons onion
8944.DESCRIPTION: Anton decided to test why cows eat grass, unfortunately spring onions were a bad idea. Harvest onions.

8945.NAME: Hanging the jacket
8945.DESCRIPTION: Crafstman Anton hammered lots of nails into wall for coat hanging. Craft nails.

8946.NAME: Wet candles
8946.DESCRIPTION: Anton melted candles in hot water, the reformed wax in human shapes. Build wax figurines.

8947.NAME: Grey cold
8947.DESCRIPTION: Bebe is still learning how to draw, also the poster glue came off. Harsh words hit Bebe like a stone block, craft some blocks.

8948.NAME: Lost pea
8948.DESCRIPTION: Sad cries from the treasure cave, Anton got lost. Search the treasure cave.

8949.NAME: Pearl pea
8949.DESCRIPTION: Anton dropped into pond when trying to feed ducks (feed them). Now sitting in water, Anton tries to find pearl clams.

895.NAME: Decorate the tree
895.DESCRIPTION: You can visit the dwarf shop on your friend's islands. There you can buy decorations for the Christmas tree.

8950.NAME: Red brotherhood
8950.DESCRIPTION: The painted rocks will get a fresh edition, now tomatoes join the cause. Harvest tomatoes.

8951.NAME: Real lego
8951.DESCRIPTION: Anton if forbidden from using hammer and nails, so he opts for bricks. Craft some clay bricks.

8952.NAME: Before departure
8952.DESCRIPTION: Anton gave Pea flower lots of headaches when he needed to go, just after leaving the home. Build toilets.

8953.NAME: Diving in ocean
8953.DESCRIPTION: Diving in cage will keep you safe from sharks. Lucy awaits in anticipation. Collect smelted iron.

8954.NAME: Wax paratroopers
8954.DESCRIPTION: Handkerchief parachutes tied to each wax soldier. Spend cloth rolls.

8955.NAME: Fence for cows
8955.DESCRIPTION: Lucy set up a small fence around flowers, to keep the goats away. Feed goats.

8956.NAME: Garden flowers
8956.DESCRIPTION: Lucy eagerly makes plots for flowers. Plant beans in the fresh soil.

8957.NAME: Personal mine
8957.DESCRIPTION: Anton will not get lost underground again, since he dug this mine himself. Collect copper ore.

8958.NAME: Bebe and hedgehog
8958.DESCRIPTION: Bebe once rolled around long after sunset, just as hedgehogs were waking up.

8959.NAME: Lucy and Bebe
8959.DESCRIPTION: Bebe dislikes sharp savanna grass, Lucy points to the stone pathways. Build clay or stone paths.

896.NAME: Place the dwarf shop
896.DESCRIPTION: Find the shop in the section BUILDINGS and place it on your island so that your friends can buy decorations.

8960.NAME: Bread for Hedgehogs
8960.DESCRIPTION: Plant some wheat, since Bebe wishes to feed Hedgehogs some fresh bread.

8961.NAME: Stone brotherhood
8961.DESCRIPTION: Round stones, hand painted, these are Antons new friends. Collect stone shards.

8962.NAME: Crayon masterpiece
8962.DESCRIPTION: Anton wishes to hammer a frame for his drawing. Make Shark or angel fish trophies.

8963.NAME: Help the chicks
8963.DESCRIPTION: On mothers day let the mother sleep a bit more and feed baby chicks yourself.

8964.NAME: Everything has a place
8964.DESCRIPTION: Lucy found bricks under the table and returned them to proper place. Build clay storage sheds.

8965.NAME: Counting
8965.DESCRIPTION: Lucy is actively counting pumpkin sprouts in the garden. Plant some pumpkins.

8966.NAME: Colorful rocks
8966.DESCRIPTION: Lucy collects all the shiny rocks and ambers, get her some lazurites.

8967.NAME: Flower poem
