8967.DESCRIPTION: Stunned by the beauty of flax field Lucy recites the poem about blue flax flowers. Harvest flax.

8968.NAME: Clean up
8968.DESCRIPTION: Collect all your toys and put them in boxes, otherwise mommy might get tired while putting away your stuff. Sell lava lamps.

8969.NAME: Picture book
8969.DESCRIPTION: Lucy recognizes pirštas mushroom, and even knew what to do. Collect one from coconuts or corn harvest.

897.NAME: Cow specialist
897.DESCRIPTION: Have at least 30 grown-up cows on your island at the same time

8970.NAME: Different barrels
8970.DESCRIPTION: Pickle barrels are smaller than root-beer barrels, so all barrels are different, right? Build wine barrels.

8971.NAME: Root plant
8971.DESCRIPTION: Carrot is a root? But roots should go in all directions. Roots can differ, harvest some carrots.

8972.NAME: Different fishes
8972.DESCRIPTION: Some are fresh water, others live in salty seas, salmon adapts to both. Catch blue guppy fish.

8973.NAME: Antons screws
8973.DESCRIPTION: Anton shows how to plant screws, just don't try hammer and nails, i got scolded for it. Craft screws.

8974.NAME: In wallaby pouch
8974.DESCRIPTION: Anton did not like that Bebe copied him. Wallabies comforted  crying Bebe, feed them.

8975.NAME: Bebe's mischief
8975.DESCRIPTION: Bebe, do you think the statue has tounge? Let's climb! Build fish statues or royal water roses.

8976.NAME: Lucy's ears
8976.DESCRIPTION: Lucy had memorized poems perfectly, so she got the wise fox role in the play. Feed foxes.

8977.NAME: Replanting
8977.DESCRIPTION: When crocus flower withered Lucy planted some melon seeds. Time to plant! Harvest melons.

8978.NAME: Trained puppy
8978.DESCRIPTION: Lucy taught a puppy to give a paw, and it was not even her dog. Feed dogs and puppies.

8979.NAME: Bebe in desert
8979.DESCRIPTION: Bebe visited Toby, show the pea the island, do any actions.

898.NAME: Ostrich specialist
898.DESCRIPTION: Have at least 40 grown-up ostriches on your island at the same time

8980.NAME: Pot fortress
8980.DESCRIPTION: Wax soldiers are coming to take the flipped clay pot fortress in the lawn! Collect pots.

8981.NAME: Melons for elephants
8981.DESCRIPTION: Elephants are veeeery big. Lucy had planed to feed them long ago, so she grew melons. Feed elephants.

8982.NAME: Workshop work
8982.DESCRIPTION: Pearl and Jasper necklaces take time to make, but spider decoration consumes energy. Choose and craft the present.

8983.NAME: Meerkat person
8983.DESCRIPTION: You know humans have no tales, right Anton? What a splendid meerkat drawing. Sell meerkats.

8984.NAME: Potato fries
8984.DESCRIPTION: Fried potatoes for dinner, Anton likes this dish! Harvest potatoes.

8985.NAME: Fearless lucy
8985.DESCRIPTION: With gluodenas in hands, Lucy intends to scare her siblings. The pea can tell apart poisoned critters from safe ones.

8986.NAME: Confiscate machete
8986.DESCRIPTION: Lucy took away machete from Anton, while he likes to cut the long grass, he almost hit Bebe. Collect yellow machetes.

8987.NAME: Short legs
8987.DESCRIPTION: Hedgehogs wanted to eat minced meat, but they can't reach the table top. Build simple, wooden, clay or iron tables.

8988.NAME: Bebe the chick
8988.DESCRIPTION: Baby chicks can no longer roll around after hatching, but they still like Bebe. Feed baby chicks.

8989.NAME: Aldo eagle
8989.DESCRIPTION: Eagle, it is such a big bird! Let pea girl feed the friendly eagle on Aldo isle.

899.NAME: Sheep specialist
899.DESCRIPTION: Have at least 40 grown-up sheep on your island at the same time

8990.NAME: Ashamed pea
8990.DESCRIPTION: Bebe promises not to do that again, Bebe even made flax crown to appease flower pea. Make rope from flax.

8991.NAME: Bebe among ostriches
8991.DESCRIPTION: The smallest of ostriches is still bigger then Bebe, but Bebe is not afraid. Sell adult ostriches.

8992.NAME: Eyeing Bebe
8992.DESCRIPTION: Bebe thinks the sneaking movement went undetected, but there is always someone keeping watch on the kid. Collect game masks.

8993.NAME: To paprica's liking
8993.DESCRIPTION: Anton heeded advice, and went to show his drawing to chili pepper fields. He misunderstood. Harvest chili.

8994.NAME: Fishing in darkness
8994.DESCRIPTION: Anton got scared a bit, night came fast. Bat friends of Bebe showed peas the way home. Feed bats.

8995.NAME: Sour truth
8995.DESCRIPTION: Anton regrets his poor actions, and wishes to apologize to Bebe. Dispose of the sour lemons, harvest them.

8996.NAME: Bebe's cache
8996.DESCRIPTION: Bebe, you should showcase your big catch. Build aquariums for Bebes fishes.

8997.NAME: Sweets
8997.DESCRIPTION: Wallaby gives Bebe a sweet fruit from his pouch. Collect mango fruits, pitayas, coconuts or bananas.

8998.NAME: Fish tongues
8998.DESCRIPTION: Anton, do real fish have tongues? Let's find out! Go fishing in octopus or hammerhead shark locations.

8999.NAME: Eggplants and tomatoes
8999.DESCRIPTION: Eggplants stuffed with tomatoes and meat have been served. Anton refuses without even trying. Cook this meal.

9.NAME: Place workshop
9.DESCRIPTION: Buy a workshop from the shop menu and place it on the island.

90.NAME: Build plank house
90.DESCRIPTION: Gather resources and build a plank house

9000.NAME: Housewarming Gifts
9000.DESCRIPTION: Bebe does not come empty handed, he brought strawberries he picked for Toby. Harvest strawberries.

9001.NAME: Protecting beehives
9001.DESCRIPTION: Lucy found beehives, and she knows bears like honey. To protect the bees she asks that you feed the bears.

9002.NAME: Home flowers
9002.DESCRIPTION: Crocus grows quickly, thus they were selected for flower boxes. Build some flower boxes.

9003.NAME: Platypus at home
9003.DESCRIPTION: Bebe will stay at home for a while, feed platypuses that keep the pea occupied for now.

9004.NAME: Hair flowers
9004.DESCRIPTION: The more time Bebe spends on desert island, the more Cactus flowers cling to the pea. Spend cactus flowers.

9005.NAME: Bebe's paintings
9005.DESCRIPTION: Seeing how Anton frames his works, Bebe tries to glue his papers to wooden signs. Build wooden signs.

9006.NAME: Pea island
9006.DESCRIPTION: Flower pea has spread roots on this island, visit the heartfull mother on her island.

9007.NAME: Blooming tree
9007.DESCRIPTION: Poke and select UPGRADE for the blooming tree. Let the tree tell the tales of pea kids.

9008.NAME: Tree stories
9008.DESCRIPTION: Do the pea quests and find the entire story of one of the peas. Use it on the tree.

9009.NAME: Two peas
9009.DESCRIPTION: If you do the second pea quest you will receive a blooming tree upgrade that will give extra 60 reputation.

9010.NAME: Pea trio
9010.DESCRIPTION: By doing all three of the pea quests you will earn  1 maximum energy. Keep the mother conversation going.

9011.NAME: Antons determination
9011.DESCRIPTION: To please Pea flower Anton decided to cut all weeds and bushes. Clear some of them.

9012.NAME: Bebe with flowers
9012.DESCRIPTION: Anemone flowers look neat, help Bebe pick a bouquet of these blue flowers.

9013.NAME: Tropical tiara
9013.DESCRIPTION: Lucy decided to make a ping head band out of the pink tropical leaves. Cut tropical palmtrees.

9015.NAME: Water rat
9015.DESCRIPTION: Whiskers dried out from salty ocean winds. Get water from well to quench Salty's thirst.

9016.NAME: Feeding Salty
9016.DESCRIPTION: Sweet meal should cheer him up, add extra sugar to tea. Spend sugar in any way.

9017.NAME: Dry fur
9017.DESCRIPTION: Rugged rat, scoffs at fancy silk sheets. Get some wool for Salty.

9018.NAME: Rat's tragedy
9018.DESCRIPTION: This seasoned sailor once got shipwrecked.

9019.NAME: Strange shore
9019.DESCRIPTION: Mr. Salty was thrown out on a beach rich with fruits. Harvest watermelons.

9020.NAME: Missing rope
9020.DESCRIPTION: Not a single piece of broken ship was washed on the beach, rat did not get even a tail length worth of rope. Make ropes.

9021.NAME: Leaf crafts
9021.DESCRIPTION: Unable to endure the sweet diet, Salty made boat of leaves. Build food storages.

9022.NAME: Sharp scent
9022.DESCRIPTION: Putting his nose up, the rat cought a savory scent. Harvest radishes.

9023.NAME: Offset
9023.DESCRIPTION: Your island was not the one Salty yearned for. Feed dogs to catch direction of the odor.

9024.NAME: Escort Slaty
9024.DESCRIPTION: The small boat is already pushed into water, push your boat and fallow Salty.

9025.NAME: Salty shore
9025.DESCRIPTION: Upon arrival the odor is unbearable. No, your nose will not tolerate this.  Remove fishes.

9026.NAME: Rescue your nose
9026.DESCRIPTION: Build scented candles and select USE once you have dealt with fishes.

9027.NAME: Hot ore
9027.DESCRIPTION: Black clouds originate from here. Extinguish red hot blocks to lower temperature.

9028.NAME: Sulfur smell
9028.DESCRIPTION: Cooling the ore will solve cloud problem, but the leftover rocks stink of sulfur. Clear the hot rocks.

9029.NAME: Salty bath
9029.DESCRIPTION: Dump salt crystals into tub and you will recover some drinking water. Once tub is full you will need to wait one day.

9030.NAME: Transportation
9030.DESCRIPTION: The only sailing option was destroyed with strong ocean waves.

9031.NAME: Splitting waves
9031.DESCRIPTION: Show spite, do not yield to ocean. Split waves that wash this shore.

9032.NAME: Washed up
9032.DESCRIPTION: Fresh waves washed fresh fishes, feed them and send them back to deeps.

9033.NAME: Odor of stress
9033.DESCRIPTION: Salty returned with empty hands and empty stomach. Feed Salty the Rat.

9034.NAME: Bump on the head
9034.DESCRIPTION: Savory smell is beneath the clay fields. Make some special pickaxes from crystal rocks.

9035.NAME: Octopus treasure
9035.DESCRIPTION: Octopus has plucked some nice things from beneath the island. Feed octopuses.

9036.NAME: Shiny obstacle
9036.DESCRIPTION: To remove glittering rocks you will need crystal pickaxes. Clear them.

9037.NAME: Big obstacle
9037.DESCRIPTION: Green rocks will need to be cleared in two attempts. First split them with crystal axes then pull them apart by hand.

9038.NAME: Gray obstacle
9038.DESCRIPTION: Crystal axes bump right off. Gray rocks can only be split with shards of green cliff rocks.

9039.NAME: Burning onions
9039.DESCRIPTION: While on fruit island, Mr. Rat pickled the leftovers, if you add some onions you will be able to work with tractor. Give onions.

904.NAME: Clay from the claypit
904.DESCRIPTION: Use claypit to get clay from it

9040.NAME: Soften the soil
9040.DESCRIPTION: SIMULTANIOUSLY have 200 fields on the island. The tractor will help you get the job done faster.

9041.NAME: Rat diggs
9041.DESCRIPTION: Rat has managed to unearth garlic here and there. SIMULTANIOUSLY have 30 Garlic rats.

9042.NAME: Watermelons in tank
9042.DESCRIPTION: Cocktail in fuel tank. Salty has no more fruits to mix as fuel. Hand in some watermelons to mix their juice into fuel.

9043.NAME: Garlic harvest
9043.DESCRIPTION: Rat calls dibs on all the garlic, don't even think about other options.

9044.NAME: Garlic for rat
9044.DESCRIPTION: After harvest feed all those hungry rats. Feed garlic rats.

9045.NAME: Sweet promise
9045.DESCRIPTION: Salty wishes to keep snacking on your island, just promise not to feed him sweets. Harvest fruits, corn or pumkins.

9046.NAME: Eater's eater
9046.DESCRIPTION: Sell cats for salty to have peace of mind when he moves in.

9047.NAME: Peel candy
9047.DESCRIPTION: Open workshop and peel garlic shaped chocolates. From to time Salty will give you more of these.

905.NAME: Growing Strawberries
905.DESCRIPTION: Give strawberries to the native children

9053.NAME: Gear nest
9053.DESCRIPTION: Magpies like shiny things. Check the nests first, build bird houses.

9054.NAME: Water nests
9054.DESCRIPTION: Not all nests are in trees. Look for gearsin water bird nests, feed ducks.

9055.NAME: Strawberry nests
9055.DESCRIPTION: Corvids tend to snack on your strawberries. Harvest the berries and check for dropped gears.

9056.NAME: Bear lair
9056.DESCRIPTION: Bears are sleeping, where was their lair located? Feed elephants or meerkats to find out.

9057.NAME: Sticky house
9057.DESCRIPTION: Check if gear is stuck to the beehive. Empty some hives.

9058.NAME: Honey gear
9058.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps bears are not at fault. Build some wax figurines since some have started to melt.

9059.NAME: Earth gear
9059.DESCRIPTION: “Me digged field, and got this metal round thingy.” Harvest potatoes.

906.NAME: Help friend
906.DESCRIPTION: Harvest 30 strawberry fields on your friends' islands

9060.NAME: Gear in the bag
9060.DESCRIPTION: “Me has zero pocket, after return i check potatoe bags.” Build glass food storages.

9061.NAME: Jellyfish skirt
9061.DESCRIPTION: “Native woman went fishing, caught jellyfish with metal skirt.” Fish octopuses or hammer head sharks.

9062.NAME: Reptile pieces
9062.DESCRIPTION: Spend reptile food to question snakes, if they had seen gears lying around.

9063.NAME: Fire advice
9063.DESCRIPTION: Before you speak to Volcano island diety, help him by spending volcanic rocks on making neat furniture.

9064.NAME: White marble
9064.DESCRIPTION: Draw the cog for Haraiki giant to understand. Spend paint buckets.

9065.NAME: Animal thirst
9065.DESCRIPTION: Feed any animal on your island or friend island. Cows have thirst so big, they started to munch cactusses.

9066.NAME: Rescuing flowers
9066.DESCRIPTION: Put poted plants in basement for the night. Sell flower boxes, or royal water roses.

9067.NAME: Watermelon treat
9067.DESCRIPTION: You will be given seeds in other tasks. Harvest some watermelons to ease your suffering in this heat.

9068.NAME: Growing heat
9068.DESCRIPTION: Listen to me, heat not normal. Wheat, corn grow quick, but that is not good. Harvest these grains.

9069.NAME: Heat direction
9069.DESCRIPTION: Hang bone beads in all corners of your island, then figure out, which side has the hottest beads. Make bead necklaces.

907.NAME: Bean stew
907.DESCRIPTION: Cook 10 portions of bean stew in the workshop

9070.NAME: Metal piece
9070.DESCRIPTION: Dogs took a swim in this heat and came back with a metal piece. Feed dogs to liberate the metal part.

9071.NAME: Gear island
9071.DESCRIPTION: Let's take a look at this gear island. Let's travel!

9072.NAME: Everything stopped
9072.DESCRIPTION: Nothing is moving, including sun  that never sets. Try pushing some elements.

9073.NAME: Gears
9073.DESCRIPTION: “I has found a cog as well, it was on my island.” Use workshop to polish the gears Paprick found.

9074.NAME: Restore movement
9074.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps some gears are on your main island (as quests) or, you could try workshop. Spend all gears.

9075.NAME: Mechanisms
9075.DESCRIPTION: After clearing the path take all of the gears and fix other mechanisms on this island.

9076.NAME: Pull the spring
9076.DESCRIPTION: Use the power keys you got to make things tick on this island. With a bit of help, this place will soon be up and running.

9077.NAME: Fix the flower
9077.DESCRIPTION: Flowers use sun energy to tense up the spring coil. Selct UPGRADE.

9078.NAME: Fix the fish
9078.DESCRIPTION: Select UPGRADE on the fish planks. Fish baloons can store all the cought wind to make keys.

9079.NAME: Fix the eel
9079.DESCRIPTION: River rubs the eel barrel and eel circles nervously, generating power. Poke the eel, select UPGRADE

908.NAME: Banana cake
908.DESCRIPTION: Cook 10 portions of banana cake in the workshop

9080.NAME: Energy
9080.DESCRIPTION: Each morning when all mechanisms are wound up, you can collect power keys from them. Get power keys.

9081.NAME: Activate palmtrees
9081.DESCRIPTION: Use power keys to simultaneously have all the palmtrees working on this island.

9082.NAME: Wind-up snakes.
9082.DESCRIPTION: Without energy the snakes will not move. Wind up some snakes.

9083.NAME: Charge the clock
9083.DESCRIPTION: The working pieces are starting to push out the uncharged elements. Wind up some clocks.

9084.NAME: Gears splattr
9084.DESCRIPTION: Fix the broken parts by adding the missing gears, that poped up on the island. (reload page)

9085.NAME: Snake error
9085.DESCRIPTION: Turns out you needed to wind up all of the snakes SIMULTANEOUSLY, do it.

9086.NAME: Hang chameleons
9086.DESCRIPTION: Get more chameleons, and use them as pendums for the trees.

9087.NAME: Charged snake
9087.DESCRIPTION: Put a spark inside  snake to makeit move indeffinitely.

9088.NAME: Charge the palmtrees
9088.DESCRIPTION: Palmtrees are working fine. Remove them from the island by using sparks.

9089.NAME: Imitation
9089.DESCRIPTION: Put some chameleons on the tall palmtrees. Make the island look real.

909.NAME: Pumpkin pie
909.DESCRIPTION: Cook 10 portions of pumpkin pie in the workshop

9090.NAME: More flowers
9090.DESCRIPTION: Unpack the new sprouted flowers. More flowers means more energy.

9091.NAME: Sun spring
9091.DESCRIPTION: SIMULTANEOUSLY have all five flowers with lose springs.

9092.NAME: Summer qualification
9092.DESCRIPTION: Harvest bean or onions, then visit the stadium island without waiting for prompt from Papric.

9093.NAME: Bronze discipline I
9093.DESCRIPTION: Chop down fully grown three branch palmtrees. Be careful of leaving stumps behind.

9094.NAME: Bronze discipline II
9094.DESCRIPTION: Feed any kind of bunnies. Animal feeding is better than gardening in such events.

9095.NAME: Bronze discipline III
9095.DESCRIPTION: Craft nails inside the workshop. If you lack branches, look around.

9096.NAME: Bronze discipline IV
9096.DESCRIPTION: Feed adult pigs. Collections drop from adult animals more often, than from youngsters.

9097.NAME: Bronze discipline V
9097.DESCRIPTION: Craft milk 10 times. Finding a space in workshop may need more effort than you think.

9098.NAME: Bronze discipline VI
9098.DESCRIPTION: THINK!  Collect any type of feathers.

9099.NAME: Bronze discipline VII
9099.DESCRIPTION: Unlike bunnies, radishes can not be moved. Harvest 60 such fields.

91.NAME: Complete the plank house
91.DESCRIPTION: Complete the plank house to increase your maximum energy

910.NAME: Corn pie
910.DESCRIPTION: Cook 10 portions of corn pie in the workshop

9100.NAME: Bronze discipline VIII
9100.DESCRIPTION: Fortunately fern bushes can't block path. Have 40 of these at the same time.

9101.NAME: Bronze discipline IX
9101.DESCRIPTION: A tropical house for tropical mood. Build straw huts, can you manage to find it in shop?

9102.NAME: Silver discipline I
9102.DESCRIPTION: The island has more jungle than you need for this task. Chop down 16 jungles.

9103.NAME: Silver discipline II
9103.DESCRIPTION: Sell grown roosters. If nothing else, this can be done quickly.

9104.NAME: Silver discipline III
9104.DESCRIPTION: You can't sell these peacocks, so building fans is possible. Sell peacock feather fans.

9105.NAME: Silver discipline IV
9105.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps next time we will ask you to build the statue, this time we'll limit to handing in some Molio masė.

9106.NAME: Silver discipline V
9106.DESCRIPTION: Sell 8 flamingo bushes. It is strange, but each time we do this as a riddle, some players forget the answer.

9107.NAME: Silver discipline VI
9107.DESCRIPTION: To save space, consider feeding adult animals. Feed any kind of ducks.

9108.NAME: Silver discipline VII
9108.DESCRIPTION: Have 24 big rose bushes at the same time. The island can support up to 47 of these without rock chopping.

9109.NAME: Silver discipline VIII
9109.DESCRIPTION: Collect small copper pieces. You will not be able to do this, if you don't have done gem mine main quest.

911.NAME: Carrot stew
911.DESCRIPTION: Cook some carrot stew in the workshop

9110.NAME: Silver discipline IX
9110.DESCRIPTION: Missing stuff can be gained elsewhere, focus! Make rope from flax.

9111.NAME: Gold discipline I
9111.DESCRIPTION: Some tasks only change by looks, but not the total amount. Chop volcanic rocks.

9112.NAME: Gold discipline II
9112.DESCRIPTION: Chicken get sick more often than meeerkats. Feed adult meerkats.

9113.NAME: Gold discipline III
9113.DESCRIPTION: Don't forget to consider which tasks come first. Harvest tomatoes.

9114.NAME: Gold discipline IV
9114.DESCRIPTION: One of the most stocked items for competitions is clay bricks. This time build clay paths.

9115.NAME: Gold discipline V
9115.DESCRIPTION: To make sure you don't screw up, the upper swamp was blocked until now. Remove swamp.

9116.NAME: Gold discipline VI
9116.DESCRIPTION: Not a large amount, but this might cause a delay for some. Sell pearl necklaces.

9117.NAME: Gold discipline VII
9117.DESCRIPTION: Gold tier is never easy. Sell 60 truffle pigs.

9118.NAME: Gold discipline VIII
9118.DESCRIPTION: Since they are easy to craft, not many have stockpile of screws. Hand in 55 of them.

9119.NAME: Gold discipline IX
9119.DESCRIPTION: There is space, but only barely enough. Have 8 plank pools at the same time.

912.NAME: Strawberry soup
912.DESCRIPTION: Cook some strawberry soup in the workshop

9120.NAME: Juicy branch
9120.DESCRIPTION: I am cool where I am, but could you fetch me some of those delicious branches?

9121.NAME: Let's roll dude!
9121.DESCRIPTION: Do you see that stone pile among trees? Recover my buried bike.

9122.NAME: Mosquitoes
9122.DESCRIPTION: If you sell troughs, Mosquitoes will take revenge and start spawning. Do it, but you were warned.

9123.NAME: Inform the shy guy
9123.DESCRIPTION: Oh, yeah, my neighbour is shy. Every day you will receive one idea to share with him.

9124.NAME: Mosquitoes attack
9124.DESCRIPTION: One mosquitoe spawns exactly every 3 minutes up to 5 bugs in total. Flatten these bugs.

9125.NAME: Summer Mark
9125.DESCRIPTION: Mark will join your island, but for now help him celebrate. Feed all Markhors

9126.NAME: Reminder
9126.DESCRIPTION: The faster you bring three snow globes to Mark, the higher the chance of getting a high tier trophy.

9127.NAME: Friend harvest
9127.DESCRIPTION: Neighbor does not like me visiting his cabbage fields, so You harvest any of his fields and fruit trees.

9128.NAME: Neighbor animals
9128.DESCRIPTION: Some of those animals are my dudes, so feed any of them.

9129.NAME: Build friendship
9129.DESCRIPTION: Help with clay, stone or gem pit, empty fireplace or pump oil at your friends place.

913.NAME: White bread
913.DESCRIPTION: Bake some white bread in the workshop

9130.NAME: Visit the patient
9130.DESCRIPTION: Before leaving, visit Native island and collect a bit of experience.

9131.NAME: Feed the animals
9131.DESCRIPTION: Paprick did say he will visit and help, but, just in case, over-feed all of your animals.

9132.NAME: First stop
9132.DESCRIPTION: Harvest some fields on the Festival island while you wait for the transportation to arrive.

9133.NAME: Towards the unknown
9133.DESCRIPTION: Open the map and look at the travel route. Find your way to the Sandy clearing.

9134.NAME: Sandy clearing
9134.DESCRIPTION: The end destination got buried in sand. Spin the propeller of the submarine, than select USE.

9135.NAME: Bone handle
9135.DESCRIPTION: You'll need a to fan away the sand yourself, since submarine is beyond the reach. Remove bones to make fan handles.

9136.NAME: Jungle leaves
9136.DESCRIPTION: Cut off jungle leaves for fans. You can get acquire machetes from the bone task.

9137.NAME: Stump dweller
9137.DESCRIPTION: Inside the stump there is a hidden inhabitant. Upgrade the stump, than select USE.

9138.NAME: Green in greenery
9138.DESCRIPTION: Find more green bugs, you may see some of them, but more are hiding in plain sight.

9139.NAME: Red flower miracle
9139.DESCRIPTION: Cut down jungles with dark red flowers, Violetinių žiedų krūmas will work just as well.

914.NAME: Coconut porridge
914.DESCRIPTION: Cook some coconut porridge in the workshop

9140.NAME: Fan bugs
9140.DESCRIPTION: Find more stumps, knock on them and UPGRADE, than select USE.

9141.NAME: Warming cabbages
9141.DESCRIPTION: Warm the cabbages until they hatch, mowing is impossible without the excellent bugs.

9142.NAME: Hay rolls
9142.DESCRIPTION: While bugs are moving, tie up the straw in hay rolls, poke the clover fields.

9143.NAME: Fanning
9143.DESCRIPTION: Bugs are too busy moving, so you can move forward only after the work. Upgrade stumps.

9144.NAME: Cabadge smell
9144.DESCRIPTION: By clearing the sand you found some weary goats. Such sweet cabbage smell provoked their apatite. Feed goats.

9145.NAME: Sowing the skulls
9145.DESCRIPTION: Find some bug skulls inside your backpack, and plant the sweet shells. Don't worry the skulls are fake.

9146.NAME: Sand storm
9146.DESCRIPTION: When you have done everything, find stump and start fanning.

9147.NAME: Yellow as sun
9147.DESCRIPTION: You turned around once, and the green leaf fans became orange. Grow some orange sunflowers.

9148.NAME: Purple wood
9148.DESCRIPTION: Collect some collection flowers, you can do it in multiple ways, cutting down tropical palmtrees is one example.

9149.NAME: Lonely fan
9149.DESCRIPTION: Tropical area has only one stump, for bug to hide in, upgrade it.

9150.NAME: Digging underground
9150.DESCRIPTION: Empty the clay pit and check if you can cross the sand field by going under it.

9151.NAME: Digging tools
9151.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade workshop, so you can work with clay more efficiently.

9152.NAME: Using clay
9152.DESCRIPTION: You know what, all this spare clay should be put to use. Build clay statues.

9153.NAME: Return home
9153.DESCRIPTION: On this side there are only gorillas, but no bugs, hurry up, submarine is waiting on you. Visit Festival island.

9154.NAME: Wish to return
9154.DESCRIPTION: Is there a point in returning? Everything is covered in sand anyway. Use workshop to make a miracle dragonfly.

9155.NAME: Calling the wind
9155.DESCRIPTION: Collect and hand in 50 dragonflies, you can achieve this by doing quests.

9156.NAME: Whistling wind
9156.DESCRIPTION: First build a structure that does not impede the wind. Food storage from planks shall fit perfectly.

9157.NAME: Voice of the wind
9157.DESCRIPTION: Some voices are stronger than others and stand out. Sell some roosters.

9158.NAME: Strong paws
9158.DESCRIPTION: You will need a lot of arm strength to wave fast enough. Feed small and big bunnies with strong legs.

9159.NAME: Melon flavour
9159.DESCRIPTION: Squid raises his eyes at you, and asks for some prickly melons. Plant some.

916.NAME: Small-time bigger
916.DESCRIPTION: Dig 20 furrows. The natives will give you 5 corn seeds

9160.NAME: Tangled wind
9160.DESCRIPTION: Wind rings your hanged flower pots, Squid disapproves this. Sell hanging flower pots.

9161.NAME: Fox feathers
9161.DESCRIPTION: Squid sneezes and blows away fur he intended to use. Feed some foxes to get more hairs of fox fur.

9162.NAME: Ocean bees
9162.DESCRIPTION: ‟Ocean askes of me some honey, so go and get me some.” Empty hives multiple times.

9163.NAME: Ocean strawberries
9163.DESCRIPTION: You will need strawberries, but i am not sure how they will be used. Harvest strawberry fields.

9164.NAME: Ocean advice
9164.DESCRIPTION: ‟Oh, ocean advises you to feed your priest with strawberries” Craft strawberry soup.

9165.NAME: Pincer priest
9165.DESCRIPTION: Squid lost his grip on the crab, now he's running away.

9166.NAME: Crab mower
9166.DESCRIPTION: While running crab snips your chili pepper fields, harvest them.

9167.NAME: Diving crab
9167.DESCRIPTION: With a loud splash the crab dives into corner of modern pool. Build this pool to take a better look.

9168.NAME: Wind horses
9168.DESCRIPTION: While looking for dragonflies Squid goes into swamp. Leave your horse behind, sell horses.

9169.NAME: Rubber tree log
9169.DESCRIPTION: Calmar sees a big rubber tree, and suggests you put this thing horizontally. Chop these trees many times.

917.NAME: Big-time bigger
917.DESCRIPTION: Dig 60 furrows. The natives will give you 10 tomato seeds

9170.NAME: Visitor inside aquarium
9170.DESCRIPTION: From the swamp Squid extracts something that needs Saltwater aquarium, so, build one for storage.

9171.NAME: Pepper present
9171.DESCRIPTION: Seasoning can be collected by helping friends. Bake and then HAND IN some gingerbread cookies.

9172.NAME: Desert hunger
9172.DESCRIPTION: Not only bugs, but other animals are lost inside the sand as well. Feed them.

9173.NAME: Sand in well
9173.DESCRIPTION: It is not as hot, as it is sandy. Select UPGRADE, then build the well, finally, select MOVE on the well.

9174.NAME: Keep faning
9174.DESCRIPTION: Use collected fans to clear more ground on the island.

9175.NAME: Colossus leeward
9175.DESCRIPTION: Twister starts loosing power, now things become more interesting. Build more colossus to enhance the effect.

9176.NAME: Analyzing bones
9176.DESCRIPTION: Bones look oddly fresh, pick them up and check them.

9177.NAME: Bug trees
9177.DESCRIPTION: Green bugs called for backup, poke some odd trees and upgrade stumps as well.

9178.NAME: Scare the bats
9178.DESCRIPTION: Red bugs would rather see bats in their neighborhood. Upgrade trees, than build webs.

9179.NAME: Bio-fuel
9179.DESCRIPTION: There are some other friends that have crashed in the area. Produce fuel from cloverfield.

918.NAME: Huge-time bigger
918.DESCRIPTION: Dig 140 furrows. The natives will give you 15 bean seeds

9180.NAME: Keep fanning
9180.DESCRIPTION: With abundance of green friends, you definitely can spin more twisters. Use fans.

9181.NAME: Piloting submarine
9181.DESCRIPTION: Return to Sand clearing and keep moving forward.

9182.NAME: Earning fans
9182.DESCRIPTION: To move forward you need to build 7 plank paths.

9183.NAME: Spend fans
9183.DESCRIPTION: After doing the other two quests, you must spend 15 more fans.

9184.NAME: Moving in circles
9184.DESCRIPTION: It looks like the path bends back to the start of this island. Fix paths to move with ease.

9185.NAME: Abandoned
9185.DESCRIPTION: You were away for far too long. Feed any animals on this island.

9186.NAME: Twist the twister
9186.DESCRIPTION: Bugs are fanning with all of their might, soon a small twister appears. Finish spinning the twister.

9187.NAME: Renting the submarine
9187.DESCRIPTION: After long argument the captain agrees to take you back to the sand island. Travel there.

9188.NAME: Counterforce
9188.DESCRIPTION: Find more bugs, and ask to spin in opposite direction. Spend all fans.

9189.NAME: Shell plants
9189.DESCRIPTION: Find some sweet shell plants and plant them, perhaps check the shop?

9190.NAME: Reversed twister
9190.DESCRIPTION: Turn the hurricane upside down, a bit more force and you will reach balance. Spend wind gusts.

9192.NAME: Totem directions
9192.DESCRIPTION: Check your eagle totem to determine directions, select USE to travel forward.

9193.NAME: Feed the birds
9193.DESCRIPTION: There are four bird feeders and you can buy more. Feed small birdies.

9194.NAME: Feeding sheep
9194.DESCRIPTION: Re-count the animals you are looking after, buy sheep and feed them.

9195.NAME: Check suroundings
9195.DESCRIPTION: Chop some trees, the strange bird might be hiding in the bushes. You can find more trees in the shop.

9196.NAME: Rooster story
9196.DESCRIPTION: Feed roosters and ask them about other birds inhabiting this island.

9197.NAME: Kiwi birds
9197.DESCRIPTION: Kiwi is a small non-flying bird that comes from distant lands. Feed Kiwi birds.

9198.NAME: Catch kites
9198.DESCRIPTION: Paper kites are drifting above and only after several attempts you manage to cache it. Wait for kites and collect them.

9199.NAME: Untangle the Kite
9199.DESCRIPTION: Wind has tied the kite in knots, use workshop to untangle the kiwi bird toy.

9200.NAME: Shocking
9200.DESCRIPTION: Oh, no, while catching the kite, you got struck by lightning. Use workshop to heal your wounds.

9201.NAME: Catch kites
9201.DESCRIPTION: Catch a Kite, but be careful. Storm clouds give kites more often, but you can get shocked.

9202.NAME: Fixing knots
9202.DESCRIPTION: Untie more knots for the joy of little kiwis.

9203.NAME: Kiwi joy
9203.DESCRIPTION: Hand back the lost kites to the small birds, this will definitely make them happy.

9204.NAME: Portable lighthouse
9204.DESCRIPTION: There are some quick-to-build lighthouses, find them, build them.

9205.NAME: Kiwi treats
9205.DESCRIPTION: Collect some ants form anthills to prepare snacks for your guests.

9206.NAME: Flower water
9206.DESCRIPTION: Finish building all of the flower fountains for kiwi friends to have a tasty drink.

9207.NAME: Tour the island
9207.DESCRIPTION: These birds can't fly so buy them from the shop and give them a walking tour.

9208.NAME: Catch kites
9208.DESCRIPTION: Untangle even more kites, how you get them is up to you.

9209.NAME: Happy kite
9209.DESCRIPTION: To finish this quest you will need more kiwis with kites simultaneously. Remember kiwis can be moved around.

9210.NAME: Feathers standing
9210.DESCRIPTION: Open the workshop and get your own kiwi. If you do not have the option you will need to reduce your shocking experience to 0

9212.NAME: Sand friends
9212.DESCRIPTION: The critters are burried deep in the sands so sell fields to dig them out.

9213.NAME: Night friends
9213.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps you did not see them, because they hid from hot midday sun. Empty the well and collect moon shells.

9214.NAME: Shy friends
9214.DESCRIPTION: In sand fields you have the creepy suspicion that someone is watching. Sell pond and get to the bottom of things.

9215.NAME: Poesia
9215.DESCRIPTION: Green bugs recommend reading poetry to gain some tangible effect.

9216.NAME: Nifty guards
9216.DESCRIPTION: Don't scare the hidden friends, feed dogs so they would behave.

9217.NAME: Fluffy koalas
9217.DESCRIPTION: Highly likely that sand friends will like these fluffy animals. Sell koalas.

9218.NAME: Daily tasks
9218.DESCRIPTION: Do at least one of the bug-friend related daily quests, if you don't have any, wait for tomorrow to come.

9219.NAME: Catch critters
9219.DESCRIPTION: When quests are done wait for critters to arrive, than greet them.

9220.NAME: Different critters
9220.DESCRIPTION: You will earn different critters with different daily quests. You can also use workshop to swap critters.

9221.NAME: Lava aksolotl
9221.DESCRIPTION: Swap a single sand critter collection to earn a axolotl lamp, try it!

9222.NAME: Green chalange
9222.DESCRIPTION: Green lava lamp can only be earned by doing sand critter daily quest nine times.

9223.NAME: Kitty lamp
9223.DESCRIPTION: Do not remove from bag, because will will not put it back. Purchase kitty lamp in shop.

9224.NAME: Burry your friend
9224.DESCRIPTION: Sand friends are still hiding under the sands. Plant any of the friends but only on Festival isle.

9225.NAME: Sand friends
9225.DESCRIPTION: This is alternative to get  collection. Open your bag check plant section and plant critters on FESTIVAL isle.

9226.NAME: Caught you
9226.DESCRIPTION: For this task you shall earn two cakes and also sand friends who were buried just moments ago. Dig them up.

924.NAME: Sheep herder
924.DESCRIPTION: Demonstrate how you can take care of sheep. Feed grown up sheep 15 times

925.NAME: Clay bowl
925.DESCRIPTION: Hand in the clay bowl so that Paprick has something to serve salad in.

926.NAME: Cloth weaver
926.DESCRIPTION: Demonstrate how you can craft cloth. Create 6 units of cloth

927.NAME: Dye cloth
927.DESCRIPTION: He wants to try and dye cloth, using your colors. Submit 5 paint buckets

9271.NAME: Hiding
9271.DESCRIPTION: Jump upon your raft and let's run away to Festival isle. Perhaps you can hide from school there, visit the island.

9272.NAME: Quiet corner
9272.DESCRIPTION: Island is a bit crowded with animals, in slow procession they disappear in woods. Buy Forest secret in shop.

9273.NAME: Into the trees
9273.DESCRIPTION: Check the bushes and find where did those animals go to. After opening the portal by using Forest secret, select USE.

9274.NAME: Giant guest
9274.DESCRIPTION: That's you! You are too big for this place, so chop your way forward.

9275.NAME: Intelligent animals
9275.DESCRIPTION: Mystic clearing reveals that animals have come to this place to study. Feed any animals.

9276.NAME: Secret instructors
9276.DESCRIPTION: If you wish to study here, you will need someone who will teach you. Find any of wise owls.

9277.NAME: Narrow path

Owl doubts you can finish entire semester in short time, you would need all the pearls.
Buy Ferris wheel on Atafu island.

9441.DESCRIPTION: By listening intently,, you think there are three different kinds of rumbles on the island, find the funny kind of rumble.

9442.NAME: The special harvest
9442.DESCRIPTION: Shake the tree hard, to get more goodies. In a few hours the trees will fall again. Collect the treasures of the trees.

9444.NAME: Autumn pranksters

9446.NAME: Hell dog ?
9446.DESCRIPTION: Hellhound visits more often during the scary days of the year, maybe you came earlier? Feed Hell dog.

9447.NAME: Weirdos ?

9448.NAME: Bear paws
9448.DESCRIPTION: Feed the cows, sheep or beers and encourage them to go for an autumn walk in your company.

945.DESCRIPTION: Timmy loves sweet tea. Give him some prickly melons, so he can make sugar out of them

9450.DESCRIPTION: One will come, all will come. Talk to chickens, roosters, toucans or elephants about a possible autumn trip.

9451.NAME: Bear walks
9451.DESCRIPTION: Bears want to stretch their bones before deep hibernation. Get the tracks by feeding the beasts on the base island then place the bear prints here.

9452.NAME: Looking for kitty
9452.DESCRIPTION: Tracks cat prints, look, tail in the bushes. Get the tracks by feeding the beasts on the main island then place the cat prints here.

9453.NAME: Footprint path
9453.DESCRIPTION: An elephant enjoys autumn by eating local leaves. Get the prints by feeding the giant on main island then place the elephant prints here.

9454.NAME: Autumn friend
9454.DESCRIPTION: Oceanians are really good friends! Let friends enjoy autumn, harvest any crops on a friend or Paprick's Island.

9455.NAME: Thundering waves
9455.DESCRIPTION: The sharp-eyed friends of the island point to the Ocean, look, something is swaying in the waves. Lift (move) any spruce ashore.

9456.NAME: Shy friends
9456.DESCRIPTION: Autumn friends finally overcame their shyness, welcome all friends and feed foxes, chickens, cats, bears, elephants or cows.

9457.NAME: Silence pact
9457.DESCRIPTION: Spruce or mountain ash, it doesn't matter to weirdos, but still, mountain ash has better prizes. Talk to weirdos.

9458.NAME: Enticing full moon
9458.DESCRIPTION: When else, if not now, to enjoy the golden autumn in the silver moonlight? Hellhound does not sleep at night. Have a talk.

9459.NAME: Sly culprits
9459.DESCRIPTION: Cut down the tree so you don't have to look for nuts. Smart! Catch the squirrels and prevent them from pushing such messy projects.

946.NAME: Anniversary wine barrel
946.DESCRIPTION: Timmy will have a birthday soon. Make and sell him a wine barrel

9460.NAME: Treefall sheep
9460.DESCRIPTION: After being encouraged, other beasts begin to emerge from the bushes. Feed everyday beasts (not squirrels).

9461.DESCRIPTION: There are no hedgehogs on the island that would be able to supply you with berries and mushrooms, so you will have to get the goods of the forest yourself.

9463.DESCRIPTION: Bustle on Autumn island and rejoice in the autumn, the acorn will drop after good work on the island is done.

9465.DESCRIPTION: Pumpkin lamps are best places for small wandering spirits to hide and stop wandering, so harvest some pumpkin fields.

9466.NAME: Bone beads

9467.NAME: Bat hideout
9467.DESCRIPTION: Plant split branch trees so that bats would have a nice hiding place.

9468.NAME: Flight of bat
9468.DESCRIPTION: Bats invite you to visit their birthplace, so get your raft, and sail there.

9469.NAME: Dig fields
9469.DESCRIPTION: The island is weird, the ground keeps trembling beneath. Have 38 fields at same time.

947.NAME: Warm blanket
947.DESCRIPTION: Timmy sometimes gets cold during nights. Craft and give him some cloths, so he can get warmer

9470.NAME: Sharpen teeth
9470.DESCRIPTION: Suddenly, you doubt that `booo` necklace will suffice. Sharpen bone beads in workshop to scare off the monsters.

9471.NAME: Friend consolation
9471.DESCRIPTION: To calm down, visit friends and earn spooky candy. If you don't have friends, keep reading.

9472.NAME: Hidden snacks
9472.DESCRIPTION: Do not worry bats hid some sweets in the cave, so visit Pinaki treasure cave to find some candy.

9473.NAME: Shake the bats
9473.DESCRIPTION: Bats are not scared of horrid sights, since they relay on hearing. Chop any threebranch palmtrees.

9474.DESCRIPTION: Lava pours from holes in the ground, clean up and store the ghost juices. After cleaning hand in ghost oil.

9476.NAME: Helldog's arrival
9476.DESCRIPTION: Hole slowly fills with tar, than a bone ladder comes up. Hug helldog once he appears.

9477.NAME: Festival isle
9477.DESCRIPTION: There's no better place for sunbathing than Festival island. Travel there.

9478.NAME: Ghostly horses
9478.DESCRIPTION: Create a spooky experience on this sunny island, feed ghostly horses and acclimate to spooky event.

9479.NAME: Spooky riders

948.NAME: Upgrade the bonfire
948.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the bonfire to its next stage

9480.DESCRIPTION: Oil the clocks, strange ticking gives you the creeps. Ghost oil can be obtained from fresh lava, check shop if you don't have any.

9481.NAME: Mirror dust
9481.DESCRIPTION: That's just a drawing on the layer of dust that coats the mirror. Clean all the mirrors.

9484.NAME: Ritual friend

9485.NAME: Infuse life

9486.NAME: Bat pack

9487.NAME: Bat tree
9487.DESCRIPTION: After tickling open plant section of backpack and plant the bat shreds.

9488.NAME: Scaring pumpkins
9488.DESCRIPTION: Ritual magic released possessed pumpkins. Pumpkins fear bats, scare the pumpkins.

9489.NAME: Use lamps
9489.DESCRIPTION: All that is left of a pumpkin after scaring, is just a glowing lamp. Use these to illuminate forest.

9490.NAME: Hell fire
9490.DESCRIPTION: Wait until next morning and you will see what lies under roots of the scary tree. Burn guests with hellhounds' hellfire.

9491.NAME: Slap monsters

9492.NAME: Take lamps apart

9493.NAME: Spare parts
9493.DESCRIPTION: While the lamp hull gets filled with wax, use  glowstick on pumpkins next to ghost. Build pumpkins.

9494.DESCRIPTION: Wax filled lamps will be a good bait for monsters. Keep in mind not all trees hide a monster.

9495.NAME: Gliding bats

9496.NAME: Riding the brooms
9496.DESCRIPTION: A squad of glow worms will fly behind bats. Prepare worms, sell all mounted brooms.

9497.NAME: Bombardment
9497.DESCRIPTION: The goal is to soften darkness by any means possible. Give hellfire to clear the darkness.

9498.NAME: Persuade gryphon

9499.NAME: Illuminate darkness

95.DESCRIPTION: Complete the 9 plank paths. Previously completed plank paths are not taken into account

9501.NAME: Haunted candy
9501.DESCRIPTION: The party is not perfect without spooky candies, give haunted candies.

9502.NAME: Digging lava
