9503.NAME: Bat guests
9503.DESCRIPTION: Ask more bats to visit you, hand in bats to start the party.

951.NAME: Finish building the house
951.DESCRIPTION: Finish building your new house and it will increase your maximum energy.

952.NAME: Build modern sheds
952.DESCRIPTION: Build any 3 modern sheds on the island

954.NAME: Flax cloth
954.DESCRIPTION: Craft cloth from flax in your workshop

955.NAME: Flax rope
955.DESCRIPTION: Craft rope from flax in your workshop

9556.NAME: Stomping
9556.DESCRIPTION: In order not to step on the researched individuals, movement will take place only along the paths. Build paths.

9557.NAME: Eye vitamins
9557.DESCRIPTION: Carrots improve eyesight, so sell rabbits to stock up on carrots.

9558.NAME: Banana notes
9558.DESCRIPTION: The researcher fell out of boat, the papers got wet. Harvest banana, coconut or pumpkin leaves to write on.

9559.NAME: Sandbank
9559.DESCRIPTION: The once-abandoned glass factories will come in handy again, go to the sandbank.

956.NAME: Create pizza from chili
956.DESCRIPTION: Cook chili pizza in the workshop

9560.NAME: Plant supremacy
9560.DESCRIPTION: The island has no masters, so the plants claimed their supremacy. Chop any plants on the island.

9561.NAME: Trail deeper
9561.DESCRIPTION: Thread further, on foot, find the sign on the Sandbank and follow the signs to get to the forest clearing.

9562.NAME: Little bats
9562.DESCRIPTION: Honduran bats are white and roost under leaves, not in caves. Pamper several such bats at the same time.

9563.NAME: Small spiders
9563.DESCRIPTION: Jumping spiders live all over the world, the peacock species is found in the tropics. Pet several such spiders at the same time.

9564.NAME: Little toads
9564.DESCRIPTION: The pumpkin toad is only a centimeter in size, yet it is poisonous. Pamper several such toads at the same time.

9565.NAME: Sand box
9565.DESCRIPTION: It is easier to melt the sand here, on site. Fill sandbags for melting.

9566.NAME: A special oven
9566.DESCRIPTION: The heat goes into the air, build a furnace to keep the heat for melting.

9567.NAME: Search tools
9567.DESCRIPTION: Make lenses from the sand that will help you see the small animals.

9568.NAME: Tire tree
9568.DESCRIPTION: Palm trees with yellow leaves smoke like old tires. Plant and harvest common palms. We recommend planting 15.

9569.NAME: Additional lenses
9569.DESCRIPTION: Very small marks are often visible, but the lens for further investigation is missing! Need lenses and fast! Produce!

957.NAME: Boiled eggs
957.DESCRIPTION: Boil eggs 5 times in the workshop section FOOD

9570.NAME: Otrā krāsns
9570.DESCRIPTION: One furnace cannot cope with the volume, time to master the second furnace.

9571.NAME: The third furnace
9571.DESCRIPTION: Borrowing some coal from the two previous furnaces, the third furnace builds up quite quickly. Building!

9572.NAME: Sparks
9572.DESCRIPTION: A fire was seen outside the oven! Find it and put it out, it's best to remove the bushes so it doesn't burn a second time.

9573.NAME: Time saving
9573.DESCRIPTION: To successfully use the furnaces, you will need to build hourglasses. Searching for dead trunks when felling tropical palms.

9574.NAME: More firewood
9574.DESCRIPTION: If you think about it, burning logs will also work for firewood. Chop wood.

9575.NAME: The fourth oven
9575.DESCRIPTION: It will burn, it will burn, the ocean surrounds it, the last furnace is being built.

9576.NAME: Researchers assistance
9576.DESCRIPTION: Unable to wait for the lenses, the researcher came to help. Give glass powder and lens for research.

9577.NAME: Want some fruits ?
9577.DESCRIPTION: Gives up worms, notes, herbivore. Harvest pitaya tomatoes, purple berries mangoes, pandanus or tangerines.

9578.NAME: Little bats
9578.DESCRIPTION: The beasts are measured, weighed and photographed. Feed the little bats.

9579.NAME: Friends of the tropics
9579.DESCRIPTION: Many rare birds are here, feed almost any of the birds and photograph them.

958.NAME: Cook spicy coconut soup
958.DESCRIPTION: Make coconut soup 3 times in the workshop

9580.NAME: Who eats who?
9580.DESCRIPTION: In search of insects of a suitable size, large areas of earth will have to be dug up. Create furrows on any island.

9581.NAME: Mini toad
9581.DESCRIPTION: Weigh two dozen small toads in one go to make the measurement more accurate. Feed the toads.

9582.NAME: Fish certificate
9582.DESCRIPTION: After digging, there is plenty of spare earthworms so document fish, go fishing.

9583.NAME: Without thread
9583.DESCRIPTION: Not all spiders weave webs, jumping spiders prefer to hunt by jumping on top of their prey. Get clues from sheep.

9584.NAME: Small spider
9584.DESCRIPTION: The spider's special eyes, dance and jumps are amazing. Feed and analyze spiders.

9585.NAME: Spider's Asylum
9585.DESCRIPTION: Cut the grass so that the spiders have nowhere to hide, then tie up straw bales so that the spiders hide there.

9586.NAME: Catch toads
9586.DESCRIPTION: It is not known where the toads are hiding, the whole region will have to be explored. Feed toads.

9587.NAME: Catch bats
9587.DESCRIPTION: It is not known under which leaves the bats are sleeping, but I can say for sure that they are here. Feed the bats.

9588.NAME: Catch spiders
9588.DESCRIPTION: It is not known when the spider will jump and give away its location, when you see it, then feed it.

9589.NAME: Escort scientist
9589.DESCRIPTION: Drink (get) the milk bottles and store the papers in a safe glass container.

959.NAME: Rainbow coloured roses
959.DESCRIPTION: Collect the roses that appear on the island. Roses that have been received as gifts do not count.

9590.NAME: 2nd candle
9590.DESCRIPTION: The assignment will be counted as finished, if you open the Advent calendar on December 4.

9591.NAME: 3rd candle
9591.DESCRIPTION: The assignment will be counted as finished, if you open the Advent calendar on December 11.

9592.NAME: 4th candle
9592.DESCRIPTION: The assignment will be counted as finished, if you open the Advent calendar on December 18.

960.NAME: Highest hay stack
960.DESCRIPTION: The locals are building a huge hay stack. Make and submit 200 straw bundles.

961.NAME: Bracelet contest
961.DESCRIPTION: The locals have decided to set a record and see how many bracelets can be put on one hand. Help them and submit flax stems.

9616.NAME: Warming in wool
9616.DESCRIPTION: Wrap yourself in the shriveled wool buns, and maybe somehow you will manage to overcome the cold.

9617.NAME: Fire heating
9617.DESCRIPTION: Top the fireplace with hefty batch of tinder. Warmth comes from abundance of firewood, that you should gather.

9618.NAME: Warm socks
9618.DESCRIPTION: Open closet (outfit section) and check if you have something warmer to wear.

9619.NAME: Blizzard cloud
9619.DESCRIPTION: Raft almost got frozen to beach, start sailing in Winter island direction.

962.NAME: Egg-eating record
962.DESCRIPTION: Local daredevil has decided to eat 300 portions of boiled eggs. Boil eggs 300 times at the workshop.

9620.NAME: Spruce buiseness
9620.DESCRIPTION: Chop x-mas trees, since at the moment they are in high demand, it also clears the view on island.

9621.NAME: Skiing on pillow
9621.DESCRIPTION: Turns out it is not a pillow hill, but someone is sleeping there, poke the hill to find out.

9622.NAME: Winter fairies
9622.DESCRIPTION: Small ice wing fairies are flying around the island, greet the fairies.

9623.NAME: Warm hands
9623.DESCRIPTION: To enjoy the season you will need a scarf, a hat and mittens. Craft mittens in workshop.

9624.NAME: Fairy heaps
9624.DESCRIPTION: Under the thick snow blanket you can find many different things. Uncover some snow fairies.

9625.NAME: Ice fey
9625.DESCRIPTION: To melt ice crystals you do not need mittens. Uncover some fairies frozen in ice.

9626.NAME: Snow tree
9626.DESCRIPTION: Snow blanket provides warmth. Select UPGRADE on ice ponds, then decorate the snow tree.

9627.NAME: Decorated trees
9627.DESCRIPTION: Help fairies enhance holiday spirits. Decorate dried trees. You can place finished trees at waters edge.

9628.NAME: Few paths
9628.DESCRIPTION: Clean approximately one forth of the paths, this will net you a bit of fertilizer.

9629.NAME: Bigger half
9629.DESCRIPTION: By cleaning more paths you will earn fodder and energy pears, as well as reputation.

963.NAME: Soup I
963.DESCRIPTION: In the first course you will serve 2 kinds of soup. Make tomato soup 5 times

9630.NAME: Clean path
9630.DESCRIPTION: Some paths are hidden beneath snow heaps, fortunately you can spot those heaps easy enough.

9631.NAME: Sprite friends
9631.DESCRIPTION: Help fey that wish to help. Snow fairies like animals, so feed any animals on your island.

9632.NAME: Cookie decorations
9632.DESCRIPTION: Snow fairies wish to decorate island using cookies. Finish building snow fairies.

9633.NAME: More decorations
9633.DESCRIPTION: Shiny ribbons used as scarfs by fairies. Decorate more dried trees.

9634.NAME: Botanical fairies
9634.DESCRIPTION: Ice fairies prefer spruces and plants over squirrels in the trees. Harvest any fields on main island.

9635.NAME: Soft spruces
9635.DESCRIPTION: Free more trees from ice, upgrade other two ice ponds and finish decorating them.

9636.NAME: Snow hogs
9636.DESCRIPTION: Ice fairies made straw stuffed pigs. Find all ice fairies and build their decorations.

9637.NAME: Cookie trap
9637.DESCRIPTION: Perhaps you noticed, but these cookies are meant for birds. Select UPGRADE on cookie jars.

9638.NAME: Ice friends
9638.DESCRIPTION: Crabs helped without even asking, reward them by feeding them.

9639.NAME: Snow bunnies
9639.DESCRIPTION: Not all snow heaps will let you clear them. Uncover and feed the six snow rabbits.

964.NAME: Soup II
964.DESCRIPTION: In the first course you will serve 2 kinds of soup. Make spicy coconut soup 5 times

9640.NAME: Spruce keepers
9640.DESCRIPTION: After feeding crabs worked even harder. Guess you should feed them even better then.

9641.NAME: Cookie heap
9641.DESCRIPTION: Eventually you will need to uncover all five remaining cookie jars. Now just two will suffice.

9642.NAME: Plowing the snow
9642.DESCRIPTION: Can't keep up with flying fairies, thus you should clean some snowy paths.

9643.NAME: Cookies are served
9643.DESCRIPTION: Do not forget to check behind spruces. Find all snow fairies, then get all the cookies.

9644.NAME: Holliday tower
9644.DESCRIPTION: In the exact center there are small trees. Set up gift tower there, select UPGRADE.

9645.NAME: Wintery giant
9645.DESCRIPTION: Fairies knitted lots of warm hats to keep the Kentosaur warm. Dress up the giant.

965.NAME: Main course
965.DESCRIPTION: For the main course, serve carrot stew. Make stew 5 times

966.NAME: Additional course
966.DESCRIPTION: You will definitely need an additional course. Collect mushrooms and make canned mushrooms 5 times

967.NAME: Dessert
967.DESCRIPTION: For dessert you can serve the delicious strawberry soup. Make 5 portions of soup

968.NAME: Snacks
968.DESCRIPTION: As a snack for the guests, make 5 pumpkin pies.

969.NAME: Flour for buns
969.DESCRIPTION: Cudsy makes delicious buns. Give her some sacks of flour.

970.NAME: Feeding sloths
970.DESCRIPTION: Feed your or your friend's sloths 20 times

972.NAME: Flowers for Cudsy
972.DESCRIPTION: Cudsy loves flowers. To cheer her up, buy and sell 30 blue, orange or white flowers.

9723.NAME: Game
9723.DESCRIPTION: Sell the beautiful stones you get from shells as many hours as it takes to grow an adult cat.

9724.NAME: Has
9724.DESCRIPTION: In the BUILDINGS section, find and build an object three times, which gives you 8 reputation each time you complete it.

9725.NAME: A secret
9725.DESCRIPTION: If you don't know when to celebrate your birthday, bake a delicious cake for each month of the year.

9726.NAME: Prize
9726.DESCRIPTION: Get Crystalline Coal for each of the native on Paprik Island. This coal can often be found together with clay.

9727.NAME: That can
9727.DESCRIPTION: Paprick will provide vegetables for fish soup, while you must try to catch the necessary fish for six portions of soup.

9728.NAME: Be earned
9728.DESCRIPTION: The year 2023 in the Eastern calendar is dedicated to this beast. Spend 40 units of food to feed these beasts.

9729.NAME: By traveling
9729.DESCRIPTION: Empty the bear feeders as many hours as it takes to fully grow one fox.

973.NAME: Stone blocks for Cudsy
973.DESCRIPTION: Make and submit 40 stone blocks. Cudsy plans to build 2 new stone sheds for food.

9730.NAME: By raft
9730.DESCRIPTION: This product of animal origin is very difficult to obtain and cannot be bought in a store. Earn it 12 times.

9731.NAME: To reach
9731.DESCRIPTION: Perform the only possible action with the build that first gave you  1 maximum energy at the beginning of the game.

9732.NAME: Tikei
9732.DESCRIPTION: Craft the simplest piece of jewelry as many times as you can earn shells by selling that piece of jewelry.

9733.NAME: Island
9733.DESCRIPTION: Feed those beasts that have two ruby alternatives in store. The number of feedings matches the store price.

9734.NAME: And afterwards
9734.DESCRIPTION: Milk the coconuts as many times as one action regenerates in Sea Cabbage gulf.

9735.NAME: Baking
9735.DESCRIPTION: Of all the things in the Nice Pack (store), this material has the fewest uses. Spend 32 times.

9736.NAME: Bread
9736.DESCRIPTION: This plant grows quickly, but dies after only two days. Harvest as many times as the cost of fishing lure.

9737.NAME: In workshop
9737.DESCRIPTION: Harvest food for pandas as many times as the cost of a bug in fishing.

9738.NAME: Second
9738.DESCRIPTION: Use on your island building, which gives pinecones to your friends, 50 times.

9739.NAME: Surprise
9739.DESCRIPTION: Harvest a vegetable that can be used in shark roast as many times as there are hours between horse feedings.

974.NAME: Reputation for the debate
974.DESCRIPTION: If you want to talk to the local senior council, you need to gain more reputation.

9740.NAME: Will reveal
9740.DESCRIPTION: Make as many shell storages as hours needed for Pinaki islands cave to recover one action.

9741.NAME: When visiting
9741.DESCRIPTION: These things cost 16 shells in the shop. Plant them as many times as a turtle can go without eating.

9742.NAME: Your
9742.DESCRIPTION: Visit Pinaki Island as many times as a grown chicken has legs.

9743.NAME: Friends
9743.DESCRIPTION: This beast sometimes gives wild berries. Feed big and small as many times as you get shells from selling adult beast.

9744.NAME: Or visiting
9744.DESCRIPTION: Without opening the bag, sell 50 times what gives no shells, no experience, no reputation when sold.

9745.NAME: Papric
9745.DESCRIPTION: Selling 20 such animals that take 6 hours from purchase to growth.

9746.NAME: You decide
9746.DESCRIPTION: Uses the only recipe that gives 36 food units per use, as many times as the yeast costs in the store.

9747.NAME: To spend
9747.DESCRIPTION: Build any decoration that sometimes gives the smiling mask number of times matching scarecrows on Paprik isle.

9748.NAME: Nine
9748.DESCRIPTION: Find and sell the thing that gives you 76 shells, as many times as there are fishing spots on Atafu Island.

9749.NAME: Ants
9749.DESCRIPTION: In Pinaki Island, make it so that you need one chocolate.

975.NAME: Coconuts for the council
975.DESCRIPTION: Submit 20 coconuts as an offering to the senior council.

9751.NAME: Last
9751.DESCRIPTION: Don't sit at home as many times as ruby price for package of fertilizer.

9752.NAME: Treasure
9752.DESCRIPTION: Make it so that you have to wait 28 minutes in the workshop.

9753.NAME: Return to
9753.DESCRIPTION: Repeats the first task of the third puzzle objective.

9754.NAME: Home
9754.DESCRIPTION: Repeats the second task of the first puzzle objective.

9755.NAME: Island
9755.DESCRIPTION: Repeats the third task of the second puzzle objective.

9756.NAME: Change
9756.DESCRIPTION: Sell the beasts that give the least number of shells when sold, earn 30 shells like this.

9757.NAME: Seven
9757.DESCRIPTION: Get 31 shells with every sale. Make 15 such sales.

9758.NAME: Outfits
9758.DESCRIPTION: Sell from bag and get 3 shells for every sale, sell 15 times.

9759.NAME: Riddle 37 of ??
9759.DESCRIPTION: Build 10 times those decors that use up 2 dyes in the building process.

976.NAME: Obsidian for the council
976.DESCRIPTION: Give obsidian to the senior council. 6 pieces should suffice.

9760.NAME: Riddle 38 of ??
9760.DESCRIPTION: This plant is found in a seed pack, the number of seeds in this pack is the least among plants. Sow (not harvest) two pack worth of these seeds.

9761.NAME: Riddle 39 of ??
9761.DESCRIPTION: Of all the beasts, this beast gets sick the fastest, feed it 30 times.

9762.NAME: Riddle 40 of ??
9762.DESCRIPTION: Find a plant that dies 27 hours after planting. When you guess the plant, collect 120 units of it.

9763.NAME: Riddle 41 of ??
9763.DESCRIPTION: Feeds a beast that can eat 12 units of food in one go. Feed 40 times.

9764.NAME: Riddle 42 of ??
9764.DESCRIPTION: Build decorations that consume iron ore. Build five such decorations.

9765.NAME: Riddle 43 of ??
9765.DESCRIPTION: Build those decors that spend 8 lianas in the building process. Complete 5 such decorations.

9766.NAME: Riddle 44 of ??
9766.DESCRIPTION: Feeds an adult beast that sometimes provides a shard, rope, shell, or egg.

9767.NAME: Riddle 45 of ??
9767.DESCRIPTION: Trim the only plant that has its own separate section. As many times as the shells it costs in the shop.

9772.NAME: Qualification
9772.DESCRIPTION: Don't rush, first sit down and think about it. Build some simple stools. After you do that seek out Stadium island.

9773.NAME: Bronze discipline I
9773.DESCRIPTION: Remember, it is possible to walk through dug-out fields, so it is best to plant crops in narrow passages. Sow carrots from the store.

9774.NAME: Bronze discipline II
9774.DESCRIPTION: Animals can easily be moved to places that are not accessible, returning them only at feeding times. Sell cats.

9775.NAME: Bronze discipline III
9775.DESCRIPTION: Boil 16 eggs. Think carefully at what point and how you will use the workshop.

9776.NAME: Bronze discipline IV
9776.DESCRIPTION: Pruning the bushes found in the shop's shrubbery spending six hours worth of energy when pruning.

9777.NAME: Bronze discipline V
9777.DESCRIPTION: Prepare food from the goodies brought by the hedgehogs. Do this as many times as there are minutes in half an hour.

9778.NAME: Bronze discipline VI
9778.DESCRIPTION: Eight different butterflies give something special. Spend this item three times. The task will take several days to complete.

9779.NAME: Bronze discipline VII
9779.DESCRIPTION: Sometimes you will have to make a decision, save shells, or save time. Feed lambs and sheep.

9780.NAME: Bronze discipline VIII
9780.DESCRIPTION: You can never have too many straw bales in Oceania, so harvest a few more fields of corn.

9781.NAME: Bronze discipline IX
9781.DESCRIPTION: Remember when I mentioned the straw bale? Now you can spend them to finish the haystacks.

9782.NAME: Silver discipline I
9782.DESCRIPTION: Let's get straight to the traditions, in every cup competition it is required to cut down 16 jungle plots, this time is no exception, cut down!

9783.NAME: Silver discipline II
9783.DESCRIPTION: Open spaces are always a problem in the Cup. Harvest 100 tomatoes.

9784.NAME: Silver discipline III
9784.DESCRIPTION: Some things can neither be forced nor bypassed, make clay pots in the workshop. Adjust your pace according to the task.

9785.NAME: Silver discipline IV
9785.DESCRIPTION: Eliminate the one that needs the special shovel 16 times. If you managed to do it earlier, the reserve is in the store.

9786.NAME: Silver discipline V
9786.DESCRIPTION: At the same time, keep the largest completed clay decorations, you will need five such decorations.

9787.NAME: Silver discipline VI
9787.DESCRIPTION: Although any mammal can be milked, specific animals are milked on a daily basis. Sell 12 animals that give milk.

9788.NAME: Silver discipline VII
9788.DESCRIPTION: Sometimes you have to know how to stop, if you had let the cabbage spots regenerate, then now you will save time. Fish!

9789.NAME: Silver discipline VIII
9789.DESCRIPTION: A task that can be put off until the last moment, places 50 hourglasses at the same time.

979.NAME: Sand for Toddrick
979.DESCRIPTION: Buy and sell 50 sacks of sand

9790.NAME: Silver discipline IX
9790.DESCRIPTION: Good that linen fabric does not require time in the workshop, sell 15 hammocks.

9791.NAME: Gold discipline I
9791.DESCRIPTION: Truffle seeds are hard to get but easy to spend, please show the contents of your bag, give truffle seeds.

9792.NAME: Gold discipline II
9792.DESCRIPTION: The lack of doubloons is a rake that is stepped on in every cup competition. This time, doubloons must be spent on buying 3 marble fountains.

9793.NAME: Gold discipline III
9793.DESCRIPTION: Historically, there have been cup competitions where the amount required has been even higher. Feed cubs and bears.

9794.NAME: Gold discipline IV
9794.DESCRIPTION: Probably the hardest puzzle in years. Craft 7 times in the workshop what costs 1100 shells when sold.

9795.NAME: Gold discipline V
9795.DESCRIPTION: Make cuts in the maximum grown tall palms as many times as it takes minutes to grow an adult rooster.

9796.NAME: Gold discipline VI
9796.DESCRIPTION: Chop only those stones that can be completely eliminated, make 210 such cuts. If that's not enough, there's more in store.

9797.NAME: Gold discipline VII
9797.DESCRIPTION: Did you give away the truffle seeds? Excellent! Now harvest 200 truffle fields to renew your seed supply.

9798.NAME: Gold discipline VIII
9798.DESCRIPTION: Harvest tangerine or lilac bushes. One type of bush is only on the island, the other is only in the shop.

9799.NAME: Gold discipline IX
9799.DESCRIPTION: Some have not yet seen the Haraiki Island monument, others have long since completed these sculptures. Build all Haraiki statues.

98.NAME: Place 7 plank fence
98.DESCRIPTION: Buy and place 7 plank fences. Previously placed fences are not taken into account

9800.NAME: Fight for cup
9800.DESCRIPTION: Collect all three snow globes, fastest 10 people who do this will have their names displayed on Paprick's island.

9801.NAME: Cabbage for Pika
9801.DESCRIPTION: All the desert cabbages have been washed into the ocean, if you want to pass Elvis, fish for cabbages.

9802.NAME: Move Elvis
9802.DESCRIPTION: While the pika is eating, take it by the tuft and move it, only in this way you will be able to clear the way forward.

9803.NAME: Lighthouses
9803.DESCRIPTION: If you want Pika to give the green light and move to your island, you will have to hold four lighthouses at the same time.

9804.NAME: Red and pretty?
9804.DESCRIPTION: A bunch of radishes makes a great gift! Try it - it will prompt a laugh and a hearty snacking.

9805.NAME: Reputation
9805.DESCRIPTION: Remember that money is not wasted if the purchased thing brings you joy. Not everything has to be practical. Gain reputation.

9806.NAME: Round and crispy?
9806.DESCRIPTION: Radish salad is perfect for local eaters - it goes perfectly with potatoes.

9807.NAME: Honey
9807.DESCRIPTION: It's easier to do work if you treat those around you with treats and sweets. Hand in honey.

9808.NAME: Visits the festival island
9808.DESCRIPTION: Maybe you can also see some festive moods on the Festival Island. Especially if you don't know how to make hives yet.

9809.NAME: Aromatic and delicious
9809.DESCRIPTION: Radishes are a great ingredient, you can add them in cold soup, or just nibble on it, as is.

9810.NAME: Pets at home
9810.DESCRIPTION: Remember to pamper your four-legged, tweeting or swimming friends too. Feed cats or kittens.

9811.NAME: Delicacies
9811.DESCRIPTION: Snacks do not necessarily have to be sweet, but sometimes sugar can drive away bad thoughts and problems. Get sugar.

9812.NAME: Healthy and full of vitamins?
9812.DESCRIPTION: Sow as many radishes as you and those you treat can eat. They can overgrow and become inedible.

9813.NAME: Salmon, salmon
9813.DESCRIPTION: We can preserve what is around us. Take care of the fish in the rivers, the animals in the forest and the birds in the treetops. Sell salmon.

9814.NAME: Grow fields
9814.DESCRIPTION: Spring is coming, the snow will melt and reveal furrows that you can fill with greenery and flowers. Plant plants in furrows.

9815.NAME: Millions of radishes!!!
9815.DESCRIPTION: Radishes can be grown on the balcony. You only need a solid box, water them twice a day and enjoy the fruits of your labor.

9816.NAME: White bread
9816.DESCRIPTION: You can do all kinds of activities together and share common joy in your hobbies and skills. Make bread.

9817.NAME: Gerberas
9817.DESCRIPTION: You can also acknowledge us - the creators of the game. Present the gerberas, we really like them. Gerberas can be obtained by emptying hives.

9819.NAME: Hammerhead fishing
9819.DESCRIPTION: Balun is brave and agile, catching hammerhead sharks is nothing to him.

982.NAME: Reviving Murrick's garden
982.DESCRIPTION: Murrick's garden has dried out. Make and sell him 3 ponds or pools

9820.NAME: Crocodiles
9820.DESCRIPTION: Big teeth and an angry look are what we see, but the owner of these pets sees something completely different.

9821.NAME: Tangerine cocktail
9821.DESCRIPTION: A blender is a great invention and allows you to turn an everyday routine, into a little taste adventure.

9822.NAME: Limestone paths
9822.DESCRIPTION: In her free time, she does not knit, she is busy making great paths.

9823.NAME: Silk
9823.DESCRIPTION: Her favorite fabric is silk. It requires special treatment and attention, but it can make wonderful outfits.

983.NAME: Kind helper
983.DESCRIPTION: Murrick is fond of helpful people. Prove yourself by helping your friends with their harvest.

9830.NAME: Straw bales
9830.DESCRIPTION: Besides, you can make many things yourself. Your hands and available tutorials on the Internet will come to aid you in this. Make straw bales.

9831.NAME: It won't be like that
9831.DESCRIPTION: Do we really need FIVE MORE!!!

9832.NAME: Lemon juice
9832.DESCRIPTION: The ingredients may be the simplest, but when mixed in the right proportions, sequence and combination - SUPER!

9833.NAME: Cactus lemonade
9833.DESCRIPTION: Vipiti doesn't understand why you have a shelf full of pretty glasses if you never use them?

984.NAME: Beans for Murrick
984.DESCRIPTION: Murrick loves beans. Give him 50 tasty beans

9841.NAME: New clothing
9841.DESCRIPTION: Do you grow radishes? Time to freshen up. Go to the PROFILE section and put on the new holiday shirt with the friendly heart.

9842.NAME: Food
9842.DESCRIPTION: A treat will also be useful for us, the creators of the game - give us some food.

9843.NAME: Marble paths
9843.DESCRIPTION: Making paths takes time and care. For Flinzy, they turn out of such high quality that sometimes she can even sell them.

9844.NAME: Paths with ornament
9844.DESCRIPTION: It is said that once they even ended up in the corridors of a mighty castle. Maybe it is, maybe it isn't, but the important thing is to keep going.

9845.NAME: High quality paint
9845.DESCRIPTION: Adonsy uses only the best paint. It's expensive, but she insists it's worth it.

9846.NAME: Llama wool
9846.DESCRIPTION: She has also tried to breed various animals that give wool, but she does not succeed. Maybe you can?

9847.NAME: Duckbills
9847.DESCRIPTION: It took a long time and knowledge for him to be able to take care of even a platypus.

9848.NAME: Sloths
9848.DESCRIPTION: Even the slowest friend is the concern of the manager. This does not mean that the worries and concerns are less.

9849.NAME: Octopus fishing
9849.DESCRIPTION: He respects his hobby and his surroundings. He made sure that nature remained untouched.

985.NAME: Bean gatherer
985.DESCRIPTION: Help your friends to gather beans

9850.NAME: Sell aquariums
9850.DESCRIPTION: He finds peace and relaxation from the pent up worries, and unravels the threads of thoughts that were let behind in the daily rush.

9852.NAME: Materials I
9852.DESCRIPTION: First, scrolls are needed. Hideko insists that shell scrolls are the best fit.

9853.NAME: Materials II
9853.DESCRIPTION: A rich feast is needed to unveil the temple. Submit 1600 watermelon fruits.

9854.NAME: Materials III
9854.DESCRIPTION: This is getting interesting, Hideko says the temple is a "path," and it's worth illuminating this path. Submit torches.

9855.NAME: Upgrade the Flower Temple
9855.DESCRIPTION: Press the right button on the temple and UPGRADE it.

9856.NAME: Surprising Journey
9856.DESCRIPTION: After upgrading, something incredible happens in the temple, try to visit it. Press the right button on the temple and USE it.

9857.NAME: Cosmic Diamond
9857.DESCRIPTION: I must admit that diamonds are truly beautiful. They can certainly be used impractically as well.

9858.NAME: Explore the Island
9858.DESCRIPTION: The island is terribly overgrown, who knows what might be hiding under the jungles and fallen trees.

9859.NAME: Check the Critters
9859.DESCRIPTION: Find and check these little flyers. They might be hiding something too.

986.NAME: Wheat, grape and flax gatherer
986.DESCRIPTION: Help your friends to gather wheat, grapes and flax.

9861.NAME: Bamboo Chair Recipe
9861.DESCRIPTION: Submit 800 bamboo sticks. They are obtained from mature bamboos.

9862.NAME: Bamboo Waterfall Recipe
9862.DESCRIPTION: To obtain the bamboo waterfall recipe, you need to submit 600 bamboo shoots. They can be obtained from young bamboos.

9863.NAME: Bamboo Tables
9863.DESCRIPTION: To obtain bamboo tables, you need to restore bamboo paths. Complete the task Build Bamboo Paths.

9864.NAME: Appease Jungle Pandas I
9864.DESCRIPTION: They are found on the left side of the island. They like bamboo sticks and dragonflies.

9865.NAME: Appease Jungle Pandas II
9865.DESCRIPTION: The pandas are picky, and overall satisfied with the general chaos around.

9866.NAME: Appease Jungle Pandas III
9866.DESCRIPTION: It seems the pandas are very satisfied with the feast and ready to trust you.

9867.NAME: Panda Cubs
9867.DESCRIPTION: Place the trusted panda cubs on the map.

9868.NAME: Raise Blue Pandas
9868.DESCRIPTION: Diligently feed the panda cubs and don't let them get sick.

9869.NAME: Feed Adult Blue Pandas
9869.DESCRIPTION: Feed the adult pandas and obtain fruit drink 40 times.

987.NAME: Fruit gatherer
987.DESCRIPTION: Help your friends to gather fruit from the trees. (This includes coconut, banana, pittaya and pandanoh trees)

9870.NAME: Upgrade the Pond
9870.DESCRIPTION: Press UPGRADE on the Suspicious Pond.

9873.NAME: Temple Granaries
9873.DESCRIPTION: Thousands of travelers will come here to see this wonder. Submit 18,000 food.

9874.NAME: Celebration Delicacy
9874.DESCRIPTION: The opening ceremony will be truly grand, it needs a special delicacy. Submit 1200 pitaya fruits.

9875.NAME: Podium Blocks
9875.DESCRIPTION: A substantial weight is needed to lift the hidden panda. Submit 800 decorative blocks.

9876.NAME: Reveal the First Koi Pond
9876.DESCRIPTION: Perform a physical restoration of the pond.

9877.NAME: Build Modern Storage
9877.DESCRIPTION: A huge amount of samples will have to be collected - build modern storage.

9878.NAME: Purchase a Modern Microscope
9878.DESCRIPTION: I have found a supplier for the latest model microscope. Sell Citrine, Jade, or Jasper necklaces.

9879.NAME: Restore the Second Koi Pond
9879.DESCRIPTION: Perform a physical restoration of the pond.

988.NAME: Tomato gatherer
988.DESCRIPTION: Help your friends to gather tomatoes

9880.NAME: Heat Problem
9880.DESCRIPTION: This climate is very hot. Our expedition members need to be able to cool down. Sell 50 peacock feather fans.

9881.NAME: Moonlight Elixir
9881.DESCRIPTION: We will have to consult with already known mystical forces. Provide 700 units of Moonlight Elixir.

9882.NAME: Restore the Third Koi Pond
9882.DESCRIPTION: Perform a physical restoration of the pond.

9883.NAME: Food for the Expedition
9883.DESCRIPTION: Since we will have to stay here for a long time, serious food supplies are needed. Submit 50 units of flour.

9884.NAME: Preventive Actions
9884.DESCRIPTION: Constant use of Underground Horseradishes prevents the possibility of contracting jungle fever. Submit 300 horseradishes.

9885.NAME: Restore the Fourth Koi Pond
9885.DESCRIPTION: Perform a physical restoration of the pond.

9886.NAME: Serious Employees
9886.DESCRIPTION: Employees need to be recruited. Sell Lady llamas, Gentleman raccoons, or Gentleman kangaroos.

9887.NAME: Finance
9887.DESCRIPTION: Research will continue for the next decade, it must be financially sustainable. Submit 1,000,000 shells.

9888.NAME: Plant Bamboos
9888.DESCRIPTION: Start cultivating the new plant. Plant 70 bamboos on this island.

9889.NAME: Obtain Bamboo Shoots
9889.DESCRIPTION: Bamboo shoots can be obtained by cutting only young bamboos.

989.NAME: Pumpkin and melon gatherer
989.DESCRIPTION: Help your friends to gather pumpkins or melons

9890.NAME: Light the Lanterns
9890.DESCRIPTION: Hang the lanterns on the sturdiest of bamboos. Hideko says it's vitally necessary for the atmosphere of this place.

9891.NAME: Cut Small Bamboos
9891.DESCRIPTION: Cut newly sprouted bamboos, Valda will add them to her collection.

9892.NAME: Obtain Bamboo Sticks
9892.DESCRIPTION: Bamboo sticks can only be obtained from mature bamboos.

9893.NAME: Light All Island Lanterns
9893.DESCRIPTION: To complete the island's decoration, all remaining island lanterns need to be lit.

9897.NAME: Feed Blue Pandas
9897.DESCRIPTION: First, the eating habits of the pandas need to be checked. Feed small or adult Blue Pandas.

9898.NAME: Sell Horses
9898.DESCRIPTION: It seems that pandas can't compete with horses in practical terms, and certainly not in speed. Sell adult Horses.

9899.NAME: Sell Elephants
9899.DESCRIPTION: Pandas are big and make a good impression, but elephants are much bigger. Sell adult Elephants.

99.NAME: Complete 7 plank fences
99.DESCRIPTION: Complete the 7 placed plank fences. Previously completed fences are not taken into account

990.NAME: Cut trees
990.DESCRIPTION: Cut trees on your friend's islands

9900.NAME: Sell Blue Pandas
9900.DESCRIPTION: It needs to be checked if pandas are profitable enough to be worth raising. Sell Blue Pandas.

9901.NAME: Sell Wallabies
9901.DESCRIPTION: It seems that some similarities can be found, but you wouldn't call these animals brothers. Sell adult Wallabies.

9902.NAME: Sell Antelopes
9902.DESCRIPTION: We can immediately note - pandas don't have horns. It's not clear if that's an advantage. Sell adult Antelopes.

9903.NAME: Raise Blue Pandas
9903.DESCRIPTION: The last comparison is with savanna animals, but Gonzo no longer hopes - pandas are not suitable. Sell Blue Pandas.

9904.NAME: Sell Zebras
9904.DESCRIPTION: Zebras are Gonzo's favorite animals. His herd is the best. Sell adult Zebras.

9905.NAME: Sell Crocodiles
9905.DESCRIPTION: Only the most experienced farmers can handle crocodiles. Like Gonzo. Sell adult Crocodiles.

9906.NAME: Build Bamboo Chairs
9906.DESCRIPTION: Let's start the comparison. This chair will definitely win over plank stools, but comparison is needed. Build Bamboo Chairs.

9907.NAME: Build Benches
9907.DESCRIPTION: Plank benches are definitely a thing of the past for any self-respecting Governor's island. Build Plank Benches.

9908.NAME: Build Lounge Chairs
9908.DESCRIPTION: Undeniably practical in the Oceanian climate, but the design is too simple. Build Lounge Chairs.

9909.NAME: Build Bamboo Chairs
9909.DESCRIPTION: It seems that even with these seats, it will be the winner. Build Bamboo Chairs.

991.NAME: Feed animals
991.DESCRIPTION: As an Easter tradition, the locals feed their animals so that they'd be healthy throughout the autumn. Feed any animal on your island.

9910.NAME: Iron Benches
9910.DESCRIPTION: Such benches are visually colossal, but they are meant only for short-term rest. Build Iron Benches.

9911.NAME: Redwood Throne
9911.DESCRIPTION: This "chair" is mighty, but the interior must be adapted to the chair. Build Redwood Thrones.

9912.NAME: Build Bamboo Chairs
9912.DESCRIPTION: Even in the fiercest competition, bamboo chairs are perfect for any Oceanian residence. Build Bamboo Chairs.

9913.NAME: Mahogany Lounge Chairs
9913.DESCRIPTION: These can compete with any chairs. They are truly both exquisite and comfortable. Build Mahogany Lounge Chairs.

9914.NAME: Jewel Thrones
9914.DESCRIPTION: These chairs create a specific feeling, but such taste is not everyday. Build Jewel Thrones.

9915.NAME: Search for Bamboo Paths
9915.DESCRIPTION: Branches, leaves, vines, and everything possible cover the ground in a thick layer - find 10 paths.

9916.NAME: Mature Bamboos
9916.DESCRIPTION: Obtain materials for path restoration - cut down 10 mature bamboos.

9917.NAME: Restore Bamboo Paths
9917.DESCRIPTION: The paths are heavily damaged, but it is possible to restore them. Restore Bamboo Paths.

9918.NAME: Find Bamboo Paths
9918.DESCRIPTION: Branches, leaves, vines, and everything possible cover the ground in a thick layer - find 10 paths.

9919.NAME: Mature Bamboos
9919.DESCRIPTION: Obtain materials for path restoration - cut down 10 mature bamboos.

992.NAME: Strawberry and onion gatherer
992.DESCRIPTION: Help your friends to gather strawberries or onions

9920.NAME: Restore Bamboo Paths
9920.DESCRIPTION: The paths are heavily damaged, but it is possible to restore them. Restore Bamboo Paths.

9921.NAME: Find Bamboo Paths
9921.DESCRIPTION: Branches, leaves, vines, and everything possible cover the ground in a thick layer - find 10 paths.

9922.NAME: Mature Bamboos
9922.DESCRIPTION: Obtain materials for path restoration - cut down 10 mature bamboos.

9923.NAME: Restore Bamboo Paths
9923.DESCRIPTION: The paths are heavily damaged, but it is possible to restore them. Restore Bamboo Paths.

9924.NAME: Build Bamboo Tables
9924.DESCRIPTION: This table doesn't have a traditional shape, but it might be an advantage.

9925.NAME: Build Tables
9925.DESCRIPTION: A well-maintained clay table is beautiful, but the material is very fragile. Build clay tables.

9926.NAME: Build Tables
9926.DESCRIPTION: Volcanic rock furniture is undeniably a style choice, but it's heavy. Build volcanic rock tables.

9927.NAME: Build Bamboo Tables
9927.DESCRIPTION: Every decision related to furniture affects your daily life. Build bamboo tables.

9928.NAME: Build Painted Tables
9928.DESCRIPTION: Using paint, we can create many great styles, but is it necessary? Build Painted Tables.

9929.NAME: Build Mahogany Coffee Tables
9929.DESCRIPTION: Tables or coffee tables, that is the question. Build Mahogany Coffee Tables.

993.NAME: Carrot, corn and chili gatherer
993.DESCRIPTION: Help your friends to gather carrots, corn or chili

9930.NAME: Build Bamboo Tables
9930.DESCRIPTION: Although many tables are good, let's choose to match the style. Build Bamboo Tables.

9931.NAME: Build Iron Tables
9931.DESCRIPTION: When it comes to utility outdoors, this table is unbeatable. Build Iron Tables.

9932.NAME: Build Jewel Tables
9932.DESCRIPTION: There are pieces of furniture so expensive that using them daily is impractical. Build Jewel Tables.

9933.NAME: Build Bamboo Fountains
9933.DESCRIPTION: Taste in decor is individual and difficult to compare. Build Bamboo Fountains.

9934.NAME: Build Royal Water Lilies
9934.DESCRIPTION: Some decorations are perfect for plants. Build Royal Water Lilies.

9935.NAME: Purchase Wise Owl Decor
9935.DESCRIPTION: It turns out books are perfect for owls to sit on. Purchase Wise Owls.

9936.NAME: Build Bamboo Fountains
9936.DESCRIPTION: This decor creates a great atmosphere with the sound of flowing water. Build Bamboo Fountains.

9937.NAME: Build Bird Statues
9937.DESCRIPTION: Some people like everything related to birds. Build Bird Statues from limestone.

9938.NAME: Build Gem Trees
9938.DESCRIPTION: Some find joy in looking at the gems they own. Build Gem Trees.

9939.NAME: Build Bamboo Fountains
9939.DESCRIPTION: This fountain is very relaxing and fits into the new interior. Build Bamboo Fountains.

994.NAME: Sea shell collector
994.DESCRIPTION: Help your friends to collect sea shells

9940.NAME: Build Decorative Figurines
9940.DESCRIPTION: For some, the most important aspect of decor is its place of origin. Build Decorative Figurines.

9941.NAME: Build Lava Lamps
9941.DESCRIPTION: Many decorations are designed for light or related to it. Build Lava Lamps.

9944.NAME: Homeschooling
9944.DESCRIPTION: Uncle is great at physics and chemistry, Evie is often shown practical experiments. Get food.

9945.NAME: Supervision
9945.DESCRIPTION: The newly brewed concoction grew eyes and now Evie has a new jelly pet. Feed any beasts.

9946.NAME: Socialization
9946.DESCRIPTION: We have to visit Hag the aunt together, so we have to wash and clean up. Use up the water so you can fill the bath with swamp sewage.

9947.NAME: Pipe's end
9947.DESCRIPTION: Aunt's visit is postponed, we are going to the black island, maybe the gel was washed away there. Travel!

9948.NAME: Terribly beautiful
9948.DESCRIPTION: Even Uncle's dynamite can't blow a hole in the bushes. Get a saw, a sickle, or ask Uncle to get a rubber sap.

9949.NAME: Road cutting
9949.DESCRIPTION: Some bushes are easy to trim, others not so much. Break a path in any direction. Note, the brown bushes are walkable, so they don't count.

995.NAME: Cutting the garden
995.DESCRIPTION: Tussy's garden is overgrown. It needs some cutting. Give machetes to Tussy.

9950.NAME: Soft ground
9950.DESCRIPTION: The ground here is extremely hard, find a place to plant a  shovel. This field will be a completely different color.

9951.NAME: A tunnel in the ground
9951.DESCRIPTION: According to the hand, this field is not under the walking bush. When you find a place, dig a furrow!

9952.NAME: Sow the pod
9952.DESCRIPTION: Each pod will have a different effect when the furrow is dug, throw any of the pods into the ground.

9953.NAME: Help Evie
9953.DESCRIPTION: Uncle told me to stay on the raft, but the horrid bushes look SO fun. Help me crawl away. IMPROVE Evie.

9954.NAME: Underground tunnel
9954.DESCRIPTION: Evie knows how to trim needle roses, after improvement, pick the terrible sedge.

9955.NAME: The journey of bats
9955.DESCRIPTION: Where did Evie go? Hi, hi, hi, asks the bats, press USE after completing the two previous tasks.

9956.NAME: Chop lightning
9956.DESCRIPTION: Uncle's favorite pastime was to catch lightning while swinging an axe. Cut down all lightning strikes.

9957.NAME: Grounding
9957.DESCRIPTION: Not all lightning strikes at once, others will appear later. Plant carrots and send lightning deep underground.

9958.NAME: Sharp wool
9958.DESCRIPTION: One benefit of lightning, petting the sheep makes their wool rise in the air, time to shear! Feed the sheep or cats and shear them.

9959.NAME: The Lost Butler
9959.DESCRIPTION: Just when the butler Lurch arrived with fresh cabbage tea, snow fell, only the boots were visible. Dig up the butler.

996.NAME: Painting the house
996.DESCRIPTION: The colour on Tussy's house has peeled off. Give her some buckets of colour

9960.NAME: Untie the horse
9960.DESCRIPTION: Not only the snow fell from the cloud, but also the beasts that the whirlwind picked up and dropped here. Help the horse.

9961.NAME: Icy hail
9961.DESCRIPTION: Looking at the sky, I can safely say that this is not the last snow. Remove the snow heaps, some of them are under the ice.

9962.NAME: Snowy bushes
9962.DESCRIPTION: The purple pod threw icy seeds into the air, not all bushes will seed at once. Freeze all the camellias.

9963.NAME: Sibyl's houseplants
9963.DESCRIPTION: How did the Sibyl's plants end up here? Flowers are disgusting, they don't sit at home when you tell them, re-grow the toothflowers!

9964.NAME: Cultivated plants
9964.DESCRIPTION: Harvest and praise the cornfields so that other plants can see how they should behave.

9965.NAME: The first blow
9965.DESCRIPTION: Stones are falling from the sky, what misfortune befell the island this time? Remove all fallen stones.

9966.NAME: The second blow
9966.DESCRIPTION: The biggest rock is still hanging in the air, when you plant the pod in the ground, it will surely fall. Clean up the giant crater.

9967.NAME: Dinosaur remains
9967.DESCRIPTION: Such rocks once killed the dinosaurs. Sell your chickens to at least save them from the rocks.

9968.NAME: Dead fish
9968.DESCRIPTION: Did the curse fail or hit someone else? The poor fish is close to death, revive them and feed them well.

9969.NAME: Live fish
9969.DESCRIPTION: Some of the fish are still quite vigorous, let them back into the ocean. Go fishing on any island.

997.NAME: Replacing the fence
997.DESCRIPTION: Tussy's fence is very old and crooked. Make and sell some plank fences.

9970.NAME: Giant aquariums
9970.DESCRIPTION: Catch the scattered sea plants and put them in the aquariums. Build four such aquariums. If aquariums are not available, wait, they will be!

9975.NAME: Curse Overcoming
9975.DESCRIPTION: Only after overcoming all five curses will you be able to split the blue-green bushes. IMPROVES the crazy bush obstacle.

9976.NAME: A lost monster
9976.DESCRIPTION: Jelly only a few hours as if brewed, big in size, but still a child at heart. Calm the jelly monster.

998.NAME: Copper decorations
998.DESCRIPTION: Tussy wants some new decorations for her house. Give her some copper ore

999.NAME: Tussy - the pig farmer
999.DESCRIPTION: Tussy wants to be a pig-breeder. Grow and sell 25 pigs
